h4.p: [21] yo ^a^P1.0001^ea^ ^a^M1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ kappako.tiihipi appameyya.m.
[27] kaala.m karonto atidukkaraani.
[26] kheda.m gato lokahitaaya naatho.
[22] namo mahaakaaru.nikassa tassa..
[21] asambudha.m buddhanisevita.m ya.m.
[27] bhavaabhava.m gacchati jiivaloko.
[26] namo ^a^V1.0002^ea^ avijjaadikilesajaala-
[22] viddha.msino dhammavarassa tassa..
[21] gu.nehi yo siilasamaadhipa~n~naa-
[27] vimutti~naa.nappabhutiihi yutto.
[26] khetta.m janaana.m kusalatthikaana.m.
[22] tamariyasa"ngha.m sirasaa namaami..
[21] iccevamaccantanamassaneyya.m.
[27] namassamaano ratanattaya.m ya.m.
[26] pu~n~naabhisanda.m vipula.m alattha.m.
[22] tassaanubhaavena hatantaraayo..
[21] yasmi.m ^a^M1.0002^ea^ .thite saasanama.t.thitassa.
[27] pati.t.thita.m hoti susa.n.thitassa.
[26] ta.m va.n.nayissa.m vinaya.m amissa.m.
[22] nissaaya pubbaacariyaanubhaava.m..
[21] kaama~nca pubbaacariyaasabhehi.
[27] ~naa.nambuniddhotamalaasavehi.
[26] visuddhavijjaapa.tisambhidehi ^a^P1.0002^ea^.
[22] saddhammasa.mva.n.nanakovidehi..
[21] sallekhiye nosulabhuupamehi.
[27] mahaavihaarassa dhajuupamehi.
[26] sa.mva.n.nitoya.m vinayo nayehi.
[22] cittehi sambuddhavaranvayehi..
[21] sa.mva.n.nanaa siiha.ladiipakena.
[27] vaakyena esaa pana sa"nkhatattaa.
[26] na ^a^V1.0003^ea^ ki~nci attha.m abhisambhu.naati.
[22] diipantare bhikkhujanassa yasmaa..
[21] tasmaa ima.m paa.linayaanuruupa.m.
[27] sa.mva.n.nana.m daani samaarabhissa.m.
[26] ajjhesana.m buddhasirivhayassa.
[22] therassa sammaa samanussaranto..
[21] sa.mva.n.nana.m ta~nca samaarabhanto.
[27] tassaa mahaaa.t.thakatha.m sariira.m.
[26] katvaa mahaapaccariya.m tatheva.
[22] kurundinaamaadisu vissutaasu..
[21] vinicchayo a.t.thakathaasu vutto.
[27] yo yuttamattha.m apariccajanto.
[26] tatopi antogadhatheravaada.m.
[22] sa.mva.n.nana.m samma samaarabhissa.m..
[21] ta.m ^a^M1.0003^ea^ me nisaamentu pasannacittaa.
[27] theraa ca bhikkhuu navamajjhimaa ca.
[26] dhammappadiipassa tathaagatassa.
[22] sakkacca dhamma.m patimaanayantaa..
[21] buddhena dhammo vinayo ca vutto.
[27] yo tassa puttehi tatheva ~naato.
[26] so yehi tesa.m matimaccajantaa.
[22] yasmaa pure a.t.thakathaa aka.msu..
[21] tasmaa ^a^P1.0003^ea^ hi ya.m a.t.thakathaasu vutta.m.
[27] ta.m vajjayitvaana pamaadalekha.m.
[26] sabbampi ^a^V1.0004^ea^ sikkhaasu sagaaravaana.m.
[22] yasmaa pamaa.na.m idha pa.n.ditaana.m..
[21] tato ca bhaasantarameva hitvaa.
[27] vitthaaramagga~nca samaasayitvaa.
[26] vinicchaya.m sabbamasesayitvaa.
[22] tantikkama.m ki~nci avokkamitvaa..
[21] suttantikaana.m vacanaanamattha.m.

[03]tattha ^a^M1.0004^ea^ ^b^ta.m va.n.nayissa.m vinaya^eb^nti vuttattaa vinayo taava vavatthapetabbo. teneta.m vuccati -- ``vinayo naama idha sakala.m vinayapi.taka.m adhippeta''nti. sa.mva.n.nanattha.m panassa aya.m ^b^maatikaa^eb^ --
[21] vutta.m yena yadaa yasmaa, dhaarita.m yena caabhata.m.
[22] yatthappati.t.thitacetameta.m vatvaa vidhi.m tato..
[21] tenaatiaadipaa.thassa, attha.m naanappakaarato.
[22] dassayanto karissaami, vinayassatthava.n.nananti..

[03]tattha ^b^vutta.m yena yadaa yasmaa^eb^ti ida.m taava vacana.m ``tena samayena buddho bhagavaa vera~njaaya.m viharatii''ti evamaadivacana.m sandhaaya vutta.m. ida~nhi buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacana.m na hoti, tasmaa vattabbameta.m ^a^P1.0004^ea^ ``ida.m vacana.m kena vutta.m, kadaa vutta.m, kasmaa ca vutta''nti? aayasmataa upaalittherena vutta.m, ta~nca pana pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikaale.

[03]pa.thamamahaasa"ngiiti ^a^V1.0005^ea^ naama cesaa ki~ncaapi pa~ncasatika^b^sa"ngiitikkhandhake^eb^ vuttaa, nidaanakosallattha.m pana idhaapi iminaa nayena veditabbaa. dhammacakkappavattana~nhi aadi.m katvaa yaava subhaddaparibbaajakavinayanaa katabuddhakicce kusinaaraaya.m upavattane mallaana.m saalavane yamakasaalaanamantare visaakhapu.n.namadivase paccuusasamaye anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbute bhagavati lokanaathe, bhagavato parinibbaane sannipatitaana.m sattanna.m bhikkhusatasahassaana.m sa"nghatthero aayasmaa mahaakassapo sattaahaparinibbute bhagavati, subhaddena vu.d.dhapabbajitena ``ala.m, aavuso, maa socittha, maa paridevittha, sumuttaa maya.m tena mahaasama.nena; upaddutaa ca homa -- `ida.m vo kappati, ida.m vo na kappatii'ti! idaani pana maya.m ya.m icchissaama ta.m karissaama, ya.m na icchissaama na ta.m karissaamaa''ti (cuu.lava0 437; dii0 ni0 2.232) vuttavacanamanussaranto ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m paapabhikkhuu atiitasatthuka.m paavacananti ma~n~namaanaa ^a^M1.0005^ea^ pakkha.m labhitvaa nacirasseva saddhamma.m antaradhaapeyyu.m, yaava ca dhammavinayo ti.t.thati taava anatiitasatthukameva paavacana.m hoti. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
[02] `yo vo, aananda, mayaa dhammo ca vinayo ca desito pa~n~natto ^a^P1.0005^ea^, so vo mamaccayena satthaa'ti (dii0 ni0 2.216).
[03]``ya.mnuunaaha.m dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyya.m, yathayida.m saasana.m addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika.m.
[03]ya.m caaha.m bhagavataa --
[02] `dhaaressasi pana me tva.m, kassapa, saa.naani pa.msukuulaani nibbasanaanii'ti vatvaa ciivare saadhaara.naparibhogena ceva,

[02] `aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavade aaka"nkhaami vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami; kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavade aaka"nkhati vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharatii'ti --

[03]evamaadinaa ^a^V1.0006^ea^ nayena navaanupubbavihaaracha.labhi~n~naappabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanaa samasama.t.thapanena ca anuggahito, tassa kima~n~na.m aa.na.nya.m bhavissati; nanu ma.m bhagavaa raajaa viya sakakavacaissariyaanuppadaanena attano kulava.msappati.t.thaapaka.m putta.m `saddhammava.msappati.t.thaapako me aya.m bhavissatii'ti mantvaa iminaa asaadhaara.nena anuggahena anuggahesii''ti cintayanto dhammavinayasa"ngaayanattha.m bhikkhuuna.m ussaaha.m janesi. yathaaha --

[02] ``atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `ekamidaaha.m, aavuso, samaya.m paavaaya kusinaara.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehii''ti (dii0 ni0 2.231) sabba.m ^b^subhaddaka.n.da^eb^.m vitthaarato veditabba.m.
[03]tato ^a^P1.0006^ea^ ^a^M1.0006^ea^ para.m aaha --

[02] ``handa maya.m, aavuso, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyyaama. pure adhammo dippati, dhammo pa.tibaahiyyati; avinayo dippati, vinayo pa.tibaahiyyati. pure adhammavaadino balavanto honti, dhammavaadino dubbalaa honti; avinayavaadino balavanto honti, vinayavaadino dubbalaa hontii''ti (cuu.lava0 437).

[03]bhikkhuu aaha.msu -- ``tena hi, bhante, thero bhikkhuu uccinatuu''ti. thero sakalanava"ngasatthusaasanapariyattidhare puthujjana-sotaapanna-sakadaagaami-anaagaami-sukkhavipassakakhii.naasavabhikkhuu anekasate anekasahasse ca vajjetvaa tipi.takasabbapariyattippabhedadhare pa.tisambhidaappatte mahaanubhaave yebhuyyena bhagavataa etadagga.m aaropite tevijjaadibhede khii.naasavabhikkhuuyeva ekuunapa~ncasate pariggahesi. ye sandhaaya ida.m vutta.m -- ``atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo ekenuunaapa~ncaarahantasataani uccinii''ti (cuu.lava0 437).

[03]kissa pana thero ekenuunamakaasiiti? aayasmato aanandattherassa okaasakara.nattha.m. tena haayasmataa sahaapi vinaapi na sakkaa dhammasa"ngiiti kaatu.m, so haayasmaa sekkho sakara.niiyo, tasmaa sahaapi na sakkaa; yasmaa panassa ki~nci dasabaladesita.m suttageyyaadika.m bhagavato asammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m naama natthi, tasmaa vinaapi na sakkaa. yadi eva.m sekkhopi samaano dhammasa"ngiitiyaa bahukaarattaa therena uccinitabbo assa. atha kasmaa na uccinitoti ^a^P1.0007^ea^? paruupavaadavivajjanato. thero hi aayasmante aanande ativiya vissattho ahosi, tathaa hi na.m ^a^V1.0007^ea^ sirasmi.m palitesu jaatesupi ``na vaaya.m kumaarako mattama~n~naasii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.154) kumaarakavaadena ovadati. sakyakulappasuto caaya.m aayasmaa tathaagatassa bhaataa cuu.lapituputto. tatra hi bhikkhuu chandaagamana.m viya ma~n~namaanaa ``bahuu asekkhapa.tisambhidaappatte bhikkhuu .thapetvaa aananda.m sekkhapa.tisambhidaappatta.m thero uccinii''ti upavadeyyu.m, ta.m paruupavaada.m parivajjento ``aananda.m vinaa sa"ngiiti ^a^M1.0007^ea^ na sakkaa kaatu.m, bhikkhuuna.myeva anumatiyaa gahessaamii''ti na uccini.
[03]atha sayameva bhikkhuu aanandassatthaaya thera.m yaaci.msu. yathaaha --

[02] ``bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavocu.m -- `aya.m, bhante, aayasmaa aanando ki~ncaapi sekkho abhabbo chandaa dosaa mohaa bhayaa agati.m gantu.m, bahu caanena bhagavato santike dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto; tena hi, bhante, thero aayasmantampi aananda.m uccinatuu'ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmantampi aananda.m uccinii''ti (cuu.lava0 437).
[03]eva.m bhikkhuuna.m anumatiyaa uccinitena tenaayasmataa saddhi.m pa~nca therasataani ahesu.m.

[03]atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kattha nu kho maya.m dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyyaamaa''ti. atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``raajagaha.m kho ^a^P1.0008^ea^ mahaagocara.m pahuutasenaasana.m, ya.mnuuna maya.m raajagahe vassa.m vasantaa dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyyaama, na a~n~ne bhikkhuu raajagahe vassa.m upagaccheyyu''nti. kasmaa pana nesa.m etadahosi? ida.m amhaaka.m thaavarakamma.m, koci visabhaagapuggalo sa"nghamajjha.m pavisitvaa ukko.teyyaati. athaayasmaa mahaakassapo ~nattidutiyena kammena saavesi, ta.m ^b^sa"ngiitikkhandhake^eb^ vuttanayeneva ~naatabba.m.

[03]atha tathaagatassa parinibbaanato sattasu saadhukii.lanadivasesu sattasu ca dhaatupuujaadivasesu viitivattesu ``a.d.dhamaaso atikkanto, idaani gimhaana.m diya.d.dho maaso seso, upaka.t.thaa vassuupanaayikaa''ti mantvaa mahaakassapatthero ``raajagaha.m, aavuso, gacchaamaa''ti upa.d.dha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m gahetvaa eka.m magga.m gato. anuruddhattheropi upa.d.dha.m gahetvaa eka.m magga.m gato. aanandatthero pana bhagavato pattaciivara.m gahetvaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto saavatthi.m gantvaa raajagaha.m gantukaamo yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. aanandattherena gatagata.t.thaane mahaaparidevo ahosi ^a^V1.0008^ea^ -- ``bhante aananda, kuhi.m satthaara.m .thapetvaa aagatosii''ti ^a^M1.0008^ea^. anupubbena pana saavatthi.m anuppatte there bhagavato parinibbaanadivase viya mahaaparidevo ahosi.

[03]tatra suda.m aayasmaa aanando aniccataadipa.tisa.myuttaaya dhammiyaa kathaaya ta.m mahaajana.m sa~n~naapetvaa jetavana.m pavisitvaa dasabalena vasitagandhaku.tiyaa dvaara.m vivaritvaa ma~ncapii.tha.m niiharitvaa pappho.tetvaa gandhaku.ti.m sammajjitvaa milaatamaalaakacavara.m ^a^P1.0009^ea^ cha.d.detvaa ma~ncapii.tha.m atiharitvaa puna yathaa.thaane .thapetvaa bhagavato .thitakaale kara.niiya.m vatta.m sabbamakaasi. atha thero bhagavato parinibbaanato pabhuti .thaananisajjabahulattaa ussannadhaatuka.m kaaya.m samassaasetu.m dutiyadivase khiiravirecana.m pivitvaa vihaareyeva nisiidi. ya.m sandhaaya subhena maa.navena pahita.m maa.navaka.m etadavoca --
[02] ``akaalo kho, maa.navaka, atthi me ajja bhesajjamattaa piitaa, appeva naama svepi upasa"nkameyyaamaa''ti (dii0 ni0 1.447).
[03]dutiyadivase cetakattherena pacchaasama.nena gantvaa subhena maa.navena pu.t.tho diighanikaaye ^b^subhasutta.m^eb^naama dasama.m suttamabhaasi.

[03]atha thero jetavanavihaare kha.n.daphullappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m kaaraapetvaa upaka.t.thaaya vassuupanaayikaaya raajagaha.m gato. tathaa mahaakassapatthero anuruddhatthero ca sabba.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m gahetvaa raajagahameva gato.

[03]tena kho pana samayena raajagahe a.t.thaarasa mahaavihaaraa honti. te sabbepi cha.d.ditapatitauklaapaa ahesu.m. bhagavato hi parinibbaane sabbe bhikkhuu attano attano pattaciivara.m gahetvaa vihaare ca parive.ne ca cha.d.detvaa agama.msu. tattha theraa bhagavato vacanapuujanattha.m titthiyavaadaparimocanattha~nca ``pa.thama.m maasa.m kha.n.daphullappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m karomaa''ti cintesu.m. titthiyaa hi eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaa satthari .thiteyeva vihaare pa.tijaggi.msu, parinibbute cha.d.desu''nti. tesa.m vaadaparimocanattha~nca cintesunti vutta.m hoti. vuttampi ^a^P1.0010^ea^ heta.m --

[02] ``atha ^a^M1.0009^ea^ kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- `bhagavataa kho, aavuso, kha.n.daphullappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m ^a^V1.0009^ea^ va.n.nita.m. handa maya.m, aavuso, pa.thama.m maasa.m kha.n.daphullappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m karoma, majjhima.m maasa.m sannipatitvaa dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayissaamaa''ti (cuu.lava0 438).

[03]te dutiyadivase gantvaa raajadvaare a.t.tha.msu. ajaatasattu raajaa aagantvaa vanditvaa ``ki.m, bhante, aagatatthaa''ti attanaa kattabbakicca.m pa.tipucchi. theraa a.t.thaarasa mahaavihaarapa.tisa"nkhara.natthaaya hatthakamma.m pa.tivedesu.m. ``saadhu, bhante''ti raajaa hatthakammakaarake manusse adaasi. theraa pa.thama.m maasa.m sabbavihaare pa.tisa"nkharaapetvaa ra~n~no aarocesu.m -- ``ni.t.thita.m, mahaaraaja, vihaarapa.tisa"nkhara.na.m. idaani dhammavinayasa"ngaha.m karomaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante, vissatthaa karotha. mayha.m aa.naacakka.m, tumhaaka.m dhammacakka.m hotu. aa.naapetha, bhante, ki.m karomii''ti? ``sa"ngaha.m karontaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sannisajja.t.thaana.m, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``kattha karomi, bhante''ti? ``vebhaarapabbatapasse sattapa.n.niguhaadvaare kaatu.m yutta.m, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante''ti kho raajaa ajaatasattu vissakammunaa nimmitasadisa.m suvibhattabhittitthambhasopaana.m naanaavidhamaalaakammalataaakammavicitta.m abhibhavantamiva raajabhavanavibhuuti.m avahasantamiva devavimaanasiri.m siriyaa niketamiva ekanipaatatitthamiva ca devamanussanayanaviha"ngaana.m lokaraama.neyyakamiva sampi.n.dita.m da.t.thabbasaarama.n.da.m ma.n.dapa.m kaaraapetvaa vividhakusumadaama-olambaka-viniggalantacaaruvitaana.m ^a^P1.0011^ea^ ratanavicittama.niko.t.timatalamiva ca na.m naanaapupphuupahaaravicittasuparini.t.thitabhuumikamma.m brahmavimaanasadisa.m ala"nkaritvaa tasmi.m mahaama.n.dape pa~ncasataana.m bhikkhuuna.m anagghaani pa~nca kappiyapaccatthara.nasataani pa~n~naapetvaa dakkhi.nabhaaga.m nissaaya uttaraabhimukha.m theraasana.m ma.n.dapamajjhe puratthaabhimukha.m buddhassa bhagavato aasanaaraha.m dhammaasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa dantakhacita.m biijani~ncettha .thapetvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa aarocaapesi -- ``ni.t.thita.m, bhante, mama kicca''nti.

[03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye ekacce bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m aananda.m sandhaaya evamaaha.msu -- ``imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe eko bhikkhu vissagandha.m vaayanto vicaratii''ti. thero ta.m sutvaa ``imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe a~n~no vissagandha.m vaayanto ^a^M1.0010^ea^ vicara.nakabhikkhu naama natthi, addhaa ete ma.m sandhaaya vadantii''ti sa.mvega.m aapajji. ekacce bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m aananda.m aaha.msu -- ``sve, aavuso, sannipaato tva~nca sekkho sakara.niiyo, tena te na yutta.m sannipaata.m gantu.m, appamatto hohii''ti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa aanando -- ``sve sannipaato, na kho pana meta.m patiruupa.m yvaaha.m sekkho ^a^V1.0010^ea^ samaano sannipaata.m gaccheyya''nti bahudeva ratti.m kaayagataayasatiyaa viitinaametvaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m ca"nkamaa orohitvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa ``nipajjissaamii''ti kaaya.m aavajjesi. dve paadaa bhuumito muttaa, appatta~nca siisa.m bimbohana.m, etasmi.m antare anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci. aya~nhi aayasmaa ca"nkamena ^a^P1.0012^ea^ bahi viitinaametvaa visesa.m nibbattetu.m asakkonto cintesi -- ``nanu ma.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- `katapu~n~nosi tva.m, aananda, padhaanamanuyu~nja; khippa.m hohisi anaasavo'ti (dii0 ni0 2.207). buddhaana~nca kathaadoso naama natthi. mama accaaraddha.m viiriya.m tena me citta.m uddhaccaaya sa.mvattati. handaaha.m viiriyasamatha.m yojemii''ti ca"nkamaa orohitvaa paadadhovana.t.thaane .thatvaa paade dhovitvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa ma~ncake nisiiditvaa ``thoka.m vissamissaamii''ti kaaya.m ma~ncake upanaamesi. dve paadaa bhuumito muttaa, siisa~nca bimbohana.m asampatta.m. etasmi.m antare anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, catuiriyaapathavirahita.m therassa arahatta.m ahosi. tena imasmi.m saasane anipanno anisinno a.t.thito aca"nkamanto ``ko bhikkhu arahatta.m patto''ti vutte ``aanandatthero''ti vattu.m va.t.tati.

[03]atha kho theraa bhikkhuu dutiyadivase katabhattakiccaa pattaciivara.m pa.tisaametvaa dhammasabhaaya.m sannipatitaa. aanandatthero pana attano arahattappatti.m ~naapetukaamo bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m na gato. bhikkhuu yathaavu.d.dha.m attano attano pattaasane nisiidantaa aanandattherassa aasana.m .thapetvaa nisinnaa. tattha kehici ``etamaasana.m kassaa''ti vutte ``aanandattherassaa''ti. ``aanando pana kuhi.m gato''ti? tasmi.m samaye thero cintesi -- ``idaani mayha.m gamanakaalo''ti. tato attano aanubhaava.m ^a^P1.0013^ea^ dassento pathaviya.m nimujjitvaa attano aasaneyeva attaana.m dassesi. aakaasenaagantvaa nisiidiitipi eke.

[03]eva.m ^a^M1.0011^ea^ nisinne tasmi.m aayasmante mahaakassapatthero bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, ki.m pa.thama.m sa"ngaayaama, dhamma.m vaa vinaya.m vaa''ti? bhikkhuu aaha.msu -- ``bhante mahaakassapa, ^b^vinayo naama buddhasaasanassa aayu, vinaye .thite saasana.m .thita.m hoti;^eb^ tasmaa pa.thama.m vinaya.m sa"ngaayaamaa''ti,. ``ka.m dhura.m katvaa''ti? ``aayasmanta.m upaali''nti. ``ki.m aanando nappahotii''ti? ``no nappahoti; api ca kho pana sammaasambuddho dharamaanoyeva vinayapariyatti.m nissaaya aayasmanta.m upaali.m etadagge .thapesi -- `etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vinayadharaana.m yadida.m upaalii'ti (a0 ni0 1.219, 228). tasmaa upaalitthera.m ^a^V1.0011^ea^ pucchitvaa vinaya.m sa"ngaayaamaa''ti. tato thero vinaya.m pucchanatthaaya attanaava attaana.m sammanni. upaalittheropi vissajjanatthaaya sammanni. tatraaya.m paa.li --
[03]``atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m upaali.m vinaya.m puccheyya'nti.
[03]``aayasmaapi upaali sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aayasmataa mahaakassapena vinaya.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti.

[03]eva.m attanaava attaana.m sammannitvaa aayasmaa upaali u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa there bhikkhuu vanditvaa dhammaasane nisiidi, dantakhacita.m biijani.m gahetvaa. tato aayasmaa mahaakassapo theraasane nisiiditvaa aayasmanta.m upaali.m vinaya.m pucchi -- ``pa.thama.m, aavuso upaali, paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta''nti ^a^P1.0014^ea^? ``vesaaliya.m, bhante''ti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti? ``sudinna.m kalandaputta.m aarabbhaa''ti. ``kismi.m vatthusmi''nti? ``methunadhamme''ti.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m upaali.m pa.thamassa paaraajikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, pa~n~nattimpi pucchi, anupa~n~nattimpi pucchi, aapattimpi pucchi, anaapattimpi pucchi; yathaa ca pa.thamassa tathaa dutiyassa tathaa tatiyassa tathaa catutthassa paaraajikassa vatthumpi pucchi...pe0... anaapattimpi pucchi. pu.t.tho pu.t.tho upaalitthero vissajjesi. tato ^a^M1.0012^ea^ imaani cattaari paaraajikaani ``paaraajikaka.n.da.m naama ida''nti sa"ngaha.m aaropetvaa .thapesu.m. terasa sa"nghaadisesaani ``terasaka''nti .thapesu.m. dve sikkhaapadaani ``aniyataanii''ti .thapesu.m. ti.msa sikkhaapadaani ``nissaggiyapaacittiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. dvenavuti sikkhaapadaani ``paacittiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. cattaari sikkhaapadaani ``paa.tidesaniiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. pa~ncasattati sikkhaapadaani ``sekhiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. satta dhamme ``adhikara.nasamathaa''ti .thapesu.m.

[03]eva.m ^a^V1.0012^ea^ mahaavibha"nga.m sa"ngaha.m aaropetvaa bhikkhuniivibha"nge a.t.tha sikkhaapadaani ``paaraajikaka.n.da.m naama ida''nti .thapesu.m. sattarasa sikkhaapadaani ``sattarasaka''nti .thapesu.m. ti.msa sikkhaapadaani ``nissaggiyapaacittiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. chasa.t.thisatasikkhaapadaani ``paacittiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. a.t.tha sikkhaapadaani ``paa.tidesaniiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. pa~ncasattati sikkhaapadaani ``sekhiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. satta dhamme ``adhikara.nasamathaa''ti ^a^P1.0015^ea^ .thapesu.m. eva.m bhikkhuniivibha"nga.m sa"ngaha.m aaropetvaa eteneva upaayena khandhakaparivaarepi aaropesu.m. evameta.m saubhatovibha"ngakhandhakaparivaara.m vinayapi.taka.m sa"ngahamaaruu.lha.m sabba.m mahaakassapatthero pucchi, upaalitthero vissajjesi. pucchaavissajjanapariyosaane pa~nca arahantasataani sa"ngaha.m aaropitanayeneva ga.nasajjhaayamaka.msu. vinayasa"ngahaavasaane upaalitthero dantakhacita.m biijani.m nikkhipitvaa dhammaasanaa orohitvaa vu.d.dhe bhikkhuu vanditvaa attano pattaasane nisiidi.

[03]vinaya.m sa"ngaayitvaa dhamma.m sa"ngaayitukaamo aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhikkhuu pucchi -- ``dhamma.m sa"ngaayantehi ka.m puggala.m dhura.m katvaa dhammo sa"ngaayitabbo''ti? bhikkhuu ``aanandatthera.m dhura.m katvaa''ti aaha.msu.
[03]atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aananda.m dhamma.m puccheyya''nti.
[03]atha kho aayasmaa aanando sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m aayasmataa mahaakassapena dhamma.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti.

[03]atha ^a^M1.0013^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa there bhikkhuu vanditvaa dhammaasane nisiidi dantakhacita.m biijani.m gahetvaa. atha mahaakassapatthero aanandatthera.m dhamma.m pucchi -- ``brahmajaala.m, aavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''nti? ``antaraa ca, bhante, raajagaha.m ^a^P1.0016^ea^ antaraa ca naa.landa.m raajaagaarake ambala.t.thikaaya''nti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti? ``suppiya~nca paribbaajaka.m, brahmadatta~nca maa.nava''nti. ``kismi.m vatthusmi''nti? ``va.n.naava.n.ne''ti. atha kho ^a^V1.0013^ea^ aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m brahmajaalassa nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, vatthumpi pucchi. ``saama~n~naphala.m panaavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''nti? `raajagahe, bhante, jiivakambavane''ti. ``kena saddhi''nti? ``ajaatasattunaa vedehiputtena saddhi''nti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m saama~n~naphalassa nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi. eteneva upaayena pa~nca nikaaye pucchi.

[03]^b^pa~ncanikaayaa^eb^ naama -- diighanikaayo, majjhimanikaayo, sa.myuttanikaayo, a"nguttaranikaayo, khuddakanikaayoti. tattha khuddakanikaayo naama -- cattaaro nikaaye .thapetvaa, avasesa.m buddhavacana.m. tattha vinayo aayasmataa upaalittherena vissajjito, sesakhuddakanikaayo cattaaro ca nikaayaa aanandattherena. tadeta.m sabbampi buddhavacana.m rasavasena ekavidha.m, dhammavinayavasena duvidha.m, pa.thamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividha.m; tathaa pi.takavasena, nikaayavasena pa~ncavidha.m, a"ngavasena navavidha.m, dhammakkhandhavasena caturaasiitisahassavidhanti veditabba.m.

[03]katha.m ^b^rasavasena ekavidha.m^eb^? ya~nhi bhagavataa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhitvaa yaava anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati, etthantare pa~ncacattaaliisavassaani devamanussanaagayakkhaadayo anusaasantena paccavekkhantena vaa vutta.m, sabba.m ta.m ekarasa.m vimuttirasameva hoti. eva.m rasavasena ekavidha.m.

[03]katha.m ^a^P1.0017^ea^ ^b^dhammavinayavasena duvidha.m^eb^? sabbameva ceta.m dhammo ceva vinayo caati sa"nkhya.m gacchati. tattha vinayapi.taka.m ^b^vinayo,^eb^ avasesa.m buddhavacana.m ^b^dhammo;^eb^ tenevaaha -- ``ya.mnuuna maya.m, aavuso, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyyaamaa''ti. ``aha.m ^a^M1.0014^ea^ upaali.m vinaya.m puccheyya.m, aananda.m dhamma.m puccheyya''nti ca eva.m dhammavinayavasena duvidha.m.
[03]katha.m ^b^pa.thamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividha.m^eb^? sabbameva hida.m pa.thamabuddhavacana.m, majjhimabuddhavacana.m, pacchimabuddhavacananti tippabheda.m hoti. tattha --
[21] ``anekajaatisa.msaara.m, sandhaavissa.m anibbisa.m.
[22] gahakaara.m gavesanto, dukkhaa jaati punappuna.m..
[21] ``gahakaaraka ^a^V1.0014^ea^ di.t.thosi, puna geha.m na kaahasi.
[27] sabbaa te phaasukaa bhaggaa, gahakuu.ta.m visa"nkhata.m.
[22] visa"nkhaaragata.m citta.m, ta.nhaana.m khayamajjhagaa''ti.. (dha0 pa0 153-154).
[03]ida.m ^b^pa.thamabuddhavacana.m^eb^.

[03]keci ``yadaa have paatubhavanti dhammaa''ti ^b^khandhake^eb^ udaanagaatha.m aahu. esaa pana paa.tipadadivase sabba~n~nubhaavappattassa somanassamaya~naa.nena paccayaakaara.m paccavekkhantassa uppannaa udaanagaathaati veditabbaa.
[03]ya.m pana parinibbaanakaale abhaasi -- ``handa daani, bhikkhave, aamantayaami vo, vayadhammaa sa"nkhaaraa, appamaadena sampaadethaa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.218) ida.m ^b^pacchimabuddhavacana.m^eb^.
[03]ubhinnamantare ya.m vutta.m eta.m ^b^majjhimabuddhavacana^eb^nti. eva.m pa.thamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividha.m.

[03]katha.m ^a^P1.0018^ea^ ^b^pi.takavasena tividha.m?^eb^ sabbampi heta.m vinayapi.taka.m suttantapi.taka.m abhidhammapi.takanti tippabhedameva hoti. tattha pa.thamasa"ngiitiya.m sa"ngiita~nca asa"ngiita~nca sabbampi samodhaanetvaa ubhayaani paatimokkhaani, dve vibha"ngaani, dvaaviisati khandhakaani, so.lasaparivaaraati ida.m ^b^vinayapi.taka.m^eb^ naama.

[03]brahmajaalaadi catutti.msasuttasa"ngaho diighanikaayo, muulapariyaayasuttaadi diya.d.dhasatadvesuttasa"ngaho majjhimanikaayo, oghatara.nasuttaadi sattasuttasahassa sattasata dvaasa.t.thisuttasa"ngaho sa.myuttanikaayo, cittapariyaadaanasuttaadi navasuttasahassa pa~ncasata sattapa~n~naasasuttasa"ngaho a"nguttaranikaayo, khuddakapaa.tha-dhammapada-udaana-itivuttaka-suttanipaata-vimaanavatthu-petavatthu-theragaathaa-theriigaathaa-jaatakaniddesa-pa.tisambhidaa-apadaana-buddhava.msa-cariyaapi.takavasena ^a^M1.0015^ea^ pannarasappabhedo khuddakanikaayoti ida.m ^b^suttantapi.taka.m^eb^ naama.
[03]dhammasa"ngaho, vibha"ngo, dhaatukathaa, puggalapa~n~natti, kathaavatthu, yamaka.m, pa.t.thaananti ida.m ^b^abhidhammapi.taka.m^eb^ naama. tattha --
[21] vividhavisesanayattaa ^a^V1.0015^ea^, vinayanato ceva kaayavaacaana.m.
[22] vinayatthaviduuhi aya.m, vinayo vinayoti akkhaato..

[03]vividhaa hi ettha pa~ncavidha paatimokkhuddesa paaraajikaadi sattaaapattikkhandhamaatikaa vibha"ngaadippabhedaa nayaa, visesabhuutaa ca da.lhiikammasithilakara.nappayojanaa anupa~n~nattinayaa ^a^P1.0019^ea^, kaayikavaacasikaajjhaacaaranisedhanato cesa kaaya.m vaaca~nca vineti, tasmaa vividhanayattaa visesanayattaa kaayavaacaana~nca vinayanato ``vinayo''ti akkhaato. tenetametassa vacanatthakosallattha.m vutta.m --
[21] ``vividhavisesanayattaa, vinayanato ceva kaayavaacaana.m.
[22] vinayatthaviduuhi aya.m, vinayo vinayoti akkhaato''ti..
[03]itara.m pana --
[21] atthaana.m suucanato, suvuttato savanatotha suudanato.
[22] suttaa.naa suttasabhaagato ca, suttanti akkhaata.m..

[03]ta~nhi attatthaparatthaadibhede atthe suuceti, suvuttaa cettha atthaa veneyyajjhaasayaanulomena vuttattaa. savati ceta.m atthe sassamiva phala.m pasavatiiti vutta.m hoti. suudati ceta.m dhenuviya khiira.m, paggharatiiti vutta.m hoti. su.t.thu ca ne taayati rakkhatiiti vutta.m hoti. suttasabhaaga~nceta.m, yathaa hi tacchakaana.m sutta.m pamaa.na.m hoti; evametampi vi~n~nuuna.m. yathaa ca suttena sa"ngahitaani pupphaani na vikiriyanti na viddha.msiyanti; evametena sa"ngahitaa atthaa. tenetametassa vacanatthakosallattha.m vutta.m --
[21] ``atthaana.m suucanato, suvuttato savanatotha suudanato.
[22] suttaa.naa suttasabhaagato ca, suttanti akkhaata''nti..
[21] ya.m ettha vu.d.dhimanto, salakkha.naa puujitaa paricchinnaa.
[22] vuttaadhikaa ca dhammaa, abhidhammo tena akkhaato..

[03]aya~nhi ^a^V1.0016^ea^ abhisaddo vu.d.dhilakkha.napuujitaparicchinnaadhikesu dissati. tathaahesa -- ``baa.lhaa me aavuso dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti no pa.tikkamantii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 3.389; sa.m0 ni0 5.195) vu.d.dhiya.m aagato. ``yaa taa rattiyo abhi~n~naataa abhilakkhitaa''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.49) lakkha.ne. ``raajaabhiraajaa manujindo''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.399; su0 ni0 558) puujite. ``pa.tibalo vinetu.m abhidhamme abhivinaye''tiaadiisu (mahaava0 85) paricchinne. a~n~nama~n~nasa"nkaravirahite dhamme ca vinaye caati vutta.m hoti. ``abhikkantena va.n.nenaa''tiaadiisu (vi0 va0 75) adhike.

[03]ettha ca ``ruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti, mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatii''tiaadinaa (dha0 sa0 160 aadayo) nayena vu.d.dhimantopi dhammaa vuttaa. ``ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa''tiaadinaa nayena aaramma.naadiihi lakkha.niiyattaa salakkha.naapi. ``sekkhaa dhammaa, asekkhaa dhammaa, lokuttaraa dhammaa''tiaadinaa nayena puujitaapi puujaarahaati adhippaayo. ``phasso hoti vedanaa hotii''tiaadinaa nayena sabhaavaparicchinnattaa paricchinnaapi. ``mahaggataa dhammaa, appamaa.naa dhammaa, anuttaraa dhammaa''tiaadinaa nayena adhikaapi dhammaa vuttaa. tenetametassa vacanatthakosallattha.m vutta.m --
[21] ``ya.m ettha vu.d.dhimanto, salakkha.naa puujitaa paricchinnaa.
[22] vuttaadhikaa ca dhammaa, abhidhammo tena akkhaato''ti..
[03]ya.m panettha avisi.t.tha.m, ta.m --
[21] pi.taka.m pi.takatthaviduu, pariyattibbhaajanatthato aahu.
[22] tena samodhaanetvaa, tayopi vinayaadayo ~neyyaa..

[03]pariyattipi ^a^P1.0021^ea^ ^a^M1.0017^ea^ hi ``maa pi.takasampadaanenaa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 3.66) pi.takanti vuccati. ``atha puriso aagaccheyya kudaalapi.taka.m aadaayaa''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.228; a0 ni0 3.70) ya.m ki~nci bhaajanampi. tasmaa pi.taka.m pi.takatthaviduu, pariyattibbhaajanatthato aahu.

[03]idaani ^b^tena samodhaanetvaa tayopi vinayaadayo ~neyyaa^eb^ti. tena eva.m duvidhatthena pi.takasaddena saha ^a^V1.0017^ea^ samaasa.m katvaa vinayo ca so pi.taka~nca pariyattibhaavato tassa tassa atthassa bhaajanato caati vinayapi.taka.m, yathaavutteneva nayena suttanta~nca ta.m pi.taka~ncaati suttantapi.taka.m, abhidhammo ca so pi.taka~ncaati abhidhammapi.takanti evamete tayopi vinayaadayo ~neyyaa.
[03]eva.m ~natvaa ca punapi tesveva pi.takesu naanappakaarakosallattha.m --
[21] desanaasaasanakathaa, bheda.m tesu yathaaraha.m.
[22] sikkhaapahaanagambhiira, bhaava~nca paridiipaye..
[21] pariyattibheda.m sampatti.m, vipatti.m caapi ya.m yahi.m.
[22] paapu.naati yathaa bhikkhu, tampi sabba.m vibhaavaye..

[03]tatraaya.m paridiipanaa vibhaavanaa ca, etaani hi tii.ni pi.takaani yathaakkama.m aa.naa vohaara paramatthadesanaa yathaaparaadha-yathaanuloma-yathaadhammasaasanaani, sa.mvaraasa.mvaradi.t.thivinive.thanaamaruupaparicchedakathaati ca vuccanti.

[03]ettha hi vinayapi.taka.m aa.naarahena bhagavataa aa.naabaahullato desitattaa ^b^aa.naadesanaa,^eb^ suttantapi.taka.m vohaarakusalena bhagavataa vohaarabaahullato desitattaa ^b^vohaaradesanaa,^eb^ abhidhammapi.taka.m paramatthakusalena bhagavataa paramatthabaahullato desitattaa ^b^paramatthadesanaa^eb^ti vuccati.

[03]tathaa ^a^P1.0022^ea^ pa.thama.m ye te pacuraaparaadhaa sattaa te yathaaparaadha.m ettha saasitaati ^b^yathaaparaadhasaasana.m,^eb^ dutiya.m anekajjhaasayaanusayacariyaadhimuttikaa sattaa yathaanuloma.m ettha saasitaati ^b^yathaanulomasaasana.m,^eb^ tatiya.m dhammapu~njamatte ``aha.m mamaa''ti sa~n~nino sattaa yathaadhamma.m ettha saasitaati ^b^yathaadhammasaasana^eb^nti vuccati.

[03]tathaa ^a^M1.0018^ea^ pa.thama.m ajjhaacaarapa.tipakkhabhuuto sa.mvaraasa.mvaro ettha kathitoti ^b^sa.mvaraasa.mvarakathaa,^eb^ dutiya.m dvaasa.t.thidi.t.thipa.tipakkhabhuutaa di.t.thivinive.thanaa ettha kathitaati ^b^di.t.thivinive.thanakathaa,^eb^ tatiya.m raagaadipa.tipakkhabhuuto naamaruupaparicchedo ettha kathitoti ^b^naamaruupaparicchedakathaa^eb^ti vuccati.

[03]tiisupi ca cetesu tisso sikkhaa, tii.ni pahaanaani, catubbidho ca gambhiirabhaavo veditabbo ^a^V1.0018^ea^. tathaa hi -- vinayapi.take visesena ^b^adhisiilasikkhaa^eb^ vuttaa, suttantapi.take ^b^adhicittasikkhaa,^eb^ abhidhammapi.take ^b^adhipa~n~naasikkhaa^eb^.

[03]vinayapi.take ca ^b^viitikkamappahaana.m^eb^ kilesaana.m, viitikkamapa.tipakkhattaa siilassa. suttantapi.take ^b^pariyu.t.thaanappahaana.m,^eb^ pariyu.t.thaanapa.tipakkhattaa samaadhissa. abhidhammapi.take ^b^anusayappahaana.m^eb^ anusayapa.tipakkhattaa pa~n~naaya.

[03]pa.thame ca ^b^tada"ngappahaana.m^eb^ kilesaana.m, itaresu ^b^vikkhambhanasamucchedappahaanaani^eb^. pa.thame ca ^b^duccaritasa.mkilesassa^eb^ pahaana.m, itaresu ^b^ta.nhaadi.t.thisa.mkilesaana.m^eb^.

[03]ekamekasmi~ncettha catubbidhopi dhammatthadesanaapa.tivedhagambhiirabhaavo veditabbo. tattha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti paa.li. ^b^attho^eb^ti tassaayevattho. ^b^desanaa^eb^ti tassaa manasaavavatthaapitaaya paa.liyaa desanaa. ^b^pa.tivedho^eb^ti paa.liyaa paa.liatthassa ca yathaabhuutaavabodho. tiisupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanaapa.tivedhaa ^a^P1.0023^ea^ yasmaa sasaadiihi viya mahaasamuddo mandabuddhiihi dukkhogaahaa alabbhaneyyapati.t.thaa ca, tasmaa gambhiiraa. eva.m ekamekasmi.m ettha catubbidhopi gambhiirabhaavo veditabbo.

[03]aparo nayo -- ^b^dhammo^eb^ti hetu. vutta.m heta.m -- ``hetumhi ~naa.na.m dhammapa.tisambhidaa''ti. ^b^attho^eb^ti hetuphala.m. vutta.m heta.m -- ``hetuphale ~naa.na.m atthapa.tisambhidaa''ti. ^b^desanaa^eb^ti pa~n~natti, yathaadhamma.m dhammaabhilaapoti adhippaayo. ^b^pa.tivedho^eb^ti abhisamayo, so ca lokiyalokuttaro visayato asammohato ca atthaanuruupa.m dhammesu, dhammaanuruupa.m atthesu, pa~n~nattipathaanuruupa.m pa~n~nattiisu avabodho.

[03]idaani yasmaa etesu pi.takesu ya.m ya.m dhammajaata.m vaa atthajaata.m vaa, yaa caaya.m yathaa yathaa ~naapetabbo attho sotuuna.m ~naa.nassa abhimukho hoti, tathaa tathaa tadatthajotikaa desanaa, yo cettha ^a^M1.0019^ea^ avipariitaavabodhasa"nkhaato pa.tivedho sabbameta.m anupacitakusalasambhaarehi duppa~n~nehi sasaadiihi viya mahaasamuddo dukkhogaaha.m alabbhaneyyapati.t.tha~nca, tasmaa gambhiira.m. evampi ekamekasmi.m ettha catubbidhopi gambhiirabhaavo veditabbo.
[03]ettaavataa ^a^P1.0024^ea^ ca --
[21] ``desanaa-saasanakathaa ^a^V1.0019^ea^, bheda.m tesu yathaaraha.m.
[22] sikkhaapahaanagambhiirabhaava~nca paridiipaye''ti..
[03]aya.m gaathaa vuttatthaa hoti.
[21] ``pariyattibheda.m sampatti.m, vipatti~ncaapi ya.m yahi.m.
[22] paapu.naati yathaa bhikkhu, tampi sabba.m vibhaavaye''ti..
[03]ettha pana tiisu pi.takesu tividho ^b^pariyattibhedo^eb^ da.t.thabbo. tisso hi pariyattiyo -- alagadduupamaa, nissara.natthaa, bha.n.daagaarikapariyattiiti.

[03]tattha yaa duggahitaa upaarambhaadihetu pariyaapu.taa, aya.m ^b^alagadduupamaa^eb^. ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m -- ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso alagaddatthiko alagaddagavesii alagaddapariyesana.m caramaano, so passeyya mahanta.m alagadda.m. tamena.m bhoge vaa na"ngu.t.the vaa ga.nheyya. tassa so alagaddo pa.tiparivattitvaa hatthe vaa baahaaya vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa a"ngapacca"nge .da.mseyya. so tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya, mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. ta.m kissa hetu? duggahitattaa, bhikkhave, alagaddassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce moghapurisaa dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti sutta.m...pe0... vedalla.m. te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa tesa.m dhammaana.m pa~n~naaya attha.m na upaparikkhanti. tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya attha.m anupaparikkhata.m na nijjhaana.m khamanti. te upaarambhaanisa.msaa ceva dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca. yassa catthaaya dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhonti. tesa.m te dhammaa duggahitaa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? duggahitattaa, bhikkhave, dhammaana''nti (ma0 ni0 1.238).

[03]yaa ^a^P1.0025^ea^ ^a^M1.0020^ea^ pana suggahitaa siilakkhandhaadipaaripuuri.myeva aaka"nkhamaanena pariyaapu.taa na upaarambhaadi hetu, aya.m ^b^nissara.natthaa^eb^. ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m -- ``tesa.m te dhammaa suggahitaa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? suggahitattaa, bhikkhave, dhammaana''nti (ma0 ni0 1.239).

[03]ya.m pana pari~n~naatakkhandho pahiinakileso bhaavitamaggo pa.tividdhaakuppo sacchikatanirodho khii.naasavo ^a^V1.0020^ea^ kevala.m pave.niipaalanatthaaya va.msaanurakkha.natthaaya pariyaapu.naati, aya.m ^b^bha.n.daagaarikapaayattii^eb^ti.

[03]vinaye pana suppa.tipanno bhikkhu siilasampatti.m nissaaya tisso vijjaa paapu.naati, taasa.myeva ca tattha pabhedavacanato. sutte suppa.tipanno samaadhisampada.m nissaaya cha abhi~n~naa paapu.naati, taasa.myeva ca tattha pabhedavacanato. abhidhamme suppa.tipanno pa~n~naasampada.m nissaaya catasso pa.tisambhidaa paapu.naati, taasa~nca tattheva pabhedavacanato. evametesu suppa.tipanno yathaakkamena ima.m vijjaattayacha.labhi~n~naacatupa.tisambhidaabheda.m sampatti.m paapu.naati.

[03]vinaye pana duppa.tipanno anu~n~naatasukhasamphassaatthara.napaavura.naadiphassasaama~n~nato pa.tikkhittesu upaadinnaphassaadiisu anavajjasa~n~nii hoti. vuttampi heta.m -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti (paaci0 417; ma0 ni0 1.234) tato dussiilabhaava.m paapu.naati. sutte ^a^P1.0026^ea^ duppa.tipanno ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 4.5) adhippaaya.m ajaananto duggahita.m ga.nhaati. ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m -- ``attanaa duggahitena amhe ceva abbhaacikkhati, attaana~nca khanati, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti (paaci0 417; ma0 ni0 1.236) tato micchaadi.t.thita.m paapu.naati. abhidhamme duppa.tipanno dhammacinta.m atidhaavanto acinteyyaanipi cinteti, tato cittakkhepa.m paapu.naati. vutta.m heta.m -- ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, acinteyyaani na cintetabbaani, yaani cintento ummaadassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti (a0 ni0 4.77). evametesu duppa.tipanno yathaakkamena ima.m dussiilabhaavamicchaadi.t.thitaa cittakkhepabheda.m vipatti.m paapu.naatiiti.
[03]ettaavataa ^a^M1.0021^ea^ ca --
[21] ``pariyattibheda.m sampatti.m, vipatti.m caapi ya.m yahi.m.
[22] paapu.naati yathaa bhikkhu, tampi sabba.m vibhaavaye''ti..
[03]ayampi gaathaa vuttatthaa hoti. eva.m naanappakaarato pi.takaani ~natvaa tesa.m vaseneta.m buddhavacana.m tividhanti ~naatabba.m.

[03]katha.m ^a^V1.0021^ea^ nikaayavasena pa~ncavidha.m? sabbameva ceta.m diighanikaayo, majjhimanikaayo, sa.myuttanikaayo, a"nguttaranikaayo, khuddakanikaayoti pa~ncappabheda.m hoti. tattha katamo ^b^diighanikaayo^eb^? tivaggasa"ngahaani brahmajaalaadiini catutti.msa suttaani.
[21] catutti.mseva suttantaa, tivaggo yassa sa"ngaho.
[22] esa diighanikaayoti, pa.thamo anulomiko..

[03]kasmaa panesa diighanikaayoti vuccati? diighappamaa.naana.m suttaana.m samuuhato nivaasato ca, samuuhanivaasaa hi nikaayoti ^a^P1.0027^ea^ vuccanti. ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekanikaayampi samanupassaami eva.m citta.m; yathayida.m, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagataa paa.naa; po.nikanikaayo, cikkhallikanikaayo''ti (sa.m0 ni0 3.100) evamaadiini cettha saadhakaani saasanato ca lokato ca. eva.m sesaanampi nikaayabhaave vacanattho veditabbo.
[03]katamo ^b^majjhimanikaayo^eb^? majjhimappamaa.naani pa~ncadasavaggasa"ngahaani muulapariyaayasuttaadiini diya.d.dhasata.m dve ca suttaani.
[21] diya.d.dhasata.m suttantaa, dve ca suttaani yattha so.
[22] nikaayo majjhimo pa~nca-dasavaggapariggaho..
[03]katamo ^b^sa.myuttanikaayo^eb^? devataasa.myuttaadivasena .thitaani oghatara.naadiini satta suttasahassaani satta ca suttasataani dvaasa.t.thi ca suttaani.
[21] satta suttasahassaani, satta suttasataani ca.
[22] dvaasa.t.thi ceva suttantaa, eso sa.myuttasa"ngaho..
[03]katamo ^a^M1.0022^ea^ ^b^a"nguttaranikaayo^eb^? ekekaa"ngaatirekavasena .thitaani cittapariyaadaanaadiini nava suttasahassaani pa~nca suttasataani sattapa~n~naasa~nca suttaani.
[21] nava suttasahassaani, pa~nca suttasataani ca.
[22] sattapa~n~naasa suttaani, sa"nkhyaa a"nguttare aya.m..

[03]katamo ^a^V1.0022^ea^ ^b^khuddakanikaayo^eb^? sakala.m vinayapi.taka.m abhidhammapi.taka.m khuddakapaa.thaadayo ca pubbe nidassitaa pannarasabhedaa .thapetvaa cattaaro nikaaye avasesa.m buddhavacananti.
[21] .thapetvaa ^a^P1.0028^ea^ caturopete, nikaaye diighaaadike.
[22] tada~n~na.m buddhavacana.m, nikaayo khuddako matoti..
[03]eva.m nikaayavasena pa~ncavidha.m.

[03]katha.m a"ngavasena navavidha.m? sabbameva hida.m sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaathaa, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedallanti navappabheda.m hoti. tattha ubhatovibha"nganiddesakhandhakaparivaaraa suttanipaate ma"ngalasutta-ratanasutta-naalakasutta-tuva.t.takasuttaani a~n~nampi ca suttanaamaka.m tathaagatavacana.m ^b^sutta^eb^nti veditabba.m. sabbampi sagaathaka.m sutta.m ^b^geyya^eb^nti veditabba.m. visesena sa.myuttake sakalopi sagaathaavaggo, sakala.m abhidhammapi.taka.m, niggaathaka.m sutta.m, ya~nca a~n~nampi a.t.thahi a"ngehi asa"ngahita.m buddhavacana.m ta.m ^b^veyyaakara.na^eb^nti veditabba.m. dhammapada.m, theragaathaa, theriigaathaa, suttanipaate nosuttanaamikaa suddhikagaathaa ca ^b^gaathaa^eb^ti veditabbaa. somanassa~naa.namayikagaathaapa.tisa.myuttaa dvaasiiti suttantaa ^b^udaana^eb^nti veditabba.m. ``vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa''tiaadinayappavattaa dasuttarasatasuttantaa ^b^itivuttaka^eb^nti veditabba.m. apa.n.nakajaatakaadiini pa~n~naasaadhikaani pa~nca jaatakasataani ^b^jaataka^eb^nti veditabba.m. ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa aanande''ti (dii0 ni0 2.209) -aadinayappavattaa sabbepi acchariyaabbhutadhammapa.tisa.myuttaa suttantaa ^b^abbhutadhamma^eb^nti veditabba.m. cuu.lavedalla-mahaavedalla-sammaadi.t.thi-sakkapa~nha-sa"nkhaarabhaajaniya-mahaapu.n.namasuttaadayo ^a^P1.0029^ea^ sabbepi veda~nca tu.t.thi~nca laddhaa laddhaa pucchitasuttantaa ^b^vedalla^eb^nti veditabba.m. eva.m a"ngavasena navavidha.m.
[03]katha.m ^a^M1.0023^ea^ dhammakkhandhavasena caturaasiitisahassavidha.m? sabbameva ceta.m buddhavacana.m --
[21] ``dvaasiiti buddhato ga.nhi.m, dve sahassaani bhikkhuto.
[22] caturaasiiti sahassaani, ye me dhammaa pavattino''ti.. (theragaa0 1027).

[03]eva.m paridiipitadhammakkhandhavasena caturaasiitisahassappabheda.m hoti. tattha ekaanusandhika.m sutta.m eko dhammakkhandho. ya.m anekaanusandhika.m tattha anusandhivasena dhammakkhandhaga.nanaa. gaathaabandhesu pa~nhaapucchana.m ^a^V1.0023^ea^ eko dhammakkhandho, vissajjana.m eko. abhidhamme ekameka.m tika-duka-bhaajana.m, ekameka~nca cittavaarabhaajana.m, eko dhammakkhandho. vinaye atthi vatthu, atthi maatikaa, atthi padabhaajaniiya.m, atthi antaraapatti, atthi aapatti, atthi anaapatti, atthi paricchedo; tattha ekameko ko.t.thaaso, ekameko dhammakkhandhoti veditabbo. eva.m dhammakkhandhavasena caturaasiitisahassavidha.m.

[03]evameta.m abhedato rasavasena ekavidha.m, bhedato dhammavinayaadivasena duvidhaadibheda.m buddhavacana.m sa"ngaayantena mahaakassapappamukhena vasiiga.nena ``aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo; ida.m pa.thamabuddhavacana.m, ida.m majjhimabuddhavacana.m, ida.m pacchimabuddhavacana.m; ida.m vinayapi.taka.m, ida.m suttantapi.taka.m, ida.m abhidhammapi.taka.m; aya.m diighanikaayo...pe0... aya.m khuddakanikaayo; imaani suttaadiini nava"ngaani, imaani caturaasiitidhammakkhandhasahassaanii''ti ima.m pabheda.m vavatthapetvaava sa"ngiita.m. na ^a^P1.0030^ea^ kevala~nca ettakameva, a~n~nampi uddaanasa"ngaha-vaggasa"ngahapeyyaalasa"ngaha-ekakanipaata-dukanipaataadinipaatasa"ngaha-sa.myuttasa"ngaha-pa.n.naasasa"ngahaadianekavidha.m tiisu pi.takesu sandissamaana.m sa"ngahappabheda.m vavatthapetvaaeva sattahi maasehi sa"ngiita.m. sa"ngiitipariyosaane cassa -- ``ida.m mahaakassapattherena dasabalassa saasana.m pa~ncavassasahassaparimaa.na.m kaala.m pavattanasamattha.m kata''nti sa~njaatappamodaa saadhukaara.m viya dadamaanaa aya.m mahaapathavii udakapariyanta.m katvaa anekappakaara.m kampi sa"nkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, anekaani ca acchariyaani paaturahesunti aya.m ^b^pa.thamamahaasa"ngiiti^eb^naama. yaa loke --
[21] satehi pa~ncahi kataa, tena pa~ncasataati ca.
[22] thereheva katattaa ca, therikaati pavuccatiiti..

[03]imissaa ^a^M1.0024^ea^ pana pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitiyaa pavattamaanaaya vinaya.m pucchantena aayasmataa mahaakassapena ``pa.thama.m, aavuso upaali, paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta''nti evamaadivacanapariyosaane ``vatthumpi pucchi, nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchii''ti ettha nidaane pucchite ta.m nidaana.m aadito pabhuti vitthaaretvaa yena ca pa~n~natta.m, yasmaa ca pa~n~natta.m, sabbameta.m kathetukaamena aayasmataa upaalittherena vutta.m ``tena samayena ^a^P1.0031^ea^ buddho bhagavaa vera~njaaya.m viharatii''ti sabba.m vattabba.m. evamida.m aayasmataa upaalittherena vutta.m, ta~nca pana ``pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikaale vutta''nti veditabba.m. ettaavataa ca ``ida.m vacana.m kena vutta.m, kadaa vutta''nti etesa.m padaana.m attho pakaasito hoti.

[03]idaani ^a^V1.0024^ea^ kasmaa vuttanti ettha vuccate, yasmaa ayamaayasmataa mahaakassapattherena nidaana.m pu.t.tho tasmaanena ta.m nidaana.m aadito pabhuti vitthaaretu.m vuttanti. evamida.m aayasmataa upaalittherena pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikaale vadantenaapi iminaa kaara.nena vuttanti veditabba.m. ettaavataa ca ^b^vutta.m yena yadaa yasmaa^eb^ti imesa.m maatikaapadaana.m attho pakaasito hoti.

[03]idaani ^b^dhaarita.m yena caabhata.m, yatthappati.t.thita.m cetameta.m vatvaa vidhi.m tato^eb^ti etesa.m atthappakaasanattha.m ida.m vuccati. ta.m paneta.m ``tena samayena buddho bhagavaa vera~njaaya.m viharatii''ti evamaadivacanapa.tima.n.ditanidaana.m vinayapi.taka.m kena dhaarita.m, kenaabhata.m, kattha pati.t.thitanti? vuccate -- aadito taava ida.m bhagavato sammukhaa aayasmataa upaalittherena dhaarita.m, tassa sammukhato aparinibbute tathaagate cha.labhi~n~naadibhedehi anekehi bhikkhusahassehi parinibbute tathaagate mahaakassapappamukhehi dhammasa"ngaahakattherehi. kenaabhatanti? jambudiipe taava upaalittheramaadi.m katvaa aacariyaparamparaaya yaava tatiyasa"ngiiti taava aabhata.m. tatraaya.m ^a^P1.0032^ea^ ^b^aacariyaparamparaa^eb^ --
[21] upaali daasako ceva, so.nako siggavo tathaa.
[22] tisso moggaliputto ca, pa~ncete vijitaavino..
[21] paramparaaya vinaya.m, diipe jambusirivhaye.
[22] acchijjamaanamaanesu.m, tatiyo yaava sa"ngaho..
[06] aayasmaa ^a^M1.0025^ea^ hi upaali ima.m vinayava.msa.m vinayatanti.m vinayapave.ni.m bhagavato

[03] sammukhaa uggahetvaa bahuuna.m bhikkhuuna.m hadaye pati.t.thaapesi. tassa haayasmato santike vinayava.msa.m uggahetvaa vinaye pakata~n~nuta.m pattesu puggalesu puthujjana-sotaapanna-sakadaagaami-anaagaamino ga.nanapatha.m viitivattaa, khii.naasavaana.m sahassameka.m ahosi. daasakattheropi tasseva saddhivihaariko ahosi, so upaalittherassa sammukhaa uggahetvaa tatheva vinaya.m vaacesi. tassaapi aayasmato santike uggahetvaa vinaye pakata~n~nuta.m pattaa puthujjanaadayo ga.nanapatha.m viitivattaa, khii.naasavaana.m sahassameva ahosi. so.nakattheropi daasakattherassa saddhivihaariko ahosi, sopi attano upajjhaayassa daasakattherassa sammukhaa uggahetvaa tatheva vinaya.m vaacesi. tassaapi aayasmato santike uggahetvaa vinaye pakata~n~nuta.m pattaa puthujjanaadayo ga.nanapatha.m viitivattaa, khii.naasavaana.m sahassameva ahosi. siggavattheropi so.nakattherassa saddhivihaariko ahosi, sopi attano upajjhaayassa ^a^V1.0025^ea^ so.nakattherassa santike vinaya.m uggahetvaa arahantasahassassa dhuraggaaho ahosi. tassa panaayasmato santike uggahetvaa vinaye pakata~n~nuta.m pattaa puthujjana-sotaapannasakadaagaami-anaagaaminopi khii.naasavaapi ettakaani ^a^P1.0033^ea^ sataaniiti vaa ettakaani sahassaaniiti vaa aparicchinnaa ahesu.m. tadaa kira jambudiipe atimahaabhikkhusamudaayo ahosi. moggaliputtatissattherassa pana aanubhaavo tatiyasa"ngiitiya.m paaka.to bhavissati. evamida.m vinayapi.taka.m jambudiipe taava imaaya aacariyaparamparaaya yaava tatiyasa"ngiiti taava aabhatanti veditabba.m.
[06] pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikathaa ni.t.thitaa.
[03]^b^dutiyasa"ngiiti^eb^vijaananattha.m pana ayamanukkamo veditabbo. yadaa hi --
[21] sa"ngaayitvaana saddhamma.m, jotayitvaa ca sabbadhi.
[22] yaava jiivitapariyanta.m, .thatvaa pa~ncasataapi te..
[21] khii.naasavaa ^a^M1.0026^ea^ jutiimanto, theraa kassapaaadayo.
[22] khii.nasnehapadiipaava, nibbaayi.msu anaalayaa..

[03]athaanukkamena gacchantesu rattindivesu vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu vesaaliya.m ``kappati si"ngiilo.nakappo, kappati dva"ngulakappo, kappati gaamantarakappo, kappati aavaasakappo, kappati anumatikappo, kappati aaci.n.nakappo, kappati amathitakappo, kappati ja.logi.m paatu.m, kappati adasaka.m nisiidana.m, kappati jaataruuparajata''nti imaani dasa vatthuuni diipesu.m. tesa.m susunaagaputto kaa.laasoko naama raajaa pakkho ahosi.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto vajjiisu caarika.m caramaano ``vesaalikaa kira vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu vesaaliya.m dasa vatthuuni diipentii''ti sutvaa ``na kho paneta.m patiruupa.m yvaaha.m dasabalassa saasanavipatti.m sutvaa appossukko bhaveyya.m. handaaha.m adhammavaadino ^a^V1.0026^ea^ niggahetvaa dhamma.m ^a^P1.0034^ea^ diipemii''ti cintento yena vesaalii tadavasari. tatra suda.m aayasmaa yaso kaaka.n.dakaputto vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m.

[03]tena kho pana samayena vesaalikaa vajjiputtakaa bhikkhuu tadahuposathe ka.msapaati.m udakena puuretvaa majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa .thapetvaa aagataagate vesaalike upaasake eva.m vadanti -- ``dethaavuso, sa"nghassa kahaapa.nampi a.d.dhampi paadampi maasakaruupampi, bhavissati sa"nghassa parikkhaarena kara.niiya''nti sabba.m taava vattabba.m, yaava ``imaaya pana vinayasa"ngiitiyaa satta bhikkhusataani anuunaani anadhikaani ahesu.m, tasmaa aya.m dutiyasa"ngiiti ^b^sattasatikaa^eb^ti vuccatii''ti.

[03]eva.m tasmi~nca sannipaate dvaadasa bhikkhusatasahassaani sannipati.msu aayasmataa yasena samussaahitaa. tesa.m majjhe aayasmataa revatena pu.t.thena sabbakaamittherena vinaya.m vissajjentena taani dasa vatthuuni vinicchitaani, adhikara.na.m vuupasamita.m. atha theraa ``puna dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayissaamaa''ti tipi.takadhare pattapa.tisambhide sattasate bhikkhuu uccinitvaa vesaaliya.m ^a^M1.0027^ea^ vaalikaaraame sannipatitvaa mahaakassapattherena sa"ngaayitasadisameva sabba.m saasanamala.m sodhetvaa puna pi.takavasena nikaayavasena a"ngavasena dhammakkhandhavasena ca sabba.m dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayi.msu. aya.m sa"ngiiti a.t.thahi maasehi ni.t.thitaa. yaa loke --
[21] satehi sattahi kataa, tena sattasataati ca.
[22] pubbe kata.m upaadaaya, dutiyaati ca vuccatiiti..
[06] saa panaaya.m --
[21] yehi therehi sa"ngiitaa, sa"ngiiti tesu vissutaa.
[22] sabbakaamii ca saa.lho ca, revato khujjasobhito..
[21] yaso ^a^P1.0035^ea^ ca saa.nasambhuuto, ete saddhivihaarikaa.
[22] theraa aanandatherassa, di.t.thapubbaa tathaagata.m..
[21] sumano vaasabhagaamii ca, ~neyyaa saddhivihaarikaa.
[22] dve ime anuruddhassa, di.t.thapubbaa tathaagata.m..
[21] dutiyo ^a^V1.0027^ea^ pana sa"ngiito, yehi therehi sa"ngaho.
[22] sabbepi pannabhaaraa te, katakiccaa anaasavaati..
[03]aya.m dutiyasa"ngiiti.

[03]evamima.m dutiyasa"ngiiti.m sa"ngaayitvaa theraa ``uppajjissati nu kho anaagatepi saasanassa evaruupa.m abbuda''nti olokayamaanaa ima.m addasa.msu -- ``ito vassasatassa upari a.t.thaarasame vasse paa.taliputte ^b^dhammaasoko^eb^ naama raajaa uppajjitvaa sakalajambudiipe rajja.m kaaressati. so buddhasaasane pasiiditvaa mahanta.m laabhasakkaara.m pavattayissati. tato titthiyaa laabhasakkaara.m patthayamaanaa saasane pabbajitvaa saka.m saka.m di.t.thi.m paridiipessanti. eva.m saasane mahanta.m abbuda.m uppajjissatii''ti. atha nesa.m etadahosi -- ``kinnu kho maya.m etasmi.m abbude uppanne sammukhaa bhavissaama, na bhavissaamaa''ti. atha te sabbeva tadaa attano asammukhabhaava.m ~natvaa ``ko nu kho ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m samattho bhavissatii''ti sakala.m manussaloka.m chakaamaavacaradevaloka~nca olokentaa na ka~nci disvaa brahmaloke ^b^tissa.m^eb^ naama mahaabrahmaana.m addasa.msu ^a^M1.0028^ea^ parittaayuka.m uparibrahmalokuupapattiyaa bhaavitamagga.m. disvaana nesa.m etadahosi -- ``sace maya.m etassa brahmuno manussaloke nibbattanatthaaya ussaaha.m kareyyaama, addhaa esa ^a^P1.0036^ea^ moggalibraahma.nassa gehe pa.tisandhi.m gahessati. tato ca mantehi palobhito nikkhamitvaa pabbajissati. so eva.m pabbajitvaa sakala.m buddhavacana.m uggahetvaa adhigatapa.tisambhido hutvaa titthiye madditvaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vinicchitvaa saasana.m pagga.nhissatii''ti.

[03]te brahmaloka.m gantvaa tissa.m mahaabrahmaana.m etadavocu.m -- ``ito vassasatassa upari a.t.thaarasame vasse saasane mahanta.m abbuda.m uppajjissati. maya~nca sakala.m manussaloka.m chakaamaavacaradevaloka~nca olokayamaanaa ka~nci saasana.m paggahetu.m samattha.m adisvaa brahmaloka.m vicinantaa bhavantameva addasaama. saadhu, sappurisa, manussaloke nibbattitvaa dasabalassa saasana.m pagga.nhitu.m pa.ti~n~na.m dehii''ti.

[03]eva.m vutte mahaabrahmaa, ``aha.m kira saasane uppanna.m abbuda.m sodhetvaa saasana.m paggahetu.m samattho bhavissaamii''ti ha.t.thapaha.t.tho udaggudaggo hutvaa, ``saadhuu''ti pa.tissu.nitvaa pa.ti~n~na.m adaasi. theraa brahmaloke ta.m kara.niiya.m tiiretvaa puna paccaagami.msu.

[03]tena ^a^V1.0028^ea^ kho pana samayena siggavatthero ca ca.n.davajjitthero ca dvepi navakaa honti daharabhikkhuu tipi.takadharaa pattapa.tisambhidaa khii.naasavaa, te ta.m adhikara.na.m na sampaapu.ni.msu. theraa ``tumhe, aavuso, amhaaka.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne no sahaayakaa ahuvattha, tena vo ida.m da.n.dakamma.m hotu -- `tisso naama brahmaa moggalibraahma.nassa gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhissati, ta.m tumhaaka.m eko niiharitvaa pabbaajetu, eko buddhavacana.m ugga.nhaapetuu'''ti vatvaa sabbepi yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa --
[21] sabbakaamippabhutayo, tepi theraa mahiddhikaa.
[22] aggikkhandhaava lokamhi, jalitvaa parinibbutaa..
[21] dutiya.m sa"ngaha.m katvaa, visodhetvaana saasana.m.
[22] anaagatepi ^a^P1.0037^ea^ katvaana, hetu.m saddhammasuddhiyaa..
[21] khii.naasavaa ^a^M1.0029^ea^ vasippatthaa, pabhinnapa.tisambhidaa.
[22] aniccataavasa.m theraa, tepi naama upaagataa..
[21] eva.m aniccata.m jammi.m, ~natvaa durabhisambhava.m.
[22] ta.m pattu.m vaayame dhiiro, ya.m nicca.m amata.m padanti..
[06] ettaavataa sabbaakaarena ^b^dutiyasa"ngiitiva.n.nanaa^eb^ ni.t.thitaa hoti.
[06] dutiyasa"ngiitikathaa ni.t.thitaa

[03]^b^tissopi^eb^ kho ^b^mahaabrahmaa^eb^ brahmalokato cavitvaa moggalibraahma.nassa gehe pa.tisandhi.m aggahesi. siggavattheropi tassa pa.tisandhiggaha.nato pabhuti satta vassaani braahma.nassa geha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. ekadivasampi u.lu"nkamatta.m vaa yaagu.m ka.tacchumatta.m vaa bhatta.m naalattha. sattanna.m pana vassaana.m accayena ekadivasa.m ``aticchatha, bhante''ti vacanamatta.m alattha. ta.mdivasameva braahma.nopi bahiddhaa ki~nci kara.niiya.m katvaa aagacchanto pa.tipathe thera.m disvaa, ``bho pabbajita, amhaaka.m geha.m agamitthaa''ti aaha. ``aama, braahma.na, agamimhaa''ti. ``api ki~nci ^a^V1.0029^ea^ labhitthaa''ti? ``aama, braahma.na, labhimhaa''ti. so geha.m gantvaa pucchi -- ``tassa pabbajitassa ki~nci adatthaa''ti? ``na ki~nci adamhaa''ti. braahma.no dutiyadivase gharadvaareyeva nisiidi ``ajja pabbajita.m musaavaadena niggahessaamii''ti. thero dutiyadivase braahma.nassa gharadvaara.m sampatto. braahma.no thera.m disvaava evamaaha -- ``tumhe hiyyo amhaaka.m gehe ki~nci aladdhaayeva `labhimhaa'ti avocuttha. va.t.tati nu kho tumhaaka.m musaavaado''ti! thero aaha -- ``maya.m, braahma.na, tumhaaka.m gehe satta vassaani `aticchathaa'ti vacanamattampi alabhitvaa hiyyo `aticchathaa'ti vacanamatta.m labhimha; atheta.m pa.tisanthaara.m upaadaaya evamavocumhaa''ti.

[03]braahma.no cintesi -- ``ime pa.tisanthaaramattampi labhitvaa `labhimhaa'ti pasa.msanti, a~n~na.m ki~nci khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m ^a^P1.0038^ea^ labhitvaa kasmaa na pasa.msantii''ti pasiiditvaa attano atthaaya pa.tiyaaditabhattato ka.tacchumatta.m bhikkha.m tadupiya~nca bya~njana.m daapetvaa ``ima.m bhikkha.m sabbakaala.m tumhe labhissathaa''ti aaha ^a^M1.0030^ea^. so punadivasato pabhuti upasa"nkamantassa therassa upasama.m disvaa bhiyyosomattaaya pasiiditvaa thera.m niccakaala.m attano ghare bhattavissaggakara.natthaaya yaaci. thero adhivaasetvaa divase divase bhattakicca.m katvaa gacchanto thoka.m thoka.m buddhavacana.m kathetvaa gacchati. sopi kho maa.navako so.lasavassuddesikoyeva ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu ahosi. brahmalokato aagatasuddhasattassa aasane vaa sayane vaa a~n~no koci nisajjitaa vaa nipajjitaa vaa natthi. so yadaa aacariyaghara.m gacchati, tadaassa ma~ncapii.tha.m setena vatthena pa.ticchaadetvaa laggetvaa .thapenti. thero cintesi -- ``samayo daani maa.navaka.m pabbaajetu.m, cira~nca me idhaagacchantassa, na ca kaaci maa.navakena saddhi.m kathaa uppajjati. handa daani iminaa upaayena palla"nka.m nissaaya uppajjissatii''ti geha.m gantvaa yathaa tasmi.m gehe .thapetvaa maa.navakassa palla"nka.m a~n~na.m na ki~nci aasana.m dissati tathaa adhi.t.thaasi. braahma.nassa gehajano thera.m disvaa a~n~na.m ki~nci aasana.m apassanto maa.navakassa palla"nka.m attharitvaa therassa adaasi. nisiidi thero palla"nke. maa.navakopi kho ta"nkha.na~n~neva aacariyagharaa aagamma thera.m attano palla"nke nisinna.m disvaa kupito anattamano ``ko mama palla"nka.m sama.nassa pa~n~napesii''ti aaha.

[03]thero bhattakicca.m katvaa vuupasante maa.navakassa ca.n.dikkabhaave evamaaha -- ``ki.m pana tva.m, maa.navaka, ki~nci ^a^P1.0039^ea^ manta.m jaanaasii''ti? maa.navako ``bho pabbajita, mayi daani mante ajaanante a~n~ne ke jaanissantii''ti vatvaa, thera.m pucchi -- ``tumhe pana manta.m jaanaathaa''ti? ``puccha, maa.navaka, pucchitvaa sakkaa jaanitu''nti. atha kho maa.navako tiisu vedesu sanigha.n.duke.tubhesu ^a^V1.0030^ea^ saakkharappabhedesu itihaasapa~ncamesu yaani yaani ga.n.thi.t.thaanaani, yesa.m yesa.m naya.m neva attanaa passati naapissa aacariyo addasa, tesu tesu thera.m pucchi. thero ``pakatiyaapi ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu, idaani pana pa.tisambhidaappatto, tenassa natthi tesa.m pa~nhaana.m vissajjane bhaaro''ti taavadeva te pa~nhe vissajjetvaa maa.navaka.m aaha -- ``maa.navaka, aha.m tayaa bahu.m pucchito; ahampi daani ta.m eka.m pa~nha.m pucchaami, byaakarissasi me''ti? ``aama, bho pabbajita, puccha byaakarissaamii''ti. thero ^b^cittayamake^eb^ ima.m pa~nha.m pucchi --
[02] ``yassa ^a^M1.0031^ea^ citta.m uppajjati na nirujjhati tassa citta.m nirujjhissati nuppajjissati; yassa vaa pana citta.m nirujjhissati nuppajjissati tassa citta.m uppajjati na nirujjhatii''ti?

[03]maa.navo uddha.m vaa adho vaa haritu.m asakkonto ``ki.m naama, bho pabbajita, ida''nti aaha. ``buddhamanto naamaaya.m, maa.navaa''ti. ``sakkaa panaaya.m, bho, mayhampi daatu''nti. ``sakkaa maa.nava, amhehi gahitapabbajja.m ga.nhantassa daatu''nti. tato ^a^P1.0040^ea^ maa.navo maataapitaro upasa"nkamitvaa aaha -- ``aya.m pabbajito buddhamanta.m naama jaanaati, na ca attano santike apabbajitassa deti, aha.m etassa santike pabbajitvaa manta.m ugga.nhissaamii''ti.

[03]athassa maataapitaro ``pabbajitvaapi no putto mante ga.nhatu, gahetvaa punaagamissatii''ti ma~n~namaanaa ``ugga.nha, puttaa''ti anujaani.msu. thero daaraka.m pabbaajetvaa dvatti.msaakaarakamma.t.thaana.m taava aacikkhi. so tattha parikamma.m karonto nacirasseva sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi. tato thero cintesi -- ``saama.nero sotaapattiphale pati.t.thito, abhabbo daani saasanato nivattitu.m. sace panassaaha.m kamma.t.thaana.m va.d.dhetvaa katheyya.m, arahatta.m paapu.neyya, appossukko bhaveyya buddhavacana.m gahetu.m, samayo daani na.m ca.n.davajjittherassa santika.m pesetu''nti. tato aaha -- ``ehi tva.m, saama.nera, therassa santika.m gantvaa buddhavacana.m ugga.nha. mama vacanena ta~nca aarogya.m puccha; eva~nca vadehi -- `upajjhaayo ma.m, bhante, tumhaaka.m santika.m pahi.nii'ti. `ko naama te upajjhaayo'ti ca vutte `siggavatthero naama, bhante'ti vadeyyaasi. `aha.m ko naamaa'ti vutte eva.m vadeyyaasi -- `mama upajjhaayo, bhante, tumhaaka.m naama.m jaanaatii'''ti.

[03]``eva.m, bhante''ti kho tisso saama.nero thera.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa anupubbena ca.n.davajjittherassa santika.m gantvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. thero saama.nera.m pucchi -- ``kuto ^a^V1.0031^ea^ aagatosii''ti? ``upajjhaayo ma.m, bhante, tumhaaka.m santika.m pahi.nii''ti. ``ko naama te upajjhaayo''ti? ``siggavatthero naama, bhante''ti. ``aha.m ko naamaa''ti? ``mama upajjhaayo, bhante, tumhaaka.m naama.m jaanaatii''ti. ``pattaciivara.m daani pa.tisaamehii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante''ti saama.nero pattaciivara.m ^a^P1.0041^ea^ pa.tisaametvaa punadivase parive.na.m sammajjitvaa udakadantapona.m upa.t.thaapesi. thero tassa sammajjita.t.thaana.m puna sammajji ^a^M1.0032^ea^. ta.m udaka.m cha.d.detvaa a~n~na.m udaka.m aahari. ta~nca dantaka.t.tha.m apanetvaa a~n~na.m dantaka.t.tha.m ga.nhi. eva.m satta divasaani katvaa sattame divase puna pucchi. saama.nero punapi pubbe kathitasadisameva kathesi. thero ``so vataaya.m braahma.no''ti sa~njaanitvaa ``kimattha.m aagatosii''ti aaha. ``buddhavacana.m ugga.nhatthaaya, bhante''ti. thero ``ugga.nha daani, saama.neraa''ti vatvaa puna divasato pabhuti buddhavacana.m pa.t.thapesi. tisso saama.nerova hutvaa, .thapetvaa vinayapi.taka.m sabba.m buddhavacana.m ugga.nhi saddhi.m a.t.thakathaaya. upasampannakaale pana avassikova samaano tipi.takadharo ahosi. aacariyupajjhaayaa moggaliputtatissattherassa hatthe sakala.m buddhavacana.m pati.t.thaapetvaa yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa parinibbaayi.msu. moggaliputtatissattheropi aparena samayena kamma.t.thaana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahattappatto bahuuna.m dhammavinaya.m vaacesi.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bindusaarassa ra~n~no ekasataputtaa ahesu.m. te sabbe asoko attanaa saddhi.m ekamaatika.m tissakumaara.m .thapetvaa ghaatesi. ghaatento ca cattaari vassaani anabhisittova rajja.m kaaretvaa catunna.m vassaana.m accayena tathaagatassa parinibbaanato dvinna.m vassasataana.m upari a.t.thaarasame vasse sakalajambudiipe ekarajjaabhiseka.m paapu.ni ^a^P1.0042^ea^. abhisekaanubhaavena cassa imaa raajiddhiyo aagataa -- mahaapathaviyaa he.t.thaa yojanappamaa.ne aa.naa pavattati; tathaa upari aakaase anotattadahato a.t.thahi kaajehi so.lasa paaniiyagha.te divase divase devataa aaharanti, yato saasane uppannasaddho hutvaa a.t.tha gha.te bhikkhusa"nghassa adaasi, dve gha.te sa.t.thimattaana.m tipi.takadharabhikkhuuna.m, dve gha.te aggamahesiyaa asandhimittaaya, cattaaro gha.te attanaa paribhu~nji; devataaeva himavante naagalataadantaka.t.tha.m naama atthi siniddha.m muduka.m rasavanta.m ta.m divase divase aaharanti, yena ra~n~no ca mahesiyaa ca so.lasanna~nca naa.takitthisahassaana.m sa.t.thimattaana~nca bhikkhusahassaana.m devasika.m dantaponakicca.m nippajjati. devasikameva cassa devataa agadaamalaka.m agadahariitaka.m suva.n.nava.n.na~nca gandharasasampanna.m ambapakka.m aaharanti. tathaa chaddantadahato pa~ncava.n.nanivaasanapaavura.na.m piitakava.n.nahatthapucchanapa.taka.m dibba~nca paanaka.m aaharanti. devasikameva panassa nhaanagandha.m ^a^M1.0033^ea^ anuvilepanagandha.m ^a^V1.0032^ea^ paarupanatthaaya asuttamayika.m sumanapupphapa.ta.m mahaaraha~nca a~njana.m naagabhavanato naagaraajaano aaharanti. chaddantadaheva ^a^P1.0043^ea^ u.t.thitassa saalino nava vaahasahassaani divase divase sukaa aaharanti. muusikaa nitthusaka.ne karonti, ekopi kha.n.data.n.dulo na hoti, ra~n~no sabba.t.thaanesu ayameva ta.n.dulo paribhoga.m gacchati. madhumakkhikaa madhu.m karonti. kammaarasaalaasu acchaa kuu.ta.m paharanti. karaviikasaku.naa aagantvaa madhurassara.m vikuujantaa ra~n~no balikamma.m karonti.

[03]imaahi iddhiihi samannaagato raajaa ekadivasa.m suva.n.nasa"nkhalikabandhana.m pesetvaa catunna.m buddhaana.m adhigataruupadassana.m kappaayuka.m kaa.la.m naama naagaraajaana.m aanayitvaa setacchattassa he.t.thaa mahaarahe palla"nke nisiidaapetvaa anekasatava.n.nehi jalaja thalajapupphehi suva.n.napupphehi ca puuja.m katvaa sabbaala"nkaarapa.tima.n.ditehi so.lasahi naa.takitthisahassehi samantato parikkhipitvaa ``ananta~naa.nassa taava me saddhammavaracakkavattino sammaasambuddhassa ruupa.m imesa.m akkhiina.m aapaatha.m karohii''ti vatvaa tena nimmita.m sakalasariiravippaki.n.napu~n~nappabhaavanibbattaasiitaanubya~njanapa.tima.n.ditadvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nasassiriikataaya vikasitakamaluppalapu.n.dariikapa.tima.n.ditamiva salilatala.m taaraaga.narasmijaalavisadavipphuritasobhaasamujjalitamiva gaganatala.m niilapiitalohitaadibhedavicitrava.n.nara.msivinaddhabyaamappabhaaparikkhepavilaasitaaya ^a^P1.0044^ea^ sa~ncaappabhaanuraagaindadhanuvijjulataaparikkhittamiva kanakagirisikhara.m naanaaviraagavimalaketumaalaasamujjalitacaarumatthakasobha.m nayanarasaayatanamiva brahmadevamanujanaagayakkhaga.naana.m buddharuupa.m passanto satta divasaani akkhipuuja.m naama akaasi.

[03]raajaa kira abhiseka.m paapu.nitvaa tii.niyeva sa.mvaccharaani baahirakapaasa.n.da.m parigga.nhi. catutthe sa.mvacchare buddhasaasane pasiidi. tassa kira pitaa bindusaaro braahma.nabhatto ahosi, so braahma.naana~nca braahma.najaatiyapaasa.n.daana~nca pa.n.dara"ngaparibbaajakaadiina.m sa.t.thisahassamattaana.m niccabhatta.m pa.t.thapesi. asokopi pitaraa pavattita.m daana.m attano antepure tatheva dadamaano ekadivasa.m siihapa~njare .thito te upasamaparibaahirena aacaarena bhu~njamaane asa.myatindriye aviniitairiyaapathe disvaa cintesi -- ``iidisa.m daana.m upaparikkhitvaa yutta.t.thaane daatu.m va.t.tatii''ti. eva.m cintetvaa amacce aaha -- ``gacchatha, bha.ne, attano attano saadhusammate ^a^M1.0034^ea^ sama.nabraahma.ne antepura.m atiharatha, daana.m dassaamaa''ti. amaccaa ``saadhu, devaa''ti ra~n~no pa.tissu.nitvaa te te pa.n.dara"ngaparibbaajakaajiivakaniga.n.thaadayo aanetvaa ``ime, mahaaraaja, amhaaka.m arahanto''ti aaha.msu.

[03]atha ^a^V1.0033^ea^ raajaa antepure uccaavacaani aasanaani pa~n~napetvaa ``aagacchantuu''ti vatvaa aagataagate aaha -- ``attano attano patiruupe aasane nisiidathaa''ti ^a^P1.0045^ea^. tesu ekacce bhaddapii.thakesu, ekacce phalakapii.thakesu nisiidi.msu. te disvaa raajaa ``natthi nesa.m anto saaro''ti ~natvaa tesa.m anuruupa.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m datvaa uyyojesi.

[03]eva.m gacchante kaale ekadivasa.m raajaa siihapa~njare .thito addasa nigrodhasaama.nera.m raaja"nga.nena gacchanta.m danta.m gutta.m santindriya.m iriyaapathasampanna.m. ko panaaya.m ^b^nigrodho^eb^ naama? bindusaarara~n~no je.t.thaputtassa sumanaraajakumaarassa putto.
[03]tatraaya.m ^b^anupubbikathaa^eb^ --

[03]bindusaarara~n~no kira dubbalakaaleyeva asokakumaaro attanaa laddha.m ujjeniirajja.m pahaaya aagantvaa sabbanagara.m attano hatthagata.m katvaa sumanaraajakumaara.m aggahesi. ta.mdivasameva sumanassa raajakumaarassa sumanaa naama devii paripu.n.nagabbhaa ahosi. saa a~n~naatakavesena nikkhamitvaa aviduure a~n~natara.m ca.n.daalagaama.m sandhaaya gacchantii je.t.thakaca.n.daalassa gehato aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m nigrodharukkhe adhivatthaaya devataaya ``ito ehi, sumane''ti vadantiyaa sadda.m sutvaa tassaa samiipa.m gataa. devataa attano aanubhaavena eka.m saala.m nimminitvaa ``ettha vasaahii''ti adaasi. saa ta.m saala.m paavisi. gatadivaseyeva ca putta.m vijaayi. saa tassa nigrodhadevataaya pariggahitattaa ``nigrodho'' tveva naama.m akaasi. je.t.thakaca.n.daalo di.t.thadivasato pabhuti ta.m attano saamidhiitara.m viya ma~n~namaano nibaddhavatta.m pa.t.thapesi. raajadhiitaa tattha satta vassaani vasi. nigrodhakumaaropi ^a^P1.0046^ea^ sattavassiko jaato. tadaa mahaavaru.natthero naama eko arahaa daarakassa hetusampada.m disvaa rakkhitvaa tattha viharamaano ``sattavassiko daani daarako, kaalo na.m pabbaajetu''nti ^a^M1.0035^ea^ cintetvaa raajadhiitaaya aarocaapetvaa nigrodhakumaara.m pabbaajesi. kumaaro khuraggeyeva arahatta.m paapu.ni. so ekadivasa.m paatova sariira.m jaggitvaa aacariyupajjhaayavatta.m katvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ``maatuupaasikaaya gehadvaara.m gacchaamii''ti nikkhami. maatunivaasana.t.thaana~ncassa dakkhi.nadvaarena nagara.m pavisitvaa nagaramajjhena gantvaa paaciinadvaarena nikkhamitvaa gantabba.m hoti.

[03]tena ^a^V1.0034^ea^ ca samayena asoko dhammaraajaa paaciinadisaabhimukho siihapa~njare ca"nkamati. ta"nkha.na~n~neva nigrodho raaja"nga.na.m sampaapu.ni santindriyo santamaanaso yugamatta.m pekkhamaano. tena vutta.m -- ``ekadivasa.m raajaa siihapa~njare .thito addasa nigrodhasaama.nera.m raaja"nga.nena gacchanta.m danta.m gutta.m santindriya.m iriyaapathasampanna''nti. disvaa panassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m jano sabbopi vikkhittacitto bhantamigappa.tibhaago. aya.m pana daarako avikkhittacitto ativiya cassa aalokitavilokita.m sami~njanapasaara.na~nca sobhati. addhaa etassa abbhantare lokuttaradhammo bhavissatii''ti ra~n~no saha dassaneneva saama.nere citta.m pasiidi, pema.m sa.n.thahi. kasmaa? pubbe hi kira pu~n~nakara.nakaale esa ra~n~no je.t.thabhaataa vaa.nijako ahosi. vuttampi heta.m --
[21] ``pubbe va ^a^P1.0047^ea^ sannivaasena, paccuppannahitena vaa.
[22] eva.m ta.m jaayate pema.m, uppala.m va yathodake''ti.. (jaa0 1.2.174).

[03]atha raajaa sa~njaatapemo sabahumaano ``eta.m saama.nera.m pakkosathaa''ti amacce pesesi. ``te aticiraayantii''ti puna dve tayo pesesi -- ``turita.m aagacchatuu''ti. saama.nero attano pakatiyaa eva agamaasi. raajaa patiruupamaasana.m ~natvaa ``nisiidathaa''ti aaha. so ito cito ca viloketvaa ``natthi daani a~n~ne bhikkhuu''ti samussitasetacchatta.m raajapalla"nka.m upasa"nkamitvaa pattaggaha.natthaaya ra~n~no aakaara.m dassesi. raajaa ta.m palla"nkasamiipa.m upagacchanta.myeva disvaa cintesi -- ``ajjeva daani aya.m saama.nero imassa gehassa saamiko bhavissatii''ti saama.nero ra~n~no hatthe patta.m datvaa palla"nka.m abhiruhitvaa nisiidi. raajaa attano atthaaya sampaadita.m sabba.m yaagukhajjakabhattavikati.m ^a^M1.0036^ea^ upanaamesi. saama.nero attano yaapaniiyamattakameva sampa.ticchi. bhattakiccaavasaane raajaa aaha -- ``satthaaraa tumhaaka.m dinnovaada.m jaanaathaa''ti? ``jaanaami, mahaaraaja, ekadesenaa''ti. ``taata, mayhampi na.m kathehii''ti. ``saadhu, mahaaraajaa''ti ra~n~no anuruupa.m dhammapade appamaadavagga.m anumodanatthaaya abhaasi.

[03]raajaa pana ``appamaado amatapada.m, pamaado maccuno pada''nti sutvaava ``a~n~naata.m, taata, pariyosaapehii''ti aaha. anumodanaavasaane ca ``a.t.tha te, taata, dhuvabhattaani dammii''ti aaha. saama.nero aaha -- ``etaani aha.m upajjhaayassa dammi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ko aya.m, taata, upajjhaayo naamaa''ti? ``vajjaavajja.m disvaa codetaa saaretaa ca, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``a~n~naanipi te, taata, a.t.tha dammii''ti. ``etaani ^a^P1.0048^ea^ aacariyassa dammi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ko aya.m, taata, aacariyo naamaa''ti? ``imasmi.m saasane sikkhitabbakadhammesu pati.t.thaapetaa, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``saadhu, taata, a~n~naanipi te a.t.tha dammii''ti. ``etaanipi bhikkhusa"nghassa dammi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ko aya.m, taata, bhikkhusa"ngho naamaa''ti? ``ya.m nissaaya ^a^V1.0035^ea^, mahaaraaja, amhaaka.m aacariyupajjhaayaana~nca mama ca pabbajjaa ca upasampadaa caa''ti. raajaa bhiyyoso mattaaya tu.t.thacitto aaha -- ``a~n~naanipi te, taata, a.t.tha dammii''ti. saama.nero ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa punadivase dvatti.msa bhikkhuu gahetvaa raajantepura.m pavisitvaa bhattakiccamakaasi. raajaa ``a~n~nepi dvatti.msa bhikkhuu tumhehi saddhi.m sve bhikkha.m ga.nhantuu''ti eteneva upaayena divase divase va.d.dhaapento sa.t.thisahassaana.m braahma.naparibbaajakaadiina.m bhatta.m upacchinditvaa antonivesane sa.t.thisahassaana.m bhikkhuuna.m niccabhatta.m pa.t.thapesi nigrodhatthere gateneva pasaadena. nigrodhattheropi raajaana.m saparisa.m tiisu sara.nesu pa~ncasu ca siilesu pati.t.thaapetvaa buddhasaasane pothujjanikena pasaadena acalappasaada.m katvaa pati.t.thaapesi. puna raajaa ^b^asokaaraama.m^eb^ naama mahaavihaara.m kaaretvaa sa.t.thisahassaana.m bhikkhuuna.m niccabhatta.m pa.t.thapesi. sakalajambudiipe caturaasiitiyaa nagarasahassesu caturaasiitivihaarasahassaani kaaraapesi caturaasiitisahassacetiyapa.tima.n.ditaani dhammeneva, no adhammena.

[03]ekadivasa.m kira raajaa asokaaraame mahaadaana.m datvaa sa.t.thisahassabhikkhusa"nghassa majjhe nisajja sa"ngha.m catuuhi paccayehi pavaaretvaa ima.m pa~nha.m pucchi ^a^M1.0037^ea^ -- ``bhante, bhagavataa desitadhammo naama kittako hotii''ti? ``a"ngato, mahaaraaja, nava"ngaani, khandhato caturaasiitidhammakkhandhasahassaanii''ti. raajaa dhamme pasiiditvaa ``ekeka.m dhammakkhandha.m ekekavihaarena puujessaamii''ti ekadivasameva ^a^P1.0049^ea^ channavutiko.tidhana.m visajjetvaa amacce aa.naapesi -- ``etha, bha.ne, ekamekasmi.m nagare ekameka.m vihaara.m kaaraapentaa caturaasiitiyaa nagarasahassesu caturaasiitivihaarasahassaani kaaraapethaa''ti. saya~nca asokaaraame asokamahaavihaaratthaaya kamma.m pa.t.thapesi. sa"ngho indaguttatthera.m naama mahiddhika.m mahaanubhaava.m khii.naasava.m navakammaadhi.t.thaayaka.m adaasi. thero ya.m ya.m na ni.t.thaati ta.m ta.m attano aanubhaavena ni.t.thaapesi. evampi tiihi sa.mvaccharehi vihaarakamma.m ni.t.thaapesi. ekadivasameva sabbanagarehi pa.n.naani aagami.msu.

[03]amaccaa ra~n~no aarocesu.m -- ``ni.t.thitaani, deva, caturaasiitivihaarasahassaanii''ti. raajaa nagare bheri.m caraapesi -- ``ito sattanna.m divasaana.m accayena vihaaramaho bhavissati. sabbe a.t.tha siila"ngaani samaadiyitvaa antonagare ca bahinagare ca vihaaramaha.m pa.tiyaadentuu''ti. tato sattanna.m divasaana.m accayena sabbaala"nkaaravibhuusitaaya anekasatasahassasa"nkhyaaya catura"nginiyaa senaaya parivuto devaloke amaravatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa sirito adhikatarasassiriika.m viya nagara.m kaatukaamena ussaahajaatena mahaajanena ala"nkatapa.tiyatta.m nagara.m anuvicaranto vihaara.m gantvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa majjhe a.t.thaasi.

[03]tasmi~nca ^a^V1.0036^ea^ kha.ne sannipatitaa asiiti bhikkhuko.tiyo ahesu.m, bhikkhuniina~nca channavutisatasahassaani. tattha khii.naasavabhikkhuuyeva satasahassasa"nkhyaa ahesu.m. tesa.m etadahosi -- ``sace raajaa attano adhikaara.m anavasesa.m passeyya ativiya buddhasaasane pasiideyyaa''ti. tato ^a^P1.0050^ea^ lokavivara.na.m naama paa.tihaariya.m aka.msu. raajaa asokaaraame .thitova catuddisaa anuvilokento samantato samuddapariyanta.m jambudiipa.m passati caturaasiiti~nca vihaarasahassaani u.laaraaya vihaaramahapuujaaya virocamaanaani. so ta.m vibhuuti.m passamaano u.laarena piitipaamojjena samannaagato ``atthi pana a~n~nassapi kassaci evaruupa.m piitipaamojja.m uppannapubba''nti cintento bhikkhusa"ngha.m pucchi -- ``bhante, amhaaka.m lokanaathassa dasabalassa saasane ko mahaapariccaaga.m pariccaji. kassa ^a^M1.0038^ea^ pariccaago mahantoti? bhikkhusa"ngho moggaliputtatissattherassa bhaara.m akaasi. thero aaha -- ``mahaaraaja, dasabalassa saasane paccayadaayako naama tayaa sadiso dharamaanepi tathaagate na koci ahosi, taveva pariccaago mahaa''ti. raajaa therassa vacana.m sutvaa u.laarena piitipaamojjena nirantara.m phu.t.thasariiro hutvaa cintesi -- ``natthi kira mayaa sadiso paccayadaayako, mayha.m kira pariccaago mahaa, aha.m kira deyyadhammena saasana.m pagga.nhaami. ki.m panaaha.m eva.m sati saasanassa daayaado homi, na homii''ti. tato bhikkhusa"ngha.m pucchi -- ``bhavaami nu kho aha.m, bhante, saasanassa daayaado''ti?

[03]tato moggaliputtatissatthero ra~n~no ida.m vacana.m sutvaa raajaputtassa mahindassa upanissayasampatti.m sampassamaano ``sace aya.m kumaaro pabbajissati saasanassa ativiya vu.d.dhi bhavissatii''ti cintetvaa raajaana.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, mahaaraaja, ettaavataa saasanassa daayaado hoti; apica kho paccayadaayakoti vaa upa.t.thaakoti vaa sa"nkhya.m gacchati. yopi hi, mahaaraaja, pathavito yaava brahmalokaparimaa.na.m paccayaraasi.m dadeyya sopi `saasane daayaado'ti sa"nkhya.m na gacchatii''ti. ``atha katha.m carahi, bhante, saasanassa daayaado hotii''ti? ``yo hi koci, mahaaraaja, a.d.dho ^a^P1.0051^ea^ vaa daliddo vaa attano orasa.m putta.m pabbaajeti -- aya.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, daayaado saasanassaa''ti.

[03]eva.m vutte asoko raajaa ``aha.m kira evaruupa.m pariccaaga.m katvaapi neva saasanassa daayaadabhaava.m patto''ti saasane daayaadabhaava.m patthayamaano ito cito ca viloketvaa addasa mahindakumaara.m aviduure .thita.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``ki~ncaapi aha.m ima.m kumaara.m tissakumaarassa pabbajitakaalato pabhuti oparajje .thapetukaamo, atha kho oparajjatopi pabbajjaava ^a^V1.0037^ea^ uttamaa''ti. tato kumaara.m aaha -- ``sakkhasi tva.m, taata, pabbajitu''nti? kumaaro pakatiyaapi tissakumaarassa pabbajitakaalato pabhuti pabbajitukaamova ra~n~no vacana.m sutvaa ativiya paamojjajaato hutvaa aaha -- ``pabbajaami, deva, ma.m pabbaajetvaa tumhe saasanadaayaadaa hothaa''ti.

[03]tena ca samayena raajadhiitaa sa"nghamittaapi tasmi.myeva .thaane .thitaa hoti. tassaa ca saamiko aggibrahmaa naama kumaaro yuvaraajena tissakumaarena ^a^M1.0039^ea^ saddhi.m pabbajito hoti. raajaa ta.m disvaa aaha -- ``tvampi, amma, pabbajitu.m sakkhasii''ti? ``saadhu, taata, sakkomii''ti. raajaa puttaana.m mana.m labhitvaa paha.t.thacitto bhikkhusa"ngha.m etadavoca -- ``bhante, ime daarake pabbaajetvaa ma.m saasane daayaada.m karothaa''ti. sa"ngho ra~n~no vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa kumaara.m moggaliputtatissattherena upajjhaayena mahaadevattherena ca aacariyena pabbaajesi. majjhantikattherena aacariyena upasampaadesi. tadaa kira kumaaro paripu.n.naviisativassova hoti. so tasmi.myeva upasampadasiimama.n.dale saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. sa"nghamittaayapi raajadhiitaaya aacariyaa aayupaalittherii naama, upajjhaayaa pana dhammapaalittherii naama ahosi. tadaa ^a^P1.0052^ea^ sa"nghamittaa a.t.thaarasavassaa hoti. ta.m pabbajitamatta.m tasmi.myeva siimama.n.dale sikkhaaya pati.t.thaapesu.m. ubhinna.m pabbajitakaale raajaa chabbassaabhiseko hoti.

[03]atha mahindatthero upasampannakaalato pabhuti attano upajjhaayasseva santike dhamma~nca vinaya~nca pariyaapu.nanto dvepi sa"ngiitiyo aaruu.lha.m tipi.takasa"ngahita.m saa.t.thakatha.m sabba.m theravaada.m ti.n.na.m vassaana.m abbhantare uggahetvaa attano upajjhaayassa antevaasikaana.m sahassamattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m paamokkho ahosi. tadaa asoko dhammaraajaa navavassaabhiseko hoti. ra~n~no pana a.t.thavassaabhisekakaaleyeva kontaputtatissatthero byaadhipa.tikammattha.m bhikkhaacaaravattena aahi.n.danto pasatamatta.m sappi.m alabhitvaa byaadhibalena parikkhii.naayusa"nkhaaro bhikkhusa"ngha.m appamaadena ovaditvaa aakaase palla"nkena nisiiditvaa tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa parinibbaayi. raajaa ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa therassa sakkaara.m katvaa ``mayi naama rajja.m kaarente eva.m bhikkhuuna.m paccayaa dullabhaa''ti nagarassa catuusu dvaaresu pokkhara.niyo kaaraapetvaa bhesajjassa puuraapetvaa daapesi.

[03]tena kira samayena paa.taliputtassa catuusu dvaaresu cattaari satasahassaani, sabhaaya.m satasahassanti divase divase pa~ncasatasahassaani ra~n~no uppajjanti. tato raajaa nigrodhattherassa devasika.m satasahassa.m visajjesi. buddhassa cetiye gandhamaalaadiihi puujanatthaaya satasahassa.m ^a^V1.0038^ea^. dhammassa ^a^M1.0040^ea^ satasahassa.m, ta.m dhammadharaana.m bahussutaana.m catupaccayatthaaya upaniiyati. sa"nghassa satasahassa.m, catuusu dvaaresu bhesajjatthaaya satasahassa.m. eva.m saasane u.laaro laabhasakkaaro ^a^P1.0053^ea^ nibbatti.

[03]titthiyaa parihiinalaabhasakkaaraa antamaso ghaasacchaadanampi alabhantaa laabhasakkaara.m patthayamaanaa saasane pabbajitvaa sakaani sakaani di.t.thigataani ``aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo''ti diipenti. pabbajja.m alabhamaanaapi sayameva mu.n.detvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa vihaaresu vicarantaa uposathampi pavaara.nampi sa"nghakammampi ga.nakammampi pavisanti. bhikkhuu tehi saddhi.m uposatha.m na karonti. tadaa moggaliputtatissatthero ``uppanna.m daani ida.m adhikara.na.m, ta.m nacirasseva kakkha.la.m bhavissati. na kho paneta.m sakkaa imesa.m majjhe vasantena vuupasametu''nti mahindattherassa ga.na.m niiyyaatetvaa attanaa phaasuvihaarena viharitukaamo ahoga"ngapabbata.m agamaasi. tepi kho titthiyaa bhikkhusa"nghena dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena niggayhamaanaapi dhammavinayaanulomaaya pa.tipattiyaa asa.n.thahantaa anekaruupa.m saasanassa abbuda~nca mala~nca ka.n.taka~nca samu.t.thaapesu.m. keci aggi.m paricaranti, keci pa~ncaatapena taapenti, keci aadicca.m anuparivattanti, keci ``dhamma~nca vinaya~nca vobhindissaamaa''ti pagga.nhi.msu. tadaa bhikkhusa"ngho na tehi saddhi.m uposatha.m vaa pavaara.na.m vaa akaasi. asokaaraame sattavassaani uposatho upacchijji. ra~n~nopi etamattha.m aarocesu.m. raajaa eka.m amacca.m aa.naapesi -- ``vihaara.m gantvaa adhikara.na.m vuupasametvaa uposatha.m kaaraapehii''ti. amacco raajaana.m pa.tipucchitu.m avisahanto a~n~ne amacce upasa"nkamitvaa aaha -- ``raajaa ma.m `vihaara.m gantvaa adhikara.na.m vuupasametvaa uposatha.m kaaraapehii'ti pahi.ni. katha.m nu kho adhikara.na.m vuupasammatii''ti? te aaha.msu ^a^P1.0054^ea^ -- ``maya.m eva.m sallakkhema -- `yathaa naama paccanta.m vuupasamentaa core ghaatenti, evameva ye uposatha.m na karonti, te maaretukaamo raajaa bhavissatii'''ti. atha so amacco vihaara.m gantvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaatetvaa aaha -- ``aha.m ra~n~naa `uposatha.m kaaraapehii'ti pesito. karotha daani, bhante, uposatha''nti. bhikkhuu ``na maya.m titthiyehi saddhi.m uposatha.m karomaa''ti aaha.msu. atha amacco theraasanato pa.t.thaaya asinaa siisaani paatetu.m aaraddho.
