[03]^b^vivekaja^eb^nti ettha vivitti viveko, niivara.navigamoti attho. vivittoti vaa viveko, niivara.navivitto jhaanasampayuttadhammaraasiiti attho. tasmaa vivekaa, tasmi.m vaa viveke jaatanti vivekaja.m. ^b^piitisukha^eb^nti ettha pinayatiiti piiti, saa sampiyaayanalakkha.naa kaayacittapiinanarasaa ^a^V1.0107^ea^, phara.narasaa vaa, odagyapaccupa.t.thaanaa. sukhana.m sukha.m, su.t.thu vaa khaadati khanati ca kaayacittaabaadhanti sukha.m, ta.m saatalakkha.na.m, sampayuttakaana.m upabruuhanarasa.m, anuggahapaccupa.t.thaana.m. satipi ca nesa.m katthaci avippayoge i.t.thaaramma.napa.tilaabhatu.t.thi piiti, pa.tiladdharasaanubhavana.m sukha.m. yattha piiti tattha sukha.m, yattha sukha.m tattha na niyamato piiti. sa"nkhaarakkhandhasa"ngahitaa piiti, vedanaakkhandhasa"ngahita.m sukha.m. kantaarakhinnassa vanantodakadassanasavanesu viya piiti, vanacchaayappavesanaudakaparibhogesu viya sukha.m. tasmi.m tasmi.m samaye paaka.tabhaavato ceta.m vuttanti veditabba.m. aya~nca piiti, ida~nca sukha.m, assa jhaanassa, asmi.m vaa jhaane atthiiti ida.m jhaana.m ``piitisukha''nti vuccati.

[03]atha vaa piiti ca sukha~nca piitisukha.m, dhammavinayaadayo viya. vivekaja.m piitisukhamassa jhaanassa, asmi.m vaa jhaane atthiiti evampi vivekaja.mpiitisukha.m. yatheva ^a^M1.0116^ea^ hi jhaana.m, eva.m piitisukha.m pettha vivekajameva hoti, ta~ncassa atthiiti tasmaa ekapadeneva ``vivekaja.m piitisukha''ntipi vattu.m yujjati. vibha"nge pana ``ida.m sukha.m imaaya piitiyaa sahagata''ntiaadinaa (vibha0 567) nayeneta.m vutta.m. attho pana tatraapi evameva da.t.thabbo.

[03]^b^pa.thama^eb^nti ga.nanaanupubbataa pa.thama.m, ida.m pa.thama.m samaapajjatiitipi pa.thama.m. paccaniikadhamme jhaapetiiti ^b^jhaana.m,^eb^ iminaa yogino jhaayantiitipi jhaana.m, paccaniikadhamme .dahanti gocara.m vaa cintentiiti attho. saya.m vaa ta.m jhaayati upanijjhaayatiiti jhaana.m, teneva upanijjhaayanalakkha.nanti vuccati. tadeta.m aaramma.nuupanijjhaana.m ^a^P1.0146^ea^, lakkha.nuupanijjhaananti duvidha.m hoti. tattha ^b^aaramma.nuupanijjhaana^eb^nti saha upacaarena a.t.tha samaapattiyo vuccanti. kasmaa? kasi.naadiaaramma.nuupanijjhaayanato. ^b^lakkha.nuupanijjhaana^eb^nti vipassanaamaggaphalaani vuccanti. kasmaa? lakkha.nuupanijjhaayanato. ettha hi vipassanaa aniccalakkha.naadiini upanijjhaayati, vipassanaaya upanijjhaayanakicca.m pana maggena sijjhatiiti maggo lakkha.nuupanijjhaananti vuccati. phala.m pana nirodhassa tathalakkha.na.m upanijjhaayatiiti lakkha.nuupanijjhaananti vuccati. imasmi.m panatthe aaramma.nuupanijjhaanameva jhaananti adhippeta.m..

[03]etthaaha -- ``katama.m pana ta.m jhaana.m naama, ya.m savitakka.m savicaara.m...pe0... piitisukhanti eva.m apadesa.m arahatii''ti? vuccate -- yathaa sadhano saparijanotiaadiisu .thapetvaa dhana~nca parijana~nca a~n~no apadesaaraho hoti, eva.m .thapetvaa vitakkaadidhamme a~n~na.m apadesaaraha.m natthi. yathaa pana sarathaa sapatti senaati vutte sena"ngesuyeva senaasammuti, evamidha pa~ncasu a"ngesuyeva ^a^V1.0108^ea^ jhaanasammuti veditabbaa. katamesu pa~ncasu? vitakko, vicaaro, piiti, sukha.m, cittekaggataati etesu. etaaneva hissa ``savitakka.m savicaara''ntiaadinaa nayena a"ngabhaavena vuttaani. avuttattaa ekaggataa a"nga.m na hotiiti ce ta~nca na. kasmaa? vuttattaa eva. saapi hi vibha"nge ``jhaananti vitakko vicaaro piiti sukha.m cittassekaggataa''ti eva.m vuttaayeva. tasmaa yathaa savitakka.m savicaaranti, eva.m sacittekaggatanti idha avuttepi iminaa vibha"ngavacanena cittekaggataapi a"ngamevaati veditabbaa. yena hi adhippaayena bhagavataa uddeso kato, so eva tena vibha"ngepi pakaasitoti.

[03]^b^upasampajjaa^eb^ti ^a^M1.0117^ea^ upagantvaa, paapu.nitvaati vutta.m hoti. upasampaadayitvaa vaa, nipphaadetvaati vutta.m hoti. vibha"nge pana ``upasampajjaati pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabho pa.tilaabho patti sampatti phusanaa samphusanaa sacchikiriyaa upasampadaa''ti vutta.m. tassaapi evamevattho veditabbo. ^b^vihaasi^eb^nti bodhima.n.de nisajjasa"nkhaatena iriyaapathavihaarena itivuttappakaarajhaanasama"ngii ^a^P1.0147^ea^ hutvaa attabhaavassa iriya.m vutti.m paalana.m yapana.m yaapana.m caara.m vihaara.m abhinipphaadesinti attho. vutta~nheta.m vibha"nge -- ``viharatiiti iriyati vattati paaleti yapeti yaapeti carati viharati, tena vuccati viharatii''ti (vibha0 512).

[03]ki.m pana katvaa bhagavaa ima.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasiiti? kamma.t.thaana.m bhaavetvaa. katara.m? aanaapaanassatikamma.t.thaana.m. a~n~nena tadatthikena ki.m kaatabbanti? a~n~nenapi eta.m vaa kamma.t.thaana.m pathaviikasi.naadiina.m vaa a~n~natara.m bhaavetabba.m. tesa.m bhaavanaanayo visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.55) vuttanayeneva veditabbo. idha pana vuccamaane atibhaariya.m vinayanidaana.m hoti, tasmaa paa.liyaa atthappakaasanamattameva karomaati.
[06] pa.thamajjhaanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]^b^vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa^eb^ti vitakkassa ca vicaarassa caati imesa.m dvinna.m vuupasamaa samatikkamaa; dutiyajjhaanakkha.ne apaatubhaavaati vutta.m hoti. tattha ki~ncaapi dutiyajjhaane sabbepi pa.thamajjhaanadhammaa na santi, a~n~neyeva hi pa.thamajjhaane phassaadayo, a~n~ne idha; o.laarikassa pana o.laarikassa a"ngassa samatikkamaa pa.thamajjhaanato paresa.m dutiyajjhaanaadiina.m adhigamo ^a^V1.0109^ea^ hotiiti diipanattha.m ``vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa''ti eva.m vuttanti veditabba.m. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti idha niyakajjhattamadhippeta.m. vibha"nge pana ``ajjhatta.m paccatta''nti (vibha0 573) ettakameva vutta.m. yasmaa pana niyakajjhatta.m adhippeta.m, tasmaa attani jaata.m attano santaane nibbattanti ayamettha attho.

[03]^b^sampasaadana^eb^nti sampasaadana.m vuccati saddhaa. sampasaadanayogato jhaanampi sampasaadana.m, niilava.n.nayogato niilavattha.m viya. yasmaa vaa ta.m jhaana.m sampasaadanasamannaagatattaa vitakkavicaarakkhobhavuupasamanena ceto sampasaadayati, tasmaapi sampasaadananti vutta.m. imasmi~nca atthavikappe sampasaadana.m cetasoti eva.m padasambandho veditabbo. purimasmi.m pana atthavikappe ^a^M1.0118^ea^ cetasoti eta.m ekodibhaavena saddhi.m yojetabba.m. tatraaya.m atthayojanaa -- eko udetiiti ^b^ekodi,^eb^ vitakkavicaarehi anajjhaaruu.lhattaa aggo se.t.tho hutvaa udetiiti ^a^P1.0148^ea^ attho. se.t.thopi hi loke ekoti vuccati. vitakkavicaaravirahato vaa eko asahaayo hutvaatipi vattu.m va.t.tati. atha vaa sampayuttadhamme udaayatiiti udi, u.t.thaapetiiti attho. se.t.tha.t.thena eko ca so udi caati ekodi, samaadhisseta.m adhivacana.m. iti ima.m ekodi.m bhaaveti va.d.dhayatiiti ida.m dutiyajjhaana.m ^b^ekodibhaava.m^eb^. so panaaya.m ekodi yasmaa cetaso, na sattassa na jiivassa, tasmaa eta.m ^b^cetaso ekodibhaava^eb^nti vutta.m.

[03]nanu caaya.m saddhaa pa.thamajjhaanepi atthi, aya~nca ekodinaamako samaadhi; atha kasmaa idameva sampasaadana.m ``cetaso ekodibhaava~ncaa''ti vuttanti? vuccate -- adu~nhi pa.thamajjhaana.m vitakkavicaarakkhobhena viicitara"ngasamaakulamiva jala.m na suppasanna.m hoti, tasmaa satiyaapi saddhaaya sampasaadananti na vutta.m. na suppasannattaayeva cettha samaadhipi na su.t.thu paaka.to, tasmaa ekodibhaavantipi na vutta.m. imasmi.m pana jhaane vitakkavicaarapalibodhaabhaavena laddhokaasaa balavatii saddhaa, balavasaddhaasahaayappa.tilaabheneva ca samaadhipi paaka.to; tasmaa idameva eva.m vuttanti veditabba.m. vibha"nge pana ``sampasaadananti yaa saddhaa saddahanaa okappanaa abhippasaado, cetaso ekodibhaavanti yaa cittassa .thiti...pe0... sammaasamaadhii''ti ettakameva vutta.m. eva.m vuttena panetena saddhi.m aya.m atthava.n.nanaa yathaa na virujjhati a~n~nadatthu sa.msandati ceva sameti ca eva.m veditabbaa.

[03]^b^avitakka.m avicaara^eb^nti bhaavanaaya pahiinattaa etasmi.m etassa vaa vitakko natthiiti avitakka.m. iminaava nayena avicaara.m. vibha"ngepi (vibha0 576) vutta.m ``iti aya~nca vitakko ^a^V1.0110^ea^ aya~nca vicaaro santaa honti samitaa vuupasantaa attha"ngataa abbhattha"ngataa appitaa byappitaa sositaa visositaa byantiikataa, tena vuccati avitakka.m avicaara''nti.

[03]etthaaha -- nanu ca ``vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaati iminaapi ayamattho siddho, atha kasmaa puna vutta.m avitakka.m avicaara''nti? vuccate -- evameta.m siddho vaayamattho, na paneta.m tadatthadiipaka.m; nanu avocumha -- ``o.laarikassa pana o.laarikassa ^a^M1.0119^ea^ a"ngassa samatikkamaa pa.thamajjhaanato paresa.m dutiyajjhaanaadiina.m ^a^P1.0149^ea^ adhigamo hotiiti diipanattha.m vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaati eva.m vutta''nti.

[03]apica vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ida.m sampasaadana.m, na kilesakaalusiyassa. vitakkavicaaraana~nca vuupasamaa ekodibhaava.m na upacaarajjhaanamiva niivara.nappahaanaa, na pa.thamajjhaanamiva ca a"ngapaatubhaavaati eva.m sampasaadanaekodibhaavaana.m hetuparidiipakamida.m vacana.m. tathaa vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ida.m avitakkaavicaara.m, na tatiyacatutthajjhaanaani viya cakkhuvi~n~naa.naadiini viya ca abhaavaati eva.m avitakkaavicaarabhaavassa hetuparidiipaka~nca, na vitakkavicaaraabhaavamattaparidiipaka.m. vitakkavicaaraabhaavamattaparidiipakameva pana ``avitakka.m avicaara''nti ida.m vacana.m, tasmaa purima.m vatvaapi puna vattabbamevaati.

[03]^b^samaadhija^eb^nti pa.thamajjhaanasamaadhito sampayuttasamaadhito vaa jaatanti attho. tattha ki~ncaapi pa.thamampi sampayuttasamaadhito jaata.m, atha kho ayameva ``samaadhii''ti vattabbata.m arahati vitakkavicaarakkhobhavirahena ativiya acalattaa suppasannattaa ca. tasmaa imassa va.n.nabha.nanattha.m idameva ``samaadhija''nti vutta.m. ^b^piitisukha^eb^nti ida.m vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^dutiya^eb^nti ga.nanaanupubbato dutiya.m, ida.m dutiya.m samaapajjatiitipi dutiya.m. ^b^jhaana^eb^nti ettha pana yathaa pa.thamajjhaana.m vitakkaadiihi pa~nca"ngika.m hoti, evamida.m sampasaadaadiihi ``catura"ngika''nti veditabba.m. yathaaha -- ``jhaananti sampasaado, piiti, sukha.m, cittassekaggataa''ti (vibha0 580). pariyaayoyeva ceso. sampasaadana.m pana .thapetvaa nippariyaayena tiva"ngikameveta.m hoti. yathaaha -- ``katama.m tasmi.m samaye tiva"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti? piiti, sukha.m, cittassekaggataa''ti (dha0 sa0 161). sesa.m vuttanayamevaati.
[06] dutiyajjhaanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]^b^piitiyaa^eb^ ^a^V1.0111^ea^ ^b^ca viraagaa^eb^ti ettha vuttatthaayeva piiti. ^b^viraago^eb^ti tassaa jigucchana.m vaa samatikkamo vaa. ubhinnamantaraa ``ca'' saddo sampi.n.danattho, so ^a^M1.0120^ea^ hi vuupasama.m vaa sampi.n.deti vitakkavicaaravuupasama.m vaa. tattha yadaa vuupasamameva sampi.n.deti, tadaa piitiyaa viraagaa ca, ki~nca bhiyyo vuupasamaa caati eva.m yojanaa ^a^P1.0150^ea^ veditabbaa. imissaa ca yojanaaya.m viraago jigucchanattho hoti. tasmaa piitiyaa jigucchanaa ca vuupasamaa caati ayamattho da.t.thabbo. yadaa pana vitakkavicaaravuupasama.m sampi.n.deti, tadaa piitiyaa ca viraagaa, ki~nca bhiyyo vitakkavicaaraana~nca vuupasamaati eva.m yojanaa veditabbaa. imissaa ca yojanaaya.m viraago samatikkamanattho hoti. tasmaa piitiyaa ca samatikkamaa, vitakkavicaaraana~nca vuupasamaati ayamattho da.t.thabbo.

[03]kaama~ncete vitakkavicaaraa dutiyajjhaaneyeva vuupasantaa imassa pana jhaanassa maggaparidiipanattha.m va.n.nabha.nanattha~nceta.m vutta.m. ``vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa''ti hi vutte ida.m pa~n~naayati -- ``nuuna vitakkavicaaravuupasamo maggo imassa jhaanassaa''ti. yathaa ca tatiye ariyamagge appahiinaanampi sakkaayadi.t.thaadiina.m ``pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaa''ti (ma0 ni0 2.132) eva.m pahaana.m vuccamaana.m va.n.nabha.nana.m hoti tadadhigamaaya ussukaana.m ussaahajanaka.m; evameva.m idha avuupasantaanampi vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamo vuccamaano va.n.nabha.nana.m hoti. tenaayamattho vutto -- ``piitiyaa ca samatikkamaa, vitakkavicaaraana~nca vuupasamaa''ti.

[03]^b^upekkhako ca vihaasi^eb^nti ettha upapattito ikkhatiiti upekkhaa, sama.m passati, apakkhapatitaava hutvaa passatiiti attho. taaya visadaaya vipulaaya thaamagataaya samannaagatattaa tatiyajjhaanasama"ngii ``upekkhako''ti vuccati. upekkhaa pana dasavidhaa hoti -- cha.la"ngupekkhaa, brahmavihaarupekkhaa, bojjha"ngupekkhaa, viiriyupekkhaa, sa"nkhaarupekkhaa, vedanupekkhaa, vipassanupekkhaa, tatramajjhattupekkhaa, jhaanupekkhaa, paarisuddhupekkhaati. evamaya.m dasavidhaapi tattha tattha aagatanayato bhuumipuggalacittaaramma.nato, khandhasa"ngaha-ekakkha.nakusalattikasa"nkhepavasena ca ^b^a.t.thasaaliniyaa^eb^ dhammasa"ngaha.t.thakathaaya ^a^P1.0151^ea^ vuttanayeneva veditabbaa. idha pana vuccamaanaa vinayanidaana.m atibhaariya.m karotiiti na vuttaa. lakkha.naadito pana idha adhippetupekkhaa majjhattalakkha.naa, anaabhogarasaa, abyaapaarapaccupa.t.thaanaa, piitiviraagapada.t.thaanaati.

[03]etthaaha ^a^V1.0112^ea^ -- nanu caaya.m atthato tatramajjhattupekkhaava hoti, saa ca pa.thamadutiyajjhaanesupi atthi, tasmaa tatraapi ``upekkhako ca vihaasi''nti evamaya.m vattabbaa siyaa, saa kasmaa na vuttaati? aparibyattakiccato. aparibyatta~nhi ^a^M1.0121^ea^ tassaa tattha kicca.m, vitakkaadiihi abhibhuutattaa. idha panaaya.m vitakkavicaarapiitiihi anabhibhuutattaa ukkhittasiraa viya hutvaa paribyattakiccaa jaataa, tasmaa vuttaati.
[03]ni.t.thitaa ``upekkhako ca vihaasi''nti etassa sabbaso atthava.n.nanaa.

[03]idaani sato ca sampajaanoti ettha saratiiti ^b^sato,^eb^ sampajaanaatiiti ^b^sampajaano^eb^. puggalena sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca vutta.m. tattha sara.nalakkha.naa sati, asammussanarasaa, aarakkhapaccupa.t.thaanaa; asammohalakkha.na.m sampaja~n~na.m, tiira.narasa.m, pavicayapaccupa.t.thaana.m. tattha ki~ncaapi ida.m satisampaja~n~na.m purimajjhaanesupi atthi, mu.t.thassatissa hi asampajaanassa upacaarajjhaanamattampi na sampajjati, pageva appanaa; o.laarikattaa pana tesa.m jhaanaana.m bhuumiya.m viya purisassa cittassa gati sukhaa hoti, abyatta.m tattha satisampaja~n~nakicca.m. o.laarika"ngappahaanena pana sukhumattaa imassa jhaanassa purisassa khuradhaaraaya.m viya satisampaja~n~nakiccapariggahitaayeva cittassa gati icchitabbaati idheva vutta.m. ki~nca bhiyyo? yathaapi dhenupago vaccho dhenuto apaniito arakkhiyamaano punadeva dhenu.m upagacchati; evamida.m tatiyajjhaanasukha.m piitito apaniitampi satisampaja~n~naarakkhena arakkhiyamaana.m punadeva piiti.m upagaccheyya piitisampayuttameva siyaa. sukhe vaapi sattaa rajjanti, ida~nca atimadhura.m sukha.m, tato para.m sukhaabhaavaa ^a^P1.0152^ea^. satisampaja~n~naanubhaavena panettha sukhe asaarajjanaa hoti, no a~n~nathaati imampi atthavisesa.m dassetu.m ida.m idheva vuttanti veditabba.m.

[03]idaani ^b^sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedesi^eb^nti ettha ki~ncaapi tatiyajjhaanasama"ngino sukhappa.tisa.mvedanaabhogo natthi, eva.m santepi yasmaa tassa naamakaayena sampayutta.m sukha.m, ya.m vaa ta.m naamakaayasampayutta.m sukha.m, ta.msamu.t.thaanenassa yasmaa atipa.niitena ruupena ruupakaayo phu.to, yassa ^a^M1.0122^ea^ phu.tattaa jhaanaa vu.t.thitopi sukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeyya, tasmaa etamattha.m dassento ``sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedesi''nti aaha.

[03]idaani ^b^ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii^eb^ti ettha ya.mjhaanahetu ya.mjhaanakaara.naa ta.m tatiyajjhaanasama"ngiipuggala.m buddhaadayo ariyaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti ^a^V1.0113^ea^ pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti pakaasenti, pasa.msantiiti adhippaayo. kinti? ``upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii''ti. ta.m tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasinti evamettha yojanaa veditabbaa.

[03]kasmaa pana ta.m te eva.m pasa.msantiiti? pasa.msaarahato. aya~nhi yasmaa atimadhurasukhe sukhapaaramippattepi tatiyajjhaane upekkhako, na tattha sukhaabhisa"ngena aaka.d.dhiiyati, yathaa ca piiti na uppajjati; eva.m upa.t.thitassatitaaya satimaa. yasmaa ca ariyakanta.m ariyajanasevitameva ca asa.mkili.t.tha.m sukha.m naamakaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, tasmaa pasa.msaaraho. iti pasa.msaarahato na.m ariyaa te eva.m pasa.msaahetubhuute gu.ne pakaasentaa ``upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii''ti eva.m pasa.msantiiti veditabba.m.

[03]^b^tatiya^eb^nti ga.nanaanupubbato tatiya.m. ida.m tatiya.m samaapajjatiitipi tatiya.m. ^b^jhaana^eb^nti ettha ca yathaa dutiya.m sampasaadaadiihi catura"ngika.m; evamida.m upekkhaadiihi pa~nca"ngika.m. yathaaha -- ``jhaananti upekkhaa sati sampaja~n~na.m sukha.m cittassa ekaggataa''ti (vibha0 591). pariyaayoyeva ceso. upekkhaasatisampaja~n~naani pana .thapetvaa nippariyaayena duva"ngikameveta.m hoti. yathaaha -- ``katama.m tasmi.m samaye duva"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti ^a^P1.0153^ea^? sukha.m, cittassekaggataa''ti (dha0 sa0 163). sesa.m vuttanayamevaati.
[06] tatiyajjhaanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]^b^sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa^eb^ti kaayikasukhassa ca kaayikadukkhassa ca pahaanaa. ^b^pubbevaa^eb^ti ta~nca kho pubbeva, na catutthajjhaanakkha.ne ^a^M1.0123^ea^. ^b^somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa^eb^ti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa caati imesampi dvinna.m pubbeva attha"ngamaa pahaanaa icceva vutta.m hoti. kadaa pana nesa.m pahaana.m hoti? catunna.m jhaanaana.m upacaarakkha.ne. somanassa~nhi catutthajjhaanassa upacaarakkha.neyeva pahiiyati, dukkhadomanassasukhaani pa.thamadutiyatatiyaana.m upacaarakkha.nesu. evametesa.m pahaanakkamena avuttaana.m, indriyavibha"nge pana indriyaana.m uddesakkameneva idhaapi vuttaana.m sukhadukkhasomanassa domanassaana.m pahaana.m veditabba.m.

[03]yadi ^a^V1.0114^ea^ panetaani tassa tassa jhaanassupacaarakkha.neyeva pahiiyanti, atha kasmaa ``kattha cuppanna.m dukkhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thamajjhaana.m upasampajja viharati, etthuppanna.m dukkhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati. kattha cuppanna.m domanassindriya.m... sukhindriya.m... somanassindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catutthajjhaana.m upasampajja viharati, etthuppanna.m somanassindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhatii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 5.510) eva.m jhaanesveva nirodho vuttoti? atisayanirodhattaa. atisayanirodho hi nesa.m pa.thamajjhaanaadiisu, na nirodhoyeva; nirodhoyeva pana upacaarakkha.ne, naatisayanirodho. tathaa hi naanaavajjane pa.thamajjhaanuupacaare niruddhassaapi dukkhindriyassa .da.msamakasaadisamphassena vaa visamaasanupataapena vaa siyaa uppatti, na tveva antoappanaaya.m. upacaare vaa niruddhampeta.m na su.t.thu niruddha.m hoti; pa.tipakkhena avihatattaa. antoappanaaya.m pana piitiphara.nena sabbo kaayo sukhokkanto hoti. sukhokkantakaayassa ca su.t.thu niruddha.m hoti dukkhindriya.m; pa.tipakkhena vihatattaa. naanaavajjane eva ^a^P1.0154^ea^ ca dutiyajjhaanuupacaare pahiinassa domanassindriyassa yasmaa eta.m vitakkavicaarappaccayepi kaayakilamathe cittupaghaate ca sati uppajjati, vitakkavicaaraabhaave neva uppajjati. yattha pana uppajjati tattha vitakkavicaarabhaave. appahiinaa eva ca dutiyajjhaanuupacaare vitakkavicaaraati tatthassa siyaa uppatti; appahiinapaccayattaa. na tveva dutiyajjhaane; pahiinapaccayattaa. tathaa tatiyajjhaanuupacaare pahiinassaapi sukhindriyassa piitisamu.t.thaanapa.niitaruupaphu.takaayassa siyaa uppatti, na tveva tatiyajjhaane. tatiyajjhaane hi sukhassa paccayabhuutaa ^a^M1.0124^ea^ piiti sabbaso niruddhaati. tathaa catutthajjhaanuupacaare pahiinassaapi somanassindriyassa aasannattaa, appanaappattaaya upekkhaaya abhaavena sammaa anatikkantattaa ca siyaa uppatti, na tveva catutthajjhaane. tasmaa eva ca ``etthuppanna.m dukkhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhatii''ti tattha tattha aparisesaggaha.na.m katanti.

[03]etthaaha -- ``atheva.m tassa tassa jhaanassuupacaare pahiinaapi etaa vedanaa idha kasmaa samaaharii''ti? sukhaggaha.nattha.m. yaa hi aya.m ``adukkhamasukha''nti ettha adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa vuttaa, saa sukhumaa atidubbi~n~neyyaa na sakkaa sukhena gahetu.m. tasmaa yathaa naama du.t.thassa yathaa vaa tathaa vaa upasa"nkamitvaa gahetu.m asakku.neyyassa go.nassa gaha.nattha.m gopo ekasmi.m vaje sabbe gaavo samaaharati, athekeka.m niiharanto pa.tipaa.tiyaa aagata.m ``aya.m so, ga.nhatha na''nti tampi gaahaapayati; evameva bhagavaa sukhaggaha.nattha.m sabbaa etaa samaahari. eva~nhi ^a^V1.0115^ea^ samaaha.taa etaa dassetvaa ``ya.m neva sukha.m na dukkha.m na somanassa.m na domanassa.m, aya.m adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa''ti sakkaa hoti esaa gaahayitu.m.

[03]apica adukkhamasukhaaya cetovimuttiyaa paccayadassanattha~ncaapi etaa vuttaati veditabbaa. sukhappahaanaadayo hi tassaa paccayaa. yathaaha -- ``cattaaro kho, aavuso, paccayaa adukkhamasukhaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa. idhaavuso, bhikkhu, sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catutthajjhaana.m ^a^P1.0155^ea^ upasampajja viharati. ime kho, aavuso, cattaaro paccayaa adukkhamasukhaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa''ti (ma0 ni0 1.458). yathaa vaa a~n~nattha pahiinaapi sakkaayadi.t.thiaadayo tatiyamaggassa va.n.nabha.nanattha.m tattha pahiinaati vuttaa; eva.m va.n.nabha.nanatthampetassa jhaanassetaa idha vuttaatipi veditabbaa. paccayaghaatena vaa ettha raagadosaana.m atiduurabhaava.m dassetumpetaa vuttaati veditabbaa. etaasu hi sukha.m somanassassa paccayo, somanassa.m raagassa, dukkha.m domanassassa, domanassa.m dosassa. sukhaadighaatena ca te sappaccayaa raagadosaa hataati atiduure hontiiti.

[03]^b^adukkhamasukha^eb^nti dukkhaabhaavena adukkha.m, sukhaabhaavena asukha.m. etenettha dukkhasukhapa.tipakkhabhuuta.m tatiyavedana.m diipeti, na dukkhasukhaabhaavamatta.m. tatiyavedanaa naama -- adukkhamasukhaa, upekkhaatipi vuccati. saa i.t.thaani.t.thavipariitaanubhavanalakkha.naa, majjhattarasaa, avibhuutapaccupa.t.thaanaa, sukhanirodhapada.t.thaanaati veditabbaa. ^b^upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi^eb^nti upekkhaaya janitasatipaarisuddhi.m. imasmi~nhi jhaane suparisuddhaa sati. yaa ca tassaa satiyaa paarisuddhi, saa upekkhaaya kataa na a~n~nena; tasmaa eta.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhinti vuccati. ^b^vibha"nge^eb^pi vutta.m -- ``aya.m sati imaaya upekkhaaya visadaa hoti parisuddhaa pariyodaataa, tena vuccati -- `upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi'''nti (vibha0 597). yaaya ca upekkhaaya ettha satiyaa paarisuddhi hoti, saa atthato tatramajjhattataa veditabbaa. na kevala~ncettha taaya satiyeva parisuddhaa, apica kho sabbepi sampayuttadhammaa; satisiisena pana desanaa vuttaa.

[03]tattha ^a^M1.0125^ea^ ki~ncaapi aya.m upekkhaa he.t.thaapi tiisu jhaanesu vijjati, yathaa pana divaa suuriyappabhaabhibhavaa sommabhaavena ca attano upakaarakattena vaa sabhaagaaya rattiyaa alaabhaa divaa vijjamaanaapi candalekhaa aparisuddhaa hoti apariyodaataa; evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhaacandalekhaa vitakkavicaaraadipaccaniikadhammatejaabhibhavaa sabhaagaaya ca upekkhaavedanaarattiyaa alaabhaa vijjamaanaapi pa.thamaadijjhaanabhedesu aparisuddhaa ^a^P1.0156^ea^ hoti. tassaa ca ^a^V1.0116^ea^ aparisuddhaaya divaa aparisuddhacandalekhaaya pabhaa viya sahajaataapi satiaadayo aparisuddhaava honti; tasmaa tesu ekampi ``upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi''nti na vutta.m. idha pana vitakkaadipaccaniikadhammatejaabhibhavaabhaavaa sabhaagaaya ca upekkhaavedanaarattiyaa pa.tilaabhaa aya.m tatramajjhattupekkhaacandalekhaa ativiya parisuddhaa, tassaa parisuddhattaa parisuddhacandalekhaaya pabhaa viya sahajaataapi satiaadayo parisuddhaa honti pariyodaataa, tasmaa idameva upekkhaasatipaarisuddhinti vuttanti veditabba.m.

[03]^b^catuttha^eb^nti ga.nanaanupubbato catuttha.m. ida.m catuttha.m samaapajjatiitipi catuttha.m. ^b^jhaana^eb^nti ettha yathaa tatiya.m upekkhaadiihi pa~nca"ngika.m; evamida.m upekkhaadiihi tiva"ngika.m. yathaaha -- ``jhaananti upekkhaa, sati cittassekaggataa''ti. pariyaayo eva ceso. .thapetvaa pana sati.m upekkhekaggatameva gahetvaa nippariyaayena duva"ngikameveta.m hoti. yathaaha -- ``katama.m tasmi.m samaye duva"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti? upekkhaa, cittassekaggataa''ti (dha0 sa0 165). sesa.m vuttanayamevaati.
[06] catutthajjhaanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ iti imaani cattaari jhaanaani kesa~nci cittekaggatatthaani honti, kesa~nci vipassanaapaadakaani, kesa~nci abhi~n~naapaadakaani, kesa~nci nirodhapaadakaani, kesa~nci bhavokkamanatthaani. tattha khii.naasavaana.m cittekaggatatthaani honti, te hi samaapajjitvaa ``ekaggacittaa sukha.m divasa.m viharissaamaa''ti ^a^M1.0126^ea^ icceva.m kasi.naparikamma.m katvaa a.t.tha samaapattiyo nibbattenti. sekkhaputhujjanaana.m ``samaapattito vu.t.thaaya samaahitena cittena vipassissaamaa''ti nibbattentaana.m vipassanaapaadakaani honti. ye pana a.t.tha samaapattiyo nibbattetvaa abhi~n~naapaadaka.m jhaana.m samaapajjitvaa samaapattito vu.t.thaaya ``ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hotii''ti vuttanayaa abhi~n~naayo patthentaa nibbattenti, tesa.m abhi~n~naapaadakaani honti. ye pana a.t.tha samaapattiyo nibbattetvaa ``nirodhasamaapatti.m samaapajjitvaa sattaaha.m acittakaa hutvaa di.t.theva dhamme nirodha.m nibbaana.m patvaa sukha.m viharissaamaa''ti nibbattenti, tesa.m nirodhapaadakaani ^a^P1.0157^ea^ honti. ye pana a.t.tha samaapattiyo nibbattetvaa ``aparihiinajjhaanaa hutvaa brahmaloke uppajjissaamaa''ti nibbattenti, tesa.m bhavokkamanatthaani honti.

[03]bhagavataa ^a^V1.0117^ea^ panida.m catutthajjhaana.m bodhirukkhamuule nibbattita.m, ta.m tassa vipassanaapaadaka~nceva ahosi abhi~n~naapaadaka~nca nirodhapaadaka~nca sabbakiccasaadhaka~nca sabbalokiyalokuttaragu.nadaayakanti veditabba.m. yesa~nca gu.naana.m daayaka.m ahosi, tesa.m ekadesa.m dassento ^b^``so eva.m samaahite citte''^eb^tiaadimaaha.

[03]tattha ^b^so^eb^ti so aha.m. ^b^eva^eb^nti catutthajjhaanakkamanidassanameta.m. iminaa kamena catutthajjhaana.m pa.tilabhitvaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^samaahite^eb^ti iminaa catutthajjhaanasamaadhinaa samaahite. ^b^parisuddhe^eb^tiaadiisu pana upekkhaasatipaarisuddhibhaavena ^b^parisuddhe^eb^. parisuddhattaayeva ^b^pariyodaate,^eb^ pabhassareti vutta.m hoti. sukhaadiina.m paccayaana.m ghaatena vihataraagaadia"nga.nattaa ^b^ana"nga.ne^eb^. ana"nga.nattaayeva ca ^b^vigatuupakkilese;^eb^ a"nga.nena hi citta.m upakkilissati. subhaavitattaa ^b^mudubhuute,^eb^ vasiibhaavappatteti vutta.m hoti. vase vattamaana~nhi citta.m muduuti vuccati. muduttaayeva ca ^b^kammaniye,^eb^ kammakkhame kammayoggeti vutta.m hoti. mudu hi citta.m kammaniya.m hoti sudhantamiva suva.n.na.m, tadubhayampi ca subhaavitattaa eva. yathaaha -- ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekadhammampi samanupassaami, ya.m eva.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m mudu ca hoti kammaniya~nca, yathayida.m, bhikkhave, citta''nti (a0 ni0 1.22).

[03]etesu ^a^M1.0127^ea^ parisuddhabhaavaadiisu .thitattaa ^b^.thite^eb^. .thitattaayeva ^b^aane~njappatte^eb^, acale niri~njaneti vutta.m hoti. mudukamma~n~nabhaavena vaa attano vase .thitattaa .thite, saddhaadiihi pariggahitattaa aane~njappatte. saddhaapariggahita~nhi citta.m assaddhiyena na i~njati, viiriyapariggahita.m kosajjena na i~njati, satipariggahita.m pamaadena na i~njati, samaadhipariggahita.m uddhaccena na i~njati, pa~n~naapariggahita.m avijjaaya na i~njati, obhaasagata.m kilesandhakaarena na i~njati. imehi ^a^P1.0158^ea^ chahi dhammehi pariggahita.m aane~njappatta.m citta.m hoti. eva.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m citta.m abhiniihaarakkhama.m hoti abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya.

[03]aparo nayo -- catutthajjhaanasamaadhinaa samaahite. niivara.naduuriibhaavena parisuddhe. vitakkaadisamatikkamena pariyodaate. jhaanappa.tilaabhapaccayaana.m paapakaana.m icchaavacaraana.m abhaavena ana"nga.ne. abhijjhaadiina.m cittuupakkilesaana.m vigamena vigatuupakkilese. ubhayampi ceta.m ^b^ana"nga.navattha^eb^suttaanusaarena (ma0 ni0 1.57 aadayo) veditabba.m. vasippattiyaa mudubhuute. iddhipaadabhaavuupagamena kammaniye. bhaavanaapaaripuuriyaa pa.niitabhaavuupagamena ^b^.thite^eb^ ^b^aane~njappatte^eb^ ^a^V1.0118^ea^. yathaa aane~njappatta.m hoti; eva.m .thiteti attho. evampi a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m citta.m abhiniihaarakkhama.m hoti abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, paadaka.m pada.t.thaanabhuutanti attho.

[03]^b^pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naayaa^eb^ti eva.m abhi~n~naapaadake jaate etasmi.m citte pubbenivaasaanussatimhi ya.m ~naa.na.m tadatthaaya. tattha ^b^pubbenivaaso^eb^ti pubbe atiitajaatiisu nivutthakkhandhaa. nivutthaati ajjhaavutthaa anubhuutaa attano santaane uppajjitvaa niruddhaa nivutthadhammaa vaa nivutthaa, gocaranivaasena nivutthaa, attano vi~n~naa.nena vi~n~naataa paricchinnaa, paravi~n~naa.navi~n~naataapi vaa chinnava.tumakaanussara.naadiisu. ^b^pubbenivaasaanussatii^eb^ti yaaya satiyaa pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, saa pubbenivaasaanussati. ^b^~naa.na^eb^nti taaya satiyaa sampayutta~naa.na.m. evamimassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa atthaaya pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya etassa ~naa.nassa adhigamaaya pattiyaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^abhininnaamesi^eb^nti abhiniihari.m.

[03]^b^so^eb^ti ^a^M1.0128^ea^ so aha.m. ^b^anekavihita^eb^nti anekavidha.m, anekehi vaa pakaarehi pavattita.m sa.mva.n.nitanti attho. ^b^pubbenivaasa^eb^nti samanantaraatiita.m bhava.m aadi.m katvaa tattha tattha nivutthasantaana.m. ^b^anussaraamii^eb^ti ``ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo''ti eva.m jaatipa.tipaa.tiyaa anugantvaa anugantvaa saraami, anudeva vaa saraami, citte ^a^P1.0159^ea^ abhininnaamitamatte eva saraamiiti dasseti. puuritapaaramiina~nhi mahaapurisaana.m parikammakara.na.m natthi, tena te citta.m abhininnaametvaava saranti. aadikammikakulaputtaa pana parikamma.m katvaava saranti, tasmaa tesa.m vasena parikamma.m vattabba.m siyaa. ta.m pana vuccamaana.m atibhaariya.m vinayanidaana.m karoti, tasmaa ta.m na vadaama. atthikehi pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi0 2.402 aadayo) vuttanayeneva gahetabba.m. idha pana paa.limeva va.n.nayissaama.

[03]^b^seyyathida^eb^nti aaraddhappakaaradassanatthe nipaato. teneva yvaaya.m pubbenivaaso aaraddho, tassa pakaarappabheda.m dassento ^b^ekampi jaati^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^ekampi jaati^eb^nti ekampi pa.tisandhimuula.m cutipariyosaana.m ekabhavapariyaapanna.m khandhasantaana.m. esa nayo ^b^dvepi jaatiyo^eb^tiaadiisu. ^b^anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe^eb^tiaadiisu pana parihaayamaano kappo sa.mva.t.takappo, va.d.dhamaano viva.t.takappoti veditabbo. tattha ca sa.mva.t.tena sa.mva.t.ta.t.thaayii gahito hoti tammuulakattaa. viva.t.tena ca viva.t.ta.t.thaayii. eva~nhi sati yaani taani ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, kappassa asa"nkhyeyyaani ^a^V1.0119^ea^. katamaani cattaari? sa.mva.t.to sa.mva.t.ta.t.thaayii, viva.t.to viva.t.ta.t.thaayii''ti vuttaani taani sabbaani pariggahitaani honti.

[03]tattha tayo sa.mva.t.taa -- tejosa.mva.t.to, aaposa.mva.t.to, vaayosa.mva.t.toti. tisso sa.mva.t.tasiimaa -- aabhassaraa, subhaki.nhaa, vehapphalaati. yadaa kappo tejena sa.mva.t.tati, aabhassarato he.t.thaa agginaa .dayhati. yadaa udakena sa.mva.t.tati, subhaki.nhato he.t.thaa udakena viliiyati. yadaa vaatena sa.mva.t.tati, vehapphalato he.t.thaa vaatena viddha.msiyati. vitthaarato pana sadaapi eka.m buddhakkhetta.m vinassati.

[03]buddhakkhetta.m naama tividha.m hoti -- jaatikkhetta.m, aa.naakkhetta.m, visayakkhetta~nca. tattha jaatikkhetta.m dasasahassacakkavaa.lapariyanta.m hoti, ya.m tathaagatassa pa.tisandhiaadiisu kampati. aa.naakkhetta.m ^a^M1.0129^ea^ ko.tisatasahassacakkavaa.lapariyanta.m hoti. yattha ratanaparitta.m, khandhaparitta.m, dhajaggaparitta.m, aa.taanaa.tiyaparitta.m, moraparittanti imesa.m parittaana.m aanubhaavo pavattati. visayakkhetta.m pana ananta.m aparimaa.na.m, ``ya.m ^a^P1.0160^ea^ yaavataa vaa pana aaka"nkheyyaa''ti (a0 ni0 3.81) vutta.m yattha ya.m ya.m aaka"nkhati ta.m ta.m anussarati. evametesu tiisu buddhakkhettesu eka.m aa.naakkhetta.m vinassati. tasmi.m pana vinassante jaatikkhettampi vina.t.thameva hoti; vinassanta~nca ekatova vinassati, sa.n.thahantampi ekatova sa.n.thahati. tassa vinaaso ca sa.n.thahana~nca ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi0 2.404) vutta.m. atthikehi tato gahetabba.m.

[03]ye panete sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taa vuttaa, etesu bhagavaa bodhima.n.de sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhanatthaaya nisinno anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe sari. katha.m? ^b^``amutraasi^eb^''ntiaadinaa nayena. tattha ^b^amutraasi^eb^nti amumhi sa.mva.t.takappe aha.m amumhi bhave vaa yoniyaa vaa gatiyaa vaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyaa vaa sattaavaase vaa sattanikaaye vaa ahosi.m. ^b^eva.mnaamo^eb^ti vessantaro vaa jotipaalo vaa. ^b^eva.mgotto^eb^ti bhaggavo vaa gotamo vaa. ^b^eva.mva.n.no^eb^ti odaato vaa saamo vaa. ^b^evamaahaaro^eb^ti saalima.msodanaahaaro vaa pavattaphalabhojano vaa. ^b^eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii^eb^ti anekappakaarena kaayikacetasikaana.m saamisaniraamisaadippabhedaana.m vaa sukhadukkhaana.m pa.tisa.mvedii. ^b^evamaayupariyanto^eb^ti eva.m vassasataparamaayupariyanto vaa caturaasiitikappasahassaparamaayupariyanto vaa.

[03]^b^so^eb^ ^a^V1.0120^ea^ ^b^tato cuto amutra udapaadi^eb^nti so aha.m tato bhavato yonito gatito vi~n~naa.na.t.thitito sattaavaasato sattanikaayato vaa cuto, puna amukasmi.m naama bhave yoniyaa gatiyaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyaa sattaavaase sattanikaaye vaa udapaadi.m. ^b^tatraapaasi^eb^nti atha tatraapi bhave yoniyaa gatiyaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyaa sattaavaase sattanikaaye vaa puna ahosi.m. eva.mnaamotiaadi vuttanayameva.

[03]atha vaa yasmaa ^b^amutraasi^eb^nti ida.m anupubbena aarohantassa yaavadicchaka.m sara.na.m. ^b^so tato cuto^eb^ti pa.tinivattantassa paccavekkha.na.m. tasmaa ^b^idhuupapanno^eb^ti imissaa idhuupapattiyaa anantara.m amutra udapaadinti tusitabhavana.m sandhaayaahaati veditabba.m. ^b^tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo^eb^ti tatraapi ^a^M1.0130^ea^ tusitabhavane ^a^P1.0161^ea^ setaketu naama devaputto ahosi.m. ^b^eva.mgotto^eb^ti taahi devataahi saddhi.m ekagotto. ^b^eva.mva.n.no^eb^ti suva.n.nava.n.no. ^b^evamaahaaro^eb^ti dibbasudhaahaaro. ^b^eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii^eb^ti eva.m dibbasukhappa.tisa.mvedii. dukkha.m pana sa"nkhaaradukkhamattameva. ^b^evamaayupariyanto^eb^ti eva.m sattapa~n~naasavassako.tisa.t.thivassasatasahassaayupariyanto. ^b^so tato cuto^eb^ti so aha.m tato tusitabhavanato cuto. ^b^idhuupapanno^eb^ti idha mahaamaayaaya deviyaa kucchimhi nibbatto.

[03]^b^itii^eb^ti eva.m. ^b^saakaara.m sauddesa^eb^nti naamagottavasena sauddesa.m, va.n.naadivasena saakaara.m. naamagottavasena hi satto ``datto, tisso, gotamo''ti uddisiiyati; va.n.naadiihi odaato, saamoti naanattato pa~n~naayati; tasmaa naamagotta.m uddeso, itare aakaaraa. ki.m pana buddhaayeva pubbenivaasa.m sarantiiti? vuccate -- na buddhaayeva, paccekabuddha-buddhasaavaka-titthiyaapi, no ca kho avisesena. titthiyaa hi cattaaliisa.myeva kappe saranti, na tato para.m. kasmaa? dubbalapa~n~nattaa. tesa~nhi naamaruupaparicchedavirahato dubbalaa pa~n~naa hoti. saavakesu pana asiitimahaasaavakaa kappasatasahassa.m saranti; dve aggasaavakaa ekamasa"nkhyeyya.m satasahassa~nca. paccekabuddhaa dve asa"nkhyeyyaani satasahassa~nca. ettako hi tesa.m abhiniihaaro. buddhaana.m pana paricchedo natthi, yaava icchanti taava saranti. titthiyaa ca khandhapa.tipaa.timeva saranti. pa.tipaa.ti.m mu~ncitvaa cutipa.tisandhivasena saritu.m na sakkonti. tesa~nhi andhaana.m viya icchitappadesokkamana.m natthi. saavakaa ubhayathaapi saranti; tathaa paccekabuddhaa. buddhaa pana khandhapa.tipaa.tiyaapi cutipa.tisandhivasenapi siihokkantavasenapi anekaasu kappako.tiisu he.t.thaa vaa upari vaa ya.m ya.m .thaana.m aaka"nkhanti, ta.m sabba.m sarantiyeva.

[03]^b^aya.m kho me braahma.naa^eb^tiaadiisu ^b^me^eb^ti mayaa. ^b^vijjaa^eb^ti viditakara.na.t.thena vijjaa. ki.m vidita.m ^a^V1.0121^ea^ karoti? pubbenivaasa.m. ^b^avijjaa^eb^ti tasseva pubbenivaasassa aviditakara.na.t.thena tappa.ticchaadakamoho vuccati. ^b^tamo^eb^ti sveva moho tappa.ticchaadaka.t.thena ^a^P1.0162^ea^ ``tamo''ti vuccati. ^b^aaloko^eb^ti saayevavijjaa obhaasakara.na.t.thena ``aaloko''ti vuccati. ettha ca vijjaa adhigataati aya.m attho, sesa.m pasa.msaavacana.m. yojanaa ^a^M1.0131^ea^ panettha -- aya.m kho me vijjaa adhigataa, tassa me adhigatavijjassa avijjaa vihataa, vina.t.thaati attho. kasmaa? yasmaa vijjaa uppannaa. esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvaye.

[03]^b^yathaa ta^eb^nti ettha ^b^yathaa^eb^ti opammatthe. ^b^ta^eb^nti nipaato. satiyaa avippavaasena ^b^appamattassa^eb^. viiriyaataapena ^b^aataapino^eb^. kaaye ca jiivite ca anapekkhataaya ^b^pahitattassa,^eb^ pesitacittassaati attho. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaa appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avijjaa viha~n~neyya vijjaa uppajjeyya, tamo viha~n~neyya aaloko uppajjeyya; evameva mama avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato aaloko uppanno. etassa me padhaanaanuyogassa anuruupameva phala.m laddhanti.

[03]^b^aya.m kho me braahma.na pa.thamaa abhinibbhidaa ahosi kukku.tacchaapakasseva a.n.dakosamhaa^eb^ti aya.m kho mama braahma.na pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.namukhatu.n.dakena pubbe nivutthakkhandhapa.ticchaadaka.m avijja.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa pa.thamaa abhinibbhidaa pa.thamaa nikkhanti pa.thamaa ariyaajaati ahosi, kukku.tacchaapakasseva mukhatu.n.dakena vaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa tamhaa a.n.dakosamhaa abhinibbhidaa nikkhanti kukku.tanikaaye paccaajaatiiti.
[06] pubbenivaasakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ ^b^eva.m...pe0... cutuupapaata~naa.naayaa^eb^ti cutiyaa ca upapaate ca ~naa.naaya; yena ~naa.nena sattaana.m cuti ca upapaato ca ~naayati, tadatthanti vutta.m hoti. ^b^citta.m abhininnaamesi^eb^nti parikammacitta.m niihari.m. ^b^so dibbena...pe0... passaamii^eb^ti ettha pana puuritapaaramiina.m mahaasattaana.m parikammakara.na.m natthi. te hi citte abhininnaamitamatte eva dibbena cakkhunaa satte passanti, aadikammikakulaputtaa pana parikamma.m katvaa. tasmaa tesa.m vasena parikamma.m vattabba.m siyaa. ta.m pana vuccamaana.m atibhaariya.m vinayanidaana.m karoti; tasmaa ta.m ^a^V1.0122^ea^ na vadaama. atthikehi pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi0 2.411) vuttanayena gahetabba.m. idha pana paa.limeva va.n.nayissaama.

[03]^b^so^eb^ti ^a^M1.0132^ea^ so aha.m. ^b^dibbenaa^eb^tiaadiisu dibbasadisattaa ^b^dibba.m^eb^ ^a^P1.0163^ea^. devataana~nhi sucaritakammanibbatta.m pittasemharuhiraadiihi apalibuddha.m upakkilesavinimuttataaya duurepi aaramma.nasampa.ticchanasamattha.m dibba.m pasaadacakkhu hoti. ida~ncaapi viiriyabhaavanaabalanibbatta.m ~naa.nacakkhu taadisamevaati dibbasadisattaa dibba.m, dibbavihaaravasena pa.tiladdhattaa attanaa ca dibbavihaarasannissitattaapi dibba.m, aalokapariggahena mahaajutikattaapi dibba.m, tiroku.t.taadigataruupadassanena mahaagatikattaapi dibba.m. ta.m sabba.m saddasatthaanusaarena veditabba.m. dassana.t.thena ^b^cakkhu^eb^. cakkhukiccakara.nena cakkhumivaatipi cakkhu. cutuupapaatadassanena di.t.thivisuddhihetuttaa ^b^visuddha.m^eb^. yo hi cutimattameva passati na upapaata.m, so ucchedadi.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. yo upapaatamattameva passati na cuti.m, so navasattapaatubhaavadi.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. yo pana tadubhaya.m passati, so yasmaa duvidhampi ta.m di.t.thigata.m ativattati, tasmaassa ta.m dassana.m di.t.thivisuddhihetu hoti. tadubhaya~nca bhagavaa addasa. teneta.m vutta.m -- ``cutuupapaatadassanena di.t.thivisuddhihetuttaa visuddha''nti.

[03]ekaadasaupakkilesavirahato vaa visuddha.m. bhagavato hi ekaadasapakkilesavirahita.m dibbacakkhu. yathaaha -- ``so kho aha.m, anuruddha, `vicikicchaa cittassa upakkileso'ti iti viditvaa vicikiccha.m cittassa upakkilesa.m pajahi.m. amanasikaaro...pe0... thinamiddha.m... chambhitatta.m... uppila.m... du.t.thulla.m... accaaraddhaviiriya.m... atiliinaviiriya.m... abhijappaa... naanattasa~n~naa... `atinijjhaayitatta.m ruupaana.m cittassa upakkileso'ti iti viditvaa atinijjhaayitatta.m ruupaana.m cittassa upakkilesa.m pajahi.m. so kho aha.m, anuruddha, appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto obhaasa~nhi kho sa~njaanaami, na ca ruupaani passaami. ruupaani hi kho passaami, na ca obhaasa.m sa~njaanaamii''ti (ma0 ni0 3.242-243) evamaadi. tadeva.m ekaadasupakkilesavirahato ^a^P1.0164^ea^ visuddha.m.

[03]manussuupacaara.m atikkamitvaa ruupadassanena ^b^atikkantamaanusaka.m;^eb^ maanusaka.m vaa ma.msacakkhu.m atikkantattaa atikkantamaanusakanti veditabba.m. tena dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena.

[03]^b^satte^eb^ ^a^V1.0123^ea^ ^b^passaamii^eb^ti manussama.msacakkhunaa viya satte passaami dakkhaami olokemi. ^b^cavamaane upapajjamaane^eb^ti ettha cutikkha.ne vaa upapattikkha.ne vaa ^a^M1.0133^ea^ dibbacakkhunaa da.t.thu.m na sakkaa, ye pana aasannacutikaa idaani cavissanti te ^b^cavamaanaa^eb^. ye ca gahitapa.tisandhikaa sampatinibbattaa vaa, te ^b^upapajjamaanaa^eb^ti adhippetaa. te evaruupe cavamaane upapajjamaane ca passaamiiti dasseti. ^b^hiine^eb^ti mohanissandayuttattaa hiinaana.m jaatikulabhogaadiina.m vasena hii.lite ohii.lite u~n~naate ava~n~naate. ^b^pa.niite^eb^ti amohanissandayuttattaa tabbipariite. ^b^suva.n.ne^eb^ti adosanissandayuttattaa i.t.thakantamanaapava.n.nayutte. ^b^dubba.n.ne^eb^ti dosanissandayuttattaa ani.t.thaakantaamanaapava.n.nayutte; abhiruupe viruupetipi attho. ^b^sugate^eb^ti sugatigate, alobhanissandayuttattaa vaa a.d.dhe mahaddhane. ^b^duggate^eb^ti duggatigate, lobhanissandayuttattaa vaa dalidde appannapaane. ^b^yathaakammuupage^eb^ti ya.m ya.m kamma.m upacita.m tena tena upagate. tattha purimehi ``cavamaane''tiaadiihi dibbacakkhukicca.m vutta.m; iminaa pana padena yathaakammuupaga~naa.nakicca.m.

[03]tassa ca ~naa.nassa ayamuppattikkamo -- so he.t.thaa nirayaabhimukha.m aaloka.m va.d.dhetvaa nerayikasatte passati mahanta.m dukkhamanubhavamaane, ta.m dassana.m dibbacakkhukiccameva. so eva.m manasi karoti -- ``kinnu kho kamma.m katvaa ime sattaa eta.m dukkhamanubhavantii''ti? athassa ``ida.m naama katvaa''ti ta.m kammaaramma.na.m ~naa.na.m uppajjati. tathaa upari devalokaabhimukha.m aaloka.m va.d.dhetvaa nandanavana-missakavana-phaarusakavanaadiisu satte passati mahaasampatti.m anubhavamaane. tampi dassana.m dibbacakkhukiccameva. so eva.m manasi karoti -- ``kinnu kho kamma.m katvaa ime sattaa eta.m sampatti.m anubhavantii''ti? athassa ``ida.m ^a^P1.0165^ea^ naama katvaa''ti ta.mkammaaramma.na.m ~naa.na.m uppajjati. ida.m yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m naama. imassa visu.m parikamma.m naama natthi. yathaa cimassa, eva.m anaagata.msa~naa.nassapi. dibbacakkhupaadakaaneva hi imaani dibbacakkhunaa saheva ijjhanti.

[03]^b^kaayaduccaritenaa^eb^tiaadiisu du.t.thu carita.m du.t.tha.m vaa carita.m kilesapuutikattaati duccarita.m; kaayena duccarita.m, kaayato vaa uppanna.m duccaritanti ^b^kaayaduccarita.m^eb^. eva.m vaciimanoduccaritaanipi da.t.thabbaani. ^b^samannaagataa^eb^ti sama"ngiibhuutaa. ^b^ariyaana.m upavaadakaa^eb^ti buddha-paccekabuddha-buddhasaavakaana.m ariyaana.m antamaso gihisotaapannaanampi anatthakaamaa hutvaa antimavatthunaa ^a^M1.0134^ea^ vaa gu.naparidha.msanena vaa upavaadakaa; akkosakaa, garahakaati vutta.m hoti. tattha ``natthi imesa.m sama.nadhammo, assama.naa ete''ti vadanto antimavatthunaa upavadati. ``natthi imesa.m jhaana.m vaa vimokkho vaa maggo vaa phala.m vaa''ti vadanto gu.naparidha.msanena upavadatiiti ^a^V1.0124^ea^ veditabbo. so ca jaana.m vaa upavadeyya ajaana.m vaa, ubhayathaapi ariyuupavaadova hoti. bhaariya.m kamma.m saggaavara.na.m maggaavara.na~nca, satekiccha.m pana hoti. tassa ca aavibhaavattha.m ida.m vatthumudaaharanti --

[03]``a~n~natarasmi.m kira gaame eko thero ca daharabhikkhu ca pi.n.daaya caranti. te pa.thamaghareyeva u.lu"nkamatta.m u.nhayaagu.m labhi.msu. therassa ca kucchivaato atthi. so cintesi -- `aya.m yaagu mayha.m sappaayaa, yaava na siitalaa hoti taava na.m pivaamii'ti. so manussehi ummaaratthaaya aaha.te daarukkhandhe nisiiditvaa ta.m pivi. itaro ta.m jigucchi -- `aticchaato vataaya.m mahallako amhaaka.m lajjitabbaka.m akaasii'ti. thero gaame caritvaa vihaara.m gantvaa daharabhikkhu.m aaha -- `atthi te, aavuso, imasmi.m saasane pati.t.thaa'ti? `aama, bhante, sotaapanno aha'nti. `tena haavuso, uparimaggatthaaya vaayaama.m maa akaasi, khii.naasavo tayaa upavadito'ti. so ta.m khamaapesi. tenassa ta.m paakatika.m ahosi''. tasmaa yo a~n~nopi ariya.m upavadati, tena gantvaa sace attanaa vu.d.dhataro hoti, ``aha.m aayasmanta.m ida~ncida~nca avaca.m, ta.m me khamaahii''ti khamaapetabbo. sace navakataro hoti ^a^P1.0166^ea^, vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa ``aha.m bhante tumhe ida~ncida~nca avaca.m, ta.m me khamathaa''ti khamaapetabbo. sace so nakkhamati disaapakkanto vaa hoti, ye tasmi.m vihaare bhikkhuu vasanti tesa.m santika.m gantvaa sace attanaa vu.d.dhataro hoti .thitakeneva, sace navakataro ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa ``aha.m, bhante, asuka.m naama aayasmanta.m ida~ncida~nca avaca.m, khamatu me so aayasmaa''ti eva.m vadantena khamaapetabbo. sace so parinibbuto hoti, parinibbutama~nca.t.thaana.m gantvaa yaava sivathika.m gantvaapi khamaapetabbo. eva.m kate saggaavara.na~nca maggaavara.na~nca na hoti, paakatikameva hoti.

[03]^b^micchaadi.t.thikaa^eb^ti vipariitadassanaa. ^b^micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa^eb^ti micchaadi.t.thivasena samaadinnanaanaavidhakammaa, ye ca micchaadi.t.thimuulakesu kaayakammaadiisu a~n~nepi ^a^M1.0135^ea^ samaadapenti. tattha vaciiduccaritaggaha.neneva ariyuupavaade, manoduccaritaggaha.nena ca micchaadi.t.thiyaa sa"ngahitaayapi imesa.m dvinna.m puna vacana.m mahaasaavajjabhaavadassanatthanti veditabba.m. mahaasaavajjo hi ariyuupavaado aanantariyasadiso. yathaaha -- ``seyyathaapi, saariputta, bhikkhu siilasampanno samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya; eva.msampadamida.m, saariputta, vadaami ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto, eva.m niraye''ti (ma0 ni0 1.149).

[03]micchaadi.t.thito ^a^V1.0125^ea^ ca mahaasaavajjatara.m naama a~n~na.m natthi. yathaaha -- ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekadhammampi samanupassaami, eva.m mahaasaavajjatara.m, yathayida.m, micchaadi.t.thi. micchaadi.t.thiparamaani, bhikkhave, vajjaanii''ti (a0 ni0 1.310).

[03]^b^kaayassa bhedaa^eb^ti upaadinnakkhandhapariccaagaa. ^b^para.m mara.naa^eb^ti tadanantara.m abhinibbattakkhandhaggaha.ne. athavaa kaayassa bhedaati jiivitindriyassupacchedaa. para.m mara.naati cuticittato uddha.m. ^b^apaaya^eb^nti evamaadi sabba.m nirayavevacana.m. nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhuutaa pu~n~nasammataa ayaa apetattaa, sukhaana.m ^a^P1.0167^ea^ vaa aayassa abhaavaa apaayo. dukkhassa gati pa.tisara.nanti ^b^duggati;^eb^ dosabahulataaya vaa du.t.thena kammunaa nibbattaa gatiiti duggati. vivasaa nipatanti ettha dukka.takaarinoti ^b^vinipaato;^eb^ vinassantaa vaa ettha nipatanti sambhijjamaana"ngapacca"ngaati vinipaato. natthi ettha assaadasa~n~nito ayoti ^b^nirayo^eb^.

[03]atha vaa apaayaggaha.nena tiracchaanayoni.m diipeti. tiracchaanayoni hi apaayo, sugatiyaa apetattaa; na duggati, mahesakkhaana.m naagaraajaadiina.m sambhavato. duggatiggaha.nena pettivisaya.m diipeti. so hi apaayo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattaa, dukkhassa ca gatibhuutattaa; na tu vinipaato asurasadisa.m avinipatitattaa. petamahiddhikaana~nhi vimaanaanipi nibbattanti. vinipaataggaha.nena asurakaaya.m diipeti. so hi yathaavuttenatthena apaayo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi ca vinipatitattaa vinipaatoti vuccati. nirayaggaha.nena aviici-aadianekappakaara.m nirayameva diipeti. ^b^upapannaa^eb^ti upagataa, tattha abhinibbattaati adhippaayo. vuttavipariyaayena sukkapakkho veditabbo.

[03]aya.m ^a^M1.0136^ea^ pana viseso -- ettha sugatiggaha.nena manussagatipi sa"ngayhati. saggaggaha.nena devagatiyeva. tattha sundaraa gatiiti ^b^sugati^eb^. ruupaadivisayehi su.t.thu aggoti ^b^saggo^eb^. so sabbopi lujjanapalujjana.t.thena ^b^loko^eb^ti aya.m vacanattho. ^b^vijjaa^eb^ti dibbacakkhu~naa.navijjaa. ^b^avijjaa^eb^ti sattaana.m cutipa.tisandhipa.ticchaadikaa avijjaa. sesa.m vuttanayameva. ayameva hettha viseso -- yathaa pubbenivaasakathaaya.m ``pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.namukhatu.n.dakena pubbenivutthakkhandhapaacchaadaka.m avijja.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa''ti vutta.m; evamidha ``cutuupapaata~naa.namukhatu.n.dakena cutuupapaatapa.ticchaadaka.m avijja.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa''ti vattabbanti.
[06] dibbacakkhu~naa.nakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ ^a^V1.0126^ea^ ^b^eva.m samaahite citte^eb^ti idha vipassanaapaadaka.m catutthajjhaanacitta.m veditabba.m. ^b^aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naayaa^eb^ti arahattamagga~naa.natthaaya. arahattamaggo hi aasavavinaasanato aasavaana.m khayoti vuccati. tatra ceta.m ~naa.na.m tappariyaapannattaati ^a^P1.0168^ea^. ^b^citta.m abhininnaamesi^eb^nti vipassanaacitta.m abhiniihari.m. ^b^so ida.m dukkha^eb^nti evamaadiisu ``ettaka.m dukkha.m, na ito bhiyyo''ti sabbampi dukkhasacca.m sarasalakkha.napa.tivedhena yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m jaani.m pa.tivijjhi.m. tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattika.m ta.nha.m ``aya.m dukkhasamudayo''ti, tadubhayampi ya.m .thaana.m patvaa nirujjhati ta.m tesa.m appavatti.m nibbaana.m ``aya.m dukkhanirodho''ti, tassa ca sampaapaka.m ariyamagga.m ``aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti sarasalakkha.napa.tivedhena yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m jaani.m pa.tivijjhinti evamattho veditabbo.

[03]eva.m saruupato saccaani dassetvaa idaani kilesavasena pariyaayato dassento ^b^``ime aasavaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^tassa me eva.m jaanato eva.m passato^eb^ti tassa mayha.m eva.m jaanantassa eva.m passantassa saha vipassanaaya ko.tippatta.m magga.m katheti. ^b^kaamaasavaa^eb^ti kaamaasavato. ^b^vimuccitthaa^eb^ti iminaa phalakkha.na.m dasseti. maggakkha.ne hi citta.m vimuccati, phalakkha.ne vimutta.m hoti. ^b^vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na^eb^nti iminaa paccavekkha.na~naa.na.m ^a^M1.0137^ea^ dasseti. ^b^khii.naa jaatii^eb^tiaadiihi tassa bhuumi.m. tena hi ~naa.nena bhagavaa paccavekkhanto ``khii.naa jaatii''tiaadiini abbha~n~naasi.m. katamaa pana bhagavato jaati khii.naa, katha~nca na.m abbha~n~naasiiti? vuccate -- na taavassa atiitaa jaati khii.naa, pubbeva khii.nattaa; na anaagataa, anaagate vaayaamaabhaavato; na paccuppannaa, vijjamaanattaa. yaa pana maggassa abhaavitattaa uppajjeyya ekacatupa~ncavokaarabhavesu ekacatupa~ncakkhandhappabhedaa jaati, saa maggassa bhaavitattaa anuppaadadhammata.m aapajjanena khii.naa; ta.m so maggabhaavanaaya pahiinakilese paccavekkhitvaa ``kilesaabhaave vijjamaanampi kamma.m aayati.m appa.tisandhika.m hotii''ti jaananto abbha~n~naasi.m.

[03]^b^vusita^eb^nti vuttha.m parivuttha.m, kata.m carita.m ni.t.thitanti attho. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti maggabrahmacariya.m, puthujjanakalyaa.nakena hi saddhi.m satta sekkhaa brahmacariyavaasa.m vasanti naama, khii.naasavo vutthavaaso. tasmaa bhagavaa attano brahmacariyavaasa.m paccavekkhanto ``vusita.m brahmacariya''nti abbha~n~naasi.m. ^b^kata.m kara.niiya^eb^nti catuusu saccesu catuuhi maggehi pari~n~naapahaanasacchikiriyaabhaavanaabhisamayavasena ^a^V1.0127^ea^ so.lasavidhampi kicca.m ni.t.thaapitanti attho ^a^P1.0169^ea^. puthujjanakalyaa.nakaadayo hi eta.m kicca.m karonti, khii.naasavo katakara.niiyo. tasmaa bhagavaa attano kara.niiya.m paccavekkhanto ``kata.m kara.niiya''nti abbha~n~naasi.m. ^b^naapara.m itthattaayaa^eb^ti idaani puna itthabhaavaaya eva.m so.lasakiccabhaavaaya kilesakkhayaaya vaa maggabhaavanaakicca.m me natthiiti abbha~n~naasi.m.

[03]idaani eva.m paccavekkha.na~naa.napariggahita.m ta.m aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naadhigama.m braahma.nassa dassento ^b^aya.m kho me braahma.naa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^vijjaa^eb^ti arahattamagga~naa.navijjaa. ^b^avijjaa^eb^ti catusaccapa.ticchaadikaa avijjaa. sesa.m vuttanayameva. aya.m pana viseso -- ^b^aya.m kho me braahma.na tatiyaa abhinibbhidaa ahosii^eb^ti ettha aya.m kho mama braahma.na aasavaana.m khaya~naa.namukhatu.n.dakena catusaccapa.ticchaadaka.m avijja.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa tatiyaa abhinibbhidaa tatiyaa nikkhanti tatiyaa ariyajaati ahosi, kukku.tacchaapakasseva mukhatu.n.dakena vaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa tamhaa a.n.dakosamhaa abhinibbhidaa nikkhanti kukku.tanikaaye paccaajaatiiti.
[06] ettaavataa ^a^M1.0138^ea^ ki.m dassetiiti? so hi braahma.na kukku.tacchaapako a.n.dakosa.m

[03] padaaletvaa tato nikkhamanto sakimeva jaayati, aha.m pana pubbe-nivutthakkhandhapa.ticchaadaka.m avijja.n.dakosa.m bhinditvaa pa.thama.m taava pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.navijjaaya jaato, tato sattaana.m cutipa.tisandhipa.ticchaadaka.m avijja.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa dutiya.m dibbacakkhu~naa.navijjaaya jaato, puna catusaccapa.ticchaadaka.m avijja.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa tatiya.m aasavaana.m khaya~naa.navijjaaya jaato; eva.m tiihi vijjaahi tikkhattu.m jaato. saa ca me jaati ariyaa suparisuddhaati ida.m dassesi. eva.m dassento ca pubbenivaasa~naa.nena atiita.msa~naa.na.m, dibbacakkhunaa paccuppannaanaagata.msa~naa.na.m, aasavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaragu.nanti eva.m tiihi vijjaahi sabbepi sabba~n~nugu.ne pakaasetvaa attano ariyaaya jaatiyaa je.t.thase.t.thabhaava.m braahma.nassa dassesiiti.
[06] aasavakkhaya~naa.nakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ^b^eva.m^eb^ ^a^P1.0170^ea^ ^b^vutte vera~njo braahma.no^eb^ti eva.m bhagavataa lokaanukampakena braahma.na.m anukampamaanena viniguuhitabbepi attano ariyaaya jaatiyaa je.t.thase.t.thabhaave vijjattayapakaasikaaya ^a^V1.0128^ea^ dhammadesanaaya vutte piitivipphaaraparipu.n.nagattacitto vera~njo braahma.no ta.m bhagavato ariyaaya jaatiyaa je.t.thase.t.thabhaava.m viditvaa ``iidisa.m naamaaha.m sabbalokaje.t.thase.t.tha.m sabbagu.nasamannaagata.m sabba~n~nu.m `a~n~nesa.m abhivaadanaadikamma.m na karotii'ti avaca.m -- `dhiiratthu vatare a~n~naa.na'''nti attaana.m garahitvaa ``aya.m daani loke ariyaaya jaatiyaa purejaata.t.thena je.t.tho, sabbagu.nehi appa.tisama.t.thena se.t.tho''ti ni.t.tha.m gantvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``^b^je.t.tho bhava.m gotamo se.t.tho bhava.m gotamo''^eb^ti. eva~nca pana vatvaa puna ta.m bhagavato dhammadesana.m abbhanumodamaano ^b^``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotamaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha.

[03]tatthaaya.m abhikkantasaddo khayasundaraabhiruupaabbhanumodanesu dissati. ``abhikkantaa, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto pa.thamo yaamo, ciranisinno bhikkhusa"ngho''tiaadiisu ^a^M1.0139^ea^ (a0 ni0 8.20) hi khaye dissati. ``aya.m me puggalo khamati, imesa.m catunna.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 4.100) sundare.
[21] ``ko me vandati paadaani, iddhiyaa yasasaa jala.m.
[22] abhikkantena va.n.nena, sabbaa obhaasaya.m disaa''ti.. --

[07] aadiisu (vi0 va0 857) abhiruupe. ``abhikkanta.m, bhante''tiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 1.250) abbhanumodane. idhaapi abbhanumodaneyeva. yasmaa ca abbhanumodane, tasmaa ``saadhu saadhu, bho gotamaa''ti vutta.m hotiiti veditabba.m.
[21] ``bhaye kodhe pasa.msaaya.m, turite kotuuhalacchare.
[22] haase soke pasaade ca, kare aame.dita.m budho''ti..
[07] iminaa ca lakkha.nena idha pasaadavasena pasa.msaavasena caaya.m dvikkhattu.m vuttoti veditabbo.

[03]atha vaa ^b^abhikkanta^eb^nti atii.t.tha.m atimanaapa.m atisundaranti vutta.m hoti. tattha ekena abhikkantasaddena desana.m thometi, ekena attano pasaada.m. aya~nhi ettha adhippaayo -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, yadida.m bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaa, abhikkanta.m yadida.m bhoto gotamassa dhammadesana.m aagamma mama pasaado''ti. bhagavatoyeva vaa vacana.m dve ^a^P1.0171^ea^ dve atthe sandhaaya thometi ^a^V1.0129^ea^ -- bhoto gotamassa vacana.m abhikkanta.m dosanaasanato abhikkanta.m gu.naadhigamanato, tathaa saddhaajananato pa~n~naajananato, saatthato sabya~njanato, uttaanapadato gambhiiratthato, ka.n.nasukhato hadaya"ngamato, anattukka.msanato aparavambhanato, karu.naasiitalato pa~n~naavadaatato, apaatharama.niiyato vimaddakkhamato, suyyamaanasukhato viima.msiyamaanahitatoti evamaadiihi yojetabba.m.

[03]tato parampi catuuhi upamaahi desana.myeva thometi. tattha ^b^nikkujjita^eb^nti adhomukha.thapita.m, he.t.thaamukhajaata.m vaa. ^b^ukkujjeyyaa^eb^ti uparimukha.m kareyya. ^b^pa.ticchanna^eb^nti ti.napa.n.naadipa.ticchaadita.m. ^b^vivareyyaa^eb^ti ugghaa.teyya. ^b^muu.lhassaa^eb^ti disaamuu.lhassa. ^b^magga.m aacikkheyyaa^eb^ti hatthe gahetvaa esa maggoti ^a^M1.0140^ea^ vadeyya. ^b^andhakaare^eb^ti kaa.lapakkhacaatuddasii a.d.dharatta-ghanavanasa.n.da-meghapa.talehi catura"nge tamasi. aya.m taava anuttaanapadattho. aya.m pana adhippaayayojanaa -- yathaa koci nikkujjita.m ukkujjeyya, eva.m saddhammavimukha.m asaddhamme pati.t.thita.m ma.m asaddhammaa vu.t.thaapentena; yathaa pa.ticchanna.m vivareyya, eva.m kassapassa bhagavato saasanantaradhaanaa pabhuti micchaadi.t.thigahanapa.ticchanna.m saasana.m vivarantena; yathaa muu.lhassa magga.m aacikkheyya, eva.m kummaggamicchaamaggappa.tipannassa me saggamokkhamagga.m aacikkhantena; yathaa andhakaare telapajjota.m dhaareyya, eva.m mohandhakaare nimuggassa me buddhaadiratanattayaruupaani apassato tappa.ticchaadakamohandhakaaraviddha.msakadesanaapajjota.m dhaarentena, mayha.m bhotaa gotamena etehi pariyaayehi pakaasitattaa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasitoti.
[06] desanaanumodanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]eva.m desana.m thometvaa imaaya desanaaya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannaakaara.m karonto ^b^``esaaha''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^esaaha^eb^nti eso aha.m. ^b^bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaamii^eb^ti bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.nanti gacchaami; bhava.m me gotamo sara.na.m, paraaya.na.m, aghassa taataa, hitassa ca vidhaataati iminaa adhippaayena bhavanta.m gotama.m gacchaami bhajaami sevaami payirupaasaami ^a^P1.0172^ea^, eva.m vaa jaanaami bujjhaamiiti. yesa~nhi dhaatuuna.m gatiattho, buddhipi tesa.m attho; tasmaa ``gacchaamii''ti imassa jaanaami bujjhaamiiti ayampi attho vutto. ^b^dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~ncaa^eb^ti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjamaane ca catuusu apaayesu apatamaane ^a^V1.0130^ea^ dhaaretiiti ^b^dhammo;^eb^ so atthato ariyamaggo ceva nibbaana~nca. vutta.m heta.m -- ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, dhammaa sa"nkhataa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo tesa.m aggamakkhaayatii''ti (a0 ni0 4.34) vitthaaro. na kevala~nca ariyamaggo ceva nibbaana~nca, api ca kho ariyaphalehi saddhi.m pariyattidhammopi. vuttampi heta.m ^b^chattamaa.navakavimaane^eb^ --
[21] ``raagaviraagamanejamasoka.m, dhammamasa"nkhatamappa.tikuula.m.
[22] madhuramima.m pagu.na.m suvibhatta.m, dhammamima.m sara.natthamupehii''ti.. (vi0 va0 887).

[03]ettha hi ^b^raagaviraago^eb^ti maggo kathito. ^b^anejamasoka^eb^nti phala.m. ^b^dhammamasa"nkhata^eb^nti nibbaana.m. ^b^appa.tikuula.m madhuramima.m pagu.na.m suvibhatta^eb^nti pi.takattayena vibhattaa ^a^M1.0141^ea^ sabbadhammakkhandhaati. di.t.thisiilasa"nghaatena sa.mhatoti ^b^sa"ngho,^eb^ so atthato a.t.thaariyapuggalasamuuho. vutta~nheta.m tasmi.myeva ^b^vimaane^eb^ --
[21] ``yattha ca dinnamahapphalamaahu, catuusu suciisu purisayugesu.
[22] a.t.tha ca puggaladhammadasaa te, sa"nghamima.m sara.natthamupehii''ti.. (vi0 va0 888).
[03]bhikkhuuna.m sa"ngho ^b^bhikkhusa"ngho^eb^. ettaavataa ca braahma.no tii.ni sara.nagamanaani pa.tivedesi.
[06] pasannaakaarakathaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] idaani tesveva tiisu sara.nagamanesu kosallattha.m sara.na.m, sara.nagamana.m, yo sara.na.m gacchati,

[03] sara.nagamanappabhedo, sara.nagamanaphala.m, sa.mkileso, bhedoti aya.m vidhi vedi tabbo. so pana idha vuccamaano atibhaariya.m vinayanidaana.m karotiiti na vutto. atthikehi pana papa~ncasuudaniya.m vaa majjhima.t.thakathaaya.m ^b^bhayabheravasuttava.n.nanato^eb^ (ma0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.56) suma"ngalavilaasiniya.m vaa diighanikaaya.t.thakathaaya.m (dii0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.250) ^b^sara.nava.n.nanato^eb^ gahetabboti.
[06] sara.nagamanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]^b^upaasaka.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0131^ea^ ^b^ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretuu^eb^ti ma.m bhava.m gotamo ``upaasako aya''nti eva.m dhaaretuuti attho. upaasakavidhikosallattha.m panettha ko upaasako, kasmaa ^a^P1.0173^ea^ upaasakoti vuccati, kimassa siila.m, ko aajiivo, kaa vipatti, kaa sampattiiti ida.m paki.n.naka.m veditabba.m. ta.m atibhaariyakara.nato idha na vibhatta.m, atthikehi pana ^b^papa~ncasuudaniya.m majjhima.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ (ma0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.56) vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. ^b^ajjatagge^eb^ti ettha aya.m aggasaddo aadiko.tiko.t.thaasase.t.thesu dissati. ``ajjatagge, samma dovaarika, aavaraami dvaara.m niga.n.thaana.m niga.n.thiina''ntiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.70) hi aadimhi dissati. ``teneva a"ngulaggena ta.m a"ngulagga.m paraamaseyya (kathaa0 441), ucchagga.m ve.lagga''ntiaadiisu ko.tiya.m. ``ambilagga.m vaa madhuragga.m vaa tittakagga.m vaa (sa.m0 ni0 5.374) anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vihaaraggena vaa parive.naggena vaa bhaajetu''ntiaadiisu (cuu.lava0 318) ko.t.thaase. ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, sattaa apadaa vaa dvipadaa vaa...pe0... tathaagato tesa.m aggamakkhaayatii''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 4.34) se.t.the. idha panaaya.m aadimhi da.t.thabbo. tasmaa ^b^ajjatagge^eb^ti ajjata.m aadi.m katvaati evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^ajjata^eb^nti ajjabhaavanti vutta.m hoti. ^b^ajjadagge^eb^ icceva vaa ^a^M1.0142^ea^ paa.tho, dakaaro padasandhikaro, ajja agga.m katvaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^paa.nupeta^eb^nti paa.nehi upeta.m, yaava me jiivita.m pavattati, taava upeta.m ana~n~nasatthuka.m tiihi sara.nagamanehi sara.nagata.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu jaanaatu, aha~nhi sacepi me tikhi.nena asinaa siisa.m chindeyyu.m, neva buddha.m ``na buddho''ti vaa, dhamma.m ``na dhammo''ti vaa, sa"ngha.m ``na sa"ngho''ti vaa vadeyyanti. ettha ca braahma.no paa.nupeta.m sara.nagatanti puna sara.nagamana.m vadanto attasanniyyaatana.m pakaasetiiti veditabbo.

[03]eva.m attaana.m niyyaatetvaa bhagavanta.m saparisa.m upa.t.thaatukaamo aaha -- ``^b^adhivaasetu ca me bhava.m gotamo vera~njaaya.m vassaavaasa.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''^eb^ti. ki.m vutta.m hoti -- upaasaka~nca ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu, adhivaasetu ca me vera~njaaya.m vassaavaasa.m, tayo maase vera~nja.m upanissaaya mama anuggahattha.m vaasa.m sampa.ticchatuuti. ^b^adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavenaa^eb^ti athassa vacana.m sutvaa bhagavaa kaaya"nga.m vaa vaaca"nga.m vaa acopetvaa abbhantareyeva khanti.m caaretvaa tu.nhiibhaavena adhivaasesi; braahma.nassa anuggahattha.m manasaava sampa.ticchiiti ^a^P1.0174^ea^ vutta.m hoti.

[03]^b^atha^eb^ ^b^kho vera~njo braahma.no bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa^eb^ti atha vera~njo braahma.no sace me ^a^V1.0132^ea^ sama.no gotamo naadhivaaseyya, kaayena vaa vaacaaya vaa pa.tikkhipeyya. yasmaa pana appa.tikkhipitvaa abbhantare khanti.m dhaaresi, tasmaa me manasaava adhivaasesiiti eva.m aakaarasallakkha.nakusalataaya bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa, attano nisinnaasanato vu.t.thaaya catuusu disaasu bhagavanta.m sakkacca.m vanditvaa tikkhattu.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa aagatakaalato pabhuti jaatimahallakabraahma.naana.m abhivaadanaadiini na karotiiti vigarahitvaapi idaani vi~n~naatabuddhagu.no kaayena vaacaaya manasaa ca anekakkhattu.m vandantopi atittoyeva hutvaa dasanakhasamodhaanasamujjala.m a~njali.m paggayha sirasmi.m pati.t.thaapetvaa yaava dassanavisayo taava pa.timukhoyeva apakkamitvaa dassanavisaya.m vijahana.t.thaane vanditvaa pakkaami.
[06] upaasakattapa.tivedanaakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ^b^tena kho pana samayena vera~njaa dubbhikkhaa hotii^eb^ti yasmi.m samaye vera~njena braahma.nena bhagavaa vera~nja.m upanissaaya vassaavaasa.m yaacito ^a^M1.0143^ea^, tena samayena vera~njaa dubbhikkhaa hoti. ^b^dubbhikkhaa^eb^ti dullabhabhikkhaa; saa pana dullabhabhikkhataa yattha manussaa assaddhaa honti appasannaa, tattha susassakaalepi atisamagghepi pubba.n.naapara.n.ne hoti. vera~njaaya.m pana yasmaa na tathaa ahosi, apica kho dusassataaya chaatakadosena ahosi tasmaa tamattha.m dassento ^b^dviihitikaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^dviihitikaa^eb^ti dvidhaa pavattaiihitikaa. iihita.m naama iriyaa dvidhaa pavattaa -- cittairiyaa, cittaiihaa. ``ettha lacchaama nu kho ki~nci bhikkhamaanaa na lacchaamaa''ti, ``jiivitu.m vaa sakkhissaama nu kho no''ti ayamettha adhippaayo.

[03]atha vaa ^b^dviihitikaa^eb^ti dujjiivikaa, iihita.m iihaa iriyana.m pavattana.m jiivitantiaadiini padaani ekatthaani. tasmaa dukkhena iihita.m ettha pavattatiiti dviihitikaati ayamettha ^a^P1.0175^ea^ padattho. ^b^seta.t.thikaa^eb^ti setakaani a.t.thiini etthaati seta.t.thikaa. divasampi yaacitvaa ki~nci aladdhaa mataana.m kapa.namanussaana.m ahicchattakava.n.nehi a.t.thiihi tatra tatra pariki.n.naati vutta.m hoti. ^b^seta.t.tikaa^eb^tipi paa.tho. tassattho -- setaa a.t.ti etthaati seta.t.tikaa. a.t.tiiti aaturataa byaadhi rogo. tattha ca sassaana.m gabbhaggaha.nakaale setakarogena upahatameva pacchinnakhiira.m aggahitata.n.dula.m pa.n.darapa.n.dara.m saalisiisa.m vaa yavagodhuumasiisa.m vaa nikkhamati, tasmaa ``seta.t.tikaa''ti vuccati.

[03]vappakaale ^a^V1.0133^ea^ su.t.thu abhisa"nkharitvaapi vuttasassa.m tattha salaakaa eva sampajjatiiti ^b^salaakaavuttaa;^eb^ salaakaaya vaa tattha jiivita.m pavattentiiti ^b^salaakaavuttaa^eb^. ki.m vutta.m hoti? tattha kira dha~n~navikkayakaana.m santika.m kayakesu gatesu dubbalamanusse abhibhavitvaa balavamanussaava dha~n~na.m ki.nitvaa gacchanti. dubbalamanussaa alabhamaanaa mahaasadda.m karonti. dha~n~navikkayakaa ``sabbesa.m sa"ngaha.m karissaamaa''ti dha~n~nakara.na.t.thaane dha~n~namaapaka.m nisiidaapetvaa ekapasse va.n.najjhakkha.m nisiidaapesu.m. dha~n~natthikaa va.n.najjhakkhassa santika.m gacchanti. so aagatapa.tipaa.tiyaa muula.m gahetvaa ``itthannaamassa ettaka.m daatabba''nti salaaka.m likhitvaa deti, te ta.m gahetvaa dha~n~namaapakassa santika.m gantvaa dinnapa.tipaa.tiyaa dha~n~na.m ga.nhanti. eva.m salaakaaya tattha jiivita.m pavattentiiti salaakaavuttaa.

[03]^b^na^eb^ ^a^M1.0144^ea^^b^ sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu^eb^nti paggahena yo u~ncho, tena yaapetu.m na sukaraa. patta.m gahetvaa ya.m ariyaa u~ncha.m karonti, bhikkhaacariya.m caranti, tena u~nchena yaapetu.m na sukaraati vutta.m hoti. tadaa kira tattha satta.t.thagaame pi.n.daaya caritvaa ekadivasampi yaapanamatta.m na labhanti.

[03]^b^tena kho pana samayena uttaraapathakaa assavaa.nijaa...pe0... assosi kho bhagavaa udukkhalasadda^eb^nti -- ^b^tenaa^eb^ti yasmi.m samaye bhagavaa vera~nja.m upanissaaya vassaavaasa.m upagato tena samayena. uttaraapathavaasikaa uttaraapathato vaa aagatattaa eva.m laddhavohaaraa assavaa.nijaa uttaraapathe assaana.m u.t.thaana.t.thaane ^a^P1.0176^ea^ pa~nca assasataani gahetvaa digu.na.m tigu.na.m laabha.m patthayamaanaa desantara.m gacchantaa tehi attano vikkaayikabha.n.dabhuutehi pa~ncamattehi assasatehi vera~nja.m vassaavaasa.m upagataa honti. kasmaa? na hi sakkaa tasmi.m dese vassike cattaaro maase addhaana.m pa.tipajjitu.m. upagacchantaa ca bahinagare udakena anajjhotthara.niiye .thaane attano ca vaasaagaaraani assaana~nca mandira.m kaaraapetvaa vatiyaa parikkhipi.msu. taani tesa.m vasana.t.thaanaani ``assama.n.dalikaayo''ti pa~n~naayi.msu. tenaaha -- ``^b^tehi assama.n.dalikaasu bhikkhuuna.m patthapatthapulaka.m pa~n~natta.m hotii''^eb^ti. ^b^patthapatthapulaka^eb^nti ekamekassa bhikkhuno patthapatthapamaa.na.m pulaka.m. pattho naama naa.limatta.m hoti, ekassa purisassa ala.m yaapanaaya. vuttampi heta.m -- ``patthodano naalamaya.m duvinna''nti (jaa0 2.21.192). pulaka.m naama nitthusa.m katvaa ussedetvaa gahitayavata.n.dulaa vuccanti. yadi hi sathusaa honti, paa.nakaa vijjhanti, addhaanakkhamaa na honti. tasmaa te vaa.nijaa addhaanakkhama.m katvaa yavata.n.dulamaadaaya addhaana.m pa.tipajjanti ^a^V1.0134^ea^ ``yattha assaana.m khaadaniiya.m ti.na.m dullabha.m bhavissati, tattheta.m assabhatta.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03]kasmaa pana tehi ta.m bhikkhuuna.m pa~n~nattanti? vuccate -- ``na hi te dakkhi.naapathamanussaa viya assaddhaa appasannaa, te pana saddhaa pasannaa buddhamaamakaa, dhammamaamakaa, sa"nghamaamakaa; te pubba.nhasamaya.m kenacideva kara.niiyena nagara.m pavisantaa dve tayo divase addasa.msu satta.t.tha bhikkhuu sunivatthe supaarute ^a^M1.0145^ea^ iriyaapathasampanne sakalampi nagara.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa ki~nci alabhamaane. disvaana nesa.m etadahosi -- ``ayyaa ima.m nagara.m upanissaaya vassa.m upagataa; chaataka~nca vattati, na ca ki~nci labhanti, ativiya kilamanti. maya~ncamha aagantukaa, na sakkoma nesa.m devasika.m yaagu~nca bhatta~nca pa.tiyaadetu.m. amhaaka.m pana assaa saaya~nca paato ca dvikkhattu.m bhatta.m labhanti. ya.mnuuna maya.m ekamekassa assassa paataraasabhattato ekamekassa bhikkhuno patthapatthapulaka.m dadeyyaama. eva.m ayyaa ca na kilamissanti ^a^P1.0177^ea^, assaa ca yaapessantii''ti. te bhikkhuuna.m santika.m gantvaa etamattha.m aarocetvaa ``bhante, tumhe patthapatthapulaka.m pa.tiggahetvaa ya.m vaa ta.m vaa katvaa paribhu~njathaa''ti yaacitvaa devasika.m patthapatthapulaka.m pa~n~napesu.m. tena vutta.m -- ``tehi assama.n.dalikaasu bhikkhuuna.m patthapatthapulaka.m pa~n~natta.m hotii''ti.

[03]^b^pa~n~natta^eb^nti niccabhattasa"nkhepena .thapita.m. idaani ^b^bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa^eb^tiaadiisu ^b^pubba.nhasamaya^eb^nti divasassa pubbabhaagasamaya.m, pubba.nhasamayeti attho. pubba.nhe vaa samaya.m pubba.nhasamaya.m, pubba.nhe eka.m kha.nanti vutta.m hoti. eva.m accantasa.myoge upayogavacana.m labbhati. ^b^nivaasetvaa^eb^ti paridahitvaa, vihaaranivaasanaparivattanavaseneta.m veditabba.m. na hi te tato pubbe anivatthaa ahesu.m. ^b^pattaciivaramaadaayaa^eb^ti patta.m hatthehi ciivara.m kaayena aadiyitvaa sampa.ticchaadetvaa, dhaaretvaati attho. yena vaa tena vaa hi pakaarena ga.nhantaa aadaayaicceva vuccanti, yathaa ``samaadaayeva pakkamatii''ti (dii0 ni0 1.21). ^b^pi.n.da.m alabhamaanaa^eb^ti sakalampi vera~nja.m caritvaa ti.t.thatu pi.n.do, antamaso ``aticchathaa''ti vaacampi alabhamaanaa.

[03]^b^patthapatthapulaka.m aaraama.m aaharitvaa^eb^ti gatagata.t.thaane laddha.m ekameka.m patthapatthapulaka.m gahetvaa aaraama.m netvaa. ^b^udukkhale ko.t.tetvaa ko.t.tetvaa paribhu~njantii^eb^ti theraana.m koci kappiyakaarako natthi, yo nesa.m ta.m gahetvaa yaagu.m vaa bhatta.m vaa paceyya. saamampi pacana.m sama.nasaaruppa.m na hoti na ca va.t.tati. te eva.m no sallahukavuttitaa ca bhavissati, saamapaakaparimocana~ncaati a.t.tha a.t.tha ^a^V1.0135^ea^ janaa vaa dasa dasa janaa vaa ekato hutvaa udukkhale ko.t.tetvaa ko.t.tetvaa saka.m saka.m pa.tiviisa.m udakena temetvaa paribhu~njanti. eva.m paribhu~njitvaa appossukkaa sama.nadhamma.m karonti ^a^M1.0146^ea^. bhagavato pana te assavaa.nijaa patthapulaka~nca denti, tadupiya~nca sappimadhusakkara.m. ta.m aayasmaa aanando aaharitvaa silaaya.m pisati. pu~n~navataa pa.n.ditapurisena kata.m manaapameva hoti. atha na.m pisitvaa sappiaadiihi sammaa yojetvaa bhagavato ^a^P1.0178^ea^ upanaamesi. athettha devataa dibboja.m pakkhipanti. ta.m bhagavaa paribhu~njati. paribhu~njitvaa phalasamaapattiyaa kaala.m atinaameti. na tato pa.t.thaaya pi.n.daaya carati.

[03]ki.m panaanandatthero tadaa bhagavato upa.t.thaako hotiiti? hoti, no ca kho upa.t.thaaka.t.thaana.m laddhaa. bhagavato hi pa.thamabodhiya.m viisativassantare nibaddhupa.t.thaako naama natthi. kadaaci naagasamaalatthero bhagavanta.m upa.t.thaasi, kadaaci naagitatthero, kadaaci meghiyatthero, kadaaci upavaa.natthero, kadaaci saagatatthero, kadaaci sunakkhatto licchaviputto. te attano ruciyaa upa.t.thahitvaa yadaa icchanti tadaa pakkamanti. aanandatthero tesu tesu upa.t.thahantesu appossukko hoti, pakkantesu sayameva vattapa.tipatti.m karoti. bhagavaapi ki~ncaapi me ~naatise.t.tho upa.t.thaaka.t.thaana.m na taava labhati, atha kho evaruupesu .thaanesu ayameva patiruupoti adhivaasesi. tena vutta.m -- ``aayasmaa panaanando patthapulaka.m silaaya.m pisitvaa bhagavato upanaamesi, ta.m bhagavaa paribhu~njatii''ti.

[03]nanu ca manussaa dubbhikkhakaale ativiya ussaahajaataa pu~n~naani karonti, attanaa abhu~njitvaapi bhikkhuuna.m daatabba.m ma~n~nanti. te tadaa kasmaa ka.tacchubhikkhampi na ada.msu? aya~nca vera~njo braahma.no mahataa ussaahena bhagavanta.m vassaavaasa.m yaaci, so kasmaa bhagavato atthibhaavampi na jaanaatiiti? vuccate -- maaraava.t.tanaaya. vera~nja~nhi braahma.na.m bhagavato santikaa pakkantamattameva sakala~nca nagara.m samantaa ca yojanamatta.m yattha sakkaa purebhatta.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa paccaagantu.m, ta.m sabba.m maaro aava.t.tetvaa mohetvaa sabbesa.m asallakkha.nabhaava.m katvaa pakkaami. tasmaa na koci antamaso saamiicikammampi kattabba.m ma~n~nittha.

[03]ki.m ^a^M1.0147^ea^ pana bhagavaapi maaraava.t.tana.m ajaanitvaava tattha vassa.m upagatoti? no ajaanitvaa. atha kasmaa campaa-saavatthi-raajagahaadiina.m a~n~natarasmi.m na upagatoti? ti.t.thantu campaa-saavatthi-raajagahaadiini, sacepi bhagavaa tasmi.m sa.mvacchare ^a^P1.0179^ea^ uttarakuru.m vaa tidasapura.m vaa gantvaa vassa.m upagaccheyya, tampi maaro aava.t.teyya. so kira ta.m sa.mvacchara.m ativiya aaghaatena ^a^V1.0136^ea^ pariyu.t.thitacitto ahosi. idha pana bhagavaa ima.m atirekakaara.na.m addasa -- ``assavaa.nijaa bhikkhuuna.m sa"ngaha.m karissantii''ti. tasmaa vera~njaayameva vassa.m upagacchi.

[03]ki.m pana maaro vaa.nijake aava.t.tetu.m na sakkotiiti? no na sakkoti, te pana aava.t.titapariyosaane aagami.msu. pa.tinivattitvaa kasmaa na aava.t.tetiiti? avisahataaya. na hi so tathaagatassa abhiha.tabhikkhaaya nibaddhadaanassa appitavattassa antaraaya.m kaatu.m visahati. catunna~nhi na sakkaa antaraayo kaatu.m. katamesa.m catunna.m? tathaagatassa abhiha.tabhikkhaasa"nkhepena vaa nibaddhadaanassa appitavattasa"nkhepena vaa pariccattaana.m catunna.m paccayaana.m na sakkaa kenaci antaraayo kaatu.m. buddhaana.m jiivitassa na sakkaa kenaci antaraayo kaatu.m. asiitiyaa anubya~njanaana.m byaamappabhaaya vaa na sakkaa kenaci antaraayo kaatu.m. candimasuuriyadevabrahmaanampi hi pabhaa tathaagatassa anubya~njanabyaamappabhaappadesa.m patvaa vihataanubhaavaa honti. buddhaana.m sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nassa na sakkaa kenaci antaraayo kaatunti imesa.m catunna.m na sakkaa kenaci antaraayo kaatu.m. tasmaa maarena akatantaraaya.m bhikkha.m bhagavaa sasaavakasa"ngho tadaa paribhu~njatiiti veditabbo.

[03]eva.m paribhu~njanto ca ekadivasa.m ^b^assosi kho bhagavaa udukkhalasadda^eb^nti bhagavaa patthapatthapulaka.m ko.t.tentaana.m bhikkhuuna.m musalasa"ngha.t.tajanita.m udukkhalasadda.m su.ni. tato para.m ^b^jaanantaapi tathaagataa^eb^ti evamaadi ya.m parato ``kinnu kho so, aananda, udukkhalasaddo''ti pucchi, tassa parihaaradassanattha.m vutta.m. tatraaya.m sa"nkhepava.n.nanaa -- tathaagataa naama jaanantaapi sace taadisa.m pucchaakaara.na.m hoti, pucchanti. sace pana taadisa.m pucchaakaara.na.m natthi, jaanantaapi ^a^P1.0180^ea^ na pucchanti. yasmaa pana buddhaana.m ajaanana.m naama natthi, tasmaa ajaanantaapiiti na vutta.m. ^b^kaala.m viditvaa pucchantii^eb^ti sace tassaa pucchaaya so kaalo hoti, eva.m ta.m kaala.m viditvaa pucchanti; sace na hoti ^a^M1.0148^ea^, evampi kaala.m viditvaava na pucchanti. eva.m pucchantaapi ca atthasa.mhita.m tathaagataa pucchanti, ya.m atthanissita.m kaara.nanissita.m, tadeva pucchanti, no anatthasa.mhita.m. kasmaa? yasmaa anatthasa.mhite setughaato tathaagataana.m. ^b^setu^eb^ vuccati maggo, maggeneva taadisassa vacanassa ^b^ghaato,^eb^ samucchedoti vutta.m hoti.

[03]idaani ^b^atthasa.mhita^eb^nti ettha ya.m atthasannissita.m vacana.m tathaagataa pucchanti, ta.m dassento ^b^``dviihaakaarehii^eb^''ti aadimaaha. tattha ^b^aakaarehii^eb^ti kaara.nehi. ^b^dhamma.m vaa desessaamaa^eb^ti a.t.thuppattiyutta.m sutta.m vaa pubbacaritakaara.nayutta.m jaataka.m vaa kathayissaama. ^b^saavakaana.m vaa sikkhaapada.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0137^ea^ ^b^pa~n~napessaamaa^eb^ti saavakaana.m vaa taaya pucchaaya viitikkama.m paaka.ta.m katvaa garuka.m vaa lahuka.m vaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaama aa.na.m .thapessaamaati.

[03]^b^atha kho bhagavaa...pe0... etamattha.m aarocesii^eb^ti ettha natthi ki~nci vattabba.m. pubbe vuttameva hi bhikkhuuna.m patthapatthapulakapa.tilaabha.m sallahukavuttita.m saamapaakaparimocana~nca aarocento etamattha.m aarocesiiti vuccati. ^b^``saadhu^eb^ ^b^saadhu, aanandaa''^eb^ti ida.m pana bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m sampaha.msento aaha. saadhukaara.m pana datvaa dviisu aakaaresu eka.m gahetvaa dhamma.m desento aaha -- ^b^``tumhehi, aananda, sappurisehi vijita.m, pacchimaa janataa saalima.msodana.m atima~n~nissatii''^eb^ti. tatraayamadhippaayo -- tumhehi, aananda, sappurisehi eva.m dubbhikkhe dullabhapi.n.de imaaya sallahukavuttitaaya iminaa ca sallekhena vijita.m. ki.m vijitanti? dubbhikkha.m vijita.m, lobho vijito, icchaacaaro vijito. katha.m? ``aya.m vera~njaa dubbhikkhaa, samantato pana anantaraa gaamanigamaa phalabhaaranamitasassaa subhikkhaa sulabhapi.n.daa. eva.m santepi bhagavaa idheva amhe nigga.nhitvaa vasatii''ti ekabhikkhussapi cintaa vaa vighaato vaa natthi. eva.m taava dubbhikkha.m vijita.m abhibhuuta.m attano vase vattita.m.

[03]katha.m lobho vijito? ``aya.m vera~njaa dubbhikkhaa, samantato pana anantaraa gaamanigamaa phalabhaaranamitasassaa subhikkhaa sulabhapi.n.daa ^a^P1.0181^ea^. handa maya.m tattha gantvaa paribhu~njissaamaa''ti lobhavasena ekabhikkhunaapi ratticchedo vaa ``pacchimikaaya tattha vassa.m upagacchaamaa''ti vassacchedo vaa na kato. eva.m lobho vijito.

[03]katha.m ^a^M1.0149^ea^ icchaacaaro vijito? aya.m vera~njaa dubbhikkhaa, ime ca manussaa amhe dve tayo maase vasantepi na kismi~nci ma~n~nanti. ya.mnuuna maya.m gu.navaa.nijja.m katvaa ``asuko bhikkhu pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhii...pe0... asuko cha.labhi~n~noti eva.m manussaana.m a~n~nama~n~na.m pakaasetvaa kucchi.m pa.tijaggitvaa pacchaa siila.m adhi.t.thaheyyaamaa''ti ekabhikkhunaapi evaruupaa icchaa na uppaaditaa. eva.m icchaacaaro vijito abhibhuuto attano vase vattitoti.

[03]anaagate pana pacchimaa janataa vihaare nisinnaa appakasireneva labhitvaapi ``ki.m ida.m utta.n.dula.m atikilinna.m alo.na.m atilo.na.m anambila.m accambila.m, ko iminaa attho''ti aadinaa nayena saalima.msodana.m atima~n~nissati, o~n~naata.m ava~n~naata.m karissati. atha vaa janapado ^a^V1.0138^ea^ naama na sabbakaala.m dubbhikkho hoti. ekadaa dubbhikkho hoti, ekadaa subhikkho hoti. svaaya.m yadaa subhikkho bhavissati, tadaa tumhaaka.m sappurisaana.m imaaya pa.tipattiyaa pasannaa manussaa bhikkhuuna.m yaagukhajjakaadippabhedena anekappakaara.m saalivikati.m ma.msodana~nca daatabba.m ma~n~nissanti. ta.m tumhe nissaaya uppanna.m sakkaara.m tumhaaka.m sabrahmacaariisa"nkhaataa pacchimaa janataa tumhaaka.m antare nisiiditvaa anubhavamaanaava atima~n~nissati, tappaccaya.m maana~nca omaana~nca karissati. katha.m? kasmaa ettaka.m pakka.m, ki.m tumhaaka.m bhaajanaani natthi, yattha attano santaka.m pakkhipitvaa .thapeyyaathaati.
[06] dubbhikkhakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano^eb^tiaadiisu ^b^aayasmaa^eb^ti piyavacanameta.m, garugaaravasappatissaadhivacanameta.m. ^b^mahaamoggallaano^eb^ti mahaa ca so gu.namahantataaya moggallaano ca gottenaati mahaamoggallaano. ^b^etadavocaa^eb^ti eta.m avoca. idaani vattabba.m ``etarahi bhante''tiaadivacana.m dasseti. kasmaa avoca? thero kira pabbajitvaa sattame divase saavakapaarami~naa.nassa ^a^P1.0182^ea^ matthaka.m patto, satthaaraapi mahiddhikataaya etadagge .thapito. so ta.m attano mahiddhikata.m nissaaya cintesi -- ``aya.m vera~njaa dubbhikkhaa, bhikkhuu ca kilamanti, ya.mnuunaaha.m pathavi.m parivattetvaa bhikkhuu pappa.takoja.m bhojeyya''nti. athassa ^a^M1.0150^ea^ etadahosi -- ``sace panaaha.m bhagavato santike viharanto bhagavanta.m ayaacitvaa eva.m kareyya.m, na meta.m assa patiruupa.m; yugaggaaho viya bhagavataa saddhi.m kato bhaveyyaa''ti. tasmaa yaacitukaamo aagantvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca.

[03]^b^he.t.thimatala.m sampanna^eb^nti pathaviyaa kira he.t.thimatale pathavima.n.do pathavojo pathavi-pappa.tako atthi, ta.m sandhaaya vadati. tattha ^b^sampanna^eb^nti madhura.m, saadurasanti attho. yatheva hi ``tatrassa rukkho sampannaphalo ca upapannaphalo caa''ti (ma0 ni0 2.48) ettha madhuraphaloti attho; evamidhaapi sampannanti madhura.m saadurasanti veditabba.m. seyyathaapi^b^ khuddamadhu.m anii.laka^eb^nti ida.m panassa madhurataaya opammanidassanattha.m vutta.m. ^b^khuddamadhu^eb^nti khuddakamakkhikaahi katamadhu. ^b^anii.laka^eb^nti nimmakkhika.m nimmakkhika.n.daka.m parisuddha.m. eta.m kira madhu sabbamadhuuhi agga~nca se.t.tha~nca surasa~nca ojavanta~nca. tenaaha -- ``seyyathaapi khuddamadhu.m anii.laka.m evamassaada''nti.

[03]^b^saadhaaha.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0139^ea^, ^b^bhante^eb^ti saadhu aha.m, bhante. ettha ^b^saadhuu^eb^ti aayaacanavacanameta.m. pathaviparivattana.m aayaacanto hi thero bhagavanta.m evamaaha. ^b^parivatteyya^eb^nti ukkujjeyya.m, he.t.thimatala.m uparima.m kareyya.m. kasmaa? eva~nhi kate sukhena bhikkhuu pappa.takoja.m pathavima.n.da.m paribhu~njissantiiti. atha bhagavaa ananu~n~naatukaamopi thera.m siihanaada.m nadaapetu.m pucchi -- ^b^``ye pana te, moggallaana, pathavinissitaa paa.naa te katha.m karissasii''^eb^ti. ye pathavinissitaa gaamanigamaadiisu paa.naa, te pathaviyaa parivattiyamaanaaya aakaase ^a^P1.0183^ea^ sa.n.thaatu.m asakkonte katha.m karissasi, kattha .thapessasiiti? atha thero bhagavataa etadagge .thapitabhaavaanuruupa.m attano iddhaanubhaava.m pakaasento ^b^``ekaaha.m, bhante''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tassattho -- eka.m aha.m bhante hattha.m yathaa aya.m mahaapathavii eva.m abhinimminissaami, pathavisadisa.m karissaami. eva.m katvaa ye pathavinissitaa paa.naa te ekasmi.m hatthatale .thite paa.ne tato dutiyahatthatale sa"nkaamento viya tattha sa"nkaamessaamiiti.
