[03]^b^anekapariyaayenaa^eb^ti imehi ``ananucchavika''ntiaadinaa nayena vuttehi, bahuuhi kaara.nehi. ^b^dubbharataaya...pe0... kosajjassa ava.n.na.m bhaasitvaa^eb^ti dubbharataadiina.m vatthubhuutassa asa.mvarassa ava.n.na.m ninda.m garaha.m bhaasitvaati attho. yasmaa hi asa.mvare .thitassa puggalassa attaa dubbharata~nceva dupposata~nca aapajjati, tasmaa asa.mvaro ^b^``dubbharataa, dupposataa''^eb^ti ca vuccati. yasmaa pana asa.mvare ^a^P1.0222^ea^ .thitassa attaa catuusu paccayesu mahicchata.m sineruppamaa.nepi ca paccaye laddhaa asantu.t.thita.m aapajjati, tasmaa asa.mvaro ^b^``mahicchataa, asantu.t.thitaa''^eb^ti ca vuccati. yasmaa ca asa.mvare .thitassa attaa ga.nasa"nga.nikaaya ceva kilesasa"nga.nikaaya ca sa.mvattati, kosajjaanugato ca hoti a.t.thakusiitavatthupaaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati, tasmaa asa.mvaro ^b^``sa"nga.nikaa, ceva kosajja~ncaa''^eb^ti vuccati.

[03]^b^subharataaya...pe0... viiriyaarambhassa va.n.na.m bhaasitvaa^eb^ti subharataadiina.m vatthubhuutassa sa.mvarassa va.n.na.m bhaasitvaati attho. yasmaa hi asa.mvara.m pahaaya sa.mvare .thitassa attaa subharo hoti suposo, catuusu ca paccayesu appicchata.m nitta.nhabhaava.m aapajjati, ekamekasmi~nca paccaye yathaalaabha-yathaabala-yathaasaaruppavasena tippabhedaaya santu.t.thiyaa sa.mvattati, tasmaa sa.mvaro ^b^``subharataa ceva suposataa ca appiccho ca santu.t.tho caa''^eb^ti vuccati.
[03]yasmaa pana asa.mvara.m pahaaya sa.mvare .thitassa attaa kilesasallekhanataaya ceva niddhunanataaya ca sa.mvattati, tasmaa sa.mvaro ^b^``sallekho ca dhuto caa''^eb^ti vuccati.

[03]yasmaa ca asa.mvara.m pahaaya sa.mvare .thitassa attaa kaayavaacaana.m appaasaadika.m appasaadaniiya.m asanta.m asaaruppa.m kaayavaciiduccarita.m cittassa appaasaadika.m ^a^M1.0187^ea^ appasaadaniiya.m asanta.m asaaruppa.m akusalavitakkattaya~nca anupagamma tabbipariitassa kaayavaciisucaritassa ceva kusalavitakkattayassa ca paasaadikassa pasaadaniiyassa santassa saaruppassa paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati, tasmaa sa.mvaro ``paasaadiko''ti vuccati.

[03]yasmaa ^a^V1.0172^ea^ pana asa.mvara.m pahaaya sa.mvare .thitassa attaa sabbakilesaapacayabhuutaaya, viva.t.taaya, a.t.thaviiriyaarambhavatthupaaripuuriyaa ca sa.mvattati, tasmaa sa.mvaro ^b^``apacayo ceva viiriyaarambho caa''^eb^ti vuccatiiti.

[03]^b^bhikkhuuna.m tadanucchavika.m tadanulomika^eb^nti tattha sannipatitaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ya.m idaani sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessati, tassa anucchavika~nceva anulomika~nca. yo vaa aya.m subharataadiihi sa.mvaro vutto, tassa anucchavika~nceva anulomika~nca sa.mvarappahaanapa.tisa.myutta.m ^a^P1.0223^ea^ asuttantavinibaddha.m paa.livinimutta.m okkantikadhammadesana.m katvaati attho. bhagavaa kira iidisesu .thaanesu pa~ncava.n.nakusumamaala.m karonto viya, ratanadaama.m sajjento viya, ca ye pa.tikkhipanaadhippaayaa asa.mvaraabhirataa te samparaayikena va.t.tabhayena tajjento anekappakaara.m aadiinava.m dassento, ye sikkhaakaamaa sa.mvare .thitaa te appekacce arahatte pati.t.thapento appekacce anaagaami-sakadaagaami-sotaapattiphalesu upanissayavirahitepi saggamagge pati.t.thapento diighanikaayappamaa.nampi majjhimanikaayappamaa.nampi dhammadesana.m karoti. ta.m sandhaayeta.m vutta.m -- ``bhikkhuuna.m tadanucchavika.m tadanulomika.m dhammi.m katha.m katvaa''ti.

[03]^b^tena hii^eb^ti tena sudinnassa ajjhaacaarena kaara.nabhuutena. ^b^sikkhaapada^eb^nti ettha sikkhitabbaati sikkhaa, pajjate iminaati pada.m, sikkhaaya pada.m sikkhaapada.m; sikkhaaya adhigamupaayoti attho. atha vaa muula.m nissayo pati.t.thaati vutta.m hoti. methunaviratiyaa methunasa.mvarasseta.m adhivacana.m. methunasa.mvaro hi tada~n~nesa.m sikkhaasa"nkhaataana.m siilavipassanaajhaanamaggadhammaana.m vuttatthavasena padattaa idha ``sikkhaapada''nti adhippeto. aya~nca attho sikkhaapadavibha"nge vuttanayeneva veditabbo. apica tassatthassa diipaka.m vacanampi ``sikkhaapada''nti veditabba.m. vuttampi ceta.m -- ``sikkhaapadanti yo tattha naamakaayo padakaayo niruttikaayo bya~njanakaayo''ti. atha vaa yathaa ``anabhijjhaa dhammapada''nti vutte anabhijjhaa eko dhammako.t.thaasoti attho ^a^M1.0188^ea^ hoti, evamidhaapi ``sikkhaapada''nti sikkhaako.t.thaaso sikkhaaya eko padesotipi attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^dasa^eb^ ^b^atthavase pa.ticcaa^eb^ti dasa kaara.navase sikkhaapadapa~n~nattihetu adhigamaniiye hitavisese pa.ticca aagamma aarabbha, dasanna.m hitavisesaana.m nipphatti.m sampassamaanoti vutta.m hoti. idaani te dasa atthavase dassento ^b^``sa"nghasu.t.thutaayaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^sa"nghasu.t.thutaa^eb^ naama sa"nghassa su.t.thubhaavo, ``su.t.thu devaa''ti aagata.t.thaane viya ``su.t.thu, bhante''ti vacanasampa.ticchanabhaavo ^a^V1.0173^ea^. yo ca tathaagatassa vacana.m sampa.ticchati ^a^P1.0224^ea^, tassa ta.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya hoti, tasmaa sa"nghassa ``su.t.thu, bhante''ti mama vacanasampa.ticchanattha.m pa~n~napessaami, asampa.ticchane aadiinava.m sampa.ticchane ca aanisa.msa.m dassetvaa, na balakkaarena abhibhavitvaati etamattha.m aavikaronto aaha -- ``sa"nghasu.t.thutaayaa''ti. ^b^sa"nghaphaasutaayaa^eb^ti sa"nghassa phaasubhaavaaya; sahajiivitaaya sukhavihaaratthaayaati attho.

[03]^b^dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaayaa^eb^ti dumma"nkuu naama dussiilapuggalaa; ye ma"nkuta.m aapaadiyamaanaapi dukkhena aapajjanti, viitikkama.m karontaa vaa katvaa vaa na lajjanti, tesa.m niggahatthaaya; te hi sikkhaapade asati ``ki.m tumhehi di.t.tha.m, ki.m suta.m -- ki.m amhehi kata.m; katarasmi.m vatthusmi.m katama.m aapatti.m aaropetvaa amhe nigga.nhathaa''ti sa"ngha.m vihe.thessanti, sikkhaapade pana sati te sa"ngho sikkhaapada.m dassetvaa dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena niggahessati. tena vutta.m -- ``dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaayaa''ti.

[03]^b^pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraayaa^eb^ti pesalaana.m piyasiilaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaratthaaya. piyasiilaa hi bhikkhuu kattabbaakattabba.m saavajjaanavajja.m vela.m mariyaada.m ajaanantaa sikkhattayapaaripuuriyaa gha.tamaanaa kilamanti, sandi.t.thamaanaa ubbaa.lhaa honti. kattabbaakattabba.m pana saavajjaanavajja.m vela.m mariyaada.m ~natvaa sikkhattayapaaripuuriyaa gha.tamaanaa na kilamanti, sandi.t.thamaanaa na ubbaa.lhaa honti. tena nesa.m sikkhaapadapa~n~naapanaa phaasuvihaaraaya sa.mvattati. yo vaa dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggaho, sveva etesa.m phaasuvihaaro. dussiilapuggale nissaaya hi uposatho na ti.t.thati ^a^M1.0189^ea^, pavaara.naa na ti.t.thati, sa"nghakammaani nappavattanti, saamaggii na hoti, bhikkhuu anekaggaa uddesaparipucchaakamma.t.thaanaadiini anuyu~njitu.m na sakkonti. dussiilesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi aya.m upaddavo na hoti. tato pesalaa bhikkhuu phaasu viharanti. eva.m ``pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasu vihaaraayaa''ti ettha dvidhaa attho ^a^P1.0225^ea^ veditabbo.

[03]^b^di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraayaa^eb^ti di.t.thadhammikaa aasavaa naama asa.mvare .thitena tasmi~n~neva attabhaave pattabbaa paa.nippahaara-da.n.dappahaara-hatthaccheda-paadaccheda-akitti-ayasavippa.tisaaraadayo dukkhavisesaa. iti imesa.m di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya pidhaanaaya aagamanamaggathakanaayaati attho.

[03]^b^samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m pa.tighaataayaa^eb^ti samparaayikaa aasavaa naama asa.mvare .thitena katapaapakammamuulakaa samparaaye narakaadiisu pattabbaa dukkhavisesaa, tesa.m pa.tighaatatthaaya ^a^V1.0174^ea^ pa.tippassambhanatthaaya vuupasamatthaayaati vutta.m hoti.

[03]^b^appasannaana.m pasaadaayaa^eb^ti sikkhaapadapa~n~nattiyaa hi sati sikkhaapadapa~n~natti.m ~natvaa vaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa.tipajjamaane bhikkhuu disvaa vaa yepi appasannaa pa.n.ditamanussaa, te ``yaani vata loke mahaajanassa rajjana-dussana-muyhana.t.thaanaani, tehi ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa aarakaa virataa viharanti, dukkara.m vata karonti, bhaariya.m vata karontii''ti pasaada.m aapajjanti, vinayapi.take potthaka.m disvaa micchaadi.t.thika-tivedii braahma.no viya. tena vutta.m -- ``appasannaana.m pasaadaayaa''ti.

[03]^b^pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaayaa^eb^ti yepi saasane pasannaa kulaputtaa tepi sikkhaapadapa~n~natti.m ~natvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa.tipajjamaane bhikkhuu vaa disvaa ``aho ayyaa dukkarakaarino, ye yaavajiiva.m ekabhatta.m brahmacariya.m vinayasa.mvara.m anupaalentii''ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasiidanti. tena vutta.m -- ``pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaayaa''ti.

[03]^b^saddhamma.t.thitiyaa^eb^ti tividho saddhammo -- pariyattisaddhammo, pa.tipattisaddhammo, adhigamasaddhammoti. tattha pi.takattayasa"ngahita.m sabbampi buddhavacana.m ``pariyattisaddhammo'' naama. terasa dhutagu.naa, cuddasa khandhakavattaani, dveasiiti mahaavattaani, siilasamaadhivipassanaati ^a^M1.0190^ea^ aya.m ``pa.tipattisaddhammo'' naama. cattaaro ariyamaggaa cattaari ca saama~n~naphalaani nibbaana~ncaati aya.m ``adhigamasaddhammo'' naama. so sabbopi yasmaa sikkhaapadapa~n~nattiyaa sati bhikkhuu sikkhaapada~nca tassa vibha"nga~nca tadatthajotanattha.m a~n~na~nca buddhavacana.m pariyaapu.nanti, yathaapa~n~natta~nca pa.tipajjamaanaa pa.tipatti.m puuretvaa pa.tipattiyaa adhigantabba.m ^a^P1.0226^ea^ lokuttaradhamma.m adhigacchanti, tasmaa sikkhaapadapa~n~nattiyaa cira.t.thitiko hoti. tena vutta.m -- ``saddhamma.t.thitiyaa''ti.

[03]^b^vinayaanuggahaayaa^eb^ti sikkhaapadapa~n~nattiyaa hi sati sa.mvaravinayo ca pahaanavinayo ca samathavinayo ca pa~n~nattivinayo caati catubbidhopi vinayo anuggahito hoti upatthambhito suupatthambhito. tena vutta.m -- ``vinayaanuggahaayaa''ti.

[03]sabbaaneva cetaani padaani ``sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaamii''ti iminaa vacanena saddhi.m yojetabbaani ^a^V1.0175^ea^. tatraaya.m pa.thamapacchimapadayojanaa -- ``sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaami, vinayaanuggahaaya sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaamii''ti.

[03]api cettha ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m sa"nghaphaasu, ya.m sa"nghaphaasu ta.m dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaayaati eva.m sa"nkhalikanaya.m; ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m sa"nghaphaasu, ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaayaati eva~nca ekekapadamuulika.m dasakkhattu.m yojana.m katvaa ya.m vutta.m ^b^parivaare^eb^ (pari0 334) --
[21] ``atthasata.m dhammasata.m, dve ca niruttisataani.
[22] cattaari ~naa.nasataani, atthavase pakara.ne''ti..
[03]ta.m sabba.m veditabba.m. ta.m paneta.m yasmaa parivaareyeva aavi bhavissati, tasmaa idha na va.n.nitanti.

[03]eva.m sikkhaapadapa~n~nattiyaa aanisa.msa.m dassetvaa tasmi.m sikkhaapade bhikkhuuhi kattabbakicca.m diipento ^b^``eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaathaa''^eb^ti aaha. ki.m vutta.m hoti? bhikkhave, ima.m pana mayaa iti sandassitaanisa.msa.m sikkhaapada.m eva.m paatimokkhuddese uddiseyyaatha ca pariyaapu.neyyaatha ca dhaareyyaatha ca a~n~nesa~nca vaaceyyaathaati. atirekaanayanattho ^a^M1.0191^ea^ hi ettha ca saddo, tenaayamattho aaniito hotiiti.
[06] idaani ya.m vutta.m ``ima.m sikkhaapada''nti ta.m dassento ^b``yo pana bhikkhu

[03] methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tiseveyya, paaraajiko hoti asa.mvaaso''b^ti aaha. eva.m muulacchejjavasena da.lha.m katvaa pa.thamapaaraajike pa~n~natte aparampi anupa~n~nattatthaaya makka.tiivatthu udapaadi. tassuppattidiipanatthameta.m vutta.m -- ^b^eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hotii^eb^ti. tassattho -- bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m ida.m sikkhaapada.m eva.m pa~n~natta.m hoti ca, ida~nca a~n~na.m vatthu udapaadiiti.
[06] pa.thamapa~n~nattikathaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] sudinnabhaa.navaara.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ idaani ^a^P1.0227^ea^ ^a^V1.0176^ea^ ya.m ta.m a~n~na.m vatthu uppanna.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``tena kho pana samayenaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tatraaya.m anuttaanapadava.n.nanaa -- ^b^makka.ti.m aamisenaa^eb^ti mahaavane bhikkhuuna.m khantimettaadigu.naanubhaavena niraasa"nkacittaa bahuu migamorakukku.tamakka.taadayo tiracchaanaa padhaanaagaara.t.thaanesu vicaranti. tatra eka.m makka.ti.m aamisena yaagubhattakhajjakaadinaa upalaapetvaa, sa"nga.nhitvaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^tassaa^eb^ti bhummavacana.m. ^b^pa.tisevatii^eb^ti pacurapa.tisevano hoti; pacuratthe hi vattamaanavacana.m. ^b^so bhikkhuu^eb^ti so methunadhammapa.tisevanako bhikkhu. ^b^senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa^eb^ti te bhikkhuu aagantukaa buddhadassanaaya aagataa paatova aagantukabhattaani labhitvaa katabhattakiccaa bhikkhuuna.m nivaasana.t.thaanaani passissaamaati vicari.msu. tena vutta.m -- ^b^``senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa''^eb^ti. ^b^yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkamii^eb^ti tiracchaanagataa naama ekabhikkhunaa saddhi.m vissaasa.m katvaa a~n~nesupi taadisa~n~neva citta.m uppaadenti. tasmaa saa makka.tii yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ca attano vissaasikabhikkhusseva tesampi ta.m vikaara.m dassesi.

[03]^b^cheppa^eb^nti na"ngu.t.tha.m. ^b^o.d.dii^eb^ti abhimukha.m .thapesi. ^b^nimittampi akaasii^eb^ti yena niyaamena yaaya kiriyaaya methunaadhippaaya.m te jaananti ta.m akaasiiti attho ^a^M1.0192^ea^. ^b^so bhikkhuu^eb^ti yassaaya.m vihaaro. ^b^ekamanta.m niliiyi.msuu^eb^ti ekasmi.m okaase pa.ticchannaa acchi.msu.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ^b^sacca.m, aavuso^eb^ti saho.d.dhaggahito coro viya paccakkha.m disvaa coditattaa ``ki.m vaa mayaa kata''ntiaadiini vattu.m asakkonto ``sacca.m, aavuso''ti aaha. ^b^nanu, aavuso, tatheva ta.m hotii^eb^ti aavuso yathaa manussitthiyaa, nanu tiracchaanagatitthiyaapi ta.m sikkhaapada.m tatheva hoti. manussitthiyaapi hi dassanampi gaha.nampi aamasanampi phusanampi gha.t.tanampi du.t.thullameva. tiracchaanagatitthiyaapi ta.m sabba.m du.t.thullameva. ko ettha viseso? alesa.t.thaane tva.m lesa.m o.d.desiiti.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ^b^antamaso tiracchaanagataayapi paaraajiko hoti asa.mvaaso^eb^ti tiracchaanagataayapi methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitvaa paaraajiko yeva hotiiti da.lhatara.m sikkhaapadamakaasi. duvidha~nhi ^a^P1.0228^ea^ sikkhaapada.m -- lokavajja.m, pa.n.nattivajja~nca. tattha yassa sacittakapakkhe citta.m akusalameva hoti, ta.m lokavajja.m naama. sesa.m pa.n.nattivajja.m. tattha lokavajje anupa~n~natti uppajjamaanaa rundhantii dvaara.m pidahantii sota.m pacchindamaanaa gaa.lhatara.m karontii uppajjati, ^b^a~n~natra adhimaanaa, a~n~natra supinantaa^eb^ti aya.m pana viitikkamaabhaavaa abbohaarikattaa ca vuttaa. pa.n.nattivajje akate viitikkame uppajjamaanaa sithila.m karontii mocentii dvaara.m dadamaanaa aparaaparampi anaapatti.m kurumaanaa uppajjati, ga.nabhojanaparamparabhojanaadiisu anupa~n~nattiyo viya. ^b^``antamaso ta"nkha.nikaayapii''^eb^ti evaruupaa pana kate viitikkame uppannattaa pa~n~nattigatikaava hoti. ida.m pana pa.thamasikkhaapada.m yasmaa lokavajja.m, na pa.n.nattivajja.m; tasmaa ayamanupa~n~natti rundhantii ^a^V1.0177^ea^ dvaara.m pidahantii sota.m pacchindamaanaa gaa.lhatara.m karontii uppajji.

[03]eva.m dvepi vatthuuni sampi.n.detvaa muulacchejjavasena da.lhatara.m katvaa pa.thamapaaraajike pa~n~natte aparampi anupa~n~nattatthaaya vajjiputtakavatthu udapaadi. tassuppattidassanatthameta.m vutta.m -- ``eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hotii''ti ^a^M1.0193^ea^. tassattho -- bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m ida.m sikkhaapada.m eva.m pa~n~natta.m hoti ca ida~nca a~n~nampi vatthu udapaadiiti.
[06] makka.tiivatthukathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 43-44^b^.^eb^ idaani ya.m ta.m a~n~nampi vatthu uppanna.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``tena kho pana samayenaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tatraapi ayamanuttaanapadava.n.nanaa -- ^b^vesaalikaa^eb^ti vesaalivaasino. ^b^vajjiputtakaa^eb^ti vajjira.t.the vesaaliya.m kulaana.m puttaa. saasane kira yo yo upaddavo aadiinavo abbudamuppajji, sabba.m ta.m vajjiputtake nissaaya. tathaa hi devadattopi vajjiputtake pakkhe labhitvaa sa"ngha.m bhindi. vajjiputtakaa eva ca vassasataparinibbute bhagavati uddhamma.m ubbinaya.m satthusaasana.m diipesu.m. imepi tesa.m yeva ekacce eva.m pa~n~nattepi sikkhaapade ^a^P1.0229^ea^ yaavadattha.m bhu~nji.msu...pe0... methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevi.msuuti.

[03]^b^~naatibyasanenapii^eb^ti ettha asana.m byasana.m vikkhepo viddha.msana.m vinaasoti sabbameta.m ekattha.m. ~naatiina.m byasana.m ^b^~naatibyasana.m,^eb^ tena ~naatibyasanena, raajada.n.dabyaadhimara.navippavaasanimittena ^a^V1.0178^ea^ ~naativinaasenaati attho. esa nayo dutiyapadepi. tatiyapade pana aarogyavinaasako rogo eva ^b^rogabyasana.m^eb^. so hi aarogya.m byasati vikkhipati vinaasetiiti byasana.m. rogova byasana.m rogabyasana.m, tena rogabyasanena. ^b^phu.t.thaa^eb^ti adhipannaa abhibhuutaa samannaagataati attho.

[03]^b^na maya.m, bhante aananda, buddhagarahino^eb^ti bhante aananda, maya.m na buddha.m garahaama, na buddhassa dosa.m dema. na dhammagarahino, na sa"nghagarahino. ^b^attagarahino maya^eb^nti attaanameva maya.m garahaama, attano dosa.m dema. ^b^alakkhikaa^eb^ti nissirikaa. ^b^appapu~n~naa^eb^ti parittapu~n~naa. ^b^vipassakaa kusalaana.m dhammaana^eb^nti ye a.t.thati.msaaramma.nesu vibhattaa kusalaa dhammaa, tesa.m vipassakaa; tato tato aaramma.nato vu.t.thaaya teva dhamme vipassamaanaati ^a^M1.0194^ea^ attho. ^b^pubbarattaapararatta^eb^nti rattiyaa pubba.m pubbaratta.m, rattiyaa apara.m apararatta.m, pa.thamayaama~nca pacchimayaama~ncaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^bodhipakkhikaana^eb^nti bodhissa pakkhe bhavaana.m, arahattamagga~naa.nassa upakaarakaananti attho. ^b^bhaavanaanuyoga^eb^nti va.d.dhanaanuyoga.m. ^b^anuyuttaa vihareyyaamaa^eb^ti gihipalibodha.m aavaasapalibodha~nca pahaaya vivittesu senaasanesu yuttapayuttaa ana~n~nakiccaa vihareyyaama.

[03]^b^evamaavuso^eb^ti thero etesa.m aasaya.m ajaananto ida.m nesa.m mahaagajjita.m sutvaa ``sace ime iidisaa bhavissanti, saadhuu''ti ma~n~namaano ``evamaavuso''ti sampa.ticchi. ^b^a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso^eb^ti ubhayampeta.m kaara.napa.tikkhepavacana.m. kaara.na~nhi yasmaa tattha tadaayattavuttibhaavena phala.m ti.t.thati. yasmaa cassa ta.m okaaso hoti tadaayattavuttibhaavena, tasmaa ``.thaana~nca avakaaso caa''ti vuccati, ta.m pa.tikkhipanto aaha -- ``a.t.thaanameta.m, aananda ^a^P1.0230^ea^, anavakaaso''ti. eta.m .thaana.m vaa okaaso vaa natthi. ^b^ya.m tathaagato^eb^ti yena tathaagato vajjiina.m vaa...pe0... samuuhaneyya, ta.m kaara.na.m natthiiti attho. yadi hi bhagavaa etesa.m ``labheyyaama upasampada''nti yaacantaana.m upasampada.m dadeyya, eva.m sante ``paaraajiko hoti asa.mvaaso''ti pa~n~natta.m samuuhaneyya. yasmaa paneta.m na samuuhanati, tasmaa ``a.t.thaanameta''ntiaadimaaha.

[03]^b^so aagato na upasampaadetabbo^eb^ti ``yadi hi eva.m aagato upasampada.m labheyya, saasane agaaravo bhaveyya. saama.nerabhuumiya.m pana .thito sagaaravo ca bhavissati, attattha~nca karissatii''ti ~natvaa anukampamaano bhagavaa aaha -- ``so aagato na upasampaadetabbo''ti. ^b^so aagato upasampaadetabbo^eb^ti eva.m aagato bhikkhubhaave .thatvaa avipannasiilataaya saasane sagaaravo ^a^V1.0179^ea^ bhavissati, so sati upanissaye nacirasseva uttamattha.m paapu.nissatiiti ~natvaa upasampaadetabboti aaha.

[03]eva.m methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitvaa aagatesu anupasampaadetabba~nca upasampaadetabba~nca dassetvaa tii.nipi vatthuuni samodhaanetvaa paripu.n.na.m katvaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napetukaamo ``eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddiseyyaathaa''ti vatvaa ``yo pana bhikkhu...pe0... asa.mvaaso''ti paripu.n.na.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napesi.
[06] vajjiputtakavatthuva.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ idaanissa ^a^M1.0195^ea^ attha.m vibhajanto ^b^``yo panaati, yo yaadiso''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tasmi.m pana sikkhaapade ca sikkhaapadavibha"nge ca sakale ca vinayavinicchaye kosalla.m patthayantena ^b^catubbidho vinayo^eb^ jaanitabbo --
[21] catubbidha~nhi vinaya.m, mahaatheraa mahiddhikaa.
[22] niiharitvaa pakaasesu.m, dhammasa"ngaahakaa puraa..

[03]katama.m catubbidha.m? sutta.m, suttaanuloma.m, aacariyavaada.m, attanomatinti. ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m -- ``aahaccapadena rasena aacariyava.msena adhippaayaa''ti, ettha hi ^b^aahaccapada^eb^nti sutta.m adhippeta.m, ^b^raso^eb^ti suttaanuloma.m, ^b^aacariyava.mso^eb^ti aacariyavaado, ^b^adhippaayo^eb^ti attanomati.
[03]tattha ^b^sutta.m^eb^naama sakale vinayapi.take paa.li.

[03]^b^suttaanuloma.m^eb^ naama cattaaro mahaapadesaa; ye bhagavataa eva.m vuttaa -- ``ya.m, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0231^ea^, mayaa `ida.m na kappatii'ti appa.tikkhitta.m, ta.m ce akappiya.m anulometi; kappiya.m pa.tibaahati, ta.m vo na kappati. ya.m, bhikkhave, mayaa `ida.m na kappatii'ti appa.tikkhitta.m, ta.m ce kappiya.m anulometi; akappiya.m pa.tibaahati, ta.m vo kappati. ya.m, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0180^ea^, mayaa `ida.m kappatii'ti ananu~n~naata.m, ta.m ce akappiya.m anulometi, kappiya.m pa.tibaahati; ta.m vo na kappati. ya.m, bhikkhave, mayaa `ida.m kappatii'ti ananu~n~naata.m, ta.m ce kappiya.m anulometi, akappiya.m pa.tibaahati; ta.m vo kappatii''ti (mahaava0 305).
[03]^b^aacariyavaado^eb^ naama dhammasa"ngaahakehi pa~ncahi arahantasatehi .thapitaa paa.livinimuttaa okkantavinicchayappavattaa a.t.thakathaatanti.
[03]^b^attanomati^eb^ naama sutta-suttaanuloma-aacariyavaade mu~ncitvaa anumaanena attano anubuddhiyaa nayaggaahena upa.t.thitaakaarakathana.m.

[03]apica suttantaabhidhammavinaya.t.thakathaasu aagato sabbopi theravaado ``attanomati'' naama. ta.m pana attanomati.m gahetvaa kathentena na da.lhaggaaha.m ^a^M1.0196^ea^ gahetvaa voharitabba.m. kaara.na.m sallakkhetvaa atthena paa.li.m, paa.liyaa ca attha.m sa.msanditvaa kathetabba.m. attanomati aacariyavaade otaaretabbaa. sace tattha otarati ceva sameti ca, gahetabbaa. sace neva otarati na sameti, na gahetabbaa. aya~nhi attanomati naama sabbadubbalaa. attanomatito aacariyavaado balavataro.
[03]aacariyavaadopi suttaanulome otaaretabbo. tattha otaranto samentoyeva gahetabbo, itaro na gahetabbo. aacariyavaadato hi suttaanuloma.m balavatara.m.

[03]suttaanulomampi sutte otaaretabba.m. tattha otaranta.m samentameva gahetabba.m, itara.m na gahetabba.m. suttaanulomato hi suttameva balavatara.m. sutta~nhi appa.tivattiya.m kaarakasa"nghasadisa.m buddhaana.m .thitakaalasadisa.m. tasmaa yadaa dve bhikkhuu saakacchanti, sakavaadii sutta.m gahetvaa katheti, paravaadii suttaanuloma.m. tehi a~n~nama~n~na.m khepa.m vaa garaha.m vaa akatvaa suttaanuloma.m sutte otaaretabba.m. sace otarati sameti, gahetabba.m. no ce, na gahetabba.m; suttasmi.myeva .thaatabba.m. athaaya.m sutta.m gahetvaa katheti, paro aacariyavaada.m. tehipi a~n~nama~n~na.m khepa.m vaa garaha.m vaa akatvaa aacariyavaado sutte otaaretabbo. sace otarati sameti, gahetabbo. anotaranto asamento ca gaarayhaacariyavaado na gahetabbo; suttasmi.myeva .thaatabba.m.

[03]athaaya.m sutta.m ^a^P1.0232^ea^ gahetvaa katheti, paro attanomati.m. tehipi a~n~nama~n~na.m khepa.m vaa garaha.m vaa ^a^V1.0181^ea^ akatvaa attanomati sutte otaaretabbaa. sace otarati sameti, gahetabbaa. no ce, na gahetabbaa. suttasmi.m yeva .thaatabba.m.

[03]atha panaaya.m suttaanuloma.m gahetvaa katheti, paro sutta.m. sutta.m suttaanulome otaaretabba.m. sace otarati sameti, tisso sa"ngiitiyo aaruu.lha.m paa.liaagata.m pa~n~naayati, gahetabba.m. no ce tathaa pa~n~naayati na otarati na sameti, baahirakasutta.m vaa hoti siloko vaa a~n~na.m vaa gaarayhasutta.m gu.lhavessantaragu.lhavinayavedallaadiina.m a~n~natarato aagata.m, na gahetabba.m. suttaanulomasmi.myeva .thaatabba.m.

[03]athaaya.m ^a^M1.0197^ea^ suttaanuloma.m gahetvaa katheti, paro aacariyavaada.m. aacariyavaado suttaanulome otaaretabbo. sace otarati sameti, gahetabbo. no ce, na gahetabbo. suttaanulomeyeva .thaatabba.m.
[03]athaaya.m suttaanuloma.m gahetvaa katheti, paro attanomati.m. attanomati suttaanulome otaaretabbaa. sace otarati sameti, gahetabbaa. no ce, na gahetabbaa. suttaanulomeyeva .thaatabba.m.

[03]atha panaaya.m aacariyavaada.m gahetvaa katheti, paro sutta.m. sutta.m aacariyavaade otaaretabba.m. sace otarati sameti, gahetabba.m. itara.m gaarayhasutta.m na gahetabba.m. aacariyavaadeyeva .thaatabba.m.

[03]athaaya.m aacariyavaada.m gahetvaa katheti, paro suttaanuloma.m. suttaanuloma.m aacariyavaade otaaretabba.m. otaranta.m samentameva gahetabba.m, itara.m na gahetabba.m. aacariyavaadeyeva .thaatabba.m.
[03]athaaya.m aacariyavaada.m gahetvaa katheti, paro attanomati.m. attanomati aacariyavaade otaaretabbaa. sace otarati sameti, gahetabbaa. no ce, na gahetabbaa. aacariyavaadeyeva .thaatabba.m.

[03]atha panaaya.m attanomati.m gahetvaa katheti, paro sutta.m. sutta.m attanomatiya.m otaaretabba.m. sace otarati sameti, gahetabba.m. itara.m gaarayhasutta.m na gahetabba.m. attanomatiyameva .thaatabba.m.

[03]athaaya.m ^a^V1.0182^ea^ attanomati.m gahetvaa katheti, paro suttaanuloma.m. suttaanuloma.m attanomatiya.m otaaretabba.m. otaranta.m samentameva gahetabba.m, itara.m na gahetabba.m. attanomatiyameva .thaatabba.m.

[03]athaaya.m attanomati.m gahetvaa katheti, paro aacariyavaada.m. aacariyavaado attanomatiya.m otaaretabbo. sace otarati sameti, gahetabbo; itaro gaarayhaacariyavaado na gahetabbo. attanomatiyameva .thaatabba.m. attano gaha.nameva ^a^P1.0233^ea^ baliya.m kaatabba.m. sabba.t.thaanesu ca khepo vaa garahaa vaa na kaatabbaati.

[03]atha ^a^M1.0198^ea^ panaaya.m ``kappiya''nti gahetvaa katheti, paro ``akappiya''nti. sutte ca suttaanulome ca otaaretabba.m. sace kappiya.m hoti, kappiye .thaatabba.m. sace akappiya.m, akappiye .thaatabba.m.

[03]athaaya.m tassa kappiyabhaavasaadhaka.m suttato bahu.m kaara.na~nca vinicchaya~nca dasseti, paro kaara.na.m na vindati. kappiyeva .thaatabba.m. atha paro tassa akappiyabhaavasaadhaka.m suttato bahu.m kaara.na~nca vinicchaya~nca dasseti, anena attano gaha.nanti katvaa da.lha.m aadaaya na .thaatabba.m. ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa akappiyeva .thaatabba.m. atha dvinnampi kaara.nacchaayaa dissati, pa.tikkhittabhaavoyeva saadhu, akappiye .thaatabba.m. vinaya~nhi patvaa kappiyaakappiyavicaara.namaagamma rundhitabba.m, gaa.lha.m kattabba.m, sota.m pacchinditabba.m, garukabhaaveyeva .thaatabba.m.
[03]atha panaaya.m ``akappiya''nti gahetvaa katheti, paro ``kappiya''nti. sutte ca suttaanulome ca otaaretabba.m. sace kappiya.m hoti, kappiye .thaatabba.m. sace akappiya.m, akappiye .thaatabba.m.

[03]athaaya.m bahuuhi suttavinicchayakaara.nehi akappiyabhaava.m dasseti, paro kaara.na.m na vindati, akappiye .thaatabba.m. atha paro bahuuhi suttavinicchayakaara.nehi kappiyabhaava.m dasseti, aya.m kaara.na.m na vindati, kappiye .thaatabba.m. atha dvinnampi kaara.nacchaayaa dissati, attano gaha.na.m na vissajjetabba.m. yathaa caaya.m kappiyaakappiye akappiyakappiye ca vinicchayo vutto; eva.m anaapattiaapattivaade aapattaanaapattivaade ca, lahukagarukaapattivaade garukalahukaapattivaade caapi ^a^V1.0183^ea^ vinicchayo veditabbo. naamamatta.myeva hi ettha naana.m, yojanaanaye naana.m natthi, tasmaa na vitthaarita.m.

[03]eva.m kappiyaakappiyaadivinicchaye uppanne yo sutta-suttaanulomaaacariyavaadaattanomatiisu atirekakaara.na.m labhati, tassa vaade .thaatabba.m. sabbaso pana kaara.na.m vinicchaya.m alabhantena sutta.m na jahitabba.m, suttasmi.myeva .thaatabbanti. eva.m tasmi.m sikkhaapade ca sikkhaapadavibha"nge ca sakale ca vinayavinicchaye kosalla.m patthayantena aya.m catubbidho vinayo jaanitabbo.

[03]ima~nca ^a^M1.0199^ea^ ^a^P1.0234^ea^ pana catubbidha.m vinaya.m ~natvaapi vinayadharena puggalena tilakkha.nasamannaagatena bhavitabba.m. ^b^tii.ni^eb^ hi ^b^vinayadharassa lakkha.naani^eb^ icchitabbaani. katamaani tii.ni? ``sutta~ncassa svaagata.m hoti suppavatti suvinicchita.m suttato anubya~njanato''ti idameka.m lakkha.na.m. ``vinaye kho pana .thito hoti asa.mhiiro''ti ida.m dutiya.m. ``aacariyaparamparaa kho panassa suggahitaa hoti sumanasikataa suupadhaaritaa''ti ida.m tatiya.m.

[03]tattha ^b^sutta.m^eb^ naama sakala.m vinayapi.taka.m. ta~ncassa ^b^svaagata.m hotii^eb^ti su.t.thu aagata.m. ^b^suppavattii^eb^ti su.t.thu pavatta.m pagu.na.m vaacuggata.m suvinicchita.m. ^b^suttato anubya~njanato^eb^ti paa.lito ca paripucchato ca a.t.thakathaato ca suvinicchita.m hoti, ka"nkhaccheda.m katvaa uggahita.m.

[03]vinaye kho pana .thito hotiiti vinaye lajjiibhaavena pati.t.thito hoti. alajjii hi bahussutopi samaano laabhagarutaaya tanti.m visa.mvaadetvaa uddhamma.m ubbinaya.m satthusaasana.m diipetvaa saasane mahanta.m upaddava.m karoti. sa"nghabhedampi sa"ngharaajimpi uppaadeti. lajjii pana kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo jiivitahetupi tanti.m avisa.mvaadetvaa dhammameva vinayameva ca diipeti, satthusaasana.m garu.m katvaa .thapeti. tathaa hi pubbe mahaatheraa tikkhattu.m vaaca.m nicchaaresu.m -- ^b^``anaagate lajjii rakkhissati, lajjii rakkhissati, lajjii rakkhissatii''^eb^ti. eva.m yo lajjii, so vinaya.m avijahanto avokkamanto lajjiibhaavena vinaye .thito hoti suppati.t.thitoti. ^b^asa.mhiiro^eb^ti sa.mhiiro naama yo paa.liya.m vaa a.t.thakathaaya.m vaa he.t.thato vaa uparito vaa padapa.tipaa.tiyaa vaa pucchiyamaano vitthunati vipphandati santi.t.thitu.m na sakkoti; ya.m ya.m parena vuccati ta.m ta.m anujaanaati; sakavaada.m cha.d.detvaa paravaada.m ga.nhaati. yo pana paa.liya.m vaa a.t.thakathaaya vaa he.t.thupariyena vaa padapa.tipaa.tiyaa ^a^P1.0235^ea^ vaa pucchiyamaano na vitthunati na vipphandati, ekekaloma.m sa.n.daasena ga.nhanto viya ``eva.m maya.m vadaama; eva.m no aacariyaa vadantii''ti ^a^V1.0184^ea^ vissajjeti; yamhi paa.li ca paa.livinicchayo ca suva.n.nabhaajane pakkhittasiihavasaa viya parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m agacchanto ti.t.thati, aya.m vuccati ``asa.mhiiro''ti.

[03]^b^aacariyaparamparaa kho panassa suggahitaa hotii^eb^ti theraparamparaa va.msaparamparaa cassa suu gahitaa hoti. ^b^sumanasikataa^eb^ti su.t.thu manasikataa; aavajjitamatte ujjalitapadiipo viya hoti. ^b^suupadhaaritaa^eb^ti su.t.thu ^a^M1.0200^ea^ upadhaaritaa pubbaaparaanusandhito atthato kaara.nato ca upadhaaritaa; attano mati.m pahaaya aacariyasuddhiyaa vattaa hoti ``mayha.m aacariyo asukaacariyassa santike ugga.nhi, so asukassaa''ti eva.m sabba.m aacariyaparampara.m theravaada"nga.m aaharitvaa yaava upaalitthero sammaasambuddhassa santike ugga.nhiiti paapetvaa .thapeti. tatopi aaharitvaa upaalitthero sammaasambuddhassa santike ugga.nhi, daasakatthero attano upajjhaayassa upaalittherassa, so.nakatthero attano upajjhaayassa daasakattherassa, siggavatthero attano upajjhaayassa so.nakattherassa, moggaliputtatissatthero attano upajjhaayassa siggavattherassa ca.n.davajjittherassa caati. eva.m sabba.m aacariyaparampara.m theravaada"nga.m aaharitvaa attano aacariya.m paapetvaa .thapeti. eva.m uggahitaa hi aacariyaparamparaa suggahitaa hoti. eva.m asakkontena pana avassa.m dve tayo pariva.t.taa uggahetabbaa. sabbapacchimena hi nayena yathaa aacariyo ca aacariyaacariyo ca paa.li~nca paripuccha~nca vadanti, tathaa ~naatu.m va.t.tati.

[03]imehi ca pana tiihi lakkha.nehi samannaagatena vinayadharena vatthuvinicchayattha.m sannipatite sa"nghe oti.n.ne vatthusmi.m codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe sahasaa avinicchinitvaava ^b^cha .thaanaani^eb^ oloketabbaani. katamaani cha? vatthu oloketabba.m, maatikaa oloketabbaa, padabhaajaniiya.m oloketabba.m, tikaparicchedo oloketabbo, antaraapatti oloketabbaa, anaapatti oloketabbaati.

[03]vatthu.m olokentopi ^a^P1.0236^ea^ hi ``ti.nena vaa pa.n.nena vaa pa.ticchaadetvaa aagantabba.m, na tveva naggena aagantabba.m; yo aagaccheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (paaraa0 517) eva.m ekacca.m aapatti.m passati. so ta.m sutta.m aanetvaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamessati.

[03]maatika.m olokentopi ``sampajaanamusaavaade paacittiya''ntiaadinaa (paaci0 2) nayena ^a^V1.0185^ea^ pa~ncanna.m aapattiina.m a~n~natara.m aapatti.m passati, so ta.m sutta.m aanetvaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamessati.

[03]padabhaajaniiya.m ^a^M1.0201^ea^ olokentopi ``akkhayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati, aapatti paaraajikassa. yebhuyyena khayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati, aapatti thullaccayassaa''tiaadinaa (paaraa0 59 aadayo, atthato samaana.m) nayena sattanna.m aapattiina.m a~n~natara.m aapatti.m passati, so padabhaajaniiyato sutta.m aanetvaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamessati.

[03]tikapariccheda.m olokentopi tikasa"nghaadisesa.m vaa tikapaacittiya.m vaa tikadukka.ta.m vaa a~n~natara.m vaa aapatti.m tikaparicchede passati, so tato sutta.m aanetvaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamessati.

[03]antaraapatti.m olokentopi ``pa.tilaata.m ukkhipati, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (paaci0 355) eva.m yaa sikkhaapadantaresu antaraapatti hoti ta.m passati, so ta.m sutta.m aanetvaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamessati.

[03]anaapatti.m olokentopi ``anaapatti bhikkhu asaadiyantassa, atheyyacittassa, na mara.naadhippaayassa, anullapanaadhippaayassa, na mocanaadhippaayassa, asa~ncicca, assatiyaa, ajaanantassaa''ti (paaraa0 72 aadayo) eva.m tasmi.m tasmi.m sikkhaapade niddi.t.tha.m anaapatti.m passati, so ta.m sutta.m aanetvaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamessati.

[03]yo hi bhikkhu catubbidhavinayakovido tilakkha.nasampanno imaani cha .thaanaani oloketvaa adhikara.na.m vuupasamessati, tassa vinicchayo appa.tivattiyo, buddhena saya.m nisiiditvaa vinicchitasadiso hoti. ta.m ceva.m vinicchayakusala.m bhikkhu.m koci katasikkhaapadaviitikkamo bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa attano kukkucca.m puccheyya; tena saadhuka.m sallakkhetvaa sace anaapatti hoti, ``anaapattii''ti vattabba.m. sace pana aapatti hoti, ``aapattii''ti vattabba.m. saa desanaagaaminii ce, ``desanaagaaminii''ti vattabba.m. vu.t.thaanagaaminii ce, ``vu.t.thaanagaaminii''ti vattabba.m. athassa paaraajikacchaayaa ^a^P1.0237^ea^ dissati, ``paaraajikaapattii''ti na taava vattabba.m. kasmaa? methunadhammaviitikkamo hi uttarimanussadhammaviitikkamo ca o.laariko. adinnaadaanamanussaviggahaviitikkamaa pana sukhumaa cittalahukaa. te sukhumeneva aapajjati ^a^V1.0186^ea^, sukhumena rakkhati, tasmaa visesena ta.mvatthuka.m kukkucca.m pucchiyamaano ``aapattii''ti avatvaa sacassa aacariyo dharati, tato tena so bhikkhu ``amhaaka.m aacariya.m ^a^M1.0202^ea^ pucchaa''ti pesetabbo. sace so puna aagantvaa ``tumhaaka.m aacariyo suttato nayato oloketvaa `satekiccho'ti ma.m aahaa''ti vadati, tato anena so ``saadhu su.t.thu ya.m aacariyo bha.nati ta.m karohii''ti vattabbo. atha panassa aacariyo natthi, saddhi.m uggahitatthero pana atthi, tassa santika.m pesetabbo -- ``amhehi saha uggahitatthero ga.napaamokkho, ta.m gantvaa pucchaa''ti. tenaapi ``satekiccho''ti vinicchite ``saadhu su.t.thu tassa vacana.m karohii''ti vattabbo. atha saddhi.m uggahitattheropi natthi, antevaasiko pa.n.dito atthi, tassa santika.m pesetabbo -- ``asukadahara.m gantvaa pucchaa''ti. tenaapi ``satekiccho''ti vinicchite ``saadhu su.t.thu tassa vacana.m karohii''ti vattabbo. atha daharassaapi paaraajikacchaayaava upa.t.thaati, tenaapi ``paaraajikosii''ti na vattabbo. dullabho hi buddhuppaado, tato dullabhataraa ^a^M1.0203^ea^ pabbajjaa ca upasampadaa ca. eva.m pana vattabbo -- ``vivitta.m okaasa.m sammajjitvaa divaavihaara.m nisiiditvaa siilaani sodhetvaa dvatti.msaakaara.m taava manasi karohii''ti. sace tassa aroga.m siila.m kamma.t.thaana.m gha.tayati, sa"nkhaaraa paaka.taa hutvaa upa.t.thahanti, upacaarappanaappatta.m viya cittampi ekagga.m hoti, divasa.m atikkantampi na jaanaati. so divasaatikkame upa.t.thaana.m aagato eva.m vattabbo -- ``kiidisaa te cittappavattii''ti. aarocitaaya cittappavattiyaa vattabbo -- ``pabbajjaa naama cittavisuddhatthaaya, appamatto sama.nadhamma.m karohii''ti.

[03]yassa pana siila.m bhinna.m hoti, tassa kamma.t.thaana.m na gha.tayati, patodaabhitunna.m viya citta.m vikampati, vippa.tisaaragginaa .dayhati, tattapaasaa.ne nisinno viya ta"nkha.na~n~neva vu.t.thaati. so ^a^P1.0238^ea^ aagato ``kaa te cittappavattii''ti pucchitabbo. aarocitaaya cittappavattiyaa ``natthi loke raho naama paapakamma.m pakubbato. sabbapa.thama~nhi paapa.m karonto attanaa jaanaati, athassa aarakkhadevataa paracittaviduu sama.nabraahma.naa a~n~naa ca devataa jaananti, tva.myeva daani tava sotthi.m pariyesaahii''ti vattabbo.
[06] ni.t.thitaa catubbidhavinayakathaa
[06] vinayadharassa ca lakkha.naadikathaa.

[03]idaani ^a^V1.0187^ea^ sikkhaapadavibha"ngassa attha.m va.n.nayissaama. ya.m vutta.m ^b^yo panaati yo yaadiso^eb^tiaadi. ettha ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti vibhajitabbapada.m; ^b^yo yaadiso^eb^tiaadiini tassa vibhajanapadaani. ettha ca yasmaa ^b^panaa^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m; ^b^yo^eb^ti atthapada.m; ta~nca aniyamena puggala.m diipeti, tasmaa tassa attha.m dassento aniyamena puggaladiipaka.m yo saddameva aaha. tasmaa ettha evamattho veditabbo -- ^b^yo panaa^eb^ti yo yokociiti vutta.m hoti. yasmaa pana yo yokoci naama, so avassa.m li"nga-yutta-jaati-naama-gotta-siila-vihaara-gocaravayesu ekenaakaarena pa~n~naayati, tasmaa ta.m tathaa ~naapetu.m ta.m pabheda.m pakaasento ^b^``yaadiso''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^yaadiso^eb^ti li"ngavasena yaadiso vaa taadiso vaa hotu; diigho vaa rasso vaa kaa.lo vaa odaato vaa ma"nguracchavi vaa kiso vaa thuulo vaati attho. ^b^yathaayutto^eb^ti yogavasena yena vaa tena vaa yutto hotu; navakammayutto vaa uddesayutto vaa vaasadhurayutto vaati attho. ^b^yathaajacco^eb^ti jaativasena ya.mjacco vaa ta.mjacco vaa hotu; khattiyo vaa braahma.no vaa vesso vaa suddo vaati attho. ^b^yathaanaamo^eb^ti naamavasena yathaanaamo vaa tathaanaamo vaa hotu; buddharakkhito vaa dhammarakkhito vaa sa"ngharakkhito vaati attho. ^b^yathaagotto^eb^ti gottavasena yathaagotto vaa tathaagotto vaa yena vaa tena vaa gottena hotu; kaccaayano vaa vaasi.t.tho vaa kosiyo vaati attho. ^b^yathaasiilo^eb^ti siilesu yathaasiilo vaa tathaasiilo vaa hotu; navakammasiilo vaa uddesasiilo vaa vaasadhurasiilo vaati attho. ^b^yathaavihaarii^eb^ti vihaaresupi yathaavihaarii vaa tathaavihaarii vaa hotu; navakammavihaarii vaa uddesavihaarii vaa vaasadhuravihaarii vaati attho. ^b^yathaagocaro^eb^ti gocaresupi yathaagocaro vaa tathaagocaro vaa hotu; navakammagocaro ^a^P1.0239^ea^ vaa uddesagocaro vaa vaasadhuragocaro vaati attho. ^b^thero vaa^eb^ti aadiisu vayovu.d.dhaadiisu yo vaa so vaa hotu; paripu.n.nadasavassataaya thero vaa uunapa~ncavassataaya navo vaa atirekapa~ncavassataaya ^a^M1.0204^ea^ majjhimo vaati attho. atha kho sabbova imasmi.m atthe eso vuccati ``yo panaa''ti.

[03]bhikkhuniddese bhikkhatiiti ^b^bhikkhako;^eb^ labhanto vaa alabhanto vaa ariyaaya yaacanaaya yaacatiiti attho. buddhaadiihi ajjhupagata.m bhikkhaacariya.m ajjhupagatattaa ^b^bhikkhaacariya.m ajjhupagato^eb^ naama. yo hi koci appa.m vaa mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, so kasigorakkhaadiihi jiivikakappana.m hitvaa li"ngasampa.ticchaneneva ^b^bhikkhaacariya.m ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu^eb^. parapa.tibaddhajiivikattaa vaa vihaaramajjhe kaajabhatta.m bhu~njamaanopi ^a^V1.0188^ea^ ^b^bhikkhaacariya.m ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu;^eb^ pi.n.diyaalopabhojana.m nissaaya pabbajjaaya ussaahajaatattaa vaa ^b^bhikkhaacariya.m ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu^eb^. agghaphassava.n.nabhedena bhinna.m pa.ta.m dhaaretiiti ^b^bhinnapa.tadharo^eb^. tattha satthakacchedanena agghabhedo veditabbo. sahassagghanakopi hi pa.to satthakena kha.n.daakha.n.dika.m chinno bhinnaggho hoti. purimagghato upa.d.dhampi na agghati. suttasa.msibbanena phassabhedo veditabbo. sukhasamphassopi hi pa.to suttehi sa.msibbito bhinnaphasso hoti. kharasamphassata.m paapu.naati. suucimalaadiihi va.n.nabhedo veditabbo. suparisuddhopi hi pa.to suucikammato pa.t.thaaya suucimalena, hatthasedamalajallikaahi, avasaane rajanakappakara.nehi ca bhinnava.n.no hoti; pakativa.n.na.m vijahati. eva.m tiihaakaarehi bhinnapa.tadhaara.nato ^b^bhinnapa.tadharoti bhikkhu^eb^. gihivatthavisabhaagaana.m vaa kaasaavaana.m dhaara.namatteneva ^b^bhinnapa.tadharoti bhikkhu^eb^.

[03]^b^sama~n~naayaa^eb^ti pa~n~nattiyaa vohaarenaati attho. sama~n~naaya eva hi ekacco ``bhikkhuu''ti pa~n~naayati. tathaa hi nimantanaadimhi bhikkhuusu ga.niyamaanesu saama.nerepi gahetvaa ``sata.m bhikkhuu sahassa.m bhikkhuu''ti vadanti. ^b^pa.ti~n~naayaa^eb^ti attano pa.tijaananena pa.ti~n~naayapi hi ekacco ``bhikkhuu''ti pa~n~naayati. tassa ``ko etthaati? aha.m, aavuso, bhikkhuu''ti (a0 ni0 10.96) evamaadiisu sambhavo da.t.thabbo ^a^P1.0240^ea^. aya.m pana aanandattherena vuttaa dhammikaa pa.ti~n~naa. rattibhaage pana dussiilaapi pa.tipatha.m aagacchantaa ``ko etthaa''ti vutte adhammikaaya pa.ti~n~naaya abhuutaaya ``maya.m bhikkhuu''ti vadanti.

[03]^b^ehi^eb^ ^a^M1.0205^ea^ bhikkhuuti ehi bhikkhu naama bhagavato ``ehi bhikkhuu''ti vacanamattena bhikkhubhaava.m ehibhikkhuupasampada.m patto. bhagavaa hi ehibhikkhubhaavaaya upanissayasampanna.m puggala.m disvaa rattapa.msukuulantarato suva.n.nava.n.na.m dakkhi.nahattha.m niiharitvaa brahmaghosa.m nicchaarento ``ehi, bhikkhu, cara brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti vadati. tassa saheva bhagavato vacanena gihili"nga.m antaradhaayati, pabbajjaa ca upasampadaa ca ruhati. bha.n.du kaasaayavasano hoti. eka.m nivaasetvaa eka.m paarupitvaa eka.m a.mse .thapetvaa vaama.msakuu.te aasattaniiluppalava.n.namattikaapatto --
[21] ``ticiivara~nca patto ca, vaasi suuci ca bandhana.m.
[22] parissaavanena a.t.thete, yuttayogassa bhikkhuno''ti..

[03]eva.m ^a^V1.0189^ea^ vuttehi a.t.thahi parikkhaarehi sariire pa.timukkehiyeva sa.t.thivassikatthero viya iriyaapathasampanno buddhaacariyako buddhupajjhaayako sammaasambuddha.m vandamaanoyeva ti.t.thati. bhagavaa hi pa.thamabodhiya.m ekasmi.m kaale ehibhikkhuupasampadaaya eva upasampaadeti. eva.m upasampannaani ca sahassupari ekacattaaliisuttaraani tii.ni bhikkhusataani ahesu.m; seyyathida.m -- pa~nca pa~ncavaggiyattheraa, yaso kulaputto, tassa parivaaraa catupa.n.naasa sahaayakaa, ti.msa bhaddavaggiyaa, sahassapuraa.naja.tilaa, saddhi.m dviihi aggasaavakehi a.d.dhateyyasataa paribbaajakaa, eko a"ngulimaalattheroti. vutta~nheta.m ^b^a.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ --
[21] ``tii.ni sata.m sahassa~nca, cattaaliisa.m punaapare.
[22] eko ca thero sappa~n~no, sabbe te ehibhikkhukaa''ti..

[03]na kevala~nca ete eva, a~n~nepi bahuu santi. seyyathida.m -- tisataparivaaro selo braahma.no, sahassaparivaaro mahaakappino, dasasahassaa ^a^P1.0241^ea^ kapilavatthuvaasino kulaputtaa, so.lasasahassaa paaraayanikabraahma.naati evamaadayo. te pana vinayapi.take paa.liya.m na niddi.t.thattaa na vuttaa. ime tattha niddi.t.thattaa vuttaati.
[21] ``sattaviisa sahassaani, tii.niyeva sataani ca.
[22] etepi sabbe sa"nkhaataa, sabbe te ehibhikkhukaa''ti..

[03]^b^tiihi^eb^ ^a^M1.0206^ea^^b^ sara.nagamanehi upasampanno^eb^ti ``buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaamii''tiaadinaa nayena tikkhattu.m vaaca.m bhinditvaa vuttehi tiihi sara.nagamanehi upasampanno. aya~nhi upasampadaa naama a.t.thavidhaa -- ehibhikkhuupasampadaa, sara.nagamanuupasampadaa, ovaadapa.tiggaha.nuupasampadaa, pa~nhabyaakara.nuupasampadaa, garudhammapa.tiggaha.nuupasampadaa, duutenuupasampadaa, a.t.thavaacikuupasampadaa, ~natticatutthakammuupasampadaati. tattha ehibhikkhuupasampadaa, sara.nagamanuupasampadaa ca vuttaa eva.

[03]ovaadapa.tiggaha.nuupasampadaa naama ``tasmaatiha te, kassapa, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `tibba.m me hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thita.m bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesu caa'ti. eva~nhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, kassapa, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ya.m ki~nci dhamma.m sossaami kusaluupasa.mhita.m, sabba.m ta.m a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto dhamma.m sossaamii'ti. eva.m hi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba.m. tasmaatiha te, kassapa, eva.m sikkhitabba.m ^a^V1.0190^ea^ -- `saatasahagataa ca me kaayagataasati na vijahissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba''nti (sa.m0 ni0 2.154) iminaa ovaadapa.tiggaha.nena mahaakassapattherassa anu~n~naataupasampadaa.

[03]pa~nhabyaakara.nuupasampadaa naama sopaakassa anu~n~naataupasampadaa. bhagavaa kira pubbaaraame anuca"nkamanta.m sopaakasaama.nera.m ```uddhumaatakasa~n~naa'ti vaa, sopaaka, `ruupasa~n~naa'ti vaa ime dhammaa naanatthaa naanaabya~njanaa ^a^P1.0242^ea^, udaahu ekatthaa, bya~njanameva naana''nti dasa asubhanissite pa~nhe pucchi. so te byaakaasi. bhagavaa tassa saadhukaara.m datvaa ``kativassosi tva.m, sopaakaa''ti pucchi. ``sattavassoha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``sopaaka, tva.m mama sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nena saddhi.m sa.msanditvaa pa~nhe byaakaasii''ti aaraddhacitto upasampada.m anujaani. aya.m pa~nhabyaakara.nuupasampadaa.
[03]garudhammapa.tiggaha.nuupasampadaa naama mahaapajaapatiyaa a.t.thagarudhammassa pa.tiggaha.nena anu~n~naataupasampadaa.
[03]duutenuupasampadaa naama a.d.dhakaasiyaa ga.nikaaya anu~n~naataupasampadaa.
[03]a.t.thavaacikuupasampadaa naama bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhunisa"nghato ~natticatutthena bhikkhusa"nghato ~natticatutthenaati imehi dviihi kammehi upasampadaa.

[03]~natticatutthakammuupasampadaa ^a^M1.0207^ea^ naama bhikkhuuna.m etarahi upasampadaa. imaasu a.t.thasu upasampadaasu ``yaa saa, bhikkhave, mayaa tiihi sara.nagamanehi upasampadaa anu~n~naataa, ta.m ajjatagge pa.tikkhipaami. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ~natticatutthena kammena upasampaadetu''nti (mahaava0 69) eva.m anu~n~naataaya imaaya upasampadaaya upasampannoti vutta.m hoti.

[03]^b^bhadro^eb^ti apaapako. kalyaa.naputhujjanaadayo hi yaava arahaa, taava bhadrena siilena samaadhinaa pa~n~naaya vimuttiyaa vimutti~naa.nadassanena ca samannaagatattaa ``bhadro bhikkhuu''ti sa"nkhya.m gacchanti. ^b^saaro^eb^ti tehiyeva siilasaaraadiihi samannaagatattaa niilasamannaagamena niilo pa.to viya ``saaro bhikkhuu''ti veditabbo. vigatakilesapheggubhaavato vaa khii.naasavova ``saaro''ti veditabbo. ^b^sekho^eb^ti puthujjanakalyaa.nakena saddhi.m satta ^a^V1.0191^ea^ ariyaa tisso sikkhaa sikkhantiiti sekhaa. tesu yo koci ``sekho bhikkhuu''ti veditabbo. na sikkhatiiti ^b^asekho^eb^. sekkhadhamme atikkamma aggaphale .thito, tato uttari sikkhitabbaabhaavato khii.naasavo ``asekho''ti vuccati. ^b^samaggena sa"nghenaa^eb^ti sabbantimena pariyaayena pa~ncavaggakara.niiye kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa, tesa.m aagatattaa chandaarahaana.m chandassa aaha.tattaa, sammukhiibhuutaana~nca appa.tikkosanato ekasmi.m kamme samaggabhaava.m upagatena. ^b^~natticatutthenaa^eb^ti ^a^P1.0243^ea^ tiihi anussaavanaahi ekaaya ca ~nattiyaa kaatabbena. ^b^kammenaa^eb^ti dhammikena vinayakammena. ^b^akuppenaa^eb^ti vatthu-~natti-anussaavana-siimaa-parisasampattisampannattaa akopetabbata.m appa.tikkositabbata~nca upagatena. ^b^.thaanaarahenaa^eb^ti kaara.naarahena satthusaasanaarahena. ^b^upasampanno^eb^ naama uparibhaava.m samaapanno, pattoti attho. bhikkhubhaavo hi uparibhaavo, ta~ncesa yathaavuttena kammena samaapannattaa ``upasampanno''ti vuccati. ettha ca ~natticatutthakamma.m ekameva aagata.m. imasmi.m pana .thaane .thatvaa cattaari sa"nghakammaani niiharitvaa vitthaarato kathetabbaaniiti sabbaa.t.thakathaasu vutta.m. taani ca ``apalokanakamma.m ~nattikamma.m ~nattidutiyakamma.m ~natticatutthakamma''nti pa.tipaa.tiyaa .thapetvaa vitthaarena khandhakato parivaaraavasaane kammavibha"ngato ca paa.li.m aaharitvaa kathitaani. taani maya.m ^b^parivaaraavasaane kammavibha"nge^eb^yeva va.n.nayissaama. eva~nhi sati pa.thamapaaraajikava.n.nanaa ca ^a^M1.0208^ea^ na bhaariyaa bhavissati; yathaa.thitaaya ca paa.liyaa va.n.nanaa suvi~n~neyyaa bhavissati. taani ca .thaanaani asu~n~naani bhavissanti; tasmaa anupadava.n.nanameva karoma.

[03]^b^tatraa^eb^ti tesu ``bhikkhako''tiaadinaa nayena vuttesu bhikkhuusu. ^b^yvaaya.m bhikkhuu^eb^ti yo aya.m bhikkhu. ^b^samaggena sa"nghena...pe0... upasampanno^eb^ti a.t.thasu upasampadaasu ~natticatuttheneva kammena upasampanno. ^b^aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippeto bhikkhuu^eb^ti aya.m imasmi.m ``methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitvaa paaraajiko hotii''ti atthe ``bhikkhuu''ti adhippeto. itare pana ``bhikkhako''ti aadayo atthuddhaaravasena vuttaa. tesu ca ``bhikkhako''ti aadayo niruttivasena vuttaa, ``sama~n~naaya bhikkhu, pa.ti~n~naaya bhikkhuu''ti ime dve abhilaapavasena vuttaa, ``ehi bhikkhuu''ti buddhena upajjhaayena pa.tiladdhaupasampadaavasena vutto. sara.nagamanabhikkhu anuppannaaya kammavaacaaya upasampadaavasena vutto, ``bhadro''tiaadayo gu.navasena vuttaati veditabbaa.
[06] bhikkhupadabhaajaniiya.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03]idaani ^a^V1.0192^ea^ ^b^``bhikkhuuna''^eb^nti ida.m pada.m visesatthaabhaavato avibhajitvaava ya.m sikkha~nca saajiiva~nca samaapannattaa bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno hoti, ta.m dassento ^b^sikkhaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha sikkhitabbaati ^b^sikkhaa. tisso^eb^ti ga.nanaparicchedo ^a^P1.0244^ea^. ^b^adhisiilasikkhaa^eb^ti adhika.m uttama.m siilanti adhisiila.m; adhisiila~nca ta.m sikkhitabbato sikkhaa caati adhisiilasikkhaa. esa nayo adhicitta-adhipa~n~naasikkhaasu.

[03]katama.m panettha siila.m, katama.m adhisiila.m, katama.m citta.m, katama.m adhicitta.m, katamaa pa~n~naa, katamaa adhipa~n~naati? vuccate -- pa~nca"ngadasa"ngasiila.m taava siilameva. ta~nhi buddhe uppannepi anuppannepi loke pavattati. uppanne buddhe tasmi.m siile buddhaapi saavakaapi mahaajana.m samaadapenti. anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhaa ca kammavaadino ca dhammikaa sama.nabraahma.naa cakkavattii ca mahaaraajaano mahaabodhisattaa ca samaadapenti. saamampi pa.n.ditaa sama.nabraahma.naa samaadiyanti. te ta.m kusala.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa devesu ca manussesu ca sampatti.m anubhonti. paatimokkhasa.mvarasiila.m pana ``adhisiila''nti vuccati, ta~nhi suuriyo viya pajjotaana.m sineru viya pabbataana.m sabbalokiyasiilaana.m ^a^M1.0209^ea^ adhika~nceva uttama~nca, buddhuppaadeyeva ca pavattati, na vinaa buddhuppaadaa. na hi ta.m pa~n~natti.m uddharitvaa a~n~no satto .thapetu.m sakkoti, buddhaayeva pana sabbaso kaayavaciidvaaraajjhaacaarasota.m chinditvaa tassa tassa viitikkamassa anucchavika.m ta.m siilasa.mvara.m pa~n~napenti. paatimokkhasa.mvaratopi ca maggaphalasampayuttameva siila.m adhisiila.m, ta.m pana idha anadhippeta.m. na hi ta.m samaapanno bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati.

[03]kaamaavacaraani pana a.t.tha kusalacittaani, lokiyaa.t.thasamaapatticittaani ca ekajjha.m katvaa cittamevaati veditabbaani. buddhuppaadaanuppaade cassa pavatti, samaadapana.m samaadaana~nca siile vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. vipassanaapaadaka.m a.t.thasamaapatticitta.m pana ``adhicitta''nti vuccati. ta~nhi adhisiila.m viya siilaana.m sabbalokiyacittaana.m adhika~nceva uttama~nca, buddhuppaadeyeva ca hoti, na vinaa buddhuppaadaa. tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicitta.m, ta.m pana idha anadhippeta.m. na hi ta.m samaapanno bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati.

[03]``atthi dinna.m, atthi yi.t.tha''nti (dha0 sa0 1371; vibha0 793; ma0 ni0 3.92) -aadinayappavatta.m pana kammassakata~naa.na.m pa~n~naa, saa hi buddhe uppannepi ^a^P1.0245^ea^ anuppannepi loke ^a^V1.0193^ea^ pavattati. uppanne buddhe tassaa pa~n~naaya buddhaapi buddhasaavakaapi mahaajana.m samaadapenti. anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhaa ca kammavaadino ca dhammikaa sama.nabraahma.naa cakkavattii ca mahaaraajaano mahaabodhisattaa ca samaadapenti. saamampi pa.n.ditaa sattaa samaadiyanti. tathaa hi a"nkuro dasavassasahassaani mahaadaana.m adaasi. velaamo, vessantaro, a~n~ne ca bahuu pa.n.ditamanussaa mahaadaanaani ada.msu. te ta.m kusala.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa devesu ca manussesu ca sampatti.m anubhavi.msu. tilakkha.naakaaraparicchedaka.m pana vipassanaa~naa.na.m ``adhipa~n~naa''ti vuccati. saa hi adhisiila-adhicittaani viya siilacittaana.m sabbalokiyapa~n~naana.m adhikaa ceva uttamaa ca, na ca vinaa buddhuppaadaa loke pavattati. tatopi ca maggaphalapa~n~naava adhipa~n~naa, saa pana idha anadhippetaa. na hi ta.m samaapanno bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevatiiti.

[03]^b^tatraa^eb^ti taasu tiisu sikkhaasu. ^b^yaaya.m adhisiilasikkhaa^eb^ti yaa aya.m paatimokkhasiilasa"nkhaataa adhisiilasikkhaa. ^b^eta.m saajiiva.m naamaa^eb^ti eta.m sabbampi ^a^M1.0210^ea^ bhagavataa vinaye .thapita.m sikkhaapada.m, yasmaa ettha naanaadesajaatigottaadibhedabhinnaa bhikkhuu saha jiivanti ekajiivikaa sabhaagajiivikaa sabhaagavuttino honti, tasmaa ``saajiiva''nti vuccati. ^b^tasmi.m sikkhatii^eb^ti ta.m sikkhaapada.m cittassa adhikara.na.m katvaa ``yathaasikkhaapada.m nu kho sikkhaami na sikkhaamii''ti cittena olokento sikkhati. na kevala~ncaayametasmi.m saajiivasa"nkhaate sikkhaapadeyeva sikkhati, sikkhaayapi sikkhati, ``eta.m saajiiva.m naamaa''ti imassa pana anantarassa padassa vasena ``tasmi.m sikkhatii''ti vutta.m. ki~ncaapi ta.m eva.m vutta.m, atha kho ayamettha attho da.t.thabbo -- tassaa ca sikkhaaya sikkha.m paripuurento sikkhati, tasmi~nca sikkhaapade aviitikkamanto sikkhatiiti. ^b^tena vuccati saajiivasamaapanno^eb^ti idampi anantarassa saajiivapadasseva vasena vutta.m. yasmaa pana so sikkhampi samaapanno, tasmaa sikkhaasamaapannotipi atthato veditabbo. eva~nhi sati ``sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno''ti etassa padassa padabhaajanampi paripu.n.na.m ^a^P1.0246^ea^ hoti.
[06] sikkhaasaajiivapadabhaajaniiya.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03]^b^sikkha.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0194^ea^ ^b^appaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa^eb^ti sikkha~nca appa.tikkhipitvaa dubbalabhaava~nca appakaasetvaa. yasmaa ca dubbalye aavikatepi sikkhaa appaccakkhaataava hoti, sikkhaaya pana paccakkhaataaya dubbalya.m aavikatameva hoti. tasmaa ``dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa''ti iminaa padena na koci visesattho labbhati. yathaa pana ``dirattatiratta.m sahaseyya.m kappeyyaa''ti vutte dirattavacanena na koci visesattho labbhati, kevala.m lokavohaaravasena bya~njanasili.t.thataaya mukhaaruu.lhataaya eta.m vutta.m. evamidampi vohaaravasena bya~njanasili.t.thataaya mukhaaruu.lhataaya vuttanti veditabba.m.

[03]yasmaa vaa bhagavaa saattha.m sabya~njana.m dhamma.m deseti, tasmaa ``sikkha.m appaccakkhaayaa''ti iminaa attha.m sampaadetvaa ``dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa''ti iminaa bya~njana.m sampaadeti. parivaarakapadavirahita~nhi ekameva atthapada.m vuccamaana.m parivaaravirahito raajaa viya, vatthaala"nkaaravirahito viya ca puriso na sobhati; parivaarakena pana atthaanulomena sahaayapadena saddhi.m ta.m sobhatiiti.

[03]yasmaa ^a^M1.0211^ea^ vaa sikkhaapaccakkhaanassa ekacca.m dubbalyaavikamma.m attho hoti, tasmaa ta.m sandhaaya ``sikkha.m appaccakkhaayaa''tipadassa attha.m vivaranto ``dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa''ti aaha.

[03]tattha siyaa yasmaa na sabba.m dubbalyaavikamma.m sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m, tasmaa ``dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa''ti pa.thama.m vatvaa tassa atthaniyamanattha.m ``sikkha.m appaccakkhaayaa''ti vattabbanti, ta~nca na; kasmaa? atthaanukkamaabhaavato. ``sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno''ti hi vuttattaa ya.m sikkha.m samaapanno, ta.m appaccakkhaayaati vuccamaano anukkameneva attho vutto hoti, na a~n~nathaa. tasmaa idameva pa.thama.m vuttanti.

[03]apica anupa.tipaa.tiyaapi ettha attho veditabbo. katha.m? ``sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno''ti ettha ya.m sikkha.m samaapanno ta.m appaccakkhaaya ya~nca saajiiva.m samaapanno tattha dubbalya.m anaavikatvaati.

[03]idaani ^a^V1.0195^ea^ sikkhaapaccakkhaanadubbalyaavikammaana.m visesaavisesa.m ^a^P1.0247^ea^ sikkhaapaccakkhaanalakkha.na~nca dassento ^b^``atthi bhikkhave''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^atthi bhikkhave^eb^tiaadiini dve maatikaapadaani; taani vibhajanto ^b^``katha~nca bhikkhave''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tatraaya.m anuttaanapadava.n.nanaa -- ^b^katha^eb^nti kena aakaarena. ^b^dubbalyaavikamma~ncaa^eb^ti dubbalyassa aavikamma~nca. ^b^idhaa^eb^ti imasmi.m saasane. ^b^ukka.n.thito^eb^ti anabhiratiyaa imasmi.m saasane kicchajiivikappatto. atha vaa ajja yaami, sve yaami, ito yaami, ettha yaamiiti uddha.m ka.n.tha.m katvaa viharamaano, vikkhitto anekaggoti vutta.m hoti. ^b^anabhirato^eb^ti saasane abhirativirahito.

[03]^b^saama~n~naa cavitukaamo^eb^ti sama.nabhaavato apagantukaamo. ^b^bhikkhubhaava^eb^nti bhikkhubhaavena. kara.natthe upayogavacana.m. ``ka.n.the aasattena a.t.tiiyeyyaa''tiaadiisu (paaraa0 162) pana yathaalakkha.na.m kara.navacaneneva vutta.m. ^b^a.t.tiiyamaano^eb^ti a.t.ta.m pii.lita.m dukkhita.m viya attaana.m aacaramaano; tena vaa bhikkhubhaavena a.t.to kariyamaano pii.liyamaanoti attho. ^b^haraayamaano^eb^ti lajjamaano. ^b^jigucchamaano^eb^ti asuci.m viya ta.m jigucchanto. ^b^gihibhaava.m patthayamaano^eb^tiaadiini uttaanatthaaniyeva. ^b^ya.mnuunaaha.m buddha.m paccakkheyya^eb^nti ettha ^b^ya.mnuunaa^eb^ti parivitakkadassane nipaato. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- ``sacaaha.m buddha.m paccakkheyya.m, saadhu vata me siyaa''ti. ^b^vadati vi~n~naapetii^eb^ti ^a^M1.0212^ea^ imamattha.m etehi vaa a~n~nehi vaa bya~njanehi vaciibheda.m katvaa vadati ceva, yassa ca vadati, ta.m vi~n~naapeti jaanaapeti. ^b^evampii^eb^ti uparimatthasampi.n.danatto pikaaro. evampi dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca appaccakkhaataa, a~n~nathaapi.

[03]idaani ta.m a~n~nathaapi dubbalyaavikamma.m sikkhaaya ca appaccakkhaana.m dassento ^b^``atha vaa panaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m sabba.m atthato uttaanameva. padato panettha aadito pa.t.thaaya ``buddha.m paccakkheyya.m, dhamma.m, sa"ngha.m, sikkha.m, vinaya.m, paatimokkha.m, uddesa.m, upajjhaaya.m, aacariya.m, saddhivihaarika.m, antevaasika.m, samaanupajjhaayaka.m, samaanaacariyaka.m, sabrahmacaari.m paccakkheyya''nti imaani cuddasa padaani ^a^P1.0248^ea^ paccakkhaanaakaarena vuttaani.

[03]^b^gihii assa^eb^ntiaadiini ``gihii, upaasako, aaraamiko, saama.nero, titthiyo, titthiyasaavako, assama.no, asakyaputtiyo assa''nti imaani a.t.tha padaani ``assa''nti iminaa bhaavavikappaakaarena vuttaani. eva.m ``ya.mnuunaaha''nti iminaa pa.tisa.myuttaani dvaaviisati padaani.
[03] 46^b^.^eb^ yathaa ^a^V1.0196^ea^ ca etaani, eva.m ``yadi panaaha.m, apaaha.m, handaaha.m, hoti me''ti imesu ekamekena pa.tisa.myuttaani dvaaviisatiiti sabbaaneva sata~nca dasa ca padaani honti.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ tato para.m saritabbavatthudassananayena pavattaani ``maatara.m saraamii''tiaadiini sattarasa padaani. tattha ^b^khetta^eb^nti saalikhettaadi.m. ^b^vatthu^eb^nti ti.napa.n.nasaakaphalaaphalasamu.t.thaana.t.thaana.m. ^b^sippa^eb^nti kumbhakaarapesakaarasippaadika.m.
[03] 48^b^.^eb^ tato para.m saki~ncanasapalibodhabhaavadassanavasena pavattaani ``maataa me atthi, saa mayaa posetabbaa''tiaadiini nava padaani.
[03] 49^b^.^eb^ tato para.m sanissayasappati.t.thabhaavadassanavasena pavattaani ``maataa me atthi, saa ma.m posessatii''tiaadiini so.lasa padaani.
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ tato para.m ekabhattaekaseyyabrahmacariyaana.m dukkarabhaavadassanavasena pavattaani ``dukkara''ntiaadiini a.t.tha padaani.

[03]tattha ^a^M1.0213^ea^ ^b^dukkara^eb^nti ekabhattaadiina.m kara.ne dukkarata.m dasseti. ^b^na sukara^eb^nti sukarabhaava.m pa.tikkhipati. eva.m ^b^duccara.m na sucara^eb^nti ettha. ^b^na ussahaamii^eb^ti tattha ussaahaabhaava.m asakku.neyyata.m dasseti. ^b^na visahaamii^eb^ti asayhata.m dasseti. ^b^na ramaamii^eb^ti ratiyaa abhaava.m dasseti. ^b^naabhiramaamii^eb^ti abhiratiyaa abhaava.m dasseti. eva.m imaani ca pa~n~naasa, purimaani ca dasuttarasatanti sa.t.thisata.m padaani dubbalyaavikammavaare vuttaaniiti veditabbaani.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ sikkhaapaccakkhaanavaarepi ``katha~nca bhikkhave''ti aadi sabba.m atthato uttaanameva. padato panetthaapi ``buddha.m paccakkhaami, dhamma.m, sa"ngha.m, sikkha.m, vinaya.m, paatimokkha.m, uddesa.m, upajjhaaya.m, aacariya.m, saddhivihaarika.m, antevaasika.m, samaanupajjhaayaka.m, samaanaacariyaka.m, sabrahmacaari.m paccakkhaamii''ti imaani cuddasa padaani sikkhaapaccakkhaanavacanasambandhena pavattaani. sabbapadesu ca ``vadati vi~n~naapetii''ti vacanassa ayamattho -- vaciibheda.m katvaa vadati, yassa ca vadati ta.m teneva vaciibhedena ``aya.m saasana.m jahitukaamo saasanato ^a^P1.0249^ea^ muccitukaamo bhikkhubhaava.m cajitukaamo ima.m vaakyabheda.m karotii''ti vi~n~naapeti saaveti jaanaapeti.

[03]sace ^a^V1.0197^ea^ panaaya.m ``buddha.m paccakkhaamii''ti vattukaamo padapaccaabha.t.tha.m katvaa ``paccakkhaami buddha''nti vaa vadeyya. milakkhabhaasaasu vaa a~n~natarabhaasaaya tamattha.m vadeyya. ``buddha.m paccakkhaamii''ti vattukaamo uppa.tipaa.tiyaa ``dhamma.m paccakkhaamii''ti vaa ``sabrahmacaari.m paccakkhaamii''ti vaa vadeyya, seyyathaapi uttarimanussadhammavibha"nge ``pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii''ti vattukaamo ``dutiya.m jhaana''nti vadati, sace yassa vadati so ``aya.m bhikkhubhaava.m cajitukaamo etamattha.m vadatii''ti ettakamattampi jaanaati, viraddha.m naama natthi; khettameva oti.n.na.m, paccakkhaataava hoti sikkhaa. sakkattaa vaa brahmattaa vaa cutasatto viya cutova hoti saasanaa.

[03]sace pana ``buddha.m paccakkhi''nti vaa, ``buddha.m paccakkhissaamii''ti vaa, ``buddha.m paccakkheyya''nti vaati atiitaanaagataparikappavacanehi vadati, duuta.m vaa pahi.naati, saasana.m vaa peseti, akkhara.m vaa chindati, hatthamuddaaya vaa tamattha.m aaroceti, appaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. uttarimanussadhammaarocana.m pana hatthamuddaayapi siisa.m eti. sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m manussajaatikasattassa santike cittasampayutta.m vaciibheda.m ^a^M1.0214^ea^ karontasseva siisa.m eti. vaciibheda.m katvaa vi~n~naapentopi ca yadi ``ayameva jaanaatuu''ti eka.m niyametvaa aaroceti, ta~nca soyeva jaanaati, paccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. atha so na jaanaati, a~n~no samiipe .thito jaanaati, appaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. atha dvinna.m .thita.t.thaane dvinnampi niyametvaa ``etesa.m aarocemii''ti vadati, tesu ekasmi.m jaanantepi dviisu jaanantesupi paccakkhaataava hoti sikkhaa. eva.m sambahulesupi veditabba.m.

[03]sace pana anabhiratiyaa pii.lito sabhaage bhikkhuu parisa"nkamaano ``yo koci jaanaatuu''ti uccasadda.m karonto ``buddha.m paccakkhaamii''ti vadati, ta~nca aviduure .thito navakammiko vaa a~n~no vaa samaya~n~nuu puriso sutvaa ``ukka.n.thito aya.m sama.no gihibhaava.m ^a^P1.0250^ea^ pattheti, saasanato cuto''ti jaanaati, paccakkhaataava hoti sikkhaa. ta"nkha.na~n~neva pana apubba.m acarima.m dujjaana.m, sace aavajjanasamaye jaanaati; yathaa pakatiyaa loke manussaa vacana.m sutvaa jaananti, paccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. atha aparabhaage ``ki.m iminaa vutta''nti ka"nkhanto cirena jaanaati, appaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. ida~nhi sikkhaapaccakkhaana~nca upari abhuutaarocanadu.t.thullavaacaa-attakaamadu.t.thadosabhuutaa-rocanasikkhaapadaani ca ekaparicchedaani. aavajjanasamaye ~naate eva siisa.m enti, ``ki.m aya.m bha.natii''ti ka"nkhataa ^a^V1.0198^ea^ cirena ~naate siisa.m na enti. yathaa caaya.m ``buddha.m paccakkhaamii''ti pade vinicchaye vutto; eva.m sabbapadesu veditabbo.

[03]yasmaa ca yadaa sikkhaa paccakkhaataa hoti, tadaa ``ya.mnuunaaha.m buddha.m paccakkheyya''ntiaadiini avadataapi dubbalya.m aavikatameva hoti; tasmaa sabbesa.m padaana.m avasaane vutta.m -- ^b^``evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaa ca paccakkhaataa''^eb^ti.

[03]tato para.m ^b^gihiiti ma.m dhaarehii^eb^ti ettha sacepi ``gihii bhavissaamii''ti vaa ``gihii homii''ti vaa ``gihii jaatomhii''ti vaa ``gihimhii''ti vaa vadati, appaccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. sace pana ``ajja pa.t.thaaya gihiiti ma.m dhaarehii''ti vaa ``jaanaahii''ti vaa ``sa~njaanaahii''ti vaa ``manasi karohii''ti vaa vadati, ariyakena vaa vadati milakkhakena vaa; evametasmi.m atthe vutte ^a^M1.0215^ea^ yassa vadati, sace so jaanaati, paccakkhaataa hoti sikkhaa. esa nayo sesesupi ``upaasako''tiaadiisu sattasu padesu. eva.m imaani ca a.t.tha, purimaani ca cuddasaati dvaaviisati padaani honti.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ito para.m purimaaneva cuddasa padaani ``ala.m me, kinnu me, na mamattho, sumuttaaha''nti imehi catuuhi yojetvaa vuttaani chappa~n~naasa honti. tattha ^b^ala^eb^nti hotu, pariyattanti attho. ^b^ki.mnu me^eb^ti ki.m mayha.m kicca.m, ki.m kara.niiya.m, ki.m saadhetabbanti attho. ^b^na mamattho^eb^ti natthi mama attho. ^b^sumuttaaha^eb^nti sumutto aha.m. sesamettha vuttanayameva. eva.m imaani ca chappa~n~naasa purimaani ca dvaaviisatiiti a.t.thasattati padaani saruupeneva ^a^P1.0251^ea^ vuttaani.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ yasmaa pana tesa.m vevacanehipi sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti, tasmaa ^b^``yaani vaa pana~n~naanipii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^yaani vaa pana~n~naanipii^eb^ti paa.liya.m ``buddha''ntiaadiini aagatapadaani .thapetvaa yaani a~n~naani atthi. ^b^buddhavevacanaani vaa^eb^ti buddhassa vaa pariyaayanaamaani...pe0... asakyaputtiyassa vaa. tattha va.n.napa.t.thaane aagata.m naamasahassa.m upaaligaathaasu (ma0 ni0 2.76) naamasata.m a~n~naani ca gu.nato labbhamaanaani naamaani ``buddhavevacanaanii''ti veditabbaani. sabbaanipi dhammassa naamaani dhammavevacanaaniiti veditabbaani. esa nayo sabbattha.

[03]aya.m panettha yojanaa -- ^b^buddha.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevavacanena paccakkhaana.m yathaarutameva. ``sammaasambuddha.m ^a^V1.0199^ea^ paccakkhaami, anantabuddhi.m, anomabuddhi.m, bodhipa~n~naa.na.m, dhiira.m, vigatamoha.m, pabhinnakhiila.m, vijitavijaya.m paccakkhaamii''ti evamaadibuddhavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m.

[03]^b^dhamma.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m, yathaarutameva. ``svaakkhaata.m dhamma.m paccakkhaami, sandi.t.thika.m, akaalika.m, ehipassika.m, opaneyyika.m, paccatta.m veditabba.m vi~n~nuuhi dhamma.m paccakkhaami. asa"nkhata.m dhamma.m paccakkhaami; viraaga.m, nirodha.m, amata.m dhamma.m paccakkhaami, diighanikaaya.m paccakkhaami, brahmajaala.m majjhimanikaaya.m, muulapariyaaya.m, sa.myuttanikaaya.m, oghatara.na.m, a"nguttaranikaaya.m, cittapariyaadaana.m, khuddakanikaaya.m, jaataka.m, abhidhamma.m, kusala.m dhamma.m, akusala.m dhamma.m, abyaakata.m dhamma.m, satipa.t.thaana.m, sammappadhaana.m, iddhipaada.m, indriya.m, bala.m, bojjha"nga.m, magga.m, phala.m, nibbaana.m paccakkhaamii''ti caturaasiitidhammakkhandhasahassesu ekadhammakkhandhassapi ^a^M1.0216^ea^ naama.m dhammavevacanameva. eva.m dhammavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^sa"ngha.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``suppa.tipanna.m sa"ngha.m paccakkhaami, ujuppa.tipanna.m, ~naayappa.tipanna.m, saamiicippa.tipanna.m sa"ngha.m, catupurisayuga.m sa"ngha.m, a.t.thapurisapuggala.m sa"ngha.m, aahuneyya.m sa"ngha.m, paahuneyya.m, dakkhi.neyya.m, a~njalikara.niiya.m, anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m sa"ngha.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m sa"nghavevacanena ^a^P1.0252^ea^ sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^sikkha.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``bhikkhusikkha.m paccakkhaami, bhikkhuniisikkha.m, adhisiilasikkha.m, adhicittasikkha.m, adhipa~n~naasikkha.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m sikkhaavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^vinaya.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``bhikkhuvinaya.m paccakkhaami, bhikkhuniivinaya.m, pa.thama.m paaraajika.m, dutiya.m tatiya.m catuttha.m paaraajika.m, sa"nghaadisesa.m, thullaccaya.m, paacittiya.m, paa.tidesaniiya.m, dukka.ta.m, dubbhaasita.m paccakkhaamii''ti evamaadivinayavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.
[03]^b^paatimokkha.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``bhikkhupaatimokkha.m bhikkhuniipaatimokkha.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m paatimokkhavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^uddesa.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``bhikkhupaatimokkhuddesa.m, bhikkhuniipaatimokkhuddesa.m ^a^V1.0200^ea^, pa.thama.m paatimokkhuddesa.m, dutiya.m tatiya.m catuttha.m pa~ncama.m paatimokkhuddesa.m, sammaasambuddhuddesa.m, anantabuddhiuddesa.m, anomabuddhiuddesa.m, bodhipa~n~naa.nuddesa.m, dhiiruddesa.m, vigatamohuddesa.m, pabhinnakhiiluddesa.m, vijitavijayuddesa.m paccakkhaamii''ti evamaadiuddesavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^upajjhaaya.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``yo ma.m pabbaajesi, yo ma.m upasampaadesi, yassa muulenaaha.m pabbajito, yassa muulenaaha.m upasampanno, yassamuulikaa mayha.m pabbajjaa, yassamuulikaa mayha.m upasampadaa taaha.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m upajjhaayavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^aacariya.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``yo ma.m pabbaajesi, yo ma.m anussaavesi, yaaha.m nissaaya vasaami, yaaha.m uddisaapemi, yaaha.m ^a^M1.0217^ea^ paripucchaami, yo ma.m uddisati, yo ma.m paripucchaapeti taaha.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m aacariyavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^saddhivihaarika.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``yaaha.m pabbaajesi.m, yaaha.m upasampaadesi.m, mayha.m muulena yo pabbajito, mayha.m muulena yo upasampanno, mayha.mmuulikaa yassa pabbajjaa, mayha.m muulikaa yassa upasampadaa taaha.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m saddhivihaarikavevacanena ^a^P1.0253^ea^ sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^antevaasika.m^eb^ ^b^paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``yaaha.m pabbaajesi.m, yaaha.m anussaavesi.m, yo ma.m nissaaya vasati, yo ma.m uddisaapeti, yo ma.m paripucchati, yassaaha.m uddisaami, yaaha.m paripucchaapemi ta.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m antevaasikavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^samaanupajjhaayaka.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``mayha.m upajjhaayo ya.m pabbaajesi, ya.m upasampaadesi, yo tassa muulena pabbajito, yo tassa muulena upasampanno, yassa tammuulikaa pabbajjaa, yassa tammuulikaa upasampadaa ta.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m samaanupajjhaayakavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^samaanaacariyaka.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0201^ea^ ^b^paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``mayha.m aacariyo ya.m pabbaajesi, ya.m anussaavesi, yo ta.m nissaaya vasati, yo ta.m uddisaapeti paripucchati, yassa me aacariyo uddisati, ya.m paripucchaapeti ta.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m samaanaacariyakavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^sabrahmacaari.m paccakkhaamii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``yenaaha.m saddhi.m adhisiila.m sikkhaami, adhicitta.m adhipa~n~na.m sikkhaami ta.m paccakkhaamii''ti eva.m sabrahmacaarivevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^gihiiti ma.m dhaarehii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``aagaarikoti ma.m dhaarehi, kassako, vaa.nijo, gorakkho, okallako, mo.libaddho, kaamagu.nikoti ma.m dhaarehii''ti eva.m gihivevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^upaasakoti^eb^ ^a^M1.0218^ea^ ma.m dhaarehiiti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``dvevaaciko upaasakoti ma.m dhaarehi, tevaaciko upaasako, buddha.m sara.nagamaniko, dhamma.m sa"ngha.m sara.nagamaniko, pa~ncasikkhaapadiko dasasikkhaapadiko upaasakoti ma.m dhaarehii''ti eva.m upaasakavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^aaraamikoti ma.m dhaarehii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``kappiyakaarakoti ma.m dhaarehi, veyyaavaccakaro, appaharitakaarako, yaagubhaajako, phalabhaajako, khajjakabhaajakoti ma.m dhaarehii''ti eva.m aaraamikavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^saama.neroti ma.m dhaarehii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``kumaarakoti ma.m dhaarehi, cellako, ce.tako, mo.ligallo, sama.nuddeso'ti ma.m dhaarehii''ti eva.m saama.neravecanena ^a^P1.0254^ea^ sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^titthiyoti ma.m dhaarehii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``niga.n.thoti ma.m dhaarehi, aajiivako, taapaso, paribbaajako, pa.n.dara"ngoti ma.m dhaarehii''ti eva.m titthiyavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^titthiyasaavakoti^eb^ ^a^V1.0202^ea^ ^b^ma.m dhaarehii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``niga.n.thasaavakoti ma.m dhaarehi'' aajiivaka taapasa paribbaajaka pa.n.dara"ngasaavakoti ma.m dhaarehiiti eva.m titthiyasaavakavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^assama.noti ma.m dhaarehii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``dussiiloti ma.m dhaarehi, paapadhammo, asucisa"nkassarasamaacaaro, pa.ticchannakammanto, assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no, abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no, antopuuti, avassuto, kasambujaato, ko.n.tho'ti ma.m dhaarehii''ti eva.m assama.navevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^asakyaputtiyoti ma.m dhaarehii^eb^ti na vevacanena paccakkhaana.m. ``na sammaasambuddhaputtoti ma.m dhaarehi, na anantabuddhiputto, na anomabuddhiputto, na bodhipa~n~naa.naputto, na dhiiraputto, na vigatamohaputto, na pabhinnakhiilaputto ^a^M1.0219^ea^, na vijitavijayaputtoti ma.m dhaarehii''ti evamaadiasakyaputtiyavevacanena sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m hoti.

[03]^b^tehi aakaarehi tehi li"ngehi tehi nimittehii^eb^ti tehi ``buddhavevacanaani vaa''tiaadinaa nayena vuttehi buddhaadiina.m vevacanehi. vevacanaani hi sikkhaapaccakkhaanassa kaara.nattaa ^b^aakaaraani,^eb^ buddhaadiina.m sa.n.thaanadiipanattaa sikkhaapaccakkhaanasa.n.thaanattaa eva vaa ^b^li"ngaani,^eb^ sikkhaapaccakkhaanassa sa~njaananahetuto manussaana.m tilakaadiini viya ^b^nimittaanii^eb^ti vuccanti. ^b^eva.m kho bhikkhave^eb^ti ito para.m a~n~nassa sikkhaapaccakkhaanakaara.nassa abhaavato niyamento aaha. aya~nhettha attho, evameva dubbalyaavikamma~nceva hoti sikkhaapaccakkhaana~nca, na ito para.m kaara.namatthiiti.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ eva.m sikkhaapaccakkhaanalakkha.na.m dassetvaa appaccakkhaane asammohattha.m tasseva ca sikkhaapaccakkhaanalakkha.nassa puggalaadivasena vipattidassanattha.m ^b^``katha~nca, bhikkhave, appaccakkhaataa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^yehi aakaarehii^eb^tiaadi vuttanayameva. ^b^ummattako^eb^ti yakkhummattako vaa pittummattako vaa yo koci vipariitasa~n~no, so sace paccakkhaati, appaccakkhaataa ^a^P1.0255^ea^ hoti sikkhaa. ^b^ummattakassaa^eb^ti taadisasseva ummattakassa; taadisassa hi santike sace pakatatto sikkha.m paccakkhaati, ummattako na jaanaati, appaccakkhaataava hoti sikkhaa. ^b^khittacitto^eb^ti yakkhummattako vuccati. purimapade pana ummattakasaama~n~nena vutta.m ``yakkhummattako vaa pittummattako vaa''ti. ubhinnampi viseso anaapattivaare aavi bhavissati ^a^V1.0203^ea^. eva.m khittacitto sikkha.m paccakkhaati, appaccakkhaataava hoti. tassa santike paccakkhaataapi tamhi ajaanante appaccakkhaataava hoti.

[03]^b^vedanaa.t.to^eb^ti balavatiyaa dukkhavedanaaya phu.t.tho mucchaapareto; tena vilapantena paccakkhaataapi appaccakkhaataava hoti. tassa santike paccakkhaataapi tamhi ajaanante appaccakkhaataa hoti.

[03]^b^devataaya santike^eb^ti bhummadevata.m aadi.m katvaa yaava akani.t.thadevataaya santike paccakkhaataapi appaccakkhaataava hoti. ^b^tiracchaanagatassaa^eb^ti naagamaa.navakassa vaa supa.n.namaa.navakassa vaa kinnara-hatthi-makka.taadiina.m vaa yassa kassaci santike paccakkhaataapi appaccakkhaataava hoti ^a^M1.0220^ea^. tatra ummattakaadiina.m santike ajaananabhaavena appaccakkhaataati aaha. devataaya santike atikhippa.m jaananabhaavena. devataa naama mahaapa~n~naa tihetukapa.tisandhikaa atikhippa.m jaananti, citta~nca naameta.m lahuparivatta.m. tasmaa cittalahukassa puggalassa cittavaseneva ``maa atikhippa.m vinaaso ahosii''ti devataaya santike sikkhaapaccakkhaana.m pa.tikkhipi.

[03]manussesu pana niyamo natthi. yassa kassaci sabhaagassa vaa visabhaagassa vaa gaha.t.thassa vaa pabbajitassa vaa vi~n~nussa santike paccakkhaataa paccakkhaataava hoti. sace pana so na jaanaati, appaccakkhaataava hotiiti etamattha.m dassento ^b^``ariyakenaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^ariyaka.m^eb^ naama ariyavohaaro, maagadhabhaasaa. ^b^milakkhaka.m^eb^ naama yo koci anariyako andhadami.laadi. ^b^so ca na pa.tivijaanaatii^eb^ti bhaasantare vaa anabhi~n~nataaya, buddhasamaye vaa akovidataaya ``ida.m naama attha.m esa bha.natii''ti nappa.tivijaanaati. ^b^davaayaa^eb^ti sahasaa a~n~na.m bha.nitukaamo sahasaa ``buddha.m paccakkhaamii''ti bha.nati. ^b^ravaayaa^eb^ti ravaabha~n~nena, ``a~n~na.m bha.nissaamii''ti a~n~na.m bha.nanto. purimena ^a^P1.0256^ea^ ko visesoti ce? purima.m pa.n.ditassaapi sahasaavasena a~n~nabha.nana.m. ida.m pana mandattaa momuuhattaa apakata~n~nuttaa pakkhalantassa ``a~n~na.m bha.nissaamii''ti a~n~nabha.nana.m.

[03]^b^asaavetukaamo saavetii^eb^ti imassa sikkhaapadassa paa.li.m vaaceti paripucchati ugga.nhaati sajjhaaya.m karoti va.n.neti, aya.m vuccati ``asaavetukaamo saavetii''ti. ^b^saavetukaamo na saavetii^eb^ti dubbalabhaava.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhanto vaciibheda.m na karoti, aya.m vuccati ``saavetukaamo ^a^V1.0204^ea^ na saavetii''ti. ^b^avi~n~nussa saavetii^eb^ti mahallakassa vaa potthakaruupasadisassa, garumedhassa vaa samaye akovidassa, gaamadaarakaana.m vaa avi~n~nuta.m pattaana.m saaveti. ^b^vi~n~nussa na saavetii^eb^ti pa.n.ditassa ~naatu.m samatthassa na saaveti. ^b^sabbaso vaa panaa^eb^ti ``buddha.m paccakkhaamii''tiaadiisu yena yena pariyaayena sikkhaa paccakkhaataa hoti, tato ekampi vaciibheda.m katvaa na saaveti. ^b^eva.m kho^eb^ti appaccakkhaanalakkha.na.m niyameti. aya.m hettha attho -- ``evameva sikkhaa appaccakkhaataa hoti, na a~n~nena kaara.nenaa''ti.
[06] sikkhaapaccakkhaanavibha"nga.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ idaani ^a^M1.0221^ea^ ^b^``methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tiseveyyaa^eb^''tiaadiina.m atthadassanattha.m ^b^``methunadhammo naamaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^tattha methunadhammo naamaa^eb^ti ida.m niddisitabbassa methunadhammassa uddesapada.m. ^b^asaddhammo^eb^ti asata.m niicajanaana.m dhammo. ^b^gaamadhammo^eb^ti gaamavaasiina.m sevanadhammo. ^b^vasaladhammo^eb^ti vasalaana.m dhammo; kilesavassanato vaa sayameva vasalo dhammoti vasaladhammo. ^b^du.t.thulla^eb^nti du.t.thu~nca kilesehi du.t.thattaa, thuula~nca anipu.nabhaavatoti du.t.thulla.m. ito pa.t.thaaya ca tiisu padesu ``yo so''ti ida.m parivattetvaa ``ya.m ta''nti katvaa yojetabba.m -- ``ya.m ta.m du.t.thulla.m, ya.m ta.m odakantika.m, ya.m ta.m rahassa''nti. ettha ca yasmaa tassa kammassa parivaarabhuuta.m dassanampi gaha.nampi aamasanampi phusanampi gha.t.tanampi du.t.thulla.m, tasmaapi ta.m kamma.m du.t.thulla.m. ya.m ta.m du.t.thulla.m so methunadhammo. udaka.m assa ante suddhattha.m aadiiyatiiti udakanta.m, udakantameva odakantika.m; ya.m ta.m odakantika.m ^a^P1.0257^ea^, so methunadhammo. raho pa.ticchanne okaase kattabbataaya rahassa.m. ya.m ta.m rahassa.m, so methunadhammoti eva.m yojanaa veditabbaa.

[03]dvayena dvayena samaapajjitabbato ^b^dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti^eb^. tattha yojanaa -- ``yaa saa dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti so methunadhammo naamaa''ti. idha pana ta.m sabba.m ekajjha.m nigamento aaha ^b^``eso methunadhammo naamaa''^eb^ti. ki.m kaara.naa vuccati methunadhammoti? ubhinna.m rattaana.m saarattaana.m avassutaana.m pariyu.t.thitaana.m ubhinna.m sadisaana.m dhammoti, ta.m kaara.naa vuccati methunadhammoti.

[03]^b^pa.tisevati naamaa^eb^ti ida.m ``pa.tiseveyyaa''ti ettha yenaakaarena pa.tiseveyyaati vuccati, tassaakaarassa dassanattha.m maatikaapada.m. ^b^yo nittena nimitta^eb^ntiaadiisu yo bhikkhu itthiyaa nimittena ^a^V1.0205^ea^ attano nimitta.m, itthiyaa a"ngajaatena attano a"ngajaata.m sabbantimena pamaa.nena ekatilabiijamattampi vaatena asamphu.t.the allokaase paveseti, eso pa.tisevati naama; ettakena siilabheda.m paapu.naati, paaraajiko hoti.

[03]ettha ca itthinimitte cattaari passaani, vemajjha~ncaati pa~nca .thaanaani labbhanti. purisanimitte cattaari passaani, majjha.m, uparicaati cha. tasmaa itthinimitte he.t.thaa pavesentopi paaraajiko hoti. uparito pavesentopi, ubhohi passehi ^a^M1.0222^ea^ pavesentopi cattaari .thaanaani mu~ncitvaa majjhena pavesentopi paaraajiko hoti. purisanimitta.m pana he.t.thaabhaagena chupanta.m pavesentopi paaraajiko hoti. uparibhaagena chupanta.m pavesentopi, ubhohi passehi chupanta.m pavesentopi, majjheneva chupanta.m pavesentopi sama~nchita"nguli.m viya majjhimapabbapi.t.thiyaa sa"nkocetvaa uparibhaagena chupanta.m pavesentopi paaraajiko hoti. tattha tulaada.n.dasadisa.m pavesentassaapi cattaari passaani, majjha~ncaati pa~nca .thaanaani; sa"nkocetvaa pavesentassaapi cattaari passaani, uparibhaagamajjha~ncaati pa~nca .thaanaani -- eva.m sabbaanipi purisanimitte dasa .thaanaani honti.

[03]nimitte jaata.m ana.t.thakaayappasaada.m cammakhiila.m vaa pi.laka.m vaa paveseti, aapatti paaraajikassa. na.t.thakaayappasaada.m matacamma.m vaa sukkhapi.laka.m vaa paveseti, aapatti ^a^P1.0258^ea^ dukka.tassa. methunassaadena loma.m vaa a"nguli-a"ngu.t.thabiijaadiini vaa pavesentassaapi dukka.tameva. aya~nca methunakathaa naama yasmaa du.t.thullaa kathaa asabbhikathaa, tasmaa eta.m vaa a~n~na.m vaa vinaye iidisa.m .thaana.m kathentena pa.tikkuulamanasikaara~nca sama.nasa~n~na~nca hirottappa~nca paccupa.t.thapetvaa sammaasambuddhe gaarava.m uppaadetvaa asamakaaru.nikassa lokanaathassa karu.naagu.na.m aavajjetvaa kathetabba.m. so hi naama bhagavaa sabbaso kaamehi vinivattamaanasopi sattaanuddayaaya lokaanukampaaya sattesu kaaru~n~nata.m pa.ticca sikkhaapadapa~n~naapanatthaaya iidisa.m katha.m kathesi. ``aho satthu karu.naagu.no''ti eva.m lokanaathassa karu.naagu.na.m aavajjetvaa kathetabba.m.
[06] apica yadi bhagavaa sabbaakaarena iidisa.m katha.m na katheyya, ko jaaneyya ``ettakesu

[03] .thaanesu paaraajika.m, ettakesu thullaccaya.m, ettakesu dukka.ta''nti. tasmaa su.nantenapi kathentenapi biijakena mukha.m apidhaaya dantavida.msaka.m hasamaanena na nisiiditabba.m. ``sammaasambuddhenaapi iidisa.m kathita''nti paccavekkhitvaa gabbhitena hirottappasampannena satthupa.tibhaagena hutvaa kathetabbanti.
[06] muulapa~n~natta.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03]anupa~n~nattivaare ^a^V1.0206^ea^ -- ^b^antamaso^eb^ti sabbantimena paricchedena. ^b^tiracchaanagataayapii^eb^ti pa.tisandhivasena tiracchaanesu gataayapi. ^b^pageva manussitthiyaa^eb^ti pa.thamatara.m manussajaatikaaya itthiyaa. paaraajikavatthubhuutaa eva cettha tiracchaanagatitthii tiracchaanagataati gahetabbaa, na sabbaa. tatraaya.m paricchedo --
[21] apadaana.m ahi macchaa, dvipadaana~nca kukku.tii.
[22] catuppadaana.m majjaarii, vatthu paaraajikassimaati..
