[03]ya~nceta.m ^b^mahaaa.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ vutta.m, ta.m paa.liyaa viruddhamiva dissati. paa.liya~nhi -- ``gharuupacaare .thitassa majjhimassa purisassa le.d.dupaato''ti ettakameva vutta.m. a.t.thakathaaya.m pana ta.m le.d.dupaata.m gaamasa"nkhepa.m katvaa tato para.m gaamuupacaaro vuttoti? vuccate -- saccameva paa.liya.m vutta.m ^a^V1.0240^ea^, adhippaayo panettha veditabbo. so ca a.t.thakathaacariyaanameva vidito. tasmaa yathaa ``gharuupacaare .thitassaa''ti ettha gharuupacaaralakkha.na.m paa.liya.m avuttampi a.t.thakathaaya.m vuttavasena gahita.m. eva.m sesampi gahetabba.m.

[03]tatraaya.m nayo -- idha gaamo naama duvidho hoti -- parikkhitto ca aparikkhitto ca. tatra parikkhittassa parikkhepoyeva paricchedo. tasmaa tassa visu.m pariccheda.m avatvaa ``gaamuupacaaro naama parikkhittassa gaamassa indakhiile .thitassa majjhimassa purisassa le.d.dupaato''ti paa.liya.m vutta.m. aparikkhittassa pana gaamassa gaamaparicchedo vattabbo. tasmaa tassa gaamaparicchedadassanattha.m ``aparikkhittassa gaamassa gharuupacaare .thitassa majjhimassa purisassa le.d.dupaato''ti vutta.m. gaamaparicchede ca dassite gaamuupacaaralakkha.na.m pubbe vuttanayeneva sakkaa ~naatunti puna ``tattha .thitassa majjhimassa purisassa le.d.dupaato''ti na vutta.m. yo pana gharuupacaare .thitassa le.d.dupaata.myeva ``gaamuupacaaro''ti vadati, tassa gharuupacaaro gaamoti aapajjati. tato ghara.m, gharuupacaaro, gaamo ^a^P2.0301^ea^, gaamuupacaaroti esa vibhaago sa"nkariiyati. asa"nkarato cettha vinicchayo veditabbo vikaale gaamappavesanaadiisu. tasmaa paa.li~nca a.t.thakatha~nca sa.msanditvaa vuttanayenevettha gaamo ca gaamuupacaaro ca veditabbo. yopi ca gaamo pubbe mahaa hutvaa pacchaa kulesu na.t.thesu appako hoti, so gharuupacaarato le.d.dupaateneva paricchinditabbo. purimaparicchedo panassa parikkhittassaapi aparikkhittassaapi appamaa.namevaati.

[03]^b^ara~n~na.m naama .thapetvaa gaama~nca gaamuupacaara~ncaa^eb^ti ima.m yathaavuttalakkha.na.m gaama~nca gaamuupacaara~nca .thapetvaa imasmi.m adinnaadaanasikkhaapade avasesa.m ``ara~n~na.m'' ^a^M1.0261^ea^ naamaati veditabba.m. abhidhamme pana ``ara~n~nanti nikkhamitvaa bahi indakhiilaa sabbameta.m ara~n~na''nti (vibha0 529) vutta.m. aara~n~nakasikkhaapade ``aara~n~naka.m naama senaasana.m pa~ncadhanusatika.m pacchima''nti (paaraa0 654) vutta.m. ta.m indakhiilato pa.t.thaaya aaropitena aacariyadhanunaa pa~ncadhanusatappamaa.nanti veditabba.m. eva.m bhagavataa ``gaamaa vaa ara~n~naa vaa''ti etassa attha.m vibhajantena ``ghara.m, gharuupacaaro, gaamo, gaamuupacaaro ara~n~na''nti paapabhikkhuuna.m lesokaasanisedhanattha.m pa~nca ko.t.thaasaa dassitaa. tasmaa ghare vaa gharuupacaare vaa gaame vaa gaamuupacaare vaa ara~n~ne vaa paadagghanakato pa.t.thaaya sassaamika.m bha.n.da.m avaharantassa paaraajikamevaati veditabba.m.

[03]idaani ^a^V1.0241^ea^ ``adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyeyyaa''tiaadiina.m atthadassanattha.m ^b^``adinna.m naamaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^adinna^eb^nti dantaponasikkhaapade attano santakampi appa.tiggahitaka.m kappiya.m ajjhohara.niiya.m vuccati. idha pana ya.mki~nci parapariggahita.m sassaamika.m bha.n.da.m, tadeta.m tehi saamikehi kaayena vaa vaacaaya vaa na dinnanti adinna.m. attano hatthato vaa yathaa.thita.t.thaanato vaa na nissa.t.thanti ^b^anissa.t.tha.m^eb^. yathaa.thaane .thitampi anapekkhataaya na pariccattanti ^b^apariccatta.m^eb^. aarakkhasa.mvidhaanena rakkhitattaa ^b^rakkhita.m^eb^. ma~njuusaadiisu pakkhipitvaa gopitattaa ^b^gopita.m^eb^. ``mama ida''nti ta.nhaamamattena mamaayitattaa ^b^mamaayita.m^eb^. taahi apariccaagarakkha.nagopanaahi ^a^P2.0302^ea^ tehi bha.n.dasaamikehi parehi pariggahitanti ^b^parapariggahita.m^eb^. eta.m adinna.m naama.

[03]theyyasa"nkhaatanti ettha ^b^theno^eb^ti coro, thenassa bhaavo ^b^theyya.m^eb^; avahara.nacittasseta.m adhivacana.m. ``sa"nkhaa, sa"nkhaata''nti atthato eka.m; ko.t.thaasasseta.m adhivacana.m, ``sa~n~naanidaanaa hi papa~ncasa"nkhaa''tiaadiisu (su0 ni0 880) viya. theyya~nca ta.m sa"nkhaata~ncaati ^b^theyyasa"nkhaata.m,^eb^ theyyacittasa"nkhaato eko cittako.t.thaasoti attho. kara.natthe ceta.m paccattavacana.m, tasmaa theyyasa"nkhaatenaati atthato da.t.thabba.m. yo ca theyyasa"nkhaatena aadiyati, so yasmaa theyyacitto hoti, tasmaa bya~njana.m anaadiyitvaa atthameva dassetu.m ^b^theyyacitto avahara.nacitto^eb^ti evamassa padabhaajana.m vuttanti veditabba.m.

[03]^b^aadiyeyya^eb^ ^a^M1.0262^ea^^b^, hareyya, avahareyya, iriyaapatha.m vikopeyya, .thaanaa caaveyya, sa"nketa.m viitinaameyyaa^eb^ti ettha pana pa.thamapada.m abhiyogavasena vutta.m, dutiyapada.m a~n~nesa.m bha.n.da.m harantassa gacchato vasena, tatiyapada.m upanikkhittabha.n.davasena, catuttha.m savi~n~naa.nakavasena, pa~ncama.m thale nikkhittaadivasena, cha.t.tha.m parikappavasena vaa su"nkaghaatavasena vaa vuttanti veditabba.m. yojanaa panettha ekabha.n.davasenapi naanaabha.n.davasenapi hoti. ekabha.n.davasena ca savi~n~naa.nakeneva labbhati, naanaabha.n.davasena savi~n~naa.nakaavi~n~naa.nakamissakena.

[03]tattha naanaabha.n.davasena taava eva.m veditabba.m -- ^b^aadiyeyyaa^eb^ti aaraama.m abhiyu~njati, aapatti dukka.tassa. saamikassa vimati.m uppaadeti, aapatti thullaccayassa. saamiko ``na mayha.m bhavissatii''ti dhura.m nikkhipati, aapatti paaraajikassa.

[03]^b^hareyyaa^eb^ti ^a^V1.0242^ea^ a~n~nassa bha.n.da.m haranto siise bhaara.m theyyacitto aamasati, aapatti dukka.tassa. phandaapeti, aapatti thullaccayassa. khandha.m oropeti, aapatti paaraajikassa.

[03]^b^avahareyyaa^eb^ti upanikkhitta.m bha.n.da.m ``dehi me bha.n.da''nti vuccamaano ``naaha.m ga.nhaamii''ti bha.nati, aapatti dukka.tassa. saamikassa vimati.m uppaadeti, aapatti thullaccayassa. saamiko ``na mayha.m dassatii''ti dhura.m nikkhipati, aapatti paaraajikassa ^a^P2.0303^ea^.
[03]^b^iriyaapatha.m^eb^ ^b^vikopeyyaa^eb^ti ``sahabha.n.dahaaraka.m nessaamii''ti pa.thama.m paada.m sa"nkaameti, aapatti thullaccayassa. dutiya.m paada.m sa"nkaameti, aapatti paaraajikassa.
[03]^b^.thaanaa caaveyyaa^eb^ti thala.t.tha.m bha.n.da.m theyyacitto aamasati, aapatti dukka.tassa. phandaapeti, aapatti thullaccayassa. .thaanaa caaveti, aapatti paaraajikassa.

[03]^b^sa"nketa.m viitinaameyyaa^eb^ti parikappita.t.thaana.m pa.thama.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti thullaccayassa. dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti paaraajikassa. atha vaa pa.thama.m paada.m su"nkaghaata.m atikkaameti, aapatti thullaccayassa. dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti paaraajikassaati -- ayamettha naanaabha.n.davasena yojanaa.

[03]ekabha.n.davasena ^a^M1.0263^ea^ pana sassaamika.m daasa.m vaa tiracchaana.m vaa yathaavuttena abhiyogaadinaa nayena aadiyati vaa harati vaa avaharati vaa iriyaapatha.m vaa vikopeti, .thaanaa vaa caaveti, pariccheda.m vaa atikkaameti -- ayamettha ekabha.n.davasena yojanaa.

[03]apica imaani cha padaani va.n.nentena pa~nca pa~ncake samodhaanetvaa pa~ncaviisati avahaaraa dassetabbaa. eva.m va.n.nayataa hi ida.m adinnaadaanapaaraajika.m suva.n.nita.m hoti. imasmi~nca .thaane sabbaa.t.thakathaa aakulaa lu.litaa duvi~n~neyyavinicchayaa. tathaa hi sabbaa.t.thakathaasu yaani taani paa.liya.m ``pa~ncahaakaarehi adinna.m aadiyantassa aapatti paaraajikassa, parapariggahita~nca hotii''tiaadinaa nayena avahaara"ngaani vuttaani, taanipi gahetvaa katthaci eka.m pa~ncaka.m dassita.m, katthaci ``chahaakaarehii''ti aagatehi saddhi.m dve pa~ncakaani ^a^V1.0243^ea^ dassitaani. etaani ca pa~ncakaani na honti. yattha hi ekekena padena avahaaro sijjhati, ta.m pa~ncaka.m naama vuccati. ettha pana sabbehipi padehi ekoyeva avahaaro. yaani ca tattha labbhamaanaaniyeva pa~ncakaani dassitaani, tesampi na sabbesa.m attho pakaasito. evamimasmi.m .thaane sabbaa.t.thakathaa aakulaa lu.litaa duvi~n~neyyavinicchayaa. tasmaa ^b^pa~nca pa~ncake^eb^samodhaanetvaa dassiyamaanaa ime ^b^pa~ncaviisati avahaaraa^eb^ saadhuka.m sallakkhetabbaa.

[03]^b^pa~nca pa~ncakaani^eb^ naama -- naanaabha.n.dapa~ncaka.m, ekabha.n.dapa~ncaka.m, saahatthikapa~ncaka.m, pubbapayogapa~ncaka.m ^a^P2.0304^ea^, theyyaavahaarapa~ncakanti. tattha naanaabha.n.dapa~ncaka~nca ekabha.n.dapa~ncaka~nca ``aadiyeyya, hareyya, avahareyya, iriyaapatha.m vikopeyya, .thaanaa caaveyyaa''ti imesa.m padaana.m vasena labbhanti. taani pubbe yojetvaa dassitanayeneva veditabbaani. ya.m paneta.m ``sa"nketa.m viitinaameyyaa''ti cha.t.tha.m pada.m, ta.m parikappaavahaarassa ca nissaggiyaavahaarassa ca saadhaara.na.m. tasmaa ta.m tatiyapa~ncamesu pa~ncakesu labbhamaanapadavasena yojetabba.m. vutta.m naanaabha.n.dapa~ncaka~nca ekabha.n.dapa~ncaka~nca.

[03]katama.m saahatthikapa~ncaka.m? pa~nca avahaaraa -- saahatthiko, aa.nattiko, nissaggiyo, atthasaadhako, dhuranikkhepoti. tattha ^b^saahatthiko^eb^ naama parassa bha.n.da.m sahatthaa avaharati. ^b^aa.nattiko^eb^ naama ``asukassa bha.n.da.m ^a^M1.0264^ea^^b^ avaharaa''ti a~n~na.m aa.naapeti. nissaggiyo^eb^ naama antosu"nkaghaate .thito bahisu"nkaghaata.m paateti, aapatti paaraajikassaati, iminaa ca saddhi.m ``sa"nketa.m viitinaameyyaa''ti ida.m padayojana.m labhati. ^b^atthasaadhako^eb^ naama ``asuka.m naama bha.n.da.m yadaa sakkosi, tadaa avaharaa''ti aa.naapeti. tattha sace paro anantaraayiko hutvaa ta.m avaharati, aa.naapako aa.nattikkha.neyeva paaraajiko hoti, avahaarako pana avaha.takaale. aya.m atthasaadhako. ^b^dhuranikkhepo^eb^ pana upanikkhittabha.n.davasena veditabbo. ida.m saahatthikapa~ncaka.m.

[03]katama.m pubbapayogapa~ncaka.m? aparepi pa~nca avahaaraa -- pubbapayogo, sahapayogo, sa.mvidaavahaaro, sa"nketakamma.m, nimittakammanti. tattha aa.nattivasena ^b^pubbapayogo^eb^ veditabbo. .thaanaa caavanavasena ^b^sahapayogo^eb^. itare pana tayo paa.liya.m (paaraa0 118-120) aagatanayeneva veditabbaati. ida.m pubbapayogapa~ncaka.m.

[03]katama.m theyyaavahaarapa~ncaka.m? aparepi pa~nca avahaaraa -- theyyaavahaaro, pasayhaavahaaro, parikappaavahaaro ^a^V1.0244^ea^, pa.ticchannaavahaaro, kusaavahaaroti. te pa~ncapi ``a~n~nataro bhikkhu sa"nghassa ciivare bhaajiyamaane theyyacitto kusa.m sa"nkaametvaa ciivara.m aggahesii''ti (paaraa0 138) etasmi.m kusasa"nkaamanavatthusmi.m va.n.nayissaama. ida.m theyyaavahaarapa~ncaka.m. evamimaani pa~nca pa~ncakaani samodhaanetvaa ime pa~ncaviisati avahaaraa veditabbaa.
[03]imesu ca pana pa~ncasu pa~ncakesu kusalena vinayadharena oti.n.na.m vatthu.m sahasaa avinicchinitvaava ^a^P2.0305^ea^ ^b^pa~nca .thaanaani^eb^ oloketabbaani. yaani sandhaaya poraa.naa aahu --
[21] ``vatthu.m kaala~nca desa~nca, aggha.m paribhogapa~ncama.m.
[22] tulayitvaa pa~nca .thaanaani, dhaareyyattha.m vicakkha.no''ti..

[03]tattha ^b^vatthu^eb^nti bha.n.da.m; avahaarakena hi ``mayaa ida.m naama avaha.ta''nti vuttepi aapatti.m anaaropetvaava ta.m bha.n.da.m sassaamika.m vaa assaamika.m vaati upaparikkhitabba.m. sassaamikepi saamikaana.m saalayabhaavo vaa niraalayabhaavo vaa upaparikkhitabbo. sace tesa.m saalayakaale avaha.ta.m, bha.n.da.m agghaapetvaa aapatti kaatabbaa. sace niraalayakaale ^a^M1.0265^ea^, na paaraajikena kaaretabbo. bha.n.dasaamikesu pana bha.n.da.m aaharaapentesu bha.n.da.m daatabba.m. ayamettha saamiici.

[03]imassa panatthassa diipanatthamida.m vatthu -- bhaatiyaraajakaale kira mahaacetiyapuujaaya dakkhi.nadisato eko bhikkhu sattahattha.m pa.n.dukaasaava.m a.mse karitvaa cetiya"nga.na.m paavisi; ta"nkha.nameva ca raajaapi cetiyavandanattha.m aagato. tattha ussaara.naaya vattamaanaaya mahaajanasammaddo ahosi. atha so bhikkhu janasammaddapii.lito a.msato patanta.m kaasaava.m adisvaava nikkhanto; nikkhamitvaa ca kaasaava.m apassanto ``ko iidise janasammadde kaasaava.m lacchati, na daani ta.m mayha''nti dhuranikkhepa.m katvaa gato. atha~n~no bhikkhu pacchaa aagacchanto ta.m kaasaava.m disvaa theyyacittena gahetvaa puna vippa.tisaarii hutvaa ``assama.no daanimhi, vibbhamissaamii''ti citte uppannepi ``vinayadhare pucchitvaa ~nassaamii''ti cintesi.

[03]tena ca samayena cuu.lasumanatthero naama sabbapariyattidharo vinayaacariyapaamokkho mahaavihaare pa.tivasati. so bhikkhu thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa okaasa.m kaaretvaa attano kukkucca.m pucchi. thero tena bha.t.the ^a^P2.0306^ea^ janakaaye pacchaa aagantvaa gahitabhaava.m ~natvaa ``atthi daani ettha okaaso''ti cintetvaa aaha -- ``sace kaasaavasaamika.m bhikkhu.m aaneyyaasi, sakkaa ^a^V1.0245^ea^ bhaveyya tava pati.t.thaa kaatu''nti. ``kathaaha.m, bhante, ta.m dakkhissaamii''ti? ``tahi.m tahi.m gantvaa olokehii''ti. so pa~ncapi mahaavihaare oloketvaa neva addakkhi. tato na.m thero pucchi -- ``kataraaya disaaya bahuu bhikkhuu aagacchantii''ti? ``dakkhi.nadisaaya, bhante''ti. ``tena hi kaasaava.m diighato ca tiriya~nca minitvaa .thapehi. .thapetvaa dakkhi.nadisaaya vihaarapa.tipaa.tiyaa vicinitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m aanehii''ti. so tathaa katvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m disvaa therassa santika.m aanesi. thero pucchi -- ``taveda.m kaasaava''nti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``kuhi.m te paatita''nti? so sabba.m aacikkhi. thero pana tena kata.m dhuranikkhepa.m sutvaa itara.m pucchi -- ``tayaa ida.m kuhi.m disvaa gahita''nti? sopi sabba.m aarocesi. tato na.m thero aaha -- ``sace te suddhacittena gahita.m abhavissa, anaapattiyeva te assa. theyyacittena pana gahitattaa dukka.ta.m aapannosi. ta.m desetvaa anaapattiko hohi. ida~nca kaasaava.m attano ^a^M1.0266^ea^ santaka.m katvaa etasseva bhikkhuno dehii''ti. so bhikkhu amateneva abhisitto paramassaasappatto ahosiiti. eva.m vatthu oloketabba.m.

[03]^b^kaalo^eb^ti avahaarakaalo. tadeva hi bha.n.da.m kadaaci samaggha.m hoti, kadaaci mahaggha.m. tasmaa ta.m bha.n.da.m yasmi.m kaale avaha.ta.m, tasmi.myeva kaale yo tassa aggho hoti, tena agghena aapatti kaaretabbaa. eva.m kaalo oloketabbo.

[03]^b^deso^eb^ti avahaaradeso. ta~nhi bha.n.da.m yasmi.m dese avaha.ta.m, tasmi.myeva dese yo tassa aggho hoti, tena agghena aapatti kaaretabbaa. bha.n.du.t.thaanadese hi bha.n.da.m samaggha.m hoti, a~n~nattha mahaggha.m.

[03]imassaapi ca atthassa diipanatthamida.m vatthu -- antarasamudde kira eko bhikkhu susa.n.thaana.m naa.likera.m labhitvaa bhama.m aaropetvaa sa"nkhathaalakasadisa.m manorama.m paaniiyathaalaka.m katvaa tattheva .thapetvaa cetiyagiri.m agamaasi. atha~n~no bhikkhu antarasamudda.m gantvaa tasmi.m vihaare pa.tivasanto ta.m thaalaka.m disvaa theyyacittena gahetvaa cetiyagirimeva aagato. tassa tattha yaagu.m pivantassa ta.m ^a^P2.0307^ea^ thaalaka.m disvaa thaalakasaamiko bhikkhu aaha -- ``kuto te ida.m laddha''nti? ``antarasamuddato me aaniita''nti. so ta.m ``neta.m tava santaka.m, theyyaaya te gahita''nti sa"nghamajjha.m aaka.d.dhi. tattha ca vinicchaya.m alabhitvaa mahaavihaara.m agami.msu. tattha bheri.m paharaapetvaa mahaacetiyasamiipe sannipaata.m katvaa vinicchaya.m aarabhi.msu. vinayadharattheraa avahaara.m sa~n~naapesu.m.

[03]tasmi~nca ^a^V1.0246^ea^ sannipaate aabhidhammikagodattatthero naama vinayakusalo hoti. so evamaaha -- ``iminaa ida.m thaalaka.m kuhi.m avaha.ta''nti? ``antarasamudde avaha.ta''nti. ``tatrida.m ki.m agghatii''ti? ``na ki~nci agghati. tatra hi naa.likera.m bhinditvaa mi~nja.m khaaditvaa kapaala.m cha.d.denti, daaruattha.m pana pharatii''ti. ``imassa bhikkhuno ettha hatthakamma.m ki.m agghatii''ti? ``maasaka.m vaa uunamaasaka.m vaa''ti. ``atthi pana katthaci sammaasambuddhena maasakena vaa uunamaasakena vaa paaraajika.m pa~n~natta''nti. eva.m vutte ``saadhu! saadhu! sukathita.m suvinicchita''nti ekasaadhukaaro ahosi. tena ca samayena bhaatiyaraajaapi cetiyavandanattha.m nagarato nikkhamanto ta.m sadda.m sutvaa ``ki.m ida''nti pucchitvaa sabba.m pa.tipaa.tiyaa sutvaa nagare bheri.m caraapesi -- ``mayi sante bhikkhuunampi bhikkhuuniinampi ^a^M1.0267^ea^ gihiinampi adhikara.na.m aabhidhammikagodattattherena vinicchita.m suvinicchita.m, tassa vinicchaye ati.t.thamaana.m raajaa.naaya .thapemii''ti. eva.m deso oloketabbo.

[03]^b^aggho^eb^ti bha.n.daggho. navabha.n.dassa hi yo aggho hoti, so pacchaa parihaayati; yathaa navadhoto patto a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa agghati, so pacchaa bhinno vaa chiddo vaa aa.niga.n.thikaahato vaa appaggho hoti tasmaa na sabbadaa bha.n.da.m pakatiaggheneva kaatabbanti. eva.m aggho oloketabbo.

[03]^b^paribhogo^eb^ti bha.n.daparibhogo. paribhogenaapi hi vaasiaadibha.n.dassa aggho parihaayati. tasmaa eva.m upaparikkhitabba.m, sace koci kassaci paadagghanaka.m vaasi.m harati, tatra vaasisaamiko pucchitabbo ^a^P2.0308^ea^ -- ``tayaa aya.m vaasi kittakena kiitaa''ti? ``paadena, bhante''ti. ``ki.m pana te ki.nitvaava .thapitaa, udaahu ta.m va.la~njesii''ti? sace vadati ``ekadivasa.m me dantaka.t.tha.m vaa rajanachalli.m vaa pattapacanakadaaru.m vaa chinna.m, gha.msitvaa vaa nisitaa''ti. athassaa poraa.no aggho bha.t.thoti veditabbo. yathaa ca vaasiyaa eva.m a~njaniyaa vaa a~njanisalaakaaya vaa ku~ncikaaya vaa palaalena vaa thusehi vaa i.t.thakacu.n.nena vaa ekavaara.m gha.msitvaa dhovanamattenaapi aggho bhassati. tipuma.n.dalassa makaradantacchedanenaapi parimajjitamattenaapi, udakasaa.tikaaya saki.m nivaasanapaarupanenaapi paribhogasiisena a.mse vaa siise vaa .thapanamattenaapi, ta.n.dulaadiina.m pappho.tanenaapi tato eka.m vaa dve vaa apanayanenaapi, antamaso eka.m paasaa.nasakkhara.m uddharitvaa cha.d.ditamattenaapi, sappitelaadiina.m bhaajanantarapaavattanenaapi, antamaso tato makkhika.m vaa kipillika.m vaa uddharitvaa cha.d.ditamattenaapi, gu.lapi.n.dakassa madhurabhaavajaananattha.m nakhena vijjhitvaa a.numatta.m gahitamattenaapi aggho bhassati. tasmaa ^a^V1.0247^ea^ ya.mki~nci paadagghanaka.m vuttanayeneva saamikehi paribhogena uuna.m kata.m hoti, na ta.m avaha.to bhikkhu paaraajikena kaatabbo. eva.m paribhogo oloketabbo. eva.m imaani tulayitvaa pa~nca .thaanaani dhaareyyattha.m vicakkha.no, aapatti.m vaa anaapatti.m vaa garuka.m vaa lahuka.m vaa aapatti.m yathaa.thaane .thapeyyaati.
[06] ni.t.thito ``aadiyeyya...pe0... sa"nketa.m viitinaameyyaa''ti.
[06] imesa.m padaana.m vinicchayo.

[03]idaani ^a^M1.0268^ea^ yadida.m ``yathaaruupe adinnaadaane''tiaadiini vibhajantena ^b^``yathaaruupa.m naamaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^yathaaruupa^eb^nti yathaajaatika.m. ta.m pana yasmaa paadato pa.t.thaaya hoti, tasmaa ^b^``paada.m vaa paadaaraha.m vaa atirekapaada.m vaa''^eb^ti aaha. tattha paadena kahaapa.nassa catutthabhaaga.m akappiyabha.n.dameva dasseti. paadaarahena ^a^P2.0309^ea^ paadagghanaka.m kappiyabha.n.da.m. atirekapaadena ubhayampi. ettaavataa sabbaakaarena dutiyapaaraajikappahonakavatthu dassita.m hoti.

[03]^b^pathabyaa raajaa^eb^ti sakalapathaviyaa raajaa diipacakkavattii asokasadiso, yo vaa pana~n~nopi ekadiipe raajaa, siiha.laraajasadiso. ^b^padesaraajaa^eb^ti ekadiipassa padesissaro, bimbisaara-pasenadi-aadayo viya. ^b^ma.n.dalikaa^eb^ naama ye diipapadesepi ekameka.m ma.n.dala.m bhu~njanti. ^b^antarabhogikaa^eb^ naama dvinna.m raajuuna.m antaraa katipayagaamasaamikaa. ^b^akkhadassaa^eb^ti dhammavinicchanakaa, te dhammasabhaaya.m nisiiditvaa aparaadhaanuruupa.m coraana.m hatthapaadacchejjaadi.m anusaasanti. ye pana .thaanantarappattaa amaccaa vaa raajakumaaraa vaa kataaparaadhaa honti, te ra~n~no aarocenti, garuka.m .thaana.m saya.m na vinicchinanti. ^b^mahaamattaa^eb^ti .thaanantarappattaa mahaaamaccaa; tepi tattha tattha gaame vaa nigame vaa nisiiditvaa raajakicca.m karonti. ^b^ye vaa panaa^eb^ti a~n~nepi ye raajakulanissitaa vaa sakissariyanissitaa vaa hutvaa chejjabhejja.m anusaasanti, sabbepi te imasmi.m atthe ``raajaano''ti dasseti.

[03]^b^haneyyu^eb^nti potheyyu~nceva chindeyyu~nca. ^b^pabbaajeyyu^eb^nti niihareyyu.m. ^b^corosii^eb^ti evamaadiini ca vatvaa paribhaaseyyu.m; tenevaaha -- ``paribhaaso eso''ti. ^b^purima.m upaadaayaa^eb^ti methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitvaa paaraajika.m aapatti.m aapanna.m puggala.m upaadaaya. sesa.m pubbe vuttanayattaa uttaanapadatthattaa ca paaka.tamevaati.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0248^ea^ uddi.t.thasikkhaapada.m padaanukkamena vibhajitvaa idaani ya.m ta.m aadiyeyyaatiaadiihi chahi padehi sa"nkhepato aadaana.m dassetvaa sa"nkhepatoeva ``paada.m vaa paadaaraha.m vaa atirekapaada.m vaa''ti aadaatabbabha.n.da.m dassita.m, ta.m yattha yattha .thita.m, yathaa yathaa aadaana.m gacchati, anaagate ^a^M1.0269^ea^ paapabhikkhuuna.m lesokaasanirundhanattha.m tathaa tathaa vitthaarato dassetu.m ``bhuuma.t.tha.m ^a^P2.0310^ea^ thala.t.tha''ntiaadinaa nayena maatika.m .thapetvaa ^b^``bhuuma.t.tha.m naama bha.n.da.m bhuumiya.m nikkhitta.m hotii''^eb^tiaadinaa nayena tassa vibha"nga.m aaha.
[06] pa~ncaviisatiavahaarakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ tatraaya.m anuttaanapadava.n.nanaaya saddhi.m vinicchayakathaa. ^b^nikhaata^eb^nti bhuumiya.m kha.nitvaa .thapita.m. ^b^pa.ticchanna^eb^nti pa.msui.t.thakaadiihi pa.ticchanna.m. ^b^bhuuma.t.tha.m bha.n.da.m...pe0... gacchati vaa, aapatti dukka.tassaa^eb^ti ta.m eva.m nikha.nitvaa vaa pa.ticchaadetvaa vaa .thapitattaa bhuumiya.m .thita.m bha.n.da.m yo bhikkhu kenacideva upaayena ~natvaa ``aaharissaamii''ti theyyacitto hutvaa rattibhaage u.t.thaaya gacchati, so bha.n.da.t.thaana.m appatvaapi sabbakaayavaciivikaaresu dukka.ta.m aapajjati. katha.m? so hi tassa aahara.natthaaya u.t.thahanto ya.m ya.m a"ngapacca"nga.m phandaapeti, sabbattha dukka.tameva. nivaasanapaarupana.m sa.n.thapeti, hatthavaare hatthavaare dukka.ta.m. ``mahanta.m nidhaana.m na sakkaa ekena aaharitu.m, dutiya.m pariyesissaamii''ti kassaci sahaayassa santika.m gantukaamo dvaara.m vivarati, padavaare ca hatthavaare ca dukka.ta.m. dvaarapidahane pana a~n~nasmi.m vaa gamanassa anupakaare anaapatti. tassa nipannokaasa.m gantvaa ``itthannaamaa''ti pakkosati, tamattha.m aarocetvaa ``ehi gacchaamaa''ti vadati, vaacaaya vaacaaya dukka.ta.m. so tassa vacanena u.t.thahati, tassaapi dukka.ta.m. u.t.thahitvaa tassa santika.m gantukaamo nivaasanapaarupana.m sa.n.thapeti, dvaara.m vivaritvaa tassa samiipa.m gacchati, hatthavaarapadavaaresu sabbattha dukka.ta.m. so ta.m pucchati ``asuko ca asuko ca kuhi.m, asuka~nca asuka~nca pakkosaahii''ti, vaacaaya vaacaaya dukka.ta.m. sabbe samaagate disvaa ``mayaa asukasmi.m naama .thaane evaruupo nidhi upaladdho, gacchaama ta.m gahetvaa pu~n~naani ca karissaama, sukha~nca jiivissaamaa''ti vadati, vaacaaya vaacaaya dukka.tameva.

[03]eva.m laddhasahaayo kudaala.m pariyesati. sace panassa attano kudaalo atthi, ``ta.m aaharissaamii''ti gacchanto ca ga.nhanto ca aaharanto ca sabbattha hatthavaarapadavaaresu dukka.ta.m aapajjati ^a^V1.0249^ea^. sace natthi, a~n~na.m ^a^M1.0270^ea^ bhikkhu.m vaa gaha.t.tha.m vaa gantvaa yaacati, yaacanto ca sace ``kudaala.m me dehi, kudaalena me attho ^a^P2.0311^ea^, ki~nci kaatabbamatthi, ta.m katvaa paccaaharissaamii''ti musaa abha.nanto yaacati, vaacaaya vaacaaya dukka.ta.m. sace ``maatikaa sodhetabbaa atthi, vihaare bhuumikamma.m kaatabba.m atthii''ti musaapi bha.nati, ya.m ya.m vacana.m musaa, tattha tattha paacittiya.m. ^b^mahaaa.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ pana saccepi alikepi dukka.tameva vutta.m, ta.m pamaadalikhitanti veditabba.m. na hi adinnaadaanassa pubbapayoge paacittiya.t.thaane dukka.ta.m naama atthi. sace pana kudaalassa da.n.do natthi, ``da.n.da.m karissaamii''ti vaasi.m vaa pharasu.m vaa niseti, tadatthaaya gacchati, gantvaa sukkhaka.t.tha.m chindati tacchati aako.teti, sabbattha hatthavaarapadavaaresu dukka.ta.m. allarukkha.m chindati, paacittiya.m. tato para.m sabbapayogesu dukka.ta.m. ^b^sa"nkhepa.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ pana ^b^mahaapaccariya^eb^~nca tattha jaatakaka.t.thalataachedanattha.m vaasipharasu.m pariyesantaanampi dukka.ta.m vutta.m. sace pana tesa.m eva.m hoti ``vaasipharasukudaale yaacantaa aasa"nkitaa bhavissaama, loha.m samu.t.thaapetvaa karomaa''ti. tato ara~n~na.m gantvaa lohabiijattha.m pathavi.m kha.nanti, akappiyapathavi.m kha.nantaana.m dukka.tehi saddhi.m paacittiyaaniiti ^b^mahaapaccariya.m^eb^ vutta.m. yathaa ca idha, eva.m sabbattha paacittiya.t.thaane dukka.taa na muccati. kappiyapathavi.m kha.nantaana.m dukka.taaniyeva. biija.m pana gahetvaa tato para.m sabbakiriyaasu payoge payoge dukka.ta.m.

[03]pi.takapariyesanepi hatthavaarapadavaaresu vuttanayeneva dukka.ta.m. musaavaade paacittiya.m. pi.taka.m kaatukaamataaya vallicchedane paacittiyanti sabba.m purimanayeneva veditabba.m. ^b^gacchati vaa aapatti dukka.tassaa^eb^ti eva.m pariyi.t.thasahaayakudaalapi.tako nidhi.t.thaana.m gacchati, padavaare padavaare dukka.ta.m. sace pana gacchanto ``ima.m nidhi.m laddhaa buddhapuuja.m vaa dhammapuuja.m vaa sa"nghabhatta.m vaa karissaamii''ti kusala.m uppaadeti, kusalacittena gamane anaapatti. kasmaa? ``theyyacitto dutiya.m ^a^P2.0312^ea^ vaa...pe0... gacchati vaa, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti vuttattaa. yathaa ca idha, eva.m sabbattha atheyyacittassa anaapatti. maggato okkamma nidhaana.t.thaana.m gamanatthaaya magga.m karonto bhuutagaama.m chindati, paacittiya.m. sukkhaka.t.tha.m chindati, dukka.ta.m.

[03]^b^tatthajaataka^eb^nti ciranihitaaya kumbhiyaa upari jaataka.m. ^b^ka.t.tha.m vaa lata.m vaa^eb^ti na kevala.m ka.t.thalatameva, ya.mki~nci alla.m vaa sukkha.m vaa ti.narukkhalataadi.m chindantassa sahapayogattaa dukka.tameva hoti.

[03]^b^a.t.thavidha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0271^ea^ heta.m ^b^dukka.ta.m^eb^ naama imasmi.m .thaane samodhaanetvaa therehi dassita.m -- pubbapayogadukka.ta.m ^a^V1.0250^ea^, sahapayogadukka.ta.m, anaamaasadukka.ta.m, durupaci.n.nadukka.ta.m, vinayadukka.ta.m, ~naatadukka.ta.m, ~nattidukka.ta.m, pa.tissavadukka.tanti. tattha ``theyyacitto dutiya.m vaa kudaala.m vaa pi.taka.m vaa pariyesati gacchati vaa, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti ida.m ^b^pubbapayogadukka.ta.m^eb^ naama. ettha hi dukka.ta.t.thaane dukka.ta.m, paacittiya.t.thaane paacittiyameva hoti. ``tatthajaataka.m ka.t.tha.m vaa lata.m vaa chindati, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti ida.m ^b^sahapayogadukka.ta.m^eb^ naama. ettha pana paacittiyavatthu ca dukka.tavatthu ca dukka.ta.t.thaaneyeva ti.t.thati. kasmaa? avahaarassa sahapayogattaati. ya.m pana dasavidha.m ratana.m, sattavidha.m dha~n~na.m, sabba~nca aavudhabha.n.daadi.m aamasantassa dukka.ta.m vutta.m, ida.m ^b^anaamaasadukka.ta.m^eb^ naama. ya.m kadalinaa.likeraadiina.m tatthajaatakaphalaani aamasantassa dukka.ta.m vutta.m, ida.m ^b^durupaci.n.nadukka.ta.m^eb^ naama. ya.m pana pi.n.daaya carantassa patte raje patite patta.m appa.tiggahetvaa adhovitvaa vaa tattha bhikkha.m ga.nhantassa dukka.ta.m vutta.m, ida.m ^b^vinayadukka.ta.m^eb^ naama. ``sutvaa na vadanti, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (paaraa0 419) ida.m ^b^~naatadukka.ta.m^eb^ naama. ya.m ekaadasasu samanubhaasanaasu ``~nattiyaa dukka.ta''nti (paaraa0 414) vutta.m, ida.m ^b^~nattidukka.ta.m^eb^ naama. ``tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikaa ca na pa~n~naayati, pa.tissave ca aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (mahaava0 207) ida.m ^b^pa.tissavadukka.ta.m^eb^ naama. ida.m pana sahapayogadukka.ta.m. tena vutta.m -- ``ya.mki~nci alla.m vaa sukkha.m vaa ti.narukkhalataadi.m chindantassa sahapayogattaa dukka.tameva hotii''ti.

[03]sace panassa tatthajaatake ti.narukkhalataadimhi chinnepi ^a^P2.0313^ea^ lajjidhammo okkamati, sa.mvaro uppajjati, chedanapaccayaa dukka.ta.m desetvaa muccati. atha dhuranikkhepa.m akatvaa saussaahova pa.msu.m kha.nati, chedanadukka.ta.m pa.tippassambhati, kha.nanadukka.te pati.t.thaati. akappiyapathavi.m kha.nantopi hi idha sahapayogattaa dukka.tameva aapajjati. sace panassa sabbadisaasu kha.nitvaa kumbhimuula.m pattassaapi lajjidhammo okkamati, kha.nanapaccayaa dukka.ta.m desetvaa muccati.

[03]^b^byuuhati vaa^eb^ti atha pana saussaahova pa.msu.m viyuuhati, ekapasse raasi.m karoti, kha.nanadukka.ta.m pa.tippassambhati, viyuuhanadukka.te pati.t.thaati. ta~nca pa.msu.m tattha tattha pu~nja.m karonto payoge payoge dukka.ta.m aapajjati. sace pana raasi.m katvaapi dhuranikkhepa.m karoti, lajjidhamma.m aapajjati ^a^M1.0272^ea^, viyuuhanadukka.ta.m desetvaa muccati. ^b^uddharati vaa^eb^ti atha pana saussaahova pa.msu.m uddharitvaa bahi paateti, viyuuhanadukka.ta.m pa.tippassambhati, uddhara.nadukka.te pati.t.thaati. pa.msu.m pana kudaalena vaa hatthehi vaa pacchiyaa vaa tahi.m tahi.m paatento payoge payoge dukka.ta.m aapajjati. sace pana sabba.m pa.msu.m niiharitvaa kumbhi.m thala.t.tha.m katvaapi lajjidhamma.m ^a^V1.0251^ea^ aapajjati, uddhara.nadukka.ta.m desetvaa muccati. atha pana saussaahova kumbhi.m aamasati, uddhara.nadukka.ta.m pa.tippassambhati, aamasanadukka.te pati.t.thaati. aamasitvaapi ca lajjidhamma.m aapajjanto aamasanadukka.ta.m desetvaa muccati. atha saussaahova kumbhi.m phandaapeti, aamasanadukka.ta.m pa.tippassambhati, ``phandaapeti, aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti vuttathullaccaye pati.t.thaati.

[03]tatraaya.m dukka.tathullaccayaana.m dvinnampi vacanattho -- pa.thama.m taavettha du.t.thu kata.m satthaaraa vuttakicca.m viraadhetvaa katanti dukka.ta.m. atha vaa du.t.tha.m kata.m, viruupaa saa kiriyaa bhikkhukiriyaana.m majjhe na sobhatiiti evampi dukka.ta.m. vutta~nceta.m --
[21] ``dukka.ta.m iti ya.m vutta.m, ta.m su.nohi yathaatatha.m.
[22] aparaddha.m viraddha~nca, khalita.m ya~nca dukka.ta.m..
[21] ``ya.m manusso kare paapa.m, aavi vaa yadi vaa raho.
[22] dukka.tanti pavedenti, teneta.m iti vuccatii''ti.. (pari0 339).

[03]itara.m ^a^P2.0314^ea^ pana thuulattaa, accayattaa ca thullaccaya.m. ``samparaaye ca duggati'' (sa.m0 ni0 1.49), ``ya.m hoti ka.tukapphala''ntiaadiisu (dha0 pa0 66; netti0 91) viya cettha sa.myogabhaavo veditabbo. ekassa santike desetabbesu hi accayesu tena samo thuulo accayo natthi. tasmaa vutta.m ``thuulattaa accayattaa ca thullaccaya''nti. vutta~nceta.m --
[21] ``thullaccayanti ya.m vutta.m, ta.m su.nohi yathaatatha.m.
[27] ekassa muule yo deseti, yo ca ta.m pa.tigga.nhati.
[22] accayo tena samo natthi, teneta.m iti vuccatii''ti.. (pari0 339).

[03]phandaapentassa ^a^M1.0273^ea^ ca payoge payoge thullaccaya.m. phandaapetvaapi ca lajjidhamma.m okkanto thullaccaya.m desetvaa muccati. sahapayogato pa.t.thaayeva cettha purimaa purimaa aapatti pa.tippassambhati. sahapayoga.m pana akatvaa lajjidhamma.m okkantena yaa pubbapayoge dukka.tapaacittiyaa aapannaa, sabbaa taa desetabbaa. sahapayoge ca tatthajaatakacchedane bahukaanipi dukka.taani pa.msukha.nana.m patvaa pa.tippassambhanti. eka.m kha.nanadukka.tameva hoti. kha.nane ^a^V1.0252^ea^ bahukaanipi viyuuhana.m, viyuuhane bahukaanipi uddhara.na.m, uddhara.ne bahukaanipi aamasana.m, aamasane bahukaanipi phandaapana.m patvaa pa.tippassambhanti. pa.msukha.nanaadiisu ca lajjidhamme uppanne bahukaapi aapattiyo hontu, ekameva desetvaa muccatiiti ^b^kurunda.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ vutta.m. purimaapattipa.tippassaddhi ca naamesaa ``~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m, dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa pa.tippassambhantii''ti (paaraa0 414) eva.m anusaavanaasuttesuyeva aagataa. idha pana dutiyapaaraajike a.t.thakathaacariyappamaa.nena gahetabbaati.

[03]^b^.thaanaa^eb^ ^b^caaveti, aapatti paaraajikassaa^eb^ti yo pana phandaapetvaapi lajjidhamma.m anokkamitvaava ta.m kumbhi.m .thaanato antamaso kesaggamattampi caaveti, paaraajikameva aapajjatiiti attho. .thaanaa caavana~ncettha chahi aakaarehi veditabba.m. katha.m? kumbhi.m mukhava.t.tiya.m gahetvaa attano abhimukha.m aaka.d.dhanto iminaa antena phu.t.thokaasa.m kesaggamattampi ^a^P2.0315^ea^ paarimantena atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. tatheva gahetvaa parato pellento paarimantena phu.t.thokaasa.m kesaggamattampi iminaa antena atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. vaamato vaa dakkhi.nato vaa apanaamento vaamantena phu.t.thokaasa.m kesaggamattampi dakkhi.nantena atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. dakkhi.nantena vaa phu.t.thokaasa.m kesaggamattampi vaamantena atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. uddha.m ukkhipanto kesaggamattampi bhuumito moceti, paaraajika.m. kha.nitvaa he.t.thato osiidento bundena phu.t.thokaasa.m kesaggamattampi mukhava.t.tiyaa atikkaameti, paaraajikanti eva.m eka.t.thaane .thitaaya kumbhiyaa. yadi pana kumbhimukhava.t.tiyaa paasa.m katvaa lohakhaa.nu.m vaa khadirasaaraadikhaa.nu.m vaa pathaviya.m aako.tetvaa tattha sa"nkhalikaaya bandhitvaa .thapenti, ekissaa disaaya ekaaya sa"nkhalikaaya baddhaaya dve .thaanaani labbhanti, dviisu tiisu catuusu disaasu catuuhi sa"nkhalikaahi baddhaaya pa~nca .thaanaani labbhanti.

[03]tattha ^a^M1.0274^ea^ ekakhaa.nuke baddhakumbhiyaa pa.thama.m khaa.nuka.m vaa uddharati, sa"nkhalika.m vaa chindati, thullaccaya.m. tato kumbhi.m yathaavuttanayena kesaggamattampi .thaanaa caaveti, paaraajika.m. atha pa.thama.m kumbhi.m uddharati, thullaccaya.m. tato khaa.nuka.m kesaggamattampi .thaanaa caaveti, sa"nkhalika.m vaa chindati, paaraajika.m. etena upaayena dviisu tiisu catuusu khaa.nukesu baddhakumbhiyaapi pacchime .thaanaacaavane paaraajika.m. sesesu thullaccaya.m veditabba.m.

[03]sace khaa.nu natthi, sa"nkhalikaaya agge valaya.m katvaa tatthajaatake muule pavesita.m hoti, pa.thama.m kumbhi.m uddharitvaa pacchaa muula.m chetvaa valaya.m niiharati, paaraajika.m. atha muula.m acchetvaa valaya.m ^a^V1.0253^ea^ ito cito ca saareti, rakkhati. sace pana muulato aniiharitvaapi hatthena gahetvaa aakaasagata.m karoti, paaraajika.m. ayamettha viseso. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03]keci ^a^P2.0316^ea^ pana nimittatthaaya kumbhimatthake nigrodharukkhaadiini ropenti, muulaani kumbhi.m vinandhitvaa .thitaani honti, ``muulaani chinditvaa kumbhi.m gahessaamii''ti chindantassa payoge payoge dukka.ta.m. chinditvaa okaasa.m katvaa kumbhi.m kesaggamattampi .thaanaa caaveti, paaraajika.m. muulaani chindatova lu.thitvaa kumbhii ninna.t.thaana.m gataa, rakkhati taava. gata.t.thaanato uddharati, paaraajika.m. sace chinnesu muulesu ekamuulamattena kumbhii ti.t.thati, so ca ta.m ``imasmi.m muule chinne patissatii''ti chindati, chinnamatte paaraajika.m. sace pana ekamuuleneva paase baddhasuukaro viya .thitaa hoti, a~n~na.m ki~nci lagganaka.m natthi, tasmimpi muule chinnamatte paaraajika.m. sace kumbhimatthake mahaapaasaa.no .thapito hoti, ta.m da.n.dena ukkhipitvaa apanetukaamo kumbhimatthake jaatarukkha.m chindati, dukka.ta.m. tassaa samiipe jaataka.m chetvaa aaharati, atatthajaatakattaa ta.m chindato paacittiya.m.

[03]^b^attano bhaajana^eb^nti sace pana kumbhi.m uddharitu.m asakkonto kumbhigatabha.n.daggaha.nattha.m attano bhaajana.m pavesetvaa antokumbhiya.m pa~ncamaasaka.m vaa atirekapa~ncamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m theyyacitto aamasati, aapatti dukka.tassa. paricchedo cettha paaraajikaniyamanattha.m vutto. theyyacittena pana uunapa~ncamaasakampi aamasanto dukka.ta.m aapajjatiyeva.

[03]^b^phandaapetii^eb^ti ^a^M1.0275^ea^ ettha yaava ekaabaddha.m katvaa attano bhaajana.m paveseti, taava phandaapetiiti vuccati. api ca ito cito ca apabyuuhantopi phandaapetiyeva, so thullaccaya.m aapajjati. yadaa pana ekaabaddhabhaavo chinno, kumbhigata.m kumbhiyameva, bhaajanagatampi bhaajaneyeva hoti, tadaa attano bhaajanagata.m naama hoti. eva.m katvaa kumbhito aniihatepi ca bhaajane paaraajika.m aapajjati.

[03]^b^mu.t.thi.m vaa chindatii^eb^ti ettha yathaa a"ngulantarehi nikkhantakahaapa.naa kumbhigate kahaapa.ne na samphusanti, eva.m mu.t.thi.m karonto mu.t.thi.m chindati naama; sopi paaraajika.m aapajjati.

[03]^b^suttaaruu.lha^eb^nti sutte aaruu.lha.m; suttena aavutassaapi suttamayassaapi eta.m adhivacana.m ^a^P2.0317^ea^. paama"ngaadiinihi sova.n.namayaanipi honti ruupiyamayaanipi suttamayaanipi, muttaavaliaadayopi ettheva ^a^V1.0254^ea^ sa"ngaha.m gataa. ^b^ve.thana^eb^nti siisave.thanapa.to vuccati. etesu ya.mki~nci theyyacitto aamasati, dukka.ta.m. phandaapeti, thullaccaya.m. paama"ngaadiini ko.tiya.m gahetvaa aakaasa.t.tha.m akaronto uccaareti, thullaccaya.m.

[03]^b^gha.msanto niiharatii^eb^ti ettha pana paripu.n.naaya kumbhiyaa upari samatittika.m kumbhi.m katvaa .thapita.m vaa eka.m ko.ti.m bunde eka.m ko.ti.m mukhava.t.tiya.m katvaa .thapita.m vaa gha.msantassa niiharato thullaccaya.m. kumbhimukhaa mocentassa paaraajika.m. ya.m pana upa.d.dhakumbhiya.m vaa rittakumbhiya.m vaa .thapita.m, tassa attano phu.t.thokaasova .thaana.m, na sakalaa kumbhii, tasmaa ta.m gha.msantassaapi niiharato pati.t.thitokaasato kesaggamatte mutte paaraajikameva. kumbhiyaa pana paripu.n.naaya vaa uunaaya vaa ujukameva uddharantassa he.t.thimako.tiyaa pati.t.thitokaasaa muttamatteva paaraajika.m. antokumbhiya.m .thapita.m ya.mki~nci paaraajikappahonaka.m bha.n.da.m sakalakumbhiya.m caarentassa, paama"ngaadi~nca gha.msitvaa niiharantassa yaava mukhava.t.ti.m naatikkamati, taava thullaccayameva. tassa hi sabbaapi kumbhii .thaananti ^b^sa"nkhepamahaapaccariyaadiisu^eb^ vutta.m. ^b^mahaaa.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ pana ``.thapita.t.thaanameva .thaana.m, na sakalaa kumbhii. tasmaa yathaa.thita.t.thaanato kesaggamattampi mocentassa paaraajikamevaa''ti vutta.m, ta.m pamaa.na.m. itara.m pana aakaasagata.m akarontassa ciivarava.mse .thapitaciivarave.thanakanayena vutta.m, ta.m na gahetabba.m. ^b^vinayavinicchaye hi aagate garuke .thaatabba.m, esaa vinayadhammataa^eb^. apica ``attano bhaajanagata.m ^a^M1.0276^ea^ vaa karoti, mu.t.thi.m vaa chindatii''ti vacanato peta.m veditabba.m. yathaa antokumbhiya.m .thitassa na sabbaa kumbhii .thaananti.

[03]sappiaadiisu ya.mki~nci pivato ekapayogena piitamatte ^a^P2.0318^ea^ paaraajikanti ^b^mahaaa.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ vutta.m. ^b^mahaapaccariyaa^eb^diisu pana aya.m vibhaago dassito -- ``mukha.m anapanetvaa aaka.d.dhantassa pivato sace paragalagata.m paada.m na agghati, mukhagatena saddhi.m agghati, rakkhati taava. ka.n.thena pana paricchinnakaaleyeva paaraajika.m hoti. sacepi o.t.thehi paricchindanto o.t.the pidahati, paaraajikameva. uppalada.n.dave.lunaa.lina.lanaa.liaadiihi pivantassaapi sace paragalagatameva paada.m agghati, paaraajika.m. sace saha mukhagatena agghati, na taava paaraajika.m hoti. uppalada.n.daadigatena saddhi.m ekaabaddhabhaava.m kopetvaa o.t.thehi paricchinnamatte paaraajika.m. sace uppalada.n.daadigatena saddhi.m agghati, uppalada.n.daadiina.m bunde a"nguliyaapi pihitamatte paaraajika.m. paadagghanake paragala.m appavi.t.the uppalada.n.daadiisu ca mukhe ca atirekapaadaarahampi ekaabaddha.m hutvaa ti.t.thati, rakkhatiyevaa''ti. ta.m sabbampi yasmaa ``attano bhaajanagata.m vaa karoti ^a^V1.0255^ea^, mu.t.thi.m vaa chindatii''ti ima.m naya.m bhajati, tasmaa sudassitameva. esa taava ekaabaddhe nayo.

[03]sace pana hatthena vaa pattena vaa thaalakaadinaa vaa kenaci bhaajanena gahetvaa pivati, yamhi payoge paadagghanaka.m puureti, tamhi gate paaraajika.m. atha mahaggha.m hoti, sippikaayapi ekapayogeneva paadagghanaka.m gahetu.m sakkaa hoti, ekuddhaareyeva paaraajika.m. bhaajana.m pana nimujjaapetvaa ga.nhantassa yaava ekaabaddha.m hoti, taava rakkhati. mukhava.t.tiparicchedena vaa uddhaarena vaa paaraajika.m. yadaa pana sappi.m vaa tela.m vaa accha.m telasadisameva madhuphaa.nita.m vaa kumbhi.m aavi~nchetvaa attano bhaajane paveseti, tadaa tesa.m acchataaya ekaabaddhataa natthiiti paadagghanake mukhava.t.tito ga.litamatte paaraajika.m.

[03]pacitvaa .thapita.m pana madhuphaa.nita.m sileso viya cikkana.m aaka.d.dhanavika.d.dhanayogga.m hoti, uppanne kukkucce ekaabaddhameva hutvaa pa.tiniiharitu.m ^a^P2.0319^ea^ sakkoti, eta.m mukhava.t.tiyaa nikkhamitvaa bhaajane pavi.t.thampi baahirena saddhi.m ekaabaddhattaa rakkhati, mukhava.t.tito chinnamatte pana paaraajika.m. yopi theyyacittena ^a^M1.0277^ea^ parassa kumbhiyaa paadagghanaka.m sappi.m vaa tela.m vaa avassapivanaka.m ya.mki~nci dukuulasaa.taka.m vaa cammakha.n.daadiina.m vaa a~n~natara.m pakkhipati, hatthato muttamatte paaraajika.m.

[03]rittakumbhiyaa ``idaani tela.m aakirissantii''ti ~natvaa ya.mki~nci bha.n.da.m theyyacitto pakkhipati, ta.m ce tattha tele aaki.n.ne pa~ncamaasakaagghanaka.m pivati, piitamatte paaraajikanti ^b^mahaaa.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ vutta.m. ta.m pana tattheva sukkhata.laake sukkhamaatikaaya ujukara.navinicchayena virujjhati, avahaaralakkha.na~ncettha na pa~n~naayati, tasmaa na gahetabba.m. ^b^mahaapaccariyaa^eb^diisu pana tassa uddhaare paaraajika.m vutta.m, ta.m yutta.m.

[03]parassa rittakumbhiyaa sa"ngopanatthaaya bha.n.da.m .thapetvaa tattha tele aaki.n.ne ``sace aya.m jaanissati, ma.m palibujjhissatii''ti bhiito paadagghanaka.m tela.m piita.m bha.n.da.m theyyacittena uddharati, paaraajika.m. suddhacittena uddharati, pare aaharaapente bha.n.dadeyya.m. ^b^bha.n.dadeyya.m^eb^ naama ya.m parassa na.t.tha.m, tassa muula.m vaa tadeva vaa bha.n.da.m daatabbanti attho. no ce deti, saamikassa dhuranikkhepe paaraajika.m. sace parassa kumbhiyaa a~n~no sappi.m vaa tela.m vaa aakirati, tatra caaya.m theyyacittena telapivanaka.m bha.n.da.m pakkhipati, vuttanayeneva paaraajika.m. attano rittakumbhiyaa ^a^V1.0256^ea^ parassa sappi.m vaa tela.m vaa aakira.nabhaava.m ~natvaa theyyacittena bha.n.da.m nikkhipati, pubbe vuttanayeneva uddhaare paaraajika.m. suddhacitto nikkhipitvaa pacchaa theyyacittena uddharati, paaraajikameva. suddhacittova uddharati, neva avahaaro, na giivaa; ^b^mahaapaccariya.m^eb^ pana anaapattimattameva vutta.m. ```kissa mama kumbhiya.m tela.m aakirasii'ti kupito attano bha.n.da.m uddharitvaa cha.d.deti, no bha.n.dadeyya''nti ^b^kurundiya.m^eb^ vutta.m. theyyacittena mukhava.t.tiya.m gahetvaa kumbhi.m aavi~nchati ^a^P2.0320^ea^ tela.m ga.letukaamo, paadagghanake ga.lite paaraajika.m. theyyacitteneva jajjara.m karoti ``savitvaa gamissatii''ti paadagghanake savitvaa gate paaraajika.m. theyyacitteneva chidda.m karoti oma.t.tha.m vaa umma.t.tha.m vaa vema.t.tha.m vaa, ida.m pana sammoha.t.thaana.m; tasmaa su.t.thu sallekkhetabba.m. aya~nhettha vinicchayo -- ^b^oma.t.tha.m^eb^ naama adhomukhachidda.m; ^b^umma.t.tha.m^eb^ naama uddha.mmukhachidda.m; ^b^vema.t.tha.m^eb^ naama u.lu"nkasseva ujugatachidda.m. tatra oma.t.thassa bahi pa.t.thaaya katassa abbhantarantato paadagghanake tele ga.lite bahi anikkhantepi paaraajika.m. kasmaa? yasmaa tato ga.litamattameva bahigata.m naama ^a^M1.0278^ea^ hoti, na kumbhigatasa"nkhya.m labhati. anto pa.t.thaaya katassa baahirantato paadagghanake ga.lite paaraajika.m. umma.t.thassa yathaa tathaa vaa katassa baahirantato paadagghanake ga.lite paaraajika.m. ta~nhi yaava baahirantato na ga.lati, taava kumbhigatameva hoti. ``vema.t.thassa ca kapaalamajjhato ga.litavasena kaaretabbo''ti a.t.thakathaasu vutta.m. ta.m pana anto ca bahi ca pa.t.thaaya majjhe .thapetvaa katachidde ta.laakassa ca mariyaadabhedena sameti. anto pa.t.thaaya kate pana baahirantena, bahi pa.t.thaaya kate abbhantarantena kaaretabboti idamettha yutta.m. yo pana ``va.t.titvaa gacchissatii''ti theyyacittena kumbhiyaa aadhaaraka.m vaa upatthambhanale.d.duke vaa apaneti, va.t.titvaa gataaya paaraajika.m. telaakira.nabhaava.m pana ~natvaa rittakumbhiyaa jajjarabhaave vaa chiddesu vaa katesu pacchaa nikkhantatelappamaa.nena bha.n.dadeyya.m hoti. ^b^a.t.thakathaasa^eb^u pana katthaci paaraajikantipi likhita.m, ta.m pamaadalikhita.m.

[03]paripu.n.naaya kumbhiyaa upari kathala.m vaa paasaa.na.m vaa ``patitvaa bhindissati, tato tela.m paggharissatii''ti theyyacittena dubbandha.m vaa karoti, du.t.thapita.m vaa .thapeti, avassapatanaka.m tathaa karontassa katamatte paaraajika.m. rittakumbhiyaa upari karoti, ta.m pacchaa pu.n.nakaale patitvaa bhindati, bha.n.dadeyya.m. iidisesu hi .thaanesu bha.n.dassa natthikaale ^a^P2.0321^ea^ katapayogattaa aaditova paaraajika.m na hoti. bha.n.davinaasadvaarassa pana katattaa bha.n.dadeyya.m hoti. aaharaapentesu adadato saamikaana.m dhuranikkhepena paaraajika.m.

[03]theyyacittena maatika.m ujuka.m karoti ``va.t.titvaa vaa gamissati, vela.m vaa uttaraapessatii''ti ^a^V1.0257^ea^; va.t.titvaa vaa gacchatu, vela.m vaa uttaratu, ujukara.nakaale paaraajika.m. iidisaa hi payogaa pubbapayogaavahaare sa"ngaha.m gacchanti. sukkhamaatikaaya ujukataaya pacchaa udake aagate va.t.titvaa vaa gacchatu, vela.m vaa uttaratu, bha.n.dadeyya.m. kasmaa? .thaanaa caavanapayogassa abhaavaa. tassa lakkha.na.m naava.t.the aavi bhavissati.

[03]^b^tattheva bhindati vaa^eb^tiaadiisu ^b^a.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ taava vutta.m -- ^b^``bhindati vaa^eb^ti muggarena pothetvaa bhindati. ^b^cha.d.deti vaa^eb^ti udaka.m vaa vaalika.m vaa aakiritvaa uttaraapeti. ^b^jhaapeti vaa^eb^ti daaruuni aaharitvaa jhaapeti. ^b^aparibhoga.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0279^ea^^b^ vaa karotii^eb^ti akhaaditabba.m vaa apaatabba.m vaa karoti; uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa visa.m vaa ucchi.t.tha.m vaa ku.napa.m vaa paatesi, ^b^aapatti dukka.tassaa^eb^ti .thaanaacaavanassa natthitaaya dukka.ta.m, buddhavisayo naameso. ki~ncaapi dukka.ta.m, aaharaapente pana bha.n.dadeyya''nti. tattha purimadvaya.m na sameti. ta~nhi kumbhijajjarakara.nena ca maatikaaujukara.nena ca saddhi.m ekalakkha.na.m. pacchima.m pana dvaya.m .thaanaa acaaventenaapi sakkaa kaatu.m. tasmaa ettha eva.m vinicchaya.m vadanti -- ``a.t.thakathaaya.m kira `.thaanaa caavanassa natthitaaya dukka.ta'nti ida.m pacchimadvaya.m sandhaaya vutta.m. .thaanaa caavana.m akarontoyeva hi theyyacittena vaa vinaasetukaamataaya vaa jhaapeyyapi, aparibhogampi kareyya. purimadvaye pana vuttanayena bhindantassa vaa cha.d.dentassa vaa .thaanaa caavana.m atthi, tasmaa tathaa karontassa vinaasetukaamataaya bha.n.dadeyya.m, theyyacittena paaraajika''nti. paa.liya.m ``dukka.ta''nti vuttattaa ayuttanti ce? na; a~n~nathaa gahetabbatthato. paa.liya~nhi theyyacittapakkhe ^b^``bhindati vaa^eb^ti ^a^P2.0322^ea^ udakena sambhindati, ^b^cha.d.deti vaa^eb^ti tattha vamati vaa passaava.m vaa cha.d.detii''ti evameke vadanti.

[03]aya.m panettha saaro -- viniitavatthumhi ti.najjhaapako viya .thaanaa acaavetukaamova kevala.m bhindati, bhinnattaa pana telaadiini nikkhamanti, ya.m vaa panettha patthinna.m, ta.m ekaabaddhameva ti.t.thati. acha.d.detukaamoyeva ca kevala.m tattha udakavaalikaadiini aakirati, aaki.n.nattaa pana tela.m cha.d.diiyati. tasmaa vohaaravasena ^b^``bhindati vaa cha.d.deti vaa''^eb^ti vuccatiiti. evametesa.m padaana.m attho gahetabbo. naasetukaamataapakkhe pana itarathaapi yujjati. eva~nhi kathiyamaane paa.li ca a.t.thakathaa ca pubbaaparena sa.msanditvaa kathitaa honti. ettaavataapi ca santosa.m akatvaa aacariye payirupaasitvaa vinicchayo veditabboti.
[06] bhuuma.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ thala.t.the ^a^V1.0258^ea^ ^b^thale nikkhitta^eb^nti bhuumitale vaa paasaa.natalapabbatatalaadiisu vaa yattha katthaci pa.ticchanne vaa appa.ticchanne vaa .thapita.m thala.t.thanti ^a^M1.0280^ea^ veditabba.m. ta.m sace raasikata.m hoti, antokumbhiya.m bhaajanagatakara.namu.t.thicchedanavinicchayena vinicchinitabba.m. sace ekaabaddha.m silesaniyyaasaadi pakkamadhuphaa.nitavinicchayena vinicchinitabba.m. sace garuka.m hoti bhaarabaddha.m lohapi.n.di-gu.lapi.n.di-telamadhugha.taadi vaa, kumbhiya.m .thaanaacaavanavinicchayena vinicchinitabba.m. sa"nkhalikabaddhassa ca .thaanabhedo sallakkhetabbo. pattharitvaa .thapita.m pana paavaaratthara.nasaa.takaadi.m ujuka.m gahetvaa aaka.d.dhati, paarimante orimantena phu.t.thokaasa.m atikkante paaraajika.m. eva.m sabbadisaasu sallakkhetabba.m. ve.thetvaa uddharati, kesaggamatta.m aakaasagata.m karontassa paaraajika.m. sesa.m vuttanayamevaati.
[06] thala.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ aakaasa.t.the ^a^P2.0323^ea^ morassa chahi aakaarehi .thaanaparicchedo veditabbo -- purato mukhatu.n.dakena, pacchato kalaapaggena, ubhayapassesu pakkhapariyantehi, adho paadanakhasikhaaya, uddha.m sikhaggenaati. bhikkhu ``sassaamika.m aakaasa.t.tha.m mora.m gahessaamii''ti purato vaa ti.t.thati, hattha.m vaa pasaareti, moro aakaaseyeva pakkhe caareti, vaata.m gaahaapetvaa gamana.m upacchinditvaa ti.t.thati. tassa bhikkhuno dukka.ta.m. ta.m aphandento hatthena aamasati, dukka.tameva. .thaanaa acaavento phandaapeti, thullaccaya.m. hatthena pana gahetvaa vaa aggahetvaa vaa mukhatu.n.dakena phu.t.thokaasa.m kalaapagga.m, kalaapaggena vaa phu.t.thokaasa.m mukhatu.n.daka.m atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. tathaa vaamapakkhapariyantena phu.t.thokaasa.m dakkhi.napakkhapariyanta.m, dakkhi.napakkhapariyantena vaa phu.t.thokaasa.m vaamapakkhapariyanta.m atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. tathaa paadanakhasikhaaya phu.t.thokaasa.m sikhagga.m, sikhaggena vaa phu.t.thokaasa.m paadanakhasikha.m atikkaameti, paaraajika.m.

[03]aakaasena gacchanto moro siisaadiisu yasmi.m a"nge niliiyati, ta.m tassa .thaana.m. tasmaa ta.m hatthe niliina.m ito cito ca karontopi phandaapetiyeva, yadi pana itarena hatthena gahetvaa .thaanaa caaveti, paaraajika.m ^a^M1.0281^ea^. itara.m hattha.m upaneti, moro sayameva u.d.detvaa tattha niliiyati, anaapatti ^a^V1.0259^ea^. a"nge niliinabhaava.m ~natvaa theyyacittena eka.m padavaara.m gacchati, thullaccaya.m. dutiye paaraajika.m.

[03]bhuumiya.m .thitamoro dvinna.m vaa paadaana.m kalaapassa ca vasena tii.ni .thaanaani labhati. ta.m ukkhipantassa yaava ekampi .thaana.m pathavi.m phusati, taava thullaccaya.m. kesaggamattampi pathaviyaa mocitamatte paaraajika.m. pa~njare .thita.m saha pa~njarena uddharati, paaraajika.m. yadi pana paada.m na agghati, sabbattha agghavasena kaatabba.m. antovatthumhi caranta.m mora.m theyyacittena padasaa bahivatthu.m niiharanto dvaarapariccheda.m atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. vaje .thitabaliibaddassa hi vajo viya antovatthu tassa .thaana.m. hatthena pana gahetvaa antovatthusmimpi aakaasagata.m karontassa paaraajikameva. antogaame carantampi gaamaparikkhepa.m atikkaamentassa paaraajika.m ^a^P2.0324^ea^. sayameva nikkhamitvaa gaamuupacaare vaa vatthuupacaare vaa caranta.m pana theyyacitto ka.t.thena vaa kathalaaya vaa utraasetvaa a.tavimukha.m karoti, moro u.d.detvaa antogaame vaa antovatthumhi vaa chadanapi.t.the vaa niliiyati, rakkhati. sace pana a.tavimukhe u.d.deti vaa gacchati vaa ``a.tavi.m pavesetvaa gahessaamii''ti parikappe asati pathavito kesaggamattampi u.d.ditamatte vaa dutiyapadavaare vaa paaraajika.m. kasmaa? yasmaa gaamato nikkhantassa .thita.t.thaanameva .thaana.m hoti. ^b^kapi~njaraadiisupi^eb^ ayameva vinicchayo.

[03]^b^saa.taka.m vaa^eb^ti vaatavegukkhitta.m pathavitale pattharitvaa .thapitamiva aakaasena gacchanta.m khalibaddha.m saa.taka.m abhimukhaagata.m hatthena ekasmi.m ante ga.nhaati, ito cito ca .thaana.m avikopentoyeva gamanupacchede dukka.ta.m. .thaanaacaavana.m akaronto caaleti, phandaapane thullaccaya.m. .thaanaa caaveti, paaraajika.m. .thaanaparicchedo cassa morasseva chahi aakaarehi veditabbo.

[03]abaddhasaa.tako pana ekasmi.m ante gahitamatteva dutiyenantena patitvaa bhuumiya.m pati.t.thaati, tassa dve .thaanaani honti -- hattho ceva bhuumi ca. ta.m yathaagahitameva pa.thama.m gahitokaasappadesato caaleti, thullaccaya.m. pacchaa bhuumito dutiyahatthena vaa paadena vaa ukkhipati, paaraajika.m. pa.thama.m ^a^M1.0282^ea^ vaa bhuumito uddharati, thullaccaya.m. pacchaa gahitokaasappadesato caaveti, paaraajika.m. gaha.na.m vaa amu~ncanto ujukameva hattha.m onaametvaa bhuumigata.m katvaa teneva hatthena ukkhipati, paaraajika.m. ^b^ve.thane^eb^pi ayameva vinicchayo.

[03]^b^hira~n~na.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0260^ea^ ^b^vaa suva.n.na.m vaa chijjamaana^eb^nti manussaana.m ala"nkarontaana.m giiveyyakaadipi.landhana.m vaa suva.n.nasalaaka.m chindantaana.m suva.n.nakaaraana.m suva.n.nakha.n.da.m vaa chijjamaana.m patati, ta~nce bhikkhu aakaasena aagacchanta.m theyyacitto hatthena ga.nhaati, gaha.nameva .thaana.m. gahitappadesato ^a^P2.0325^ea^ hattha.m apaneti, paaraajika.m. ciivare patita.m hatthena ukkhipati, paaraajika.m. anuddharitvaava yaati, dutiye padavaare paaraajika.m. patte patitepi eseva nayo. siise vaa mukhe vaa paade vaa pati.t.thita.m hatthena ga.nhaati, paaraajika.m. aggahetvaava yaati, dutiye padavaare paaraajika.m. yattha katthaci patati, tassa patitokaasova .thaana.m, na sabba.m a"ngapacca"nga.m pattaciivara.m vaati.
[06] aakaasa.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ vehaasa.t.the ma~ncapii.thaadiisu .thapita.m bha.n.da.m aamaasa.m vaa hotu anaamaasa.m vaa, theyyacittena aamasantassa dukka.ta.m. ma~ncapii.thesu .thapitabha.n.desu panettha thala.t.the vuttanayena vinicchayo veditabbo. aya.m pana viseso -- sace khaliyaa baddhasaa.tako ma~nce vaa pii.the vaa pattha.to majjhena ma~ncatala.m na phusati, ma~ncapaadeva phusati, tesa.m vasena .thaana.m veditabba.m. paadaana.m upari phu.t.thokaasameva hi atikkamitamattena tattha paaraajika.m hoti. saha ma~ncapii.thehi harantassa pana ma~ncapii.thapaadaana.m pati.t.thitokaasavasena .thaana.m veditabba.m.

[03]^b^ciivarava.mse vaa^eb^ti ciivara.thapanatthaaya bandhitvaa .thapite va.mse vaa ka.t.thada.n.dake vaa. tattha sa.mharitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa .thapitaciivarassa pati.t.thitokaasena phu.t.thokaasova .thaana.m, na sabbo ciivarava.mso. tasmaa theyyacittena ta.m bhoge gahetvaa aaka.d.dhantassa paarato va.mse pati.t.thitokaasa.m orato ciivarena va.msassa phu.t.thappadesa.m atikkaamentassa ^a^M1.0283^ea^ ekadva"ngulamattaaka.d.dhaneneva paaraajika.m. ante gahetvaa aaka.d.dhantassaapi eseva nayo. tattheva pana ciivarava.mse vaamato vaa dakkhi.nato vaa saarentassa vaamantena dakkhi.nanta.t.thaana.m dakkhi.nantena vaa vaamanta.t.thaana.m atikkantamatte dasadvaadasa"ngulamattasaara.neneva paaraajika.m. uddha.m ukkhipantassa kesaggamattukkhipanena paaraajika.m. ciivarava.msa.m ^a^P2.0326^ea^ phusanta.m vaa aphusanta.m vaa rajjukena bandhitvaa .thapitaciivara.m mocentassa thullaccaya.m, mutte paaraajika.m. muttamattameva hi ta.m ``.thaanaa cuta''nti sa"nkhya.m gacchati. va.mse ve.thetvaa .thapita.m nibbe.thentassa thullaccaya.m, nibbe.thitamatte paaraajika.m. valaya.m katvaa .thapite valaya.m chindati vaa moceti vaa eka.m vaa va.msako.ti.m mocetvaa niiharati, thullaccaya.m ^a^V1.0261^ea^. chinnamatte muttamatte niiha.tamatte ca paaraajika.m. tathaa akatvaava ciivarava.mse ito cito ca saareti, rakkhati taava. valayassa hi sabbopi ciivarava.mso .thaana.m. kasmaa? tattha sa.msara.nadhammataaya. yadaa pana na.m hatthena gahetvaa aakaasagata.m karoti, paaraajika.m. pasaaretvaa .thapitassa pati.t.thitokaasena phu.t.thokaasova .thaana.m. tattha sa.mharitvaa .thapite vuttanayena vinicchayo veditabbo. ya.m pana ekenantena bhuumi.m phusitvaa .thita.m hoti, tassa ciivarava.mse ca bhuumiya~nca pati.t.thitokaasavasena dve .thaanaani. tattha bhuumiya.m ekenantena pati.t.thite abaddhasaa.take vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo. ciivararajjuyaapi ayameva vinicchayo.

[03]a"nkusake laggetvaa .thapitabha.n.da.m pana bhesajjagha.to vaa bhesajjatthavikaa vaa sace bhitti.m vaa bhuumi.m vaa aphusitvaa .thapita.m lagganaka.m gha.msantassa niiharato a"nkusako.tito nikkhantamatte paaraajika.m. lagganaka.m baddha.m hoti, bundena ukkhipitvaa aakaasagata.m karontassa a"nkusako.tito anikkhantepi paaraajika.m. bhittinissita.m hoti, pa.thama.m a"nkusako.tito niiharati, thullaccaya.m. pacchaa bhitti.m moceti, paaraajika.m. pa.thama.m bhitti.m mocetvaa pacchaa a"nkusato niiharantassaapi eseva nayo. sace pana bhaariya.m bha.n.da.m niiharitu.m asakkonto saya.m bhittinissita.m katvaa a"nkusato niiharati, puna bhitti.m amocetvaapi a"nkusato niiha.tamatteyeva paaraajika.m. attanaa kata.t.thaana~nhi .thaana.m na hoti. bhuumi.m phusitvaa .thitassa pana dve eva .thaanaani. tattha vuttoyeva vinicchayo ^a^P2.0327^ea^. ya.m ^a^M1.0284^ea^ pana sikkaaya pakkhipitvaa laggita.m hoti, ta.m sikkaato niiharantassaapi saha sikkaaya a"nkusato niiharantassaapi paaraajika.m. bhittibhuumisannissitavasena cettha .thaanabhedopi veditabbo.

[03]^b^bhittikhiilo^eb^ti ujuka.m katvaa bhittiya.m aako.tito vaa tatthajaatako eva vaa; naagadanto pana va"nko aako.tito eva. tesu laggetvaa .thapita.m a"nkusake vuttanayeneva vinicchinitabba.m. dviisu tiisu pana pa.tipaa.tiyaa .thitesu aaropetvaa .thapita.m kunta.m vaa bhindivaala.m vaa agge vaa bunde vaa gahetvaa aaka.d.dhati, ekamekassa phu.t.thokaasamatte atikkante paaraajika.m. phu.t.thokaasamattameva hi tesa.m .thaana.m hoti, na sabbe khiilaa vaa naagadantaa vaa. bhittiabhimukho .thatvaa majjhe gahetvaa aaka.d.dhati, orimantena phu.t.thokaasa.m paarimantena atikkantamatte paaraajika.m. parato pellentassaapi eseva nayo. hatthena gahetvaa ujuka.m ukkhipanto kesaggamattampi aakaasagata.m karoti, paaraajika.m. bhitti.m nissaaya .thapita.m bhitti.m gha.msanto aaka.d.dhati, aggena phu.t.thokaasa.m bunda.m, bundena vaa phu.t.thokaasa.m agga.m atikkaamentassa paaraajika.m ^a^V1.0262^ea^. bhittiabhimukho .thatvaa aaka.d.dhanto ekenantena phu.t.thokaasa.m aparanta.m atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. ujuka.m ukkhipanto kesaggamatta.m aakaasagata.m karoti, paaraajika.m.

[03]^b^rukkhe vaa laggita^eb^nti taalarukkhaadiisu aaropetvaa laggite a"nkusakaadiisu vuttanayena vinicchayo veditabbo. tatthajaataka.m pana taalapi.n.di.m caalentassa thullaccaya.m. yasmi.m phale paaraajikavatthu puurati, tasmi.m bandhanaa muttamatte paaraajika.m. pi.n.di.m chindati, paaraajika.m. aggena pa.n.nantara.m aaropetvaa .thapitaa dve .thaanaani labhati -- .thapita.t.thaana~nca va.n.ta.t.thaana~nca; tattha vuttanayena vinicchayo veditabbo. yo pana ``chinnamattaa patamaanaa sadda.m kareyyaa''ti bhayena saya.m aggena pa.n.nantara.m aaropetvaa chindati, chinnamatte paaraajika.m ^a^P2.0328^ea^. attanaa kata.t.thaana~nhi .thaana.m na hoti. etena upaayena sabbarukkhaana.m pupphaphalesu vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03]^b^pattaadhaarakepii^eb^ti ettha rukkhaadhaarako vaa hotu valayaadhaarako vaa da.n.daadhaarako vaa ya.mki~nci patta.t.thapanaka.m pacchikaapi hotu pattaadhaarako tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. tattha .thapitapattassa pattena phu.t.thokaaso eva ^a^M1.0285^ea^ .thaana.m. tattha rukkhaadhaarake pa~ncahaakaarehi .thaanaparicchedo hoti. tattha .thita.m patta.m mukhava.t.tiya.m gahetvaa catuusu disaasu yato kutoci ka.d.dhanto ekenantena phu.t.thokaasa.m aparanta.m atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. uddha.m kesaggamatta.m ukkhipato paaraajika.m. sahaadhaarakena harantassaapi eseva nayoti.
[06] vehaasa.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ udaka.t.the -- ^b^udake nikkhitta.m hotii^eb^ti raajabhayaadibhiitehi udakena avinassanadhammesu tambalohabhaajanaadiisu suppa.ticchanna.m katvaa pokkhara.niiaadiisu asandanake udake nikkhitta.m. tassa pati.t.thitokaasoyeva .thaana.m, na sabba.m udaka.m. ^b^gacchati vaa aapatti dukka.tassaa^eb^ti agambhiire udake padasaa gacchantassa padavaare padavaare dukka.ta.m. gambhiire hatthehi vaa paadehi vaa payoga.m karontassa hatthavaarehi vaa padavaarehi vaa payoge payoge dukka.ta.m. eseva nayo kumbhigaha.nattha.m nimujjanummujjanesu. sace pana antaraa ki~nci udakasappa.m vaa vaa.lamaccha.m vaa disvaa bhiito palaayati, anaapatti. aamasanaadiisu bhuumigataaya kumbhiyaa vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo ^a^V1.0263^ea^. aya.m pana viseso -- tattha bhuumi.m kha.nitvaa ka.d.dhati, idha kaddame osaareti. eva.m chahaakaarehi .thaanaparicchedo hoti.

[03]^b^uppalaa^eb^diisu yasmi.m pupphe vatthu.m puureti, tasmi.m chinnamatte paaraajika.m. uppalajaatikaana~ncettha yaava ekasmimpi passe vaako na chijjati, taava rakkhati. padumajaatikaana.m pana da.n.de chinne abbhantare sutta.m acchinnampi na rakkhati. saamikehi chinditvaa .thapitaani uppalaadiini honti, ya.m vatthu.m puureti, tasmi.m uddha.te ^a^P2.0329^ea^ paaraajika.m. hatthakabaddhaani honti, yasmi.m hatthake vatthu puurati, tasmi.m uddha.te paaraajika.m. bhaarabaddhaani honti, ta.m bhaara.m channa.m aakaaraana.m yena kenaci aakaarena .thaanaa caaventassa bhuuma.t.thakumbhiya.m vuttanayena paaraajika.m. diighanaa.laani uppalaadiini honti, pupphesu vaa naa.lesu vaa ^a^M1.0286^ea^ ve.ni.m katvaa udakapi.t.the rajjukesu ti.naani santharitvaa .thapenti vaa bandhanti vaa, tesa.m diighato pupphaggena ca naa.lantena ca tiriya.m pariyantehi he.t.thaa pati.t.thitokaasena uddha.m upari .thitassa pi.t.thiyaati chahaakaarehi .thaanaa caavanaparicchedo veditabbo.

[03]yopi udakapi.t.thiya.m .thapitapupphakalaapa.m udaka.m caaletvaa viici.m u.t.thaapetvaa kesaggamattampi yathaa.thita.t.thaanato caaveti, paaraajika.m. atha pana parikappeti ``ettha gata.m gahessaamii''ti, rakkhati taava; gata.t.thaane pana uddharato paaraajika.m. udakato accuggatassa pupphassa sakalamudaka.m .thaana.m, ta.m uppaa.tetvaa ujuka.m uddharantassa naa.lante kesaggamatta.m udakato atikkante paaraajika.m. pupphe gahetvaa apanaametvaa aaka.d.dhanto uppaa.teti, na udaka.m .thaana.m, uppaa.titamatte paaraajika.m. kalaapabaddhaani pupphaani udaka.t.thaane vaa rukkhe vaa gacche vaa bandhitvaa .thapenti, bandhana.m amocetvaa ito cito ca karontassa thullaccaya.m, bandhane muttamatte paaraajika.m. pa.thama.m bandhana.m mocetvaa pacchaa harati, ettha chahaakaarehi .thaanaparicchedoti ida.m ubhaya.m ^b^mahaapaccariyaa^eb^diisu vutta.m. paduminiya.m pupphaani saha padumini.myaa ga.nhitukaamassa pupphanaa.lehi ca pattanaa.lehi ca phu.t.thaudakavasena uddha~nceva tiriya~nca .thaanaparicchedo veditabbo. ta.m panassa padumini.m anuppaa.tetvaa pupphaani vaa pattaani vaa attano abhimukha.m aaka.d.dhantassa thullaccaya.m. uppaa.titamatte paaraajika.m.

[03]pupphapattanaa.le .thaanato acaavetvaapi pa.thama.m padumini.m uppaa.tentassa thullaccaya.m. pacchaa pupphapattanaa.lesu .thaanaa caavitesu paaraajika.m. uppaa.titaaya paduminiyaa puppha.m ga.nhanto pana bha.n.da.m agghaapetvaa ^a^P2.0330^ea^ kaaretabbo. bahi .thapite raasikatakalaapabaddhabhaarabaddhapupphepi eseva nayo. bhisa.m ^a^V1.0264^ea^ vaa mu.laala.m vaa yena vatthu puurati, ta.m uppaa.tentassa paaraajika.m. kaddame phu.t.thokaasavasena cettha .thaana.m paricchinditabba.m. taani uppaa.tentassa sukhumampi muula.m acchinna.m hoti, rakkhati taava. bhisapabbe jaata.m patta.m vaa puppha.m vaa hoti, tampi rakkhatiiti ^b^mahaaa.t.thakathaaya^eb^meva vutta.m. bhisaga.n.thimhi pana ka.n.tako hoti yobbanappattaana.m mukhapi.lakaa viya, aya.m adiighattaa na rakkhati. sesa.m uppalaadiisu vuttanayameva.

[03]macchakacchapaana.m ^a^M1.0287^ea^ sassaamikaana.m vaapiaadiisu sakalamudaka.m .thaana.m. tasmaa yo pa.tijaggana.t.thaane sassaamika.m maccha.m ba.lisena vaa jaalena vaa kumanena vaa hatthena vaa ga.nhaati, tassa yena macchena vatthu puurati, tasmi.m kesaggamattampi udakato uddha.tamatte paaraajika.m. koci maccho gayhamaano ito cito ca dhaavati, aakaasa.m vaa uppatati, tiire vaa patati, aakaase vaa .thita.m tiire vaa patita.m ga.nhatopi paaraajikameva. kacchapampi bahi gocarattha.m gata.m ga.nhato eseva nayo. udaka.t.tha.m pana udakaa mocayato paaraajika.m.

[03]tesu tesu pana janapadesu sabbasaadhaara.nassa mahaata.laakassa niddhamanatumba.m nissaaya sabbasaadhaara.nameva kunnadiisadisa.m udakavaahaka.m kha.nanti. tato khuddakamaatikaayo niiharitvaa maatikaako.tiya.m attano attano va.la~njanatthaaya aavaa.te kha.nanti. tesa.m pana yadaa udakena attho hoti, tadaa aavaa.te khuddakamaatikaayo udakavaahaka~nca sodhetvaa niddhamanatumba.m ugghaa.tenti. tato udakena saddhi.m macchaa nikkhamitvaa anupubbena aavaa.te patvaa vasanti. tattha ta.laake ca udakavaahakesu ca macche ga.nhante na vaarenti. khuddakaasu pana attano attano maatikaasu ^a^P2.0331^ea^ udakaaavaa.tesu ca pavi.t.thamacche ga.nhitu.m na denti, vaarenti; tattha yo ta.laake vaa niddhamanatumbe vaa udakavaahake vaa macche ga.nhaati, avahaarena so na kaaretabbo. khuddakamaatikaasu pana aavaa.tesu vaa pavi.t.tha.m ga.nhanto gahitassa agghavasena kaaretabbo. sace tato gayhamaano maccho aakaase vaa uppatati, tiire vaa patati, ta.m aakaasa.t.tha.m vaa tiira.t.tha.m vaa udakavinimutta.m ga.nhato avahaaro natthi. kasmaa? yasmaa attano pariggaha.t.thaane .thitasseva te saamikaa. evaruupaa hi tattha katikaa. kacchapepi eseva nayo.

[03]sace pana maccho gayhamaano aavaa.tato khuddakamaatika.m aaruhati, tattha na.m ga.nhatopi avahaaroyeva. khuddakamaatikaato pana udakavaahaka.m, tato ca ta.laaka.m aaruu.lha.m ga.nhato avahaaro natthi. yo aavaa.tato bhattasitthehi palobhetvaa maatika.m aaropetvaa ga.nhaati, avahaarova. tato pana palobhetvaa udakavaahaka.m aaropetvaa ga.nhantassa avahaaro natthi. keci pana ^a^V1.0265^ea^ kutocideva sabbasaadhaara.na.t.thaanato ^a^M1.0288^ea^ macche aanetvaa pacchimavatthubhaage udakaavaa.te khipitvaa posetvaa divase divase dve tii.ni uttaribha"ngatthaaya maarenti. evaruupa.m maccha.m udake vaa aakaase vaa tiire vaa yattha katthaci .thita.m ga.nhato avahaaro eva. kacchapepi eseva nayo.

[03]nidaaghakaale pana nadiyaa sote pacchinne katthaci ninna.t.thaane udaka.m ti.t.thati, tattha manussaa macchaana.m vinaasaaya madanaphalavasaadiini pakkhipitvaa gacchanti, macchaa taani khaadantaa maritvaa uttaanaa udake plavantaa ti.t.thanti. yo tattha gantvaa ``yaava saamikaa naagacchanti, taavime macche ga.nhissaamii''ti ga.nhaati, agghavasena kaaretabbo. pa.msukuulasa~n~naaya ga.nhato avahaaro natthi, aaharaapente pana bha.n.dadeyya.m. macchavisa.m pakkhipitvaa gatamanussaa bhaajanaani aaharitvaa puuretvaa gacchanti, yaava ``punapi aagacchissaamaa''ti saalayaa honti, taava te sassaamikamacchaava. yadaa pana te ``ala.m amhaaka''nti niraalayaa pakkamanti, tato pa.t.thaaya theyyacittena ga.nhantassa dukka.ta.m. pa.msukuulasa~n~nissa anaapatti. yathaa ca macchakacchapesu, eva.m sabbaayapi ^a^P2.0332^ea^ odakajaatiyaa vinicchayo veditabboti.
[06] udaka.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ naava.t.the -- pa.thama.m taava naava.m dassento ^b^``naavaa naama yaaya taratii''^eb^ti aaha. tasmaa idha antamaso rajanado.nikaapi ve.nukalaapakopi ^b^``naavaa''^eb^tveva veditabbo. siimaasammannane pana dhuvanaavaa anto kha.nitvaa vaa phalakehi bandhitvaa vaa kataa sabbantimena paricchedena ti.n.na.m vaahanikaa eva va.t.tati. idha pana ekassapi vaahanikaa ``naavaa'' tveva vuccati. ^b^naavaaya nikkhitta^eb^nti ya.mki~nci indriyabaddha.m vaa anindriyabaddha.m vaa; tassa avahaaralakkha.na.m thala.t.the vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. ^b^naava.m avaharissaamii^eb^tiaadimhi ca dutiyapariyesanagamanaaamasanaphandaapanaani vuttanayaaneva. ^b^bandhana.m mocetii^eb^ti ettha pana yaa bandhane muttamatte .thaanaa na cavati, tassaa bandhana.m yaava ^a^M1.0289^ea^ na mutta.m hoti, taava dukka.ta.m. mutte pana thullaccayampi paaraajikampi hoti, ta.m parato aavi bhavissati. sesa.m vuttanayameva. aya.m taava paa.liva.n.nanaa.

[03]aya.m panettha ^b^paa.limuttakavinicchayo^eb^ -- ca.n.dasote bandhitvaa .thapitanaavaaya eka.m .thaana.m bandhanameva ^a^V1.0266^ea^, tasmi.m muttamatte paaraajika.m. tattha yutti pubbe vuttaa eva. vippana.t.thaa naavaa pana ya.m ya.m udakappadesa.m pharitvaa .thitaa hoti, svaassaa .thaana.m. tasmaa ta.m uddha.m vaa uccaarentassa, adho vaa opilaapentassa, catuusu vaa disaasu phu.t.thokaasa.m atikkaamentassa atikkantamatte paaraajika.m. niccale udake abandhana.m attano dhammataaya .thitanaava.m purato vaa pacchato vaa vaamadakkhi.napassato vaa ka.d.dhantassa ekenantena phu.t.thokaasa.m aparena udake pati.t.thitantena atikkantamatte paaraajika.m. uddha.m kesaggamatta.m udakato mocite adho naavaatalena phu.t.thokaasa.m mukhava.t.ti.m atikkantamatte paaraajika.m. tiire bandhitvaa niccale ^a^P2.0333^ea^ udake .thapitanaavaaya bandhana~nca .thitokaaso caati dve .thaanaani. ta.m pa.thama.m bandhanaa moceti, thullaccaya.m. pacchaa channa.m aakaaraana.m a~n~natarena .thaanaa caaveti, paaraajika.m. pa.thama.m .thaanaa caavetvaa pacchaa bandhanamocanepi eseva nayo. thale ussaadetvaa ukkujjitvaa .thapitanaavaaya phu.t.thokaasova .thaana.m. tassaa pa~ncahaakaarehi .thaanaparicchedo veditabbo.

[03]nikkujjitvaa .thapitanaavaaya pana mukhava.t.tiyaa phu.t.thokaasova .thaana.m, tassaapi pa~ncahaakaarehi .thaanapariccheda.m ~natvaa yato kutoci phu.t.thokaasa.m uddha~nca kesaggamatta.m atikkantamatte paaraajika.m veditabba.m. thale pana ussaadetvaa dvinna.m daarugha.tikaana.m upari .thapitanaavaaya daarugha.tikaana.m phu.t.thokaasoyeva .thaana.m, tasmaa tattha ma~ncapaadamatthakesuyeva pattha.tabaddhasaa.take naagadantesu .thapitabhindivaale ca vuttanayena vinicchayo veditabbo.
[06] yottabaddhaaya pana naavaaya sa.t.thisattatibyaamappamaa.na.m yotta.m amocetvaava aaka.d.dhitvaa

[03] pathavilagga.m katvaa saha yottena thale .thapitaaya naavaaya ^a^M1.0290^ea^ na phu.t.thokaasamattameva .thaana.m. atha kho yottako.tito pa.t.thaaya yaava naavaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thitokaasassa pacchimanto taava diighato, tiriya.m pana naavaaya ca yottassa ca pathaviya.m pati.t.thitapariyantappamaa.na.m .thaananti veditabba.m. ta.m diighato vaa tiriyato vaa ka.d.dhantassa ekenantena phu.t.thokaasa.m aparena pathaviya.m pati.t.thitantena atikkantamatte, uddha.m kesaggamatta.m saha yottena pathavito mocite paaraajika.m. yo pana titthe .thitanaava.m aaruhitvaa theyyacitto arittena vaa phiyena vaa paajeti, paaraajika.m. sace pana chatta.m vaa pa.naametvaa ciivara.m vaa paadehi akkamitvaa hatthehi ukkhipitvaa la"nkaarasadisa.m katvaa vaata.m ga.nhaapeti, balavaa ca vaato aagamma naava.m harati, vaateneva saa ha.taa hoti; puggalassa natthi avahaaro. payogo atthi, so pana .thaanaa caavanapayogo ^a^P2.0334^ea^ na hoti. yadi pana ta.m naava.m eva.m gacchanti.m pakatigamana.m upacchinditvaa a~n~na.m disaabhaaga.m neti, paaraajika.m. sayameva ya.mki~nci ^a^V1.0267^ea^ gaamatittha.m sampatta.m .thaanaa acaaventova vikki.nitvaa gacchati, neva atthi avahaaro. bha.n.dadeyya.m pana hotiiti.
[06] naava.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ yaana.t.the -- yaana.m taava dassento ^b^``yaana.m naama vayha''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha upari ma.n.dapasadisa.m padaracchanna.m sabbapaligu.n.thima.m vaa chaadetvaa kata.m ^b^vayha.m^eb^. ubhosu passesu suva.n.narajataadimayaa gopaanasiyo datvaa garu.lapakkhakanayena kataa ^b^sandamaanikaa. ratho ca saka.ta~nca^eb^ paaka.tameva. tesu yattha katthaci savi~n~naa.naka.m vaa avi~n~naa.naka.m vaa raasiaadivasena .thapita.m bha.n.da.m theyyacittena .thaanaa caaventassa naava.t.the ca thala.t.the ca vuttanayeneva paaraajika.m veditabba.m.

[03]aya.m pana viseso -- yaana.t.tha.m ta.n.dulaadibha.n.da.m pi.takena ga.nhato pi.take anukkhittepi pi.taka.m apaharitvaa ta.n.dulaadiina.m ekaabaddhabhaave vikopite paaraajika.m. thala.t.thaadiisupi aya.m nayo labbhati. ^b^yaana.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0291^ea^^b^ avaharissaamii^eb^tiaadimhi dutiyapariyesanaadiini vuttanayaaneva. ^b^.thaanaa caavetii^eb^ti ettha pana dukayuttassa yaanassa dvinna.m go.naana.m a.t.tha paadaa, dve ca cakkaaniiti dasa .thaanaani. ta.m theyyacittassa dhure nisiiditvaa paajayato go.naana.m paaduddhaare thullaccaya.m. cakkaana.m pana pathaviya.m pati.t.thitappadesato kesaggamatte atikkante paaraajika.m. sace pana go.naa ``naaya.m amhaaka.m saamiko''ti ~natvaa dhura.m cha.d.detvaa aaka.d.dhantaa ti.t.thanti vaa phandanti vaa, rakkhati taava. go.ne puna ujuka.m pa.tipaadetvaa dhura.m aaropetvaa da.lha.m yojetvaa paacanena vijjhitvaa paajentassa vuttanayeneva tesa.m paaduddhaare thullaccaya.m. cakkaatikkame paaraajika.m.

[01] sacepi sakaddame magge eka.m cakka.m kaddame lagga.m hoti, dutiya.m cakka.m go.naa parivattentaa pavattenti, ekassa .thitattaa na taava avahaaro hoti ^a^P2.0335^ea^. go.ne pana puna ujuka.m pa.tipaadetvaa paajentassa .thitacakke kesaggamatta.m phu.t.thokaasa.m atikkante paaraajika.m. catuyuttakassa pana a.t.thaarasa .thaanaani, a.t.thayuttakassa catutti.msaati -- etenupaayena yuttayaanassa .thaanabhedo veditabbo.

[03]ya.m pana ayuttaka.m dhure ekaaya pacchato ca dviihi upatthambhiniihi upatthambhetvaa .thapita.m, tassa ti.n.na.m upatthambhiniina.m cakkaana~nca vasena pa~nca .thaanaani. sace dhure upatthambhinii he.t.thaabhaage ^a^V1.0268^ea^ kappakataa hoti, cha .thaanaani. pacchato pana anupatthambhetvaa dhure upatthambhitasseva upatthambhiniivasena tii.ni vaa cattaari vaa .thaanaani. dhurena phalakassa vaa daarukassa vaa upari .thapitassa tii.ni .thaanaani. tathaa pathaviya.m .thapitassa. ta.m dhura.mka.d.dhitvaa vaa ukkhipitvaa vaa purato ca pacchato ca .thaanaa caaventassa thullaccaya.m. cakkaana.m pati.t.thita.t.thaane kesaggamatta.m atikkante paaraajika.m. cakkaani apanetvaa dviihi akkhasiisehi daaruuna.m upari .thapitassa dve .thaanaani. ta.m ka.d.dhanto vaa ukkhipanto vaa phu.t.thokaasa.m atikkaameti, paaraajika.m. bhuumiya.m .thapitassa dhurena ca catuuhi ca akkhuddhiihi pati.t.thitavasena pa~nca .thaanaani. ta.m dhure gahetvaa ka.d.dhato uddhiina.m pacchimantehi purimante atikkante paaraajika.m. uddhiisu gahetvaa ka.d.dhato uddhiina.m purimantehi pacchimante atikkante paaraajika.m. passe gahetvaa ka.d.dhato uddhiina.myeva tiriya.m pati.t.thita.t.thaanassa atikkamena paaraajika.m. majjhe gahetvaa ukkhipato kesaggamatta.m pathavito ^a^M1.0292^ea^ mutte paaraajika.m. atha uddhikhaa.nukaa na honti, samameva baaha.m katvaa majjhe vijjhitvaa akkhasiisaani pavesitaani honti, ta.m he.t.thimatalassa samantaa sabba.m pathavi.m phusitvaa ti.t.thati. tattha catuusu disaasu uddha~nca phu.t.tha.t.thaanaatikkamavasena paaraajika.m veditabba.m. bhuumiya.m naabhiyaa .thapitacakkassa ekameva .thaana.m, tassa pa~ncahaakaarehi paricchedo. nemipassena ca naabhiyaa ca phusitvaa .thitassa dve .thaanaani. nemiyaa u.t.thitabhaaga.m paadena akkamitvaa bhuumiya.m phusaapetvaa aresu ^a^P2.0336^ea^ vaa nemiyaa vaa gahetvaa ukkhipantassa attanaa kata.t.thaana.m .thaana.m na hoti, tasmaa tasmi.m .thitepi avasesa.t.thaane atikkantamatte paaraajika.m.

[03]bhitti.m nissaaya .thapitacakkassaapi dve .thaanaani. tattha pa.thama.m bhittito mocentassa thullaccaya.m. pacchaa pathavito kesaggamattuddhaare paaraajika.m. pa.thama.m bhuumito mocentassa pana sace bhittiya.m pati.t.thita.t.thaana.m na kuppati, eseva nayo. atha aresu gahetvaa he.t.thaa ka.d.dhantassa bhitti.m phusitvaa .thitokaasassa uparimo anto he.t.thima.m atikkamati, paaraajika.m. maggappa.tipanne yaane yaanasaamiko kenacideva kara.niiyena orohitvaa maggaa okkanto hoti, atha~n~no bhikkhu pa.tipatha.m aagacchanto aarakkhasu~n~na.m passitvaa, ``yaana.m avaharissaamii''ti aarohati, tassa payoga.m vinaayeva go.naa gahetvaa pakkantaa, avahaaro natthi. sesa.m naavaaya.m vuttasadisanti.
[06] yaana.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ito ^a^V1.0269^ea^ para.m bhaaroyeva ^b^bhaara.t.tha.m^eb^. so siisabhaaraadivasena catudhaa dassito. tattha siisabhaaraadiisu asammohattha.m siisaadiina.m paricchedo veditabbo. tattha siisassa taava purimagale galavaa.tako, pi.t.thigale kesa~nci kesante aava.t.to hoti, galasseva ubhosu passesu kesa~nci kesaa oruyha jaayanti, ye ka.n.nacuu.likaati vuccanti, tesa.m adhobhaago caati aya.m he.t.thimaparicchedo, tato upari siisa.m. etthantare .thitabhaaro ^b^siisabhaaro^eb^ naama.

[03]ubhosu ^a^M1.0293^ea^ passesu ka.n.nacuu.likaahi pa.t.thaaya he.t.thaa, kapparehi pa.t.thaaya upari, pi.t.thigalaavattato ca galavaa.takato ca pa.t.thaaya he.t.thaa, pi.t.thivemajjhaavattato ca uraparicchedamajjhe hadayaaavaa.tato ca pa.t.thaaya upari khandho. etthantare .thitabhaaro ^b^khandhabhaaro^eb^ naama.
[03]pi.t.thivemajjhaavattato pana hadayaaavaa.tato ca pa.t.thaaya he.t.thaa yaava paadanakhasikhaa, aya.m ka.tiparicchedo. etthantare samantato sariire .thitabhaaro ^b^ka.tibhaaro^eb^ naama.
[03]kapparato pa.t.thaaya pana he.t.thaa yaava hatthanakhasikhaa, aya.m olambakaparicchedo. etthantare .thitabhaaro ^b^olambako^eb^ naama.

[03]idaani ^b^siise bhaara^eb^ntiaadiisu aya.m apubbavinicchayo ^a^P2.0337^ea^ -- yo bhikkhu ``ida.m gahetvaa ettha yaahii''ti saamikehi anaa.natto sayameva ``mayha.m ida.m naama detha, aha.m vo bha.n.da.m vahaamii''ti tesa.m bha.n.da.m siisena aadaaya gacchanto theyyacittena ta.m bha.n.da.m aamasati, dukka.ta.m. yathaavuttasiisapariccheda.m anatikkaamentova ito cito ca gha.msanto saaretipi paccaasaaretipi, thullaccaya.m. khandha.m oropitamatte ki~ncaapi saamikaana.m ``vahatuu''ti citta.m atthi, tehi pana anaa.nattattaa paaraajika.m. khandha.m pana anoropetvaapi siisato kesaggamatta.m mocentassa paaraajika.m. yamakabhaarassa pana eko bhaaro siise pati.t.thaati, eko pi.t.thiya.m, tattha dvinna.m .thaanaana.m vasena vinicchayo veditabbo. aya.m pana suddhasiisabhaaraadiina.myeva vasena desanaa aaraddhaa. yo caaya.m siisabhaare vutto, khandhabhaaraadiisupi ayameva vinicchayo.
[06] ^b^hatthe^eb^ ^b^bhaara^eb^nti ettha pana hatthena gahitattaa olambako ``hatthe bhaaro''ti vutto.

[03] so pa.thama.myeva bhuumito vaa gahito hotu, suddhacittena siisaadiihi vaa, ``hatthe bhaaro'' tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati ^a^V1.0270^ea^. ta.m theyyacittena taadisa.m gahana.t.thaana.m disvaa bhuumiya.m vaa gacchaadiisu vaa nikkhipantassa hatthato muttamatte paaraajika.m. ^b^bhuumito ga.nhaatii^eb^ti ettha pana tesa.m bhaaraana.m ya.mki~nci paataraasaadikaara.naa suddhacittena bhuumiya.m nikkhipitvaa puna theyyacittena kesaggamatta.m uddharantassa paaraajikanti.
[06] bhaara.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ aaraama.t.thepi ^a^M1.0294^ea^ -- aaraama.m taava dassento ^b^``aaraamo naama pupphaaraamo phalaaraamo''^eb^ti aaha. tesu vassikaadiina.m pupphanako ^b^pupphaaraamo^eb^. ambaphalaadiina.m phalanako ^b^phalaaraamo^eb^. aaraame catuuhi .thaanehi nikkhittassa vinicchayo bhuuma.t.thaadiisu vuttanayo eva.

[03]tatthajaatake pana ^b^muula^eb^nti usiirahiriveraadika.m ya.mki~nci muula.m, ta.m uppaa.tetvaa vaa uppaa.tita.m vaa ga.nhantassa yena muulena vatthu puurati, tasmi.m gahite ^a^P2.0338^ea^ paaraajika.m. kandopi muuleneva sa"ngahito. uppaa.tentassa cettha appamattakepi acchinne thullaccayameva. tattha vinicchayo bhise vuttanayeneva veditabbo. ^b^taca^eb^nti bhesajjatthaaya vaa rajanatthaaya vaa upayogagamanuupaga.m ya.mki~nci rukkhattaca.m; ta.m uppaa.tetvaa vaa uppaa.tita.m vaa ga.nhantassa muule vuttanayena paaraajika.m. ^b^puppha^eb^nti vassikamallikaadika.m ya.mki~nci puppha.m, ta.m ocinitvaa vaa ocinita.m vaa ga.nhantassa uppalapadumesu vuttanayena paaraajika.m. pupphaanampi hi va.n.ta.m vaa bandhana.m vaa acchinna.m rakkhati. va.n.tabbhantare pana kesa~nci suucikaa hoti, saa na rakkhati. ^b^phala^eb^nti ambaphalataalaphalaadika.m ya.mki~nci, ta.m rukkhato ga.nhantassa vinicchayo rukkhe laggitakathaaya.m vutto. apanetvaa .thapita.m bhuuma.t.thaadisa"ngahitameva.

[03]^b^aaraama.m abhiyu~njatii^eb^ti parasantaka.m ``mama santako aya''nti musaa bha.nitvaa abhiyu~njati, adinnaadaanassa payogattaa dukka.ta.m. ^b^saamikassa vimati.m^eb^ ^b^uppaadetii^eb^ti vinicchayakusalataaya balavanissitaadibhaavena vaa aaraamasaamikassa sa.msaya.m janeti. katha.m? ta~nhi tathaa vinicchayappasuta.m disvaa saamiko cinteti -- ``sakkhissaami nu kho aha.m ima.m aaraama.m attano kaatu.m, na sakkhissaami nu kho''ti. eva.m tassa vimati uppajjamaanaa tena uppaaditaa hoti, tasmaa thullaccaya.m aapajjati.

[03]^b^dhura.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0271^ea^ ^b^nikkhipatii^eb^ti yadaa pana saamiko ``aya.m thaddho kakkha.lo jiivitabrahmacariyantaraayampi me kareyya, ala.m daani mayha.m iminaa aaraamenaa''ti dhura.m nikkhipati, abhiyu~njako paaraajika.m aapajjati. sace sayampi katadhuranikkhepo hoti, atha ca pana saamikena dhure nikkhittepi abhiyu~njako dhura.m anikkhipitvaava ``ima.m su.t.thu pii.letvaa mama aa.naapavatti.m dassetvaa ki"nkaarappa.tissaavibhaave ^a^M1.0295^ea^ na.m .thapetvaa dassaamii''ti daatabbabhaave saussaaho hoti, rakkhati taava. athaapi abhiyu~njako ``acchinditvaa ^a^P2.0339^ea^ na daani na.m imassa dassaamii''ti dhura.m nikkhipati, saamiko pana na dhura.m nikkhipati, pakkha.m pariyesati, kaala.m aagameti, ``lajjiparisa.m taava labhaami, pacchaa jaanissaamii''ti puna gaha.neyeva saussaaho hoti, rakkhatiyeva. yadaa pana sopi ``na dassaamii''ti, saamikopi ``na lacchaamii''ti -- eva.m ubhopi dhura.m nikkhipanti, tadaa abhiyu~njakassa paaraajika.m. atha pana abhiyu~njitvaa vinicchaya.m kurumaano ani.t.thite vinicchaye saamikenapi dhuranikkhepe akate attano assaamikabhaava.m jaanantoyeva tato ki~nci puppha.m vaa phala.m vaa ga.nhaati, bha.n.dagghena kaaretabbo.

[03]^b^dhamma.m caranto^eb^ti bhikkhusa"nghe vaa raajakule vaa vinicchaya.m karonto. ^b^saamika.m paraajetii^eb^ti vinicchayikaana.m ukkoca.m datvaa kuu.tasakkhi.m otaaretvaa aaraamasaamika.m jinaatiiti attho. ^b^aapatti paaraajikassaa^eb^ti na kevala.m tasseva, sa~ncicca tassa atthasaadhane pavattaana.m kuu.tavinicchayikaanampi kuu.tasakkhiinampi sabbesa.m paaraajika.m. ettha ca saamikassa dhuranikkhepavaseneva paraajayo veditabbo. anikkhittadhuro hi aparaajitova hoti. ^b^dhamma.m caranto parajjatii^eb^ti sacepi dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena vinicchayassa pavattattaa saya.m paraajaya.m paapu.naati; evampi musaavaadena saamikaana.m pii.laakara.napaccayaa thullaccaya.m aapajjatiiti.
[06] aaraama.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ vihaara.t.thepi -- catuuhi .thaanehi nikkhitta.m vuttanayameva. abhiyogepi cettha caatuddisa.m sa"ngha.m uddissa bhikkhuuna.m dinna.m vihaara.m vaa parive.na.m vaa aavaasa.m vaa mahantampi khuddakampi abhiyu~njato abhiyogo na ruhati. acchinditvaa ga.nhitumpi na sakkoti. kasmaa? sabbesa.m dhuranikkhepaabhaavato. na hettha sabbe caatuddisaa bhikkhuu dhuranikkhepa.m karontiiti ^a^V1.0272^ea^. diighabhaa.nakaadibhedassa pana ga.nassa ekapuggalassa vaa santaka.m abhiyu~njitvaa ga.nhanto sakkoti ^a^M1.0296^ea^ te dhura.m nikkhipaapetu.m. tasmaa tattha aaraame vuttanayena vinicchayo veditabboti.
[06] vihaara.t.thakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ khetta.t.thepi ^a^P2.0340^ea^ -- khetta.m taava dassento ^b^``khetta.m naama yattha pubba.n.na.m vaa apara.n.na.m vaa jaayatii''^eb^ti aaha. tattha ^b^pubba.n.na^eb^nti saaliaadiini satta dha~n~naani; ^b^apara.n.na^eb^nti muggamaasaadiini; ucchukhettaadikampi ettheva sa"ngahita.m. idhaapi catuuhi .thaanehi nikkhitta.m vuttanayameva. tatthajaatake pana saalisiisaadiini nirumbhitvaa vaa ekameka.m hattheneva chinditvaa vaa asitena laayitvaa vaa bahuuni ekato uppaa.tetvaa vaa ga.nhantassa yasmi.m biije vaa siise vaa mu.t.thiya.m vaa muggamaasaadiphale vaa vatthu puurati, tasmi.m bandhanaa mocitamatte paaraajika.m. acchijjamaano pana da.n.dako vaa vaako vaa taco vaa appamattakopi rakkhati.
